engChrName: Aramis students are really tough, despite everything.
engSearchText: Aramis students are really tough, despite everything.
jpnChrName: アラミスの学生の子達……本当に 頼もしいわね、こんな状況でも……
jpnSearchText:
アラミスの学生の子達……本当に
頼もしいわね、こんな状況でも……

engChrName: That girl with the short hair in particular. A natural leader, that one. Won't budge at all.
engSearchText:
That girl with the short hair in particular. A natural
leader, that one. Won't budge at all.
jpnChrName: 特にあっちの、ショートカットの女子とか 全然動じずにリーダーシップを見せてて……
jpnSearchText:
特にあっちの、ショートカットの女子とか
全然動じずにリーダーシップを見せてて……

engChrName: I'm honestly impressed. The future's in good hands, with kids like these.
engSearchText:
I'm honestly impressed. The future's in good hands,
with kids like these.
jpnChrName: 流石というか、こういう子達が将来を 担っていくのね……
jpnSearchText:
流石というか、こういう子達が将来を
担っていくのね……

engChrName: I'm really happy Eve showed up.
engSearchText: I'm really happy Eve showed up.
jpnChrName: ふふ、イヴちゃんが 顔を出してくれて嬉しいわ♪
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、イヴちゃんが
顔を出してくれて嬉しいわ♪

engChrName: Madelaine really likes Apollo, too.
engSearchText: Madelaine really likes Apollo, too.
jpnChrName: マドレーヌも、アポロ君のことが とーっても大好きなんだもの。
jpnSearchText:
マドレーヌも、アポロ君のことが
とーっても大好きなんだもの。

engChrName: Today's the Revolution Festival, so things will be very busy. Take care of yourself, okay?
engSearchText:
Today's the Revolution Festival, so things will be
very busy. Take care of yourself, okay?
jpnChrName: 今日は記念祭で人が多いから 気を付けて楽しんでほしいわねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
今日は記念祭で人が多いから
気を付けて楽しんでほしいわねぇ。

engChrName: The Revolution Festival is almost upon us. I can't be all depressed at a time like this!
engSearchText:
The Revolution Festival is almost upon us. I can't be
all depressed at a time like this!
jpnChrName: もうすぐ記念祭なのね……それなら、 落ち込んでばかりじゃダメよね。
jpnSearchText:
もうすぐ記念祭なのね……それなら、
落ち込んでばかりじゃダメよね。

engChrName: I've been pretty down ever since I heard the news, but it does lift my mood a little seeing all the students enjoy themselves.
engSearchText:
I've been pretty down ever since I heard the news, but
it does lift my mood a little seeing all the students
enjoy themselves.
jpnChrName: あの事件を聞いて以来、気分も沈んでいたけど、 元気な学生の子達を見ていると多少和らぐわ。
jpnSearchText:
あの事件を聞いて以来、気分も沈んでいたけど、
元気な学生の子達を見ていると多少和らぐわ。

engChrName: Young people's happiness is so infectious. Isn't that funny?
engSearchText:
Young people's happiness is so infectious. Isn't
that funny?
jpnChrName: やっぱりね、若い子の元気な感じって 不思議な力があるわよね……
jpnSearchText:
やっぱりね、若い子の元気な感じって
不思議な力があるわよね……

engChrName: We need to set an example as adults. Kids won't be able to greet the new year right if we're all gloomy!
engSearchText:
We need to set an example as adults. Kids won't be
able to greet the new year right if we're all gloomy!
jpnChrName: あの子達が前向きに来年を迎えるためにも、 私達大人が暗くしていてはいけないわよね……
jpnSearchText:
あの子達が前向きに来年を迎えるためにも、
私達大人が暗くしていてはいけないわよね……

engChrName: Myaaau.
engSearchText: Myaaau.
jpnChrName: みぃ～……
jpnSearchText: みぃ～……

engChrName: Myaaau. *purr*
engSearchText: Myaaau. *purr*
jpnChrName: みぃ～……きゅるるる……
jpnSearchText: みぃ～……きゅるるる……

engChrName: These dears are always willing to get close to me when I'm anxious.
engSearchText:
These dears are always willing to get close to me
when I'm anxious.
jpnChrName: この子も私が不安がっている時、 こうして寄り添ってくれるのよね……
jpnSearchText:
この子も私が不安がっている時、
こうして寄り添ってくれるのよね……

engChrName: I guess even kittens can tell how people feel.
engSearchText: I guess even kittens can tell how people feel.
jpnChrName: やっぱり、仔猫にも人の気持ちって 伝わるものなのかしらねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり、仔猫にも人の気持ちって
伝わるものなのかしらねぇ。

engChrName: Meow!
engSearchText: Meow!
jpnChrName: みゃいっ！
jpnSearchText: みゃいっ！

engChrName: It's been more than ten years since I retired, but I still know the basics of combat.
engSearchText:
It's been more than ten years since I retired, but I still
know the basics of combat.
jpnChrName: ……退役して十年以上経つとはいえ、 最低限の戦いの心得えはある。
jpnSearchText:
……退役して十年以上経つとはいえ、
最低限の戦いの心得えはある。

engChrName: I'd have no regrets if my last service was to protect the people of this city.
engSearchText:
I'd have no regrets if my last service was to protect the
people of this city.
jpnChrName: 老骨最後の奉仕と思って、街の者らを 守る一助になれれば幸いじゃ……
jpnSearchText:
老骨最後の奉仕と思って、街の者らを
守る一助になれれば幸いじゃ……

engChrName: The young'uns seem capable, so I could probably just leave things to them, but I don't want to just sit back.
engSearchText:
The young'uns seem capable, so I could probably just
leave things to them, but I don't want to just sit back.
jpnChrName: 頼もしい若者らもおるようじゃが…… 儂も少しだけ働くとするぞ。
jpnSearchText:
頼もしい若者らもおるようじゃが……
儂も少しだけ働くとするぞ。

engChrName: A nationwide memorial, huh? I guess all we can really do for the dead is mourn them.
engSearchText:
A nationwide memorial, huh? I guess all we can really
do for the dead is mourn them.
jpnChrName: ……国を挙げての追悼式典か。 確かに儂らにできるのは弔う事だけじゃが……
jpnSearchText:
……国を挙げての追悼式典か。
確かに儂らにできるのは弔う事だけじゃが……

engChrName: But announcing that at the same time as the president's shiny new weapon feels tone-deaf.
engSearchText:
But announcing that at the same time as the
president's shiny new weapon feels tone-deaf.
jpnChrName: それと同時に大統領閣下肝入りの新兵器の 発表をしたのはどうにもなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
それと同時に大統領閣下肝入りの新兵器の
発表をしたのはどうにもなぁ……

engChrName: I can't help but feel anxious. We still don't really know what weapon was used to destroy Creil Village.
engSearchText:
I can't help but feel anxious. We still don't really
know what weapon was used to destroy Creil Village.
jpnChrName: クレイユ村を滅ぼしたのも、得体の知れぬ 兵器と言うし……不安を感じるというか……
jpnSearchText:
クレイユ村を滅ぼしたのも、得体の知れぬ
兵器と言うし……不安を感じるというか……

engChrName: Even if the perpetrators were captured, what happened in Creil cannot be undone.
engSearchText:
Even if the perpetrators were captured, what
happened in Creil cannot be undone.
jpnChrName: クレイユ村の事は……犯人が捕まったとはいえ、 到底忘れられるものではない……
jpnSearchText:
クレイユ村の事は……犯人が捕まったとはいえ、
到底忘れられるものではない……

engChrName: I'd been there a few times before, since I used to be border patrol.
engSearchText:
I'd been there a few times before, since I used to be
border patrol.
jpnChrName: 儂は若い頃、国境警備隊にいたのでな。 あの村にも立ち寄った事があったが……
jpnSearchText:
儂は若い頃、国境警備隊にいたのでな。
あの村にも立ち寄った事があったが……

engChrName: I risked my life to defend that place. And to think about what happened to it...
engSearchText:
I risked my life to defend that place. And to think
about what happened to it...
jpnChrName: それだけに守ってきた国土が、村が 蹂躙された事はどうにもな……
jpnSearchText:
それだけに守ってきた国土が、村が
蹂躙された事はどうにもな……

engChrName: That's a horrifying weapon that the mafia used.
engSearchText: That's a horrifying weapon that the mafia used.
jpnChrName: それにしても……マフィア共がかくも 凶悪な兵器を使ったとはな……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても……マフィア共がかくも
凶悪な兵器を使ったとはな……

engChrName: First it was Crossbell's new weapon from last year, and now this. How much farther will we take these ghastly weapons?
engSearchText:
First it was Crossbell's new weapon from last year,
and now this. How much farther will we take these
ghastly weapons?
jpnChrName: 一昨年のクロスベルに現れた兵器もそうだが、 破壊兵器というのはどこまで進化するのか……
jpnSearchText:
一昨年のクロスベルに現れた兵器もそうだが、
破壊兵器というのはどこまで進化するのか……

engChrName: At this rate, I hope we don't end up destroying the entire continent.
engSearchText:
At this rate, I hope we don't end up destroying the
entire continent.
jpnChrName: いつか、大陸そのものを滅ぼすような 事態にならねばいいが……
jpnSearchText:
いつか、大陸そのものを滅ぼすような
事態にならねばいいが……

engChrName: Apollo's going to protect us!
engSearchText: Apollo's going to protect us!
jpnChrName: アポロがみんなを守ってくれるって──
jpnSearchText: アポロがみんなを守ってくれるって──

engChrName: And that old man's gonna stand guard in front of the store!
engSearchText:
And that old man's gonna stand guard in front of
the store!
jpnChrName: さっきのお爺さんも店の前に 立っててくれるし……
jpnSearchText:
さっきのお爺さんも店の前に
立っててくれるし……

engChrName: W-We're safe. It's all gonna go back to normal...right?
engSearchText:
W-We're safe. It's all gonna go back to
normal...right?
jpnChrName: 私たち、大丈夫だよね……？ ……きっと元に戻れるよね……！？
jpnSearchText:
私たち、大丈夫だよね……？
……きっと元に戻れるよね……！？

engChrName: I befriended Francois while we were out on a walk.
engSearchText: I befriended Francois while we were out on a walk.
jpnChrName: フランソワさんとは散歩ついでに 仲良くなったのよ。
jpnSearchText:
フランソワさんとは散歩ついでに
仲良くなったのよ。

engChrName: Well, more like Apollo and Madelaine did...
engSearchText: Well, more like Apollo and Madelaine did...
jpnChrName: というか……アポロとマドレーヌが 仲良くなっちゃった感じなのかしら？
jpnSearchText:
というか……アポロとマドレーヌが
仲良くなっちゃった感じなのかしら？

engChrName: Oh, whatever! I'm happy I got to enjoy some time with my neighbors!
engSearchText:
Oh, whatever! I'm happy I got to enjoy some time
with my neighbors!
jpnChrName: ま、ともかくご近所さんと のんびりできるのっていいわよね！
jpnSearchText:
ま、ともかくご近所さんと
のんびりできるのっていいわよね！

engChrName: Wow, what a sight! You can see the whole front of the station!
engSearchText:
Wow, what a sight! You can see the whole front of
the station!
jpnChrName: わわっ、いい景色～！ 駅前がぜんぶ見渡せるなんて！
jpnSearchText:
わわっ、いい景色～！
駅前がぜんぶ見渡せるなんて！

engChrName: Come on, Apollo! You bark and I yell 'hello!'
engSearchText: Come on, Apollo! You bark and I yell 'hello!'
jpnChrName: 『ヤッホー』って言いたく なっちゃうわよね、アポロっ！
jpnSearchText:
『ヤッホー』って言いたく
なっちゃうわよね、アポロっ！

engChrName: Woof?
engSearchText: Woof?
jpnChrName: ……ウォフン？
jpnSearchText: ……ウォフン？

engChrName: I was just taking a walk around the urban part of town for a change of pace.
engSearchText:
I was just taking a walk around the urban part of
town for a change of pace.
jpnChrName: たまには気分を変えて ビル街を歩いてみたけど……
jpnSearchText:
たまには気分を変えて
ビル街を歩いてみたけど……

engChrName: Kinda surprised to find a basketball court here.
engSearchText: Kinda surprised to find a basketball court here.
jpnChrName: ふーん、こんな所に バスケコートなんてあったのね。
jpnSearchText:
ふーん、こんな所に
バスケコートなんてあったのね。

engChrName: How about it, Apollo? Want to play ball?
engSearchText: How about it, Apollo? Want to play ball?
jpnChrName: どう、アポロ。 お前もボール遊びしてみる？
jpnSearchText:
どう、アポロ。
お前もボール遊びしてみる？

engChrName: Woof, woof!
engSearchText: Woof, woof!
jpnChrName: ウォフウォフ！
jpnSearchText: ウォフウォフ！

engChrName: Let's walk around here today, Apollo!
engSearchText: Let's walk around here today, Apollo!
jpnChrName: 今日の散歩ルートは この辺りにしよっか、アポロ！
jpnSearchText:
今日の散歩ルートは
この辺りにしよっか、アポロ！

engChrName: Woof, woof!
engSearchText: Woof, woof!
jpnChrName: ウォフウォフ！
jpnSearchText: ウォフウォフ！

engChrName: Haha! You're always so energetic!
engSearchText: Haha! You're always so energetic!
jpnChrName: あははっ、お前はいつも元気ね！
jpnSearchText: あははっ、お前はいつも元気ね！

engChrName: Happy Revolution Festival, Francois!
engSearchText: Happy Revolution Festival, Francois!
jpnChrName: フランソワさん、記念祭 おめでと～ございます！
jpnSearchText:
フランソワさん、記念祭
おめでと～ございます！

engChrName: Oh, goodness. Hello, Eve! Happy festival, darling.
engSearchText: Oh, goodness. Hello, Eve! Happy festival, darling.
jpnChrName: あらあら、イヴちゃん！ ふふっ、おめでとう！
jpnSearchText:
あらあら、イヴちゃん！
ふふっ、おめでとう！

engChrName: Out alone today again? I really appreciate when you visit...
engSearchText:
Out alone today again? I really appreciate when
you visit...
jpnChrName: 今日も一人でお散歩かしら？ いつも会いに来てくれて嬉しいけど──
jpnSearchText:
今日も一人でお散歩かしら？
いつも会いに来てくれて嬉しいけど──

engChrName: ...but it's the Revolution Festival today. Shouldn't you be spending it with your family?
engSearchText:
...but it's the Revolution Festival today. Shouldn't you
be spending it with your family?
jpnChrName: せっかくの記念祭だし、 友達やご家族と楽しんではどう？
jpnSearchText:
せっかくの記念祭だし、
友達やご家族と楽しんではどう？

engChrName: Well, my parents are busy. And it's more fun spending time with Apollo!
engSearchText:
Well, my parents are busy. And it's more fun
spending time with Apollo!
jpnChrName: う～ん、ウチの親忙しいし…… アポロと二人の方が楽なんです。
jpnSearchText:
う～ん、ウチの親忙しいし……
アポロと二人の方が楽なんです。

engChrName: I'm gonna go have fun visiting the cathedral and the pâtisserie!
engSearchText:
I'm gonna go have fun visiting the cathedral and
the pâtisserie!
jpnChrName: 今日は大聖堂とかパティスリーとか回って マンキツする予定ですよ！
jpnSearchText:
今日は大聖堂とかパティスリーとか回って
マンキツする予定ですよ！

engChrName: I see, I see. Well, there's gonna be a lot of people around, so be careful!
engSearchText:
I see, I see. Well, there's gonna be a lot of people
around, so be careful!
jpnChrName: そっかそっか…… うふふ、人が多いから気を付けてね？
jpnSearchText:
そっかそっか……
うふふ、人が多いから気を付けてね？

engChrName: *whine* Grrrrr!
engSearchText: *whine* Grrrrr!
jpnChrName: ウウウゥゥゥ……グルルルル……
jpnSearchText: ウウウゥゥゥ……グルルルル……

engChrName: Meow, meow!
engSearchText: Meow, meow!
jpnChrName: みぃー、みぃー♪
jpnSearchText: みぃー、みぃー♪

engChrName: Woof! *howl* Woofwoof!
engSearchText: Woof! *howl* Woofwoof!
jpnChrName: ワオン、キュゥゥン♪ アンアン！
jpnSearchText:
ワオン、キュゥゥン♪
アンアン！

engChrName: Who's a good boy? Oh, yes, it's you! Come on, Apollo! Let's take a walk around the neighborhood!
engSearchText:
Who's a good boy? Oh, yes, it's you! Come
on, Apollo! Let's take a walk around
the neighborhood!
jpnChrName: よしよし、いい子いい子。 今日は近所を散歩しよっか、アポロ！
jpnSearchText:
よしよし、いい子いい子。
今日は近所を散歩しよっか、アポロ！

engChrName: Woofwoof! Woof!
engSearchText: Woofwoof! Woof!
jpnChrName: ウォフウォフ！　ウォフ～！
jpnSearchText: ウォフウォフ！　ウォフ～！

engChrName: What's that? You wanna go play with your friend?
engSearchText: What's that? You wanna go play with your friend?
jpnChrName: えっ、仲良しの子と遊びたい？
jpnSearchText: えっ、仲良しの子と遊びたい？

engChrName: Okay, okay. We'll stop by at the end of the walk!
engSearchText: Okay, okay. We'll stop by at the end of the walk!
jpnChrName: 分かった分かった、 じゃあ散歩の最後に立ち寄りますか♪
jpnSearchText:
分かった分かった、
じゃあ散歩の最後に立ち寄りますか♪

engChrName: The Auber District might be free now, but there's still some frozen people around.
engSearchText:
The Auber District might be free now, but there's
still some frozen people around.
jpnChrName: ……オーベル地区が解放されたとはいえ、 “停まった”ままの人は依然としています。
jpnSearchText:
……オーベル地区が解放されたとはいえ、
“停まった”ままの人は依然としています。

engChrName: Most of the embassy staff and Elsaim's envoys are still frozen.
engSearchText:
Most of the embassy staff and Elsaim's envoys are
still frozen.
jpnChrName: 大使館の職員やエルザイム使節の方々も、 ほとんどが……
jpnSearchText:
大使館の職員やエルザイム使節の方々も、
ほとんどが……

engChrName: We'll continue to provide security, regardless of how long this anomaly takes to go away.
engSearchText:
We'll continue to provide security, regardless of how
long this anomaly takes to go away.
jpnChrName: 異変がいつまで続くにせよ、彼らの安全も 確保しておかねばなりません。
jpnSearchText:
異変がいつまで続くにせよ、彼らの安全も
確保しておかねばなりません。

engChrName: I will protect the people of the embassy. I hope you'll do your part.
engSearchText:
I will protect the people of the embassy. I hope you'll
do your part.
jpnChrName: 大使館と関係者は私が守りますので…… 皆さまは、為すべき事をなさってください。
jpnSearchText:
大使館と関係者は私が守りますので……
皆さまは、為すべき事をなさってください。

engChrName: The high-ranking officials from the principality that came for the festival are in the embassy.
engSearchText:
The high-ranking officials from the principality that
came for the festival are in the embassy.
jpnChrName: 記念祭を見届けるため、追加で入国した 公国の高官達も大使館にいらっしゃいます。
jpnSearchText:
記念祭を見届けるため、追加で入国した
公国の高官達も大使館にいらっしゃいます。

engChrName: Sadly, the grand prince and the princess were not able to come this year.
engSearchText:
Sadly, the grand prince and the princess were not able
to come this year.
jpnChrName: 公王陛下や姫君については、今年は いらっしゃる事が出来なかったようですが……
jpnSearchText:
公王陛下や姫君については、今年は
いらっしゃる事が出来なかったようですが……

engChrName: Regardless of that, they were still able to send a telegram wishing for a long and healthy relationship with us.
engSearchText:
Regardless of that, they were still able to send a
telegram wishing for a long and healthy relationship
with us.
jpnChrName: それでも例年通り、祝電を大統領府に贈られ、 今後一層の友好と繁栄を祈られたとの事です。
jpnSearchText:
それでも例年通り、祝電を大統領府に贈られ、
今後一層の友好と繁栄を祈られたとの事です。

engChrName: Prince Sherid, who's come for the Revolution Festival, is staying in this embassy.
engSearchText:
Prince Sherid, who's come for the Revolution
Festival, is staying in this embassy.
jpnChrName: 記念祭に際して来訪されたシェリド殿下は、 この大使館に宿泊されておりますが……
jpnSearchText:
記念祭に際して来訪されたシェリド殿下は、
この大使館に宿泊されておりますが……

engChrName: He comes and goes ever so often. He has been enjoying sightseeing around Edith.
engSearchText:
He comes and goes ever so often. He has been
enjoying sightseeing around Edith.
jpnChrName: 時々、予定にもないのに出歩いて イーディスの娯楽を満喫されているようで……
jpnSearchText:
時々、予定にもないのに出歩いて
イーディスの娯楽を満喫されているようで……

engChrName: It's a little concerning, to be frank, even though I know he has Ms. Naje as an escort.
engSearchText:
It's a little concerning, to be frank, even though I
know he has Ms. Naje as an escort.
jpnChrName: ナージェ殿の護衛があるとはいえ、 流石に不安でなりませんよ。
jpnSearchText:
ナージェ殿の護衛があるとはいえ、
流石に不安でなりませんよ。

engChrName: But I can't deny that it's quite charming to see the prince cut loose.
engSearchText:
But I can't deny that it's quite charming to see the
prince cut loose.
jpnChrName: もっとも……そんな奔放な殿下が、 私も好きなのですけどねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
もっとも……そんな奔放な殿下が、
私も好きなのですけどねぇ……

engChrName: Him being so easygoing has made him well liked amongst the embassy staff.
engSearchText:
Him being so easygoing has made him well liked
amongst the embassy staff.
jpnChrName: 大使館職員の皆さまも、殿下のああした 親しみやすい面も含めて敬愛されているようで。
jpnSearchText:
大使館職員の皆さまも、殿下のああした
親しみやすい面も含めて敬愛されているようで。

engChrName: Never thought you'd end up rescuing me, Van. You have my thanks.
engSearchText:
Never thought you'd end up rescuing me, Van.
You have my thanks.
jpnChrName: まさかヴァン君に助けられる事になるとはね。 改めてお礼を言わせてもらうよ。
jpnSearchText:
まさかヴァン君に助けられる事になるとはね。
改めてお礼を言わせてもらうよ。

engChrName: I honestly panicked when this whole thing started, but at least I managed to make sure people nearby were safe.
engSearchText:
I honestly panicked when this whole thing started,
but at least I managed to make sure people nearby
were safe.
jpnChrName: 急な異変で私も戸惑ってはいたが…… とりあえず近くにいた人は保護しておいた。
jpnSearchText:
急な異変で私も戸惑ってはいたが……
とりあえず近くにいた人は保護しておいた。

engChrName: I'll do what I can for now. Though there's not much I can offer you save for some sugary snacks.
engSearchText:
I'll do what I can for now. Though there's not much I
can offer you save for some sugary snacks.
jpnChrName: ともかく……私も可能な範囲で力にはなろう。 食料補給は甘味しか用意できないが──
jpnSearchText:
ともかく……私も可能な範囲で力にはなろう。
食料補給は甘味しか用意できないが──

engChrName: But I guess you're not one to turn your nose up at those, eh?
engSearchText:
But I guess you're not one to turn your nose up at
those, eh?
jpnChrName: フフ、ヴァン君ならその方が 士気が上がるんじゃないかな？
jpnSearchText:
フフ、ヴァン君ならその方が
士気が上がるんじゃないかな？

engChrName: Business is always good around the festival, but this year's looking to break a record or two.
engSearchText:
Business is always good around the festival, but this
year's looking to break a record or two.
jpnChrName: やはり記念祭の期間中は一層繁盛するが、 今年は去年まで以上になるね。
jpnSearchText:
やはり記念祭の期間中は一層繁盛するが、
今年は去年まで以上になるね。

engChrName: We might have to thank the orbal net for getting word around. We got a lot of tourists, too.
engSearchText:
We might have to thank the orbal net for getting
word around. We got a lot of tourists, too.
jpnChrName: 外国から来てくれたお客さんも多いけど、 やっぱり導力ネットの口コミとかかな？
jpnSearchText:
外国から来てくれたお客さんも多いけど、
やっぱり導力ネットの口コミとかかな？

engChrName: I'm glad to see people enjoying themselves. I just hope I don't run out of stock...
engSearchText:
I'm glad to see people enjoying themselves. I just
hope I don't run out of stock...
jpnChrName: 何にせよ、多くの人に喜んでもらえる事は 良いけど、品切れは流石に心配だね。
jpnSearchText:
何にせよ、多くの人に喜んでもらえる事は
良いけど、品切れは流石に心配だね。

engChrName: Got something set aside for regulars, of course.
engSearchText: Got something set aside for regulars, of course.
jpnChrName: 昔からの常連さんたちの分も、 ちゃんと取っておきたいからね。
jpnSearchText:
昔からの常連さんたちの分も、
ちゃんと取っておきたいからね。

engChrName: Why, hello, Agnès and...
engSearchText: Why, hello, Agnès and...
jpnChrName: おや……アニエスさんに、そちらの方は……
jpnSearchText: おや……アニエスさんに、そちらの方は……

engChrName: Why, it's Van! Van, you rascal! I haven't seen you in quite some time!
engSearchText:
Why, it's Van! Van, you rascal! I haven't seen you in
quite some time!
jpnChrName: ヴァン君、ヴァン君じゃないか！ はは、随分と久しぶりに来てくれたね。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン君、ヴァン君じゃないか！
はは、随分と久しぶりに来てくれたね。

engChrName: I guess it would make sense that you'd know Holland.
engSearchText: I guess it would make sense that you'd know Holland.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、ホランドさんとやっぱり お知り合いだったんですか？
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさん、ホランドさんとやっぱり
お知り合いだったんですか？

engChrName: Considering what you'll do for their treats, it's really no surprise you'd come before, Van.
engSearchText:
Considering what you'll do for their treats, it's really
no surprise you'd come before, Van.
jpnChrName: まあ、ここのお菓子に目がない以上、 来た事はあるだろうなとは思いましたが……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、ここのお菓子に目がない以上、
来た事はあるだろうなとは思いましたが……

engChrName: Yeah, but I haven't been around in a long while. How the hell do you still remember me?
engSearchText:
Yeah, but I haven't been around in a long while.
How the hell do you still remember me?
jpnChrName: まあ、直に来れたのは何年も前になるが…… ホランドさんがまさか覚えていてくれたとは。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、直に来れたのは何年も前になるが……
ホランドさんがまさか覚えていてくれたとは。

engChrName: It's my job! My customers' gratitude carries me forward in the art of confectionary. I make the best sweets for their enjoyment.
engSearchText:
It's my job! My customers' gratitude carries me
forward in the art of confectionary. I make the best
sweets for their enjoyment.
jpnChrName: はは、私はお客様への感謝を込めて お菓子を作っている立場だしね。
jpnSearchText:
はは、私はお客様への感謝を込めて
お菓子を作っている立場だしね。

engChrName: And no one enjoys them as much as you do! I could never forget someone so passionate for my sweets.
engSearchText:
And no one enjoys them as much as you do! I could
never forget someone so passionate for my sweets.
jpnChrName: 常連さんの顔を忘れる事は無いよ、君ほど 熱心に食べてくれていた人なら尚更さ。
jpnSearchText:
常連さんの顔を忘れる事は無いよ、君ほど
熱心に食べてくれていた人なら尚更さ。

engChrName: There's somethin' nice about being remembered, even if I haven't been here in forever.
engSearchText:
There's somethin' nice about being remembered, even
if I haven't been here in forever.
jpnChrName: ハッ……まあ、しばらく顔は出していなかったが、 覚えててもらえるのも悪い気はしねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……まあ、しばらく顔は出していなかったが、
覚えててもらえるのも悪い気はしねぇな。

engChrName: You haven't lost your touch. I've had stuff from Andalucía since and it's still great.
engSearchText:
You haven't lost your touch. I've had stuff from
Andalucía since and it's still great.
jpnChrName: 贈り物でなら《アンダルシア》の菓子、何度か 食ったが相変わらず見事な味わいだったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
贈り物でなら《アンダルシア》の菓子、何度か
食ったが相変わらず見事な味わいだったぜ。

engChrName: I think I'll swing by more often, if I have the time.
engSearchText: I think I'll swing by more often, if I have the time.
jpnChrName: 今後はまあ、機会があればまた 顔を出してみるとするかな。
jpnSearchText:
今後はまあ、機会があればまた
顔を出してみるとするかな。

engChrName: Feel free to do so! Regulars like you make getting up in the mornings worth it.
engSearchText:
Feel free to do so! Regulars like you make getting up
in the mornings worth it.
jpnChrName: ああ、そうしてもらえると私も嬉しいよ。 君のような常連がいれば、一層やり甲斐が湧くね。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、そうしてもらえると私も嬉しいよ。
君のような常連がいれば、一層やり甲斐が湧くね。

engChrName: Though I never would have imagined that the two of you would walk through my door together.
engSearchText:
Though I never would have imagined that the
two of you would walk through my door together.
jpnChrName: ……しかし、アニエスさんとヴァン君が一緒に 来る事になったのは流石に意外だなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
……しかし、アニエスさんとヴァン君が一緒に
来る事になったのは流石に意外だなぁ。

engChrName: Wait, was that package Agnès bought this summer for you?
engSearchText:
Wait, was that package Agnès bought this summer
for you?
jpnChrName: あ、もしかしてアニエスさんが夏あたりに 贈呈用に買って行った品はヴァン君に……？
jpnSearchText:
あ、もしかしてアニエスさんが夏あたりに
贈呈用に買って行った品はヴァン君に……？

engChrName: That's a good guess.
engSearchText: That's a good guess.
jpnChrName: ふふ、実はそうなんです。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、実はそうなんです。

engChrName: Small world out there, huh.
engSearchText: Small world out there, huh.
jpnChrName: なるほど、それは一層縁を感じるね。
jpnSearchText: なるほど、それは一層縁を感じるね。

engChrName: Well, I'll be busier than ever since the festival's almost here, but I don't want you taking that as an excuse to not come by!
engSearchText:
Well, I'll be busier than ever since the festival's almost
here, but I don't want you taking that as an excuse to
not come by!
jpnChrName: 記念祭期間中は普段以上に忙しいけど、 ヴァン君には是非また来て欲しいね。
jpnSearchText:
記念祭期間中は普段以上に忙しいけど、
ヴァン君には是非また来て欲しいね。

engChrName: Sure thing, man. I'll fit in a visit or two.
engSearchText: Sure thing, man. I'll fit in a visit or two.
jpnChrName: ああ、暇を見つけて寄らせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、暇を見つけて寄らせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: The year's been rough, but I wasn't expecting to cap it off by seeing an old regular.
engSearchText:
The year's been rough, but I wasn't expecting to cap it
off by seeing an old regular.
jpnChrName: しかし、大変な事があった一年の締め括りに 昔の常連さんと再会できるとはね。
jpnSearchText:
しかし、大変な事があった一年の締め括りに
昔の常連さんと再会できるとはね。

engChrName: I don't know what you've been up to since I last saw you, but I do remember you very well from back then.
engSearchText:
I don't know what you've been up to since I last saw
you, but I do remember you very well from back then.
jpnChrName: ヴァン君があの後どうしていたかは知らないけど、 来てくれていた時の事はよく覚えている。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン君があの後どうしていたかは知らないけど、
来てくれていた時の事はよく覚えている。

engChrName: Even though you always looked embarrassed to be here, you'd have the biggest smile anytime you ate anything.
engSearchText:
Even though you always looked embarrassed to be
here, you'd have the biggest smile anytime you
ate anything.
jpnChrName: 少し恥ずかしそうに買いながら、 とても幸せそうに食べてくれていたものさ。
jpnSearchText:
少し恥ずかしそうに買いながら、
とても幸せそうに食べてくれていたものさ。

engChrName: It's my duty to help them as an Andalucía devotee.
engSearchText: It's my duty to help them as an Andalucía devotee.
jpnChrName: 《アンダルシア》のファンとして、 今こそお手伝いをしなくっちゃ……！
jpnSearchText:
《アンダルシア》のファンとして、
今こそお手伝いをしなくっちゃ……！

engChrName: This will all end eventually, and the store will soon return to normal!
engSearchText:
This will all end eventually, and the store will soon
return to normal!
jpnChrName: だって……異変も必ず終わって、 このお店もいつも通りに戻れるはずだもの！
jpnSearchText:
だって……異変も必ず終わって、
このお店もいつも通りに戻れるはずだもの！

engChrName: I shall do the utmost for Holland. And then I will be able to enjoy my bounty once everything is resolved!
engSearchText:
I shall do the utmost for Holland. And then I will be
able to enjoy my bounty once everything is resolved!
jpnChrName: その時に、いつものように全力で楽しめる ためにもホランドさんを支えないと……！
jpnSearchText:
その時に、いつものように全力で楽しめる
ためにもホランドさんを支えないと……！

engChrName: The Revolution Festival is awfully busy this year. I guess more and more people outside the country are becoming acquainted with it.
engSearchText:
The Revolution Festival is awfully busy this year.
I guess more and more people outside the country are
becoming acquainted with it.
jpnChrName: 記念祭とは言え……凄い賑わい。 やっぱり外国での知名度上がってきたのね……
jpnSearchText:
記念祭とは言え……凄い賑わい。
やっぱり外国での知名度上がってきたのね……

engChrName: Holland's probably gonna clean up store. It'll be a hard endeavor, still, with these many people.
engSearchText:
Holland's probably gonna clean up store. It'll be a
hard endeavor, still, with these many people.
jpnChrName: でも、これだと売り切れにならないかもだけど、 ホランドさんが大変じゃないか心配なの……
jpnSearchText:
でも、これだと売り切れにならないかもだけど、
ホランドさんが大変じゃないか心配なの……

engChrName: If Holland were to collapse from overworking, that... That would be unacceptable!
engSearchText:
If Holland were to collapse from overworking, that...
That would be unacceptable!
jpnChrName: ホランドさんがもし倒れてしまったりしたら…… 私は……私は……ッ！
jpnSearchText:
ホランドさんがもし倒れてしまったりしたら……
私は……私は……ッ！

engChrName: My ardent passion shone through today as I bought one of Holland's masterpieces!
engSearchText:
My ardent passion shone through today as I bought
one of Holland's masterpieces!
jpnChrName: よし……！　今日も心を込めて一品、 ホランドさんの作品を買えた……！
jpnSearchText:
よし……！　今日も心を込めて一品、
ホランドさんの作品を買えた……！

engChrName: Holland endeavors wholeheartedly every day to deliver us the sweetest treats.
engSearchText:
Holland endeavors wholeheartedly every day to
deliver us the sweetest treats.
jpnChrName: ホランドさんは心を込めて私達に あの素晴らしいお菓子を作ってくれている……
jpnSearchText:
ホランドさんは心を込めて私達に
あの素晴らしいお菓子を作ってくれている……

engChrName: It's our duty as customers to put our body and soul into purchasing and enjoying his confections!
engSearchText:
It's our duty as customers to put our body and soul
into purchasing and enjoying his confections!
jpnChrName: だったら、私達も心を込めて買って、 しっかり味わわないと失礼よね……！
jpnSearchText:
だったら、私達も心を込めて買って、
しっかり味わわないと失礼よね……！

engChrName: I managed to get in touch with the Old Town church and the Riverside temple.
engSearchText:
I managed to get in touch with the Old Town church
and the Riverside temple.
jpnChrName: 旧市街の礼拝堂やリバーサイドの寺院とも 連絡がついたのです。
jpnSearchText:
旧市街の礼拝堂やリバーサイドの寺院とも
連絡がついたのです。

engChrName: I'm not sure why, but Sister Philia is over in Riverside.
engSearchText:
I'm not sure why, but Sister Philia is over
in Riverside.
jpnChrName: 何故かシスター・フィリアが リバーサイドにいるようでしたが……
jpnSearchText:
何故かシスター・フィリアが
リバーサイドにいるようでしたが……

engChrName: She's been putting in a genuine effort to secure the local citizenry. We ought to follow her example.
engSearchText:
She's been putting in a genuine effort to secure the
local citizenry. We ought to follow her example.
jpnChrName: 積極的に近隣の住民の保護を行っている様子。 我々も負けてはおれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
積極的に近隣の住民の保護を行っている様子。
我々も負けてはおれませんね。

engChrName: The blessing of the Goddess will surely be with you. Please do be careful!
engSearchText:
The blessing of the Goddess will surely be with you.
Please do be careful!
jpnChrName: ──あなた方にも必ずや女神の加護があるでしょう。 どうかお気をつけて……！
jpnSearchText:
──あなた方にも必ずや女神の加護があるでしょう。
どうかお気をつけて……！

engChrName: As I understand, this cathedral is being protected by an invisible barrier.
engSearchText:
As I understand, this cathedral is being protected by
an invisible barrier.
jpnChrName: この大聖堂には、不可視の結界のようなものが 存在すると言われております。
jpnSearchText:
この大聖堂には、不可視の結界のようなものが
存在すると言われております。

engChrName: It should deny entry to any of these devils, but we mustn't rest on our laurels.
engSearchText:
It should deny entry to any of these devils, but we
mustn't rest on our laurels.
jpnChrName: “悪魔”も侵入できないはずですが…… 油断は禁物でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
“悪魔”も侵入できないはずですが……
油断は禁物でしょう。

engChrName: Please do be careful. And mind that boy we spoke of.
engSearchText: Please do be careful. And mind that boy we spoke of.
jpnChrName: 貴方がたもどうかお気をつけて。 例の少年の事は頼みましたよ。
jpnSearchText:
貴方がたもどうかお気をつけて。
例の少年の事は頼みましたよ。

engChrName: The festival has come at last. We'll be holding a memorial service in the cathedral for Creil Village.
engSearchText:
The festival has come at last. We'll be holding a
memorial service in the cathedral for Creil Village.
jpnChrName: いよいよ記念祭が始まりましたね。 大聖堂でもクレイユ村の追悼式典を執り行います。
jpnSearchText:
いよいよ記念祭が始まりましたね。
大聖堂でもクレイユ村の追悼式典を執り行います。

engChrName: What a horrible tragedy it was. And yet life goes on, and we must move along with it.
engSearchText:
What a horrible tragedy it was. And yet life goes on,
and we must move along with it.
jpnChrName: 本当に痛ましい事件でしたが── それでも我々は前に進んでいかねばなりません。
jpnSearchText:
本当に痛ましい事件でしたが──
それでも我々は前に進んでいかねばなりません。

engChrName: Our part is to mourn the dead, not be left behind with them or they will never find peace. May we all be blessed by the Goddess.
engSearchText:
Our part is to mourn the dead, not be left behind
with them or they will never find peace. May we all
be blessed by the Goddess.
jpnChrName: 悲しみを受け止め、魂の安寧を祈りましょう。 皆様にも空の女神の加護があらん事を。
jpnSearchText:
悲しみを受け止め、魂の安寧を祈りましょう。
皆様にも空の女神の加護があらん事を。

engChrName: Welcome to Edith Grand Cathedral. We're currently holding a memorial mass for Creil Village.
engSearchText:
Welcome to Edith Grand Cathedral. We're currently
holding a memorial mass for Creil Village.
jpnChrName: イーディス大聖堂へようこそ、 現在クレイユ村の追悼ミサを行っております。
jpnSearchText:
イーディス大聖堂へようこそ、
現在クレイユ村の追悼ミサを行っております。

engChrName: There will also be a memorial service during the festival. Many will come to pay their respects then.
engSearchText:
There will also be a memorial service during
the festival. Many will come to pay their
respects then.
jpnChrName: 記念祭当日にも追悼式典を予定していますが、 連日祈りに来られる方も多いですから。
jpnSearchText:
記念祭当日にも追悼式典を予定していますが、
連日祈りに来られる方も多いですから。

engChrName: It isn't terribly busy right now, which might be ideal for those of a weary heart that might want to mourn in a more reserved manner.
engSearchText:
It isn't terribly busy right now, which might be ideal
for those of a weary heart that might want to mourn
in a more reserved manner.
jpnChrName: 今でしたらそこまで混み合っておりませんし、 静かに祈りを捧げられるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
今でしたらそこまで混み合っておりませんし、
静かに祈りを捧げられるでしょう。

engChrName: I do wonder whether Sister Philia will be able to handle things, what with the large ceremony coming up...
engSearchText:
I do wonder whether Sister Philia will be able to
handle things, what with the large ceremony
coming up...
jpnChrName: しかし、このような大規模な式典を前に シスター・フィリアは大丈夫でしょうか……
jpnSearchText:
しかし、このような大規模な式典を前に
シスター・フィリアは大丈夫でしょうか……

engChrName: Sister Philia confessed this morning, but I'm not sure what it was about.
engSearchText:
Sister Philia confessed this morning, but I'm not
sure what it was about.
jpnChrName: 今朝方、シスター・オルゼに何やら懺悔をして いたようですが、よくわからない話なもので。
jpnSearchText:
今朝方、シスター・オルゼに何やら懺悔をして
いたようですが、よくわからない話なもので。

engChrName: Still, her faith is unquestionable. I'm sure she will overcome it.
engSearchText:
Still, her faith is unquestionable. I'm sure she will
overcome it.
jpnChrName: まあ……彼女の信仰心も確かですし、 何かあるにせよ乗り越えてくれると思いますが……
jpnSearchText:
まあ……彼女の信仰心も確かですし、
何かあるにせよ乗り越えてくれると思いますが……

engChrName: Now that we've gotten a better grasp of the situation in the local churches, we'll start moving to help those in need.
engSearchText:
Now that we've gotten a better grasp of the situation
in the local churches, we'll start moving to help those
in need.
jpnChrName: 各礼拝堂の状況も掴めてきた所です。 救援を求めている所には向かわねば──
jpnSearchText:
各礼拝堂の状況も掴めてきた所です。
救援を求めている所には向かわねば──

engChrName: We have plenty of water, food, and blankets stocked up, but it might not be enough.
engSearchText:
We have plenty of water, food, and blankets stocked
up, but it might not be enough.
jpnChrName: 水や食料、毛布などは各礼拝堂にも 多少はありますが、豊富ではありません。
jpnSearchText:
水や食料、毛布などは各礼拝堂にも
多少はありますが、豊富ではありません。

engChrName: I'll go wherever is needed.
engSearchText: I'll go wherever is needed.
jpnChrName: 必要な場所には私が向かいましょう。
jpnSearchText: 必要な場所には私が向かいましょう。

engChrName: You need not fear for me. There are plenty who will support me.
engSearchText:
You need not fear for me. There are plenty who will
support me.
jpnChrName: 大丈夫、支援してくださる方々も 多くいらっしゃるようですから。
jpnSearchText:
大丈夫、支援してくださる方々も
多くいらっしゃるようですから。

engChrName: We are fortunate to have Mother Celis of the Congregation here, along with Professor Hamilton.
engSearchText:
We are fortunate to have Mother Celis of the
Congregation here, along with Professor Hamilton.
jpnChrName: 封聖省のオルテシア卿に加え ハミルトン博士がいらしているのは僥倖です。
jpnSearchText:
封聖省のオルテシア卿に加え
ハミルトン博士がいらしているのは僥倖です。

engChrName: While I do have some mixed feelings about it, right now our priority must be cooperating to overcome this crisis.
engSearchText:
While I do have some mixed feelings about it, right
now our priority must be cooperating to overcome
this crisis.
jpnChrName: 我々としても思う所はありますが── 今は協力し合って事態の打破に務めると致しましょう。
jpnSearchText:
我々としても思う所はありますが──
今は協力し合って事態の打破に務めると致しましょう。

engChrName: The Goddess of the Sky has no forgiveness for such villainy.
engSearchText:
The Goddess of the Sky has no forgiveness for
such villainy.
jpnChrName: このような所業、空の女神も 決してお許しにはならないでしょうから。
jpnSearchText:
このような所業、空の女神も
決してお許しにはならないでしょうから。

engChrName: As it so happens, I often travel around the Republic as liaison to their churches.
engSearchText:
As it so happens, I often travel around the Republic
as liaison to their churches.
jpnChrName: 私は連絡役として、共和国各地の 教会施設を訪れる事が多いのですが……
jpnSearchText:
私は連絡役として、共和国各地の
教会施設を訪れる事が多いのですが……

engChrName: On this day, every church will be holding a memorial mass alongside their festival celebrations.
engSearchText:
On this day, every church will be holding a memorial
mass alongside their festival celebrations.
jpnChrName: 本日はどこの礼拝堂でも、記念祭の祝辞と 共に追悼ミサが行われております。
jpnSearchText:
本日はどこの礼拝堂でも、記念祭の祝辞と
共に追悼ミサが行われております。

engChrName: We've made it this far despite everything. For that, we should be grateful.
engSearchText:
We've made it this far despite everything. For that,
we should be grateful.
jpnChrName: 本当に今日この日を迎えられた事、 我々も嬉しく思いますよ。
jpnSearchText:
本当に今日この日を迎えられた事、
我々も嬉しく思いますよ。

engChrName: Well, then. I'd best touch base with the archbishop about the state of things in Oración.
engSearchText:
Well, then. I'd best touch base with the archbishop
about the state of things in Oración.
jpnChrName: さて、オラシオン総大聖堂の方の 状況を大司教猊下にお伝えせねば。
jpnSearchText:
さて、オラシオン総大聖堂の方の
状況を大司教猊下にお伝えせねば。

engChrName: I've been observing the situation there over the last week, and things have thankfully calmed down.
engSearchText:
I've been observing the situation there over the last
week, and things have thankfully calmed down.
jpnChrName: この一週間、向こうの視察をしていましたが ようやく落ち着いてきたようですし……
jpnSearchText:
この一週間、向こうの視察をしていましたが
ようやく落ち着いてきたようですし……

engChrName: That arrest amongst the elites has caused quite the turmoil, but the archbishop has put in a lot of effort to calm the situation.
engSearchText:
That arrest amongst the elites has caused quite the
turmoil, but the archbishop has put in a lot of effort
to calm the situation.
jpnChrName: 上流階級の逮捕などで混乱も多かったのですが あちらの大司教猊下も随分と尽力されたようです。
jpnSearchText:
上流階級の逮捕などで混乱も多かったのですが
あちらの大司教猊下も随分と尽力されたようです。

engChrName: ...Though they still seem rather hostile to Edith Grand Cathedral.
engSearchText:
...Though they still seem rather hostile to Edith
Grand Cathedral.
jpnChrName: ……まあ、イーディス大聖堂への 対抗意識だけは相変わらずでしたが。
jpnSearchText:
……まあ、イーディス大聖堂への
対抗意識だけは相変わらずでしたが。

engChrName: We've gotten in contact with most churches across the city, but the Vantail District one is a different story.
engSearchText:
We've gotten in contact with most churches across
the city, but the Vantail District one is a
different story.
jpnChrName: 各街区の礼拝堂とも連絡が取れました。 しかしやはりヴァンタイユ地区だけは──
jpnSearchText:
各街区の礼拝堂とも連絡が取れました。
しかしやはりヴァンタイユ地区だけは──

engChrName: The Congregation for the Sacraments and the Gralsritter might've decided to act alone.
engSearchText:
The Congregation for the Sacraments and the
Gralsritter might've decided to act alone.
jpnChrName: 封聖省や隠密僧兵の副兵長殿も 独自に動き出したようですね。
jpnSearchText:
封聖省や隠密僧兵の副兵長殿も
独自に動き出したようですね。

engChrName: Considering the Pandemonium and all the devils manifesting, things might just...
engSearchText:
Considering the Pandemonium and all the devils
manifesting, things might just...
jpnChrName: ふむ……『汎魔（パンデモニウム）化』という言葉にせよ 悪魔の顕現にせよ、やはりこの状況は──
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……『汎魔（パンデモニウム）化』という言葉にせよ
悪魔の顕現にせよ、やはりこの状況は──

engChrName: Well, no use in dwelling right now. Hope for the best, prepare for the worst.
engSearchText:
Well, no use in dwelling right now. Hope for the
best, prepare for the worst.
jpnChrName: 我々も備えねばなりますまい。 最悪の事態を回避するために。
jpnSearchText:
我々も備えねばなりますまい。
最悪の事態を回避するために。

engChrName: Never in my life could I have imagined I'd see a genuine devil.
engSearchText:
Never in my life could I have imagined I'd see a
genuine devil.
jpnChrName: 悪魔の顕現……これほどまでの事態は 我々も想像だにしておりませんでしたが……
jpnSearchText:
悪魔の顕現……これほどまでの事態は
我々も想像だにしておりませんでしたが……

engChrName: But we've a duty to uphold to all those who've taken refuge here.
engSearchText:
But we've a duty to uphold to all those who've taken
refuge here.
jpnChrName: 不安を抱え、ここへ避難している方々が いる以上、我々のすべきことは変わりません。
jpnSearchText:
不安を抱え、ここへ避難している方々が
いる以上、我々のすべきことは変わりません。

engChrName: We will pray for their sake, and for your victory.
engSearchText: We will pray for their sake, and for your victory.
jpnChrName: 彼らのために祈りを捧げましょう。 外の事は、どうかお願い致しましたよ。
jpnSearchText:
彼らのために祈りを捧げましょう。
外の事は、どうかお願い致しましたよ。

engChrName: You can be assured we will find the means to put a stop to this.
engSearchText:
You can be assured we will find the means to put a
stop to this.
jpnChrName: ええ、お任せを。 解決の糸口を探ると致しましょう。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、お任せを。
解決の糸口を探ると致しましょう。

engChrName: It's almost time for the memorial service. Archbishop Jerome should be arriving shortly.
engSearchText:
It's almost time for the memorial service.
Archbishop Jerome should be arriving shortly.
jpnChrName: そろそろ追悼式典の時間になりますね。 ジェローム大司教猊下もお見えになるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
そろそろ追悼式典の時間になりますね。
ジェローム大司教猊下もお見えになるでしょう。

engChrName: So many people are suffering... Especially those affected by the tragedy of Creil Village...
engSearchText:
So many people are suffering... Especially those
affected by the tragedy of Creil Village...
jpnChrName: ……クレイユ村の悲劇を含め、これまでに 繰り返されてきた多くの犠牲……
jpnSearchText:
……クレイユ村の悲劇を含め、これまでに
繰り返されてきた多くの犠牲……

engChrName: Let us pray for the Goddess to bless them all.
engSearchText: Let us pray for the Goddess to bless them all.
jpnChrName: それら全てに、女神の祝福があらん事を 本日はともに祈ると致しましょう。
jpnSearchText:
それら全てに、女神の祝福があらん事を
本日はともに祈ると致しましょう。

engChrName: These are the new choir members for the Revolution Festival.
engSearchText:
These are the new choir members for the
Revolution Festival.
jpnChrName: こちらは革命記念祭の式典に 参加される聖歌隊の皆さんでしてね。
jpnSearchText:
こちらは革命記念祭の式典に
参加される聖歌隊の皆さんでしてね。

engChrName: As always, I'm in charge of the choir.
engSearchText: As always, I'm in charge of the choir.
jpnChrName: 例年私が合唱の総仕上げを 担当しているのですよ。
jpnSearchText:
例年私が合唱の総仕上げを
担当しているのですよ。

engChrName: The festival draws near, so let's give it our best effort.
engSearchText: The festival draws near, so let's give it our best effort.
jpnChrName: さあ、本番も近い事です。 張り切っていくと致しましょう。
jpnSearchText:
さあ、本番も近い事です。
張り切っていくと致しましょう。

engChrName: The Congregation for the Sacraments should be able to handle things, at least to a certain extent.
engSearchText:
The Congregation for the Sacraments should be able
to handle things, at least to a certain extent.
jpnChrName: 封聖省の方々にも ある程度の事は取り計らいましょう。
jpnSearchText:
封聖省の方々にも
ある程度の事は取り計らいましょう。

engChrName: You and Bergard should take some time to rest.
engSearchText: You and Bergard should take some time to rest.
jpnChrName: 両卿にベルガルド殿も ごゆっくりなされて下さい。
jpnSearchText:
両卿にベルガルド殿も
ごゆっくりなされて下さい。

engChrName: You and your team should take some time to rest.
engSearchText: You and your team should take some time to rest.
jpnChrName: 両卿に貴方がたも ごゆっくりなされて下さい。
jpnSearchText:
両卿に貴方がたも
ごゆっくりなされて下さい。

engChrName: We were able to contact the Riverside temple and confirm Sister Philia's safety. She's been helping them.
engSearchText:
We were able to contact the Riverside temple and
confirm Sister Philia's safety. She's been
helping them.
jpnChrName: リバーサイドの寺院とも連絡が取れ、 シスター・フィリアの無事と寄与も確認しました。
jpnSearchText:
リバーサイドの寺院とも連絡が取れ、
シスター・フィリアの無事と寄与も確認しました。

engChrName: Churches and other businesses have been doing what they can to help those that can still move.
engSearchText:
Churches and other businesses have been doing what
they can to help those that can still move.
jpnChrName: 各所では礼拝堂やその他の施設が積極的に 動ける人々を保護しているようですが……
jpnSearchText:
各所では礼拝堂やその他の施設が積極的に
動ける人々を保護しているようですが……

engChrName: Still, this situation will definitely be felt by both those that could evacuate, and those who didn't.
engSearchText:
Still, this situation will definitely be felt by both those
that could evacuate, and those who didn't.
jpnChrName: 当然、逃げ遅れた方や、避難に成功したとしても 心に傷を負った方もいる事でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
当然、逃げ遅れた方や、避難に成功したとしても
心に傷を負った方もいる事でしょう。

engChrName: We'll need to do everything we can to get them taken care of.
engSearchText:
We'll need to do everything we can to get them taken
care of.
jpnChrName: そうした方々を、何としてでも 保護して参らねばなりません……
jpnSearchText:
そうした方々を、何としてでも
保護して参らねばなりません……

engChrName: Sister Philia is out. I do hope she's safe...
engSearchText: Sister Philia is out. I do hope she's safe...
jpnChrName: シスター・フィリアは外出中との事ですが 大丈夫でしょうか……
jpnSearchText:
シスター・フィリアは外出中との事ですが
大丈夫でしょうか……

engChrName: I suppose all I can do is have faith in her.
engSearchText: I suppose all I can do is have faith in her.
jpnChrName: いえ……今は彼女を信じましょう。
jpnSearchText: いえ……今は彼女を信じましょう。

engChrName: She's always been very personable, so I'm sure she's out, helping local churches.
engSearchText:
She's always been very personable, so I'm sure she's
out, helping local churches.
jpnChrName: 日頃より各所に赴いている彼女です、 きっと近隣の礼拝堂とも協力して──
jpnSearchText:
日頃より各所に赴いている彼女です、
きっと近隣の礼拝堂とも協力して──

engChrName: It's finally time for the ceremony... The Republic has gone through so much, and I don't mean just this year.
engSearchText:
It's finally time for the ceremony... The Republic has
gone through so much, and I don't mean just
this year.
jpnChrName: いよいよ式典ですか……思えば今年に限らず、 共和国には多くの受難がありましたね。
jpnSearchText:
いよいよ式典ですか……思えば今年に限らず、
共和国には多くの受難がありましたね。

engChrName: But I don't doubt the Goddess favors us. Soon, all the strife will be rewarded.
engSearchText:
But I don't doubt the Goddess favors us. Soon, all the
strife will be rewarded.
jpnChrName: ですが、この国にも空の女神の恩寵がある事は確か。 ……この試練の末に、きっと祝福がありましょう。
jpnSearchText:
ですが、この国にも空の女神の恩寵がある事は確か。
……この試練の末に、きっと祝福がありましょう。

engChrName: We must be grateful we are able to greet a new age. We must do so for those who can't.
engSearchText:
We must be grateful we are able to greet a new age.
We must do so for those who can't.
jpnChrName: 新たな時代を希望と共に迎えるため、 まずはこの瞬間を迎えられた事に感謝を。
jpnSearchText:
新たな時代を希望と共に迎えるため、
まずはこの瞬間を迎えられた事に感謝を。

engChrName: I'd handled our staff scheduling so that Sister Belicia could be in her hometown to assist her people.
engSearchText:
I'd handled our staff scheduling so that Sister Belicia
could be in her hometown to assist her people.
jpnChrName: シスター・ベルシアは、彼女が故郷で 仕えられるよう、私が人事を取り計らいました。
jpnSearchText:
シスター・ベルシアは、彼女が故郷で
仕えられるよう、私が人事を取り計らいました。

engChrName: And to think that just meant she'd be another victim in the Creil Village tragedy...
engSearchText:
And to think that just meant she'd be another victim
in the Creil Village tragedy...
jpnChrName: それがまさか、彼女の愛していたクレイユ村 諸共犠牲になってしまう結果になるとは……
jpnSearchText:
それがまさか、彼女の愛していたクレイユ村
諸共犠牲になってしまう結果になるとは……

engChrName: The least I can wish for is that she can rest easy, having supported her beloved hometown until the very end.
engSearchText:
The least I can wish for is that she can rest easy,
having supported her beloved hometown until the
very end.
jpnChrName: せめて、最後まで故郷を見守る事が 出来たと祈りましょう……
jpnSearchText:
せめて、最後まで故郷を見守る事が
出来たと祈りましょう……

engChrName: I shall pray for the Goddess to bless Sister Belicia and her village.
engSearchText:
I shall pray for the Goddess to bless Sister Belicia and
her village.
jpnChrName: シスター・ベルシアと彼女の愛した村に どうか女神様の祝福を……
jpnSearchText:
シスター・ベルシアと彼女の愛した村に
どうか女神様の祝福を……

engChrName: Come to think of it, Sister Philia made a confession to me this morning.
engSearchText:
Come to think of it, Sister Philia made a confession
to me this morning.
jpnChrName: ……そういえば、シスター・フィリアは今朝方、 私に何やら懺悔をしてきましたが……
jpnSearchText:
……そういえば、シスター・フィリアは今朝方、
私に何やら懺悔をしてきましたが……

engChrName: I'm not exactly sure what was bothering her. I can't imagine her faith is anything to confess about.
engSearchText:
I'm not exactly sure what was bothering her. I can't
imagine her faith is anything to confess about.
jpnChrName: はて、何を悔やんでいるのか………彼女の 信仰心や素行に問題があるとも思えませんが。
jpnSearchText:
はて、何を悔やんでいるのか………彼女の
信仰心や素行に問題があるとも思えませんが。

engChrName: She spoke of reverence, but a word like that doesn't seem to invite sin to me...
engSearchText:
She spoke of reverence, but a word like that doesn't
seem to invite sin to me...
jpnChrName: “尊み”とは一体……罪のある言葉には 特に思えませんが……
jpnSearchText:
“尊み”とは一体……罪のある言葉には
特に思えませんが……

engChrName: I'll make sure they get to Old Town safely.
engSearchText: I'll make sure they get to Old Town safely.
jpnChrName: 二人の事は必ず無事に 旧市街に送り届けてみせる──！
jpnSearchText:
二人の事は必ず無事に
旧市街に送り届けてみせる──！

engChrName: I can't thank you enough. I'll pay you back soon, I promise.
engSearchText:
I can't thank you enough. I'll pay you back soon,
I promise.
jpnChrName: それと、君たちにはちゃんと 恩返しをさせてほしいんだ。
jpnSearchText:
それと、君たちにはちゃんと
恩返しをさせてほしいんだ。

engChrName: So you better not die until I do! Paulette and Yumé would be heartbroken.
engSearchText:
So you better not die until I do! Paulette and Yumé
would be heartbroken.
jpnChrName: だから──必ず無事に戻ってきてくれよ。 ポーレットとユメも待ってるんだからさ！
jpnSearchText:
だから──必ず無事に戻ってきてくれよ。
ポーレットとユメも待ってるんだからさ！

engChrName: Thank you all so much for saving us. We're all right now.
engSearchText:
Thank you all so much for saving us. We're all
right now.
jpnChrName: みんな、助けてくれて本当にありがとう。 私たちはもう大丈夫──
jpnSearchText:
みんな、助けてくれて本当にありがとう。
私たちはもう大丈夫──

engChrName: Please come back safe, okay?
engSearchText: Please come back safe, okay?
jpnChrName: だからみんなも、必ず無事に戻ってきて。
jpnSearchText: だからみんなも、必ず無事に戻ってきて。

engChrName: I'll treat you to a nice cup of coffee once everything is over. So, do come back. I'll be waiting.
engSearchText:
I'll treat you to a nice cup of coffee once everything
is over. So, do come back. I'll be waiting.
jpnChrName: また美味しいコーヒーを奢らせて頂戴。 ふふっ、楽しみにしているから。
jpnSearchText:
また美味しいコーヒーを奢らせて頂戴。
ふふっ、楽しみにしているから。

engChrName: Van, you promised!
engSearchText: Van, you promised!
jpnChrName: ヴァン、ヤクソクだからね～っ！
jpnSearchText: ヴァン、ヤクソクだからね～っ！

engChrName: I'll be patient, okay? I'll be waiting with Mommy and the old man!
engSearchText:
I'll be patient, okay? I'll be waiting with Mommy and
the old man!
jpnChrName: ユメ、まってるから！ ママとおじーちゃんと一緒に！！
jpnSearchText:
ユメ、まってるから！
ママとおじーちゃんと一緒に！！

engChrName: Yeah. Thanks, Yumé.
engSearchText: Yeah. Thanks, Yumé.
jpnChrName: ハハ…… ありがとな、ユメ。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ……
ありがとな、ユメ。

engChrName: You take care of yourself, too, Yumé. I look forward to having tea with you at Montmart next time.
engSearchText:
You take care of yourself, too, Yumé. I look forward
to having tea with you at Montmart next time.
jpnChrName: ユメちゃんたちも気を付けて。 またモンマルトでお茶しましょうね！
jpnSearchText:
ユメちゃんたちも気を付けて。
またモンマルトでお茶しましょうね！

engChrName: Yes! I-I know there's a lot of important ceremonies today.
engSearchText:
Yes! I-I know there's a lot of important
ceremonies today.
jpnChrName: ほ、本日が重要な式典と儀式で 立て込んでいるのも承知の上です……！
jpnSearchText:
ほ、本日が重要な式典と儀式で
立て込んでいるのも承知の上です……！

engChrName: But I REALLY need to get this done today!
engSearchText: But I REALLY need to get this done today!
jpnChrName: で、でも……どうしても今日は 外せない用事というか……！
jpnSearchText:
で、でも……どうしても今日は
外せない用事というか……！

engChrName: Fine. If you insist so much, then so be it.
engSearchText: Fine. If you insist so much, then so be it.
jpnChrName: ふう、そこまで言うのであれば 仕方がありませんね……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、そこまで言うのであれば
仕方がありませんね……

engChrName: You'll be back in time for the evening service. Understood?
engSearchText:
You'll be back in time for the evening service.
Understood?
jpnChrName: ……夕方の奉仕までには戻るのですよ？
jpnSearchText: ……夕方の奉仕までには戻るのですよ？

engChrName: Y-Yes! Thank you so much!
engSearchText: Y-Yes! Thank you so much!
jpnChrName: あ、ありがとう……ありがとうございますっ！
jpnSearchText: あ、ありがとう……ありがとうございますっ！

engChrName: What a horrible tragedy... So many precious lives were taken.
engSearchText:
What a horrible tragedy... So many precious lives
were taken.
jpnChrName: ……この度、本当に不幸な出来事があり…… 罪の無い方々の尊い命が失われました。
jpnSearchText:
……この度、本当に不幸な出来事があり……
罪の無い方々の尊い命が失われました。

engChrName: There will be a memorial mass held in Edith Grand Cathedral. I'm making sure people are aware of it.
engSearchText:
There will be a memorial mass held in Edith
Grand Cathedral. I'm making sure people are aware
of it.
jpnChrName: イーディス大聖堂でも追悼ミサを行っており、 そのお知らせを張り出しているのです。
jpnSearchText:
イーディス大聖堂でも追悼ミサを行っており、
そのお知らせを張り出しているのです。

engChrName: We hope many will join us today in praying to the Goddess for those we lost. May their souls find peace.
engSearchText:
We hope many will join us today in praying to the
Goddess for those we lost. May their souls find peace.
jpnChrName: 少しでも多くの方に、クレイユ村の方々の 魂への安寧を祈っていただきたいものです……
jpnSearchText:
少しでも多くの方に、クレイユ村の方々の
魂への安寧を祈っていただきたいものです……

engChrName: Sometimes I play messenger between some of the other chapels in the city.
engSearchText:
Sometimes I play messenger between some of the
other chapels in the city.
jpnChrName: 時おりこうして、各礼拝堂や寺院との 連絡役を務めているのですが……
jpnSearchText:
時おりこうして、各礼拝堂や寺院との
連絡役を務めているのですが……

engChrName: Every time I visit one, I can't help feeling self-conscious about all my shortcomings and my own vices.
engSearchText:
Every time I visit one, I can't help feeling
self-conscious about all my shortcomings and my
own vices.
jpnChrName: その……その度に自らの不徳というか、 煩悩を自認させられるというか……
jpnSearchText:
その……その度に自らの不徳というか、
煩悩を自認させられるというか……

engChrName: *sigh* I need to learn to be as devout as the other sisters...
engSearchText:
*sigh* I need to learn to be as devout as the
other sisters...
jpnChrName: ──ふう、他のシスターの方々のように もう少し自制して奉仕出来るようにならねば……
jpnSearchText:
──ふう、他のシスターの方々のように
もう少し自制して奉仕出来るようにならねば……

engChrName: The professor and the students let me know communications were reestablished, albeit limited.
engSearchText:
The professor and the students let me know
communications were reestablished, albeit limited.
jpnChrName: あちらの学生さんと教授から、限定的ながら 通信網が回復していると聞きました。
jpnSearchText:
あちらの学生さんと教授から、限定的ながら
通信網が回復していると聞きました。

engChrName: We used that chance to contact the various embassies and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, but as we feared, there was no response.
engSearchText:
We used that chance to contact the various embassies
and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, but as we feared,
there was no response.
jpnChrName: なので、各国大使館や外務省の状況を 確認しているのですが、やはり応答がなく……
jpnSearchText:
なので、各国大使館や外務省の状況を
確認しているのですが、やはり応答がなく……

engChrName: Argh! I feel so useless here, but I need to continue my duties as ambassador.
engSearchText:
Argh! I feel so useless here, but I need to continue my
duties as ambassador.
jpnChrName: くっ、できる事は限られそうですが 外交官として為すべき事をしないと……！
jpnSearchText:
くっ、できる事は限られそうですが
外交官として為すべき事をしないと……！

engChrName: What a stroke of bad luck, for this to happen on the day of the festival. At least my family is safe.
engSearchText:
What a stroke of bad luck, for this to happen on the
day of the festival. At least my family is safe.
jpnChrName: ……記念祭の日にこんな事が起こるなんて。 家族が全員無事なのは幸いでしたが……
jpnSearchText:
……記念祭の日にこんな事が起こるなんて。
家族が全員無事なのは幸いでしたが……

engChrName: I'd heard about all the anomalies happening in Erebonia and Crossbell...
engSearchText:
I'd heard about all the anomalies happening in
Erebonia and Crossbell...
jpnChrName: エレボニア帝国やクロスベルでも 近年“異変”が起きていたと聞きますが──
jpnSearchText:
エレボニア帝国やクロスベルでも
近年“異変”が起きていたと聞きますが──

engChrName: But I never thought something like that would happen to the Republic as well!
engSearchText:
But I never thought something like that would
happen to the Republic as well!
jpnChrName: まさか共和国でこんな災厄に見舞われるとは！
jpnSearchText: まさか共和国でこんな災厄に見舞われるとは！

engChrName: I have to protect my dear Nadiya and Amia!
engSearchText: I have to protect my dear Nadiya and Amia!
jpnChrName: ナディアとアミアだけは 何とかして守らないと……！
jpnSearchText:
ナディアとアミアだけは
何とかして守らないと……！

engChrName: My family must've worried for me so much, but I hope I can have the chance to go back to them now.
engSearchText:
My family must've worried for me so much, but I
hope I can have the chance to go back to them now.
jpnChrName: ……家族にはこれまで心配をかけさせてきました。 今こそ二人に最後まで寄り添いたい。
jpnSearchText:
……家族にはこれまで心配をかけさせてきました。
今こそ二人に最後まで寄り添いたい。

engChrName: I still need to get in contact with the other embassies and make sure everything is all right on their end. It's my duty as ambassador.
engSearchText:
I still need to get in contact with the other embassies
and make sure everything is all right on their end.
It's my duty as ambassador.
jpnChrName: 勿論、外交官として各国大使館や 安否確認も状況が落ち着き次第行いますが……
jpnSearchText:
勿論、外交官として各国大使館や
安否確認も状況が落ち着き次第行いますが……

engChrName: But Nadiya and Amia are my priority!
engSearchText: But Nadiya and Amia are my priority!
jpnChrName: 今はナディアとアミアを守らなくては……！
jpnSearchText: 今はナディアとアミアを守らなくては……！

engChrName: It's funny how emotional you can get over events like these when you spend so much time out of the country.
engSearchText:
It's funny how emotional you can get over events like
these when you spend so much time out of
the country.
jpnChrName: やはり国外勤務を長くしていると、 こういう行事も一層恋しくなるものです。
jpnSearchText:
やはり国外勤務を長くしていると、
こういう行事も一層恋しくなるものです。

engChrName: Especially now that I get to spend time with my family. I hadn't been able to come home for a good two years when I left for the Empire!
engSearchText:
Especially now that I get to spend time with
my family. I hadn't been able to come home for a
good two years when I left for the Empire!
jpnChrName: 家族と一緒であればなおの事です。 帝国時代は丸二年も帰国できませんでしたが……
jpnSearchText:
家族と一緒であればなおの事です。
帝国時代は丸二年も帰国できませんでしたが……

engChrName: When I think about how long I've been away, it makes me cherish this time with them even more.
engSearchText:
When I think about how long I've been away,
it makes me cherish this time with them
even more.
jpnChrName: あの時の事を思うと一層、今のこの一瞬を 大切にしないといけないなと思うもので……
jpnSearchText:
あの時の事を思うと一層、今のこの一瞬を
大切にしないといけないなと思うもので……

engChrName: Culleo's really busy, but he still took time to spend with us.
engSearchText:
Culleo's really busy, but he still took time to spend
with us.
jpnChrName: クレオさん、他にも心配な場所もあるだろうに、 私達と一緒にいてくれて……
jpnSearchText:
クレオさん、他にも心配な場所もあるだろうに、
私達と一緒にいてくれて……

engChrName: I really have the greatest husband in all of Zemuria.
engSearchText: I really have the greatest husband in all of Zemuria.
jpnChrName: 本当に最高の夫を持てたんだなって、 改めて確信するというか……
jpnSearchText:
本当に最高の夫を持てたんだなって、
改めて確信するというか……

engChrName: I constantly worried Culleo would fall out of love with me during those two years he spent in the Empire.
engSearchText:
I constantly worried Culleo would fall out of love with
me during those two years he spent in the Empire.
jpnChrName: クレオさん、帝国で丸二年会えなかった時は自分が 愛想尽かされてないか不安だったそうだけど……
jpnSearchText:
クレオさん、帝国で丸二年会えなかった時は自分が
愛想尽かされてないか不安だったそうだけど……

engChrName: Of course that never happened. I shouldn't doubt his love for me so much.
engSearchText:
Of course that never happened. I shouldn't doubt his
love for me so much.
jpnChrName: とんでもないわ、彼の愛情をそれだけで 忘れてしまうはずないのに。
jpnSearchText:
とんでもないわ、彼の愛情をそれだけで
忘れてしまうはずないのに。

engChrName: This really had to happen when we'd finally gotten to spend some family time during the festival...
engSearchText:
This really had to happen when we'd finally gotten to
spend some family time during the festival...
jpnChrName: せっかく家族で過ごせていた記念祭なのに、 こんな事って……
jpnSearchText:
せっかく家族で過ごせていた記念祭なのに、
こんな事って……

engChrName: What's worse, this might be the work of the mafia behind what happened in Creil.
engSearchText:
What's worse, this might be the work of the mafia
behind what happened in Creil.
jpnChrName: しかも、これを引き起こしたのがクレイユ村の テロを犯したマフィアというのも本当なの……？
jpnSearchText:
しかも、これを引き起こしたのがクレイユ村の
テロを犯したマフィアというのも本当なの……？

engChrName: My daughter and I are scared, but we're hanging on since Culleo's here.
engSearchText:
My daughter and I are scared, but we're hanging on
since Culleo's here.
jpnChrName: 娘も怯えているけど……でも、クレオさんは ちゃんと一緒にいてくれるから何とか……
jpnSearchText:
娘も怯えているけど……でも、クレオさんは
ちゃんと一緒にいてくれるから何とか……

engChrName: I'm so happy that I'll get to spend this year's festival with Culleo.
engSearchText:
I'm so happy that I'll get to spend this year's festival
with Culleo.
jpnChrName: 今年も記念祭をクレオさんと過ごせて、 本当に嬉しいものね。
jpnSearchText:
今年も記念祭をクレオさんと過ごせて、
本当に嬉しいものね。

engChrName: It's nice to spend the year's end with family.
engSearchText: It's nice to spend the year's end with family.
jpnChrName: やっぱり一年の締め括りだもの、 家族揃って迎えないと……
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり一年の締め括りだもの、
家族揃って迎えないと……

engChrName: Considering everything that happened this year, I'm all the more eager to greet the new year with my whole family.
engSearchText:
Considering everything that happened this year, I'm
all the more eager to greet the new year with my
whole family.
jpnChrName: 特に今年は不幸な事件もあったし、家族全員で 迎えられる有難さも噛み締めてね……
jpnSearchText:
特に今年は不幸な事件もあったし、家族全員で
迎えられる有難さも噛み締めてね……

engChrName: Culleo and I will be attending the memorial mass on the day of the festival, but we came by today to worship as well.
engSearchText:
Culleo and I will be attending the memorial mass on
the day of the festival, but we came by today to
worship as well.
jpnChrName: 記念祭当日の追悼式典にもクレオさんと一緒に 参加するけど、今日も二人で礼拝に来たの。
jpnSearchText:
記念祭当日の追悼式典にもクレオさんと一緒に
参加するけど、今日も二人で礼拝に来たの。

engChrName: It hardly hurts to offer more prayers for peace for the victims, and peace for our future.
engSearchText:
It hardly hurts to offer more prayers for peace for the
victims, and peace for our future.
jpnChrName: 犠牲者への安息も、今後の平和も、 いくら祈っても悪い事は無いはずでしょうし。
jpnSearchText:
犠牲者への安息も、今後の平和も、
いくら祈っても悪い事は無いはずでしょうし。

engChrName: Besides, I like the cathedral. Honestly, I always have.
engSearchText: Besides, I like the cathedral. Honestly, I always have.
jpnChrName: それに……私、この大聖堂が 好きなの、昔からね……
jpnSearchText:
それに……私、この大聖堂が
好きなの、昔からね……

engChrName: It's peaceful here. I used to come by when I was still a novice artist to draw the cathedral. It's held a special place in my heart since.
engSearchText:
It's peaceful here. I used to come by when I was still a
novice artist to draw the cathedral. It's held a special
place in my heart since.
jpnChrName: 駆け出しの頃から大聖堂を描いてきて、 思い入れがあるからか、本当に落ち着けて……
jpnSearchText:
駆け出しの頃から大聖堂を描いてきて、
思い入れがあるからか、本当に落ち着けて……

engChrName: Daddy's been helping all the church people while we're here. That nice lady and the Aramis students are working hard, too.
engSearchText:
Daddy's been helping all the church people while
we're here. That nice lady and the Aramis students
are working hard, too.
jpnChrName: パパもそばにいながら頑張ってくれてるし、 教会の人たちやアラミスのお姉ちゃん達も……
jpnSearchText:
パパもそばにいながら頑張ってくれてるし、
教会の人たちやアラミスのお姉ちゃん達も……

engChrName: I was really scared at first, but we'll be okay now! Mommy and Daddy are with me, so I'm okay!
engSearchText:
I was really scared at first, but we'll be okay now!
Mommy and Daddy are with me, so I'm okay!
jpnChrName: 最初は怖かったけど……きっと、きっと みんなで乗りこえられるわよね……！
jpnSearchText:
最初は怖かったけど……きっと、きっと
みんなで乗りこえられるわよね……！

engChrName: I wanna help out so Daddy doesn't have to work so hard and get tired!
engSearchText:
I wanna help out so Daddy doesn't have to work so
hard and get tired!
jpnChrName: アミアも、パパが疲れちゃわないように すこしでもお手伝いをさがさなくっちゃ……！
jpnSearchText:
アミアも、パパが疲れちゃわないように
すこしでもお手伝いをさがさなくっちゃ……！

engChrName: What is that thing out there? It's scary. Really, really scary...
engSearchText:
What is that thing out there? It's scary. Really,
really scary...
jpnChrName: そとのアレ……一体何なの……？ こわいよ、こわい……
jpnSearchText:
そとのアレ……一体何なの……？
こわいよ、こわい……

engChrName: Everyone's talking about what happened before, but what does it have to do with us?
engSearchText:
Everyone's talking about what happened before, but
what does it have to do with us?
jpnChrName: それに、この前の事件の話も…… え、何か関係があるの……？
jpnSearchText:
それに、この前の事件の話も……
え、何か関係があるの……？

engChrName: I trust Daddy, but I don't want him to get hurt...
engSearchText: I trust Daddy, but I don't want him to get hurt...
jpnChrName: パパは頼もしいけど、パパにも 怪我はしないで欲しいし……
jpnSearchText:
パパは頼もしいけど、パパにも
怪我はしないで欲しいし……

engChrName: I have to help him!
engSearchText: I have to help him!
jpnChrName: どうすればいいの……！？
jpnSearchText: どうすればいいの……！？

engChrName: Daddy came back in time!
engSearchText: Daddy came back in time!
jpnChrName: パパ、はやめにお仕事終われた みたいでよかったわね。
jpnSearchText:
パパ、はやめにお仕事終われた
みたいでよかったわね。

engChrName: I thought he would be too tired to do anything with us...
engSearchText:
I thought he would be too tired to do anything
with us...
jpnChrName: もっとくたびれちゃっていたら どうしようかと思ったけど……
jpnSearchText:
もっとくたびれちゃっていたら
どうしようかと思ったけど……

engChrName: But now we'll be able to enjoy the whole festival together!
engSearchText:
But now we'll be able to enjoy the whole
festival together!
jpnChrName: これなら最後まで記念祭を いっしょに楽しめそうね！
jpnSearchText:
これなら最後まで記念祭を
いっしょに楽しめそうね！

engChrName: Mommy draws the cathedral a lot. Her drawings are really popular!
engSearchText:
Mommy draws the cathedral a lot. Her drawings are
really popular!
jpnChrName: ママ、よくこの大聖堂の絵を描いてて、 けっこう人気もあるんだって。
jpnSearchText:
ママ、よくこの大聖堂の絵を描いてて、
けっこう人気もあるんだって。

engChrName: But she said those weren't her favorite treasures, and that she has something 'more special.'
engSearchText:
But she said those weren't her favorite treasures, and
that she has something 'more special.'
jpnChrName: でも、ママがいうには、一番のたからものの 絵は大聖堂の絵じゃないらしいわ。
jpnSearchText:
でも、ママがいうには、一番のたからものの
絵は大聖堂の絵じゃないらしいわ。

engChrName: I wonder which painting it could be? She wouldn't tell me! Said it was a secret.
engSearchText:
I wonder which painting it could be? She wouldn't
tell me! Said it was a secret.
jpnChrName: 何の絵なのかなって思ったけど…… ヒミツなんだって。
jpnSearchText:
何の絵なのかなって思ったけど……
ヒミツなんだって。

engChrName: I'm sorry I only made it back home yesterday. At least I made it to the memorial with you.
engSearchText:
I'm sorry I only made it back home yesterday. At least
I made it to the memorial with you.
jpnChrName: 帰りが前日になって申し訳ない、 でも一緒に追悼式典に参加できてよかった。
jpnSearchText:
帰りが前日になって申し訳ない、
でも一緒に追悼式典に参加できてよかった。

engChrName: I know I've been really busy, but I made sure everything would be taken care of. You will have my undivided attention for the whole festival!
engSearchText:
I know I've been really busy, but I made sure
everything would be taken care of. You will have my
undivided attention for the whole festival!
jpnChrName: 一応、忙しいとはいえ最低限の休息も取れたし 今日は記念祭に最後まで付き合うよ。
jpnSearchText:
一応、忙しいとはいえ最低限の休息も取れたし
今日は記念祭に最後まで付き合うよ。

engChrName: Aww, I really appreciate that, Culleo.
engSearchText: Aww, I really appreciate that, Culleo.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ありがとうねクレオさん。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、ありがとうねクレオさん。

engChrName: You're in much higher spirits than I thought you would be.
engSearchText:
You're in much higher spirits than I thought you
would be.
jpnChrName: 見たところ、本当に思ったほど 疲れていないみたいで嬉しいわ。
jpnSearchText:
見たところ、本当に思ったほど
疲れていないみたいで嬉しいわ。

engChrName: Yeah. I was worried the terrorist attack would cause a whole world of trouble in Crossbell.
engSearchText:
Yeah. I was worried the terrorist attack would
cause a whole world of trouble in Crossbell.
jpnChrName: ああ、本当は件のテロを受けてクロスベルでも 相当な混乱を予想していたが……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、本当は件のテロを受けてクロスベルでも
相当な混乱を予想していたが……

engChrName: Turns out I had nothing to worry about! The Crossbell Police Department is just as capable as our own forces.
engSearchText:
Turns out I had nothing to worry about!
The Crossbell Police Department is just as capable as
our own forces.
jpnChrName: あそこの警察は共和国警察にも劣らず本当に 優秀でね、私達も結構助かったというか……
jpnSearchText:
あそこの警察は共和国警察にも劣らず本当に
優秀でね、私達も結構助かったというか……

engChrName: Both businesses and citizens were helping out, too, so things went a lot more smoothly than I expected.
engSearchText:
Both businesses and citizens were helping out, too, so
things went a lot more smoothly than I expected.
jpnChrName: まあ、市民や企業も協力的だったし、 思った以上に対応がスムーズに進んだんだ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、市民や企業も協力的だったし、
思った以上に対応がスムーズに進んだんだ。

engChrName: Crossbell's gone through two, umm, incidents, right?
engSearchText: Crossbell's gone through two, umm, incidents, right?
jpnChrName: クロスベルってたしか、前に二回も ジヘンがあったんだっけ？
jpnSearchText:
クロスベルってたしか、前に二回も
ジヘンがあったんだっけ？

engChrName: That they have. And its people are all the stronger for it.
engSearchText:
That they have. And its people are all the stronger
for it.
jpnChrName: そういう側面もあるね、でもそういう困難を何度も 乗り越えてきたから皆強いもので……
jpnSearchText:
そういう側面もあるね、でもそういう困難を何度も
乗り越えてきたから皆強いもので……

engChrName: Felt like a sorry excuse for an ambassador, relying on the locals so much, but I made sure to do everything in my power.
engSearchText:
Felt like a sorry excuse for an ambassador, relying on
the locals so much, but I made sure to do everything
in my power.
jpnChrName: まあ、地元住民に甘え過ぎても外交官としては 情けない事だし、やれる事は最後までしてきたよ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、地元住民に甘え過ぎても外交官としては
情けない事だし、やれる事は最後までしてきたよ。

engChrName: Wow! Crossbell sounds so cool!
engSearchText: Wow! Crossbell sounds so cool!
jpnChrName: へぇ！　本当にクロスベルって 素敵な場所なのね……！
jpnSearchText:
へぇ！　本当にクロスベルって
素敵な場所なのね……！

engChrName: I agree, darling. This talk has made me want to visit. But for today, we have a festival to look forward to.
engSearchText:
I agree, darling. This talk has made me want to visit.
But for today, we have a festival to look forward to.
jpnChrName: ふふ、私も一層行ってみたくなったわ。 でも、今はとにかくこの日を祝いましょう。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、私も一層行ってみたくなったわ。
でも、今はとにかくこの日を祝いましょう。

engChrName: Only those who have pride in their own nation can look towards their neighbors with respect.
engSearchText:
Only those who have pride in their own nation can
look towards their neighbors with respect.
jpnChrName: 自分達の国に誇りをもってこそ、他の土地の 魅力なんかも違って見えてくるだろうし。
jpnSearchText:
自分達の国に誇りをもってこそ、他の土地の
魅力なんかも違って見えてくるだろうし。

engChrName: That's right. I have my own concerns about the president's speech, but this is a rare chance for us to enjoy ourselves.
engSearchText:
That's right. I have my own concerns about the
president's speech, but this is a rare chance for us to
enjoy ourselves.
jpnChrName: ああ、そうだね……大統領演説には思うところも あるけど、記念祭が良い機会なのはたしかだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、そうだね……大統領演説には思うところも
あるけど、記念祭が良い機会なのはたしかだ。

engChrName: Let's celebrate the festival today, as family and citizens of the Republic both.
engSearchText:
Let's celebrate the festival today, as family and
citizens of the Republic both.
jpnChrName: 今日は家族で、共和国の市民としての 祝うべきものを祝うとしようか。
jpnSearchText:
今日は家族で、共和国の市民としての
祝うべきものを祝うとしようか。

engChrName: Goddess, thank you for blessing us.
engSearchText: Goddess, thank you for blessing us.
jpnChrName: 女神様……平穏を取り戻してくださり、 ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText:
女神様……平穏を取り戻してくださり、
ありがとうございます。

engChrName: Please grant eternal peace to the souls of those who have passed.
engSearchText:
Please grant eternal peace to the souls of those who
have passed.
jpnChrName: 亡くなった方々の魂にもどうか 永遠の安らぎを……
jpnSearchText:
亡くなった方々の魂にもどうか
永遠の安らぎを……

engChrName: Miss Goddess Aidios, please watch over Daddy and Mommy and me.
engSearchText:
Miss Goddess Aidios, please watch over Daddy and
Mommy and me.
jpnChrName: 女神様……これからもアミアたちを 見守ってください……
jpnSearchText:
女神様……これからもアミアたちを
見守ってください……

engChrName: Mommy, where's Daddy?
engSearchText: Mommy, where's Daddy?
jpnChrName: ──ところでママ、パパは来ないの？
jpnSearchText: ──ところでママ、パパは来ないの？

engChrName: Oh, I forgot to mention. Culleo said he'd arrive a little late.
engSearchText:
Oh, I forgot to mention. Culleo said he'd arrive a
little late.
jpnChrName: あら、言っていなかったかしら。 クレオさんは、予定より帰るのが遅れるそうなの。
jpnSearchText:
あら、言っていなかったかしら。
クレオさんは、予定より帰るのが遅れるそうなの。

engChrName: With the festival and now the attack on top of everything, things have been hectic over at the Crossbell Consulate.
engSearchText:
With the festival and now the attack on top of
everything, things have been hectic over at the
Crossbell Consulate.
jpnChrName: ただでさえクロスベルの領事館も記念祭関係で 忙しかったのに、今回の事件の対応も加わって……
jpnSearchText:
ただでさえクロスベルの領事館も記念祭関係で
忙しかったのに、今回の事件の対応も加わって……

engChrName: But don't worry. It sounds like everything will be settled before the festivities, and we'll get to spend the festival with Daddy.
engSearchText:
But don't worry. It sounds like everything will be
settled before the festivities, and we'll get to spend the
festival with Daddy.
jpnChrName: でも、記念祭までには終わる見込みよ。 だから記念祭は一緒に過ごせるはず、安心して。
jpnSearchText:
でも、記念祭までには終わる見込みよ。
だから記念祭は一緒に過ごせるはず、安心して。

engChrName: Yay! I wanna spend the festival together with Mommy and Daddy!
engSearchText:
Yay! I wanna spend the festival together with
Mommy and Daddy!
jpnChrName: 良かった、やっぱり記念祭は アミアも三人で過ごしたいもの！
jpnSearchText:
良かった、やっぱり記念祭は
アミアも三人で過ごしたいもの！

engChrName: It's gonna be so much fun! I want Daddy to take me everywhere!
engSearchText:
It's gonna be so much fun! I want Daddy to take
me everywhere!
jpnChrName: いろんな催しもあるっていうし、 パパに連れて行って欲しいし！
jpnSearchText:
いろんな催しもあるっていうし、
パパに連れて行って欲しいし！

engChrName: Haha, sure, darling. We'll have fun today with Daddy to make up for all the times he couldn't be with us while he was working in Erebonia.
engSearchText:
Haha, sure, darling. We'll have fun today with Daddy
to make up for all the times he couldn't be with us
while he was working in Erebonia.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そうね……帝国時代はそれすら 出来なかったけど、今は一緒に楽しめるのよね……
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、そうね……帝国時代はそれすら
出来なかったけど、今は一緒に楽しめるのよね……

engChrName: Isn't Renne being a little scary? She looks pretty serious about this...
engSearchText:
Isn't Renne being a little scary? She looks pretty
serious about this...
jpnChrName: レン先輩がそこはかとな～く 本気な気がしてちょっと怖いけど……
jpnSearchText:
レン先輩がそこはかとな～く
本気な気がしてちょっと怖いけど……

engChrName: Let's pull through this, Agnès! We can't let this OR exams win!
engSearchText:
Let's pull through this, Agnès! We can't let this OR
exams win!
jpnChrName: アニエス、力を合わせて乗り切ろうね！ あと学年末の試験も！
jpnSearchText:
アニエス、力を合わせて乗り切ろうね！
あと学年末の試験も！

engChrName: Yes! We'll get through this together, Odette!
engSearchText: Yes! We'll get through this together, Odette!
jpnChrName: うん、一緒に頑張ろうね、オデット！
jpnSearchText: うん、一緒に頑張ろうね、オデット！

engChrName: We were thankfully able to enlist the professor's aid. Our odds are looking up.
engSearchText:
We were thankfully able to enlist the professor's aid.
Our odds are looking up.
jpnChrName: 博士の力も借りることができたし どうにか光明が見えてきたわね。
jpnSearchText:
博士の力も借りることができたし
どうにか光明が見えてきたわね。

engChrName: I wish I had more time to tinker with this Marduk terminal...
engSearchText:
I wish I had more time to tinker with this
Marduk terminal...
jpnChrName: このＭＫ社が開発した端末も 色々と気にはなるけど……
jpnSearchText:
このＭＫ社が開発した端末も
色々と気にはなるけど……

engChrName: ...but I need to focus on the plan right now. Can't let anything go wrong, or we might not succeed.
engSearchText:
...but I need to focus on the plan right now. Can't let
anything go wrong, or we might not succeed.
jpnChrName: 今は作戦に集中すべきでしょう。 少しでも成功率を上げるためにね。
jpnSearchText:
今は作戦に集中すべきでしょう。
少しでも成功率を上げるためにね。

engChrName: Give it your best, Agnès. You better take good care of her, Van.
engSearchText:
Give it your best, Agnès. You better take good care of
her, Van.
jpnChrName: アニエス、しっかりやりなさい。 お兄さんも改めてよろしく頼んだわよ。
jpnSearchText:
アニエス、しっかりやりなさい。
お兄さんも改めてよろしく頼んだわよ。

engChrName: I promise I'll see this through, Renne!
engSearchText: I promise I'll see this through, Renne!
jpnChrName: 先輩……はい、必ずやり遂げてみせます！
jpnSearchText: 先輩……はい、必ずやり遂げてみせます！

engChrName: Yeah, I got'cha. No slackin' in on this one. And I've still got shit to deal with from last month.
engSearchText:
Yeah, I got'cha. No slackin' in on this one. And I've
still got shit to deal with from last month.
jpnChrName: ま、全力を尽くさせてもらうぜ。 先月のやり残しを片付ける意味でもな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、全力を尽くさせてもらうぜ。
先月のやり残しを片付ける意味でもな。

engChrName: Heehee, Aramis' student body is sharper than I gave them credit for. Quite a delightful tea party we have on our hands.
engSearchText:
Heehee, Aramis' student body is sharper than I gave
them credit for. Quite a delightful tea party we have
on our hands.
jpnChrName: ふふ、アラミスは生徒の裁量も大きいし とびきり楽しいお茶会ができそうね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、アラミスは生徒の裁量も大きいし
とびきり楽しいお茶会ができそうね。

engChrName: I was hoping they'd hold a candle to Jenis after my transfer. Or to Thors, considering all I've heard from Tita.
engSearchText:
I was hoping they'd hold a candle to Jenis after
my transfer. Or to Thors, considering all I've heard
from Tita.
jpnChrName: 留学元の《ジェニス王立学園》や、親友がいた 《トールズ士官学院》からも色々聞いてるし……
jpnSearchText:
留学元の《ジェニス王立学園》や、親友がいた
《トールズ士官学院》からも色々聞いてるし……

engChrName: I'm expecting a lot from you, Agnès. Don't disappoint me, all right?
engSearchText:
I'm expecting a lot from you, Agnès.
Don't disappoint me, all right?
jpnChrName: アニエスの働きにも期待してるわよ？
jpnSearchText: アニエスの働きにも期待してるわよ？

engChrName: O-Of course! (Well, that's comforting, but also laying the pressure on a little thick...)
engSearchText:
O-Of course!
(Well, that's comforting, but also laying the pressure
on a little thick...)
jpnChrName: は、はい……！ （楽しみではあるけど少し不安かも……）
jpnSearchText:
は、はい……！
（楽しみではあるけど少し不安かも……）

engChrName: I thankfully made it to the Auber District. I'll lend everyone at the school a hand!
engSearchText:
I thankfully made it to the Auber District. I'll lend
everyone at the school a hand!
jpnChrName: なんとかオーベル地区まで送ってもらえたので 学校のみんなと協力しつつ動くつもりです！
jpnSearchText:
なんとかオーベル地区まで送ってもらえたので
学校のみんなと協力しつつ動くつもりです！

engChrName: Everyone in Aramis is working real hard...
engSearchText: Everyone in Aramis is working real hard...
jpnChrName: アラミスの皆もできる事をしようと 動いてくれていますし……
jpnSearchText:
アラミスの皆もできる事をしようと
動いてくれていますし……

engChrName: I can't be slacking off! I need to get myself in gear, too!
engSearchText:
I can't be slacking off! I need to get myself in
gear, too!
jpnChrName: 僕も負けていられません。 全力を尽くすとしましょう！
jpnSearchText:
僕も負けていられません。
全力を尽くすとしましょう！

engChrName: Not a boring day with Lyle around.
engSearchText: Not a boring day with Lyle around.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ライエルといると 本当に退屈しませんね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、ライエルといると
本当に退屈しませんね。

engChrName: This is my first Revolution Festival, so I'm hoping to get to really see the sights.
engSearchText:
This is my first Revolution Festival, so I'm hoping to
get to really see the sights.
jpnChrName: 僕も革命記念祭は初めてなので じっくり回りたかった所です。
jpnSearchText:
僕も革命記念祭は初めてなので
じっくり回りたかった所です。

engChrName: Gotta make sure to make a lot of memories to share with my friends back in the Empire.
engSearchText:
Gotta make sure to make a lot of memories to share
with my friends back in the Empire.
jpnChrName: 帝国のみんなにいい土産話ができるよう 精一杯楽しみたいです。
jpnSearchText:
帝国のみんなにいい土産話ができるよう
精一杯楽しみたいです。

engChrName: Man... I should've known, but I stopped by my place on my way here, and my fam's all frozen!
engSearchText:
Man... I should've known, but I stopped by my place
on my way here, and my fam's all frozen!
jpnChrName: ここに来る途中、家にも立ち寄ったんだが…… 家族はみんな“停まっちまって”てよ……
jpnSearchText:
ここに来る途中、家にも立ち寄ったんだが……
家族はみんな“停まっちまって”てよ……

engChrName: No way I can leave them like that! I mean, they didn't get attacked or anything...
engSearchText:
No way I can leave them like that! I mean, they didn't
get attacked or anything...
jpnChrName: バケモノには襲われてねーが、ともかく オレとしても放っとけねーんだよ！
jpnSearchText:
バケモノには襲われてねーが、ともかく
オレとしても放っとけねーんだよ！

engChrName: Man, this thing's real scary! At least I got Julian with me, so we'll figure out what to do.
engSearchText:
Man, this thing's real scary! At least I got Julian with
me, so we'll figure out what to do.
jpnChrName: ちぃと怖いが、ユリアンと一緒なら やれる事はあるはずだ！！
jpnSearchText:
ちぃと怖いが、ユリアンと一緒なら
やれる事はあるはずだ！！

engChrName: You and your team, too, Agnès! Hang in there!
engSearchText: You and your team, too, Agnès! Hang in there!
jpnChrName: つーわけでアニエスちゃん達も頑張れよ！？ ぜってー負けんじゃねーぞ！！
jpnSearchText:
つーわけでアニエスちゃん達も頑張れよ！？
ぜってー負けんじゃねーぞ！！

engChrName: Of course! Take care, Lyle!
engSearchText: Of course! Take care, Lyle!
jpnChrName: はいっ……！！ ライエル君たちもお気をつけて！
jpnSearchText:
はいっ……！！
ライエル君たちもお気をつけて！

engChrName: Argh! Julian's such a chick magnet, it's unreal. How does he do that?
engSearchText:
Argh! Julian's such a chick magnet, it's unreal.
How does he do that?
jpnChrName: くぅぅ～っ！！　ユリアンの いい奴っぷりが止まらねえ！！
jpnSearchText:
くぅぅ～っ！！　ユリアンの
いい奴っぷりが止まらねえ！！

engChrName: I know! I'm gonna mooch off of—I-I mean! I'm gonna show him around the festival and learn all his secret techniques.
engSearchText:
I know! I'm gonna mooch off of—I-I mean!
I'm gonna show him around the festival and learn all
his secret techniques.
jpnChrName: よし決めた！！　記念祭は案内もしつつ コイツのモテテクを盗んでやるぜッ！！
jpnSearchText:
よし決めた！！　記念祭は案内もしつつ
コイツのモテテクを盗んでやるぜッ！！

engChrName: You sure you wanna come with me to look for people?
engSearchText:
You sure you wanna come with me to look
for people?
jpnChrName: 逃げ遅れた人の捜索、 本当に付き合ってくれるのかい？
jpnSearchText:
逃げ遅れた人の捜索、
本当に付き合ってくれるのかい？

engChrName: I'm honestly not super thrilled about leaving campus grounds...
engSearchText:
I'm honestly not super thrilled about leaving
campus grounds...
jpnChrName: 正直、敷地の外は安全とは言えないけど……
jpnSearchText: 正直、敷地の外は安全とは言えないけど……

engChrName: Heh, don't worry! These long and attractive legs are just as good for hoofing it!
engSearchText:
Heh, don't worry! These long and attractive legs are
just as good for hoofing it!
jpnChrName: ハッ、これでもオレは 逃げ足の速さだけは自慢なんだぜ！！
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、これでもオレは
逃げ足の速さだけは自慢なんだぜ！！

engChrName: And what kinda friend would I be if I just abandoned you?
engSearchText:
And what kinda friend would I be if I just
abandoned you?
jpnChrName: それにダチを一人で行かせるなんざ 男が廃るってモンだろ！？
jpnSearchText:
それにダチを一人で行かせるなんざ
男が廃るってモンだろ！？

engChrName: Lyle... Thanks. I really appreciate it.
engSearchText: Lyle... Thanks. I really appreciate it.
jpnChrName: ライエル……ありがとう。 本当に助かるよ。
jpnSearchText:
ライエル……ありがとう。
本当に助かるよ。

engChrName: I'll take care of the monsters. You focus on finding and rescuing people!
engSearchText:
I'll take care of the monsters. You focus on finding
and rescuing people!
jpnChrName: 怪異は僕が片づけるから 逃げ遅れた人を探してくれ！
jpnSearchText:
怪異は僕が片づけるから
逃げ遅れた人を探してくれ！

engChrName: No prob! All that practice hitting on girls has polished my hottie radar to a mirror sheen!
engSearchText:
No prob! All that practice hitting on girls has
polished my hottie radar to a mirror sheen!
jpnChrName: 了解！！　ナンパで鍛えた女の子レーダーの 威力、ここで見せてやるぜっ！！
jpnSearchText:
了解！！　ナンパで鍛えた女の子レーダーの
威力、ここで見せてやるぜっ！！

engChrName: Your...hottie radar?
engSearchText: Your...hottie radar?
jpnChrName: た、頼もしい……かな？
jpnSearchText: た、頼もしい……かな？

engChrName: Yeah, I knew that she wasn't dead.
engSearchText: Yeah, I knew that she wasn't dead.
jpnChrName: フン、こいつがくたばるワケ ねえとは思ってたが……
jpnSearchText:
フン、こいつがくたばるワケ
ねえとは思ってたが……

engChrName: She's immediately back in gear, though. Helping out refugees the moment she returns. It's very like her.
engSearchText:
She's immediately back in gear, though. Helping out
refugees the moment she returns. It's very like her.
jpnChrName: 戻って早々、学校で避難民の受け入れか。 こいつらのやりそうな事だぜ。
jpnSearchText:
戻って早々、学校で避難民の受け入れか。
こいつらのやりそうな事だぜ。

engChrName: ...I should step up to the plate, too. I'd feel awful otherwise. I'll at least help with security.
engSearchText:
...I should step up to the plate, too. I'd feel
awful otherwise. I'll at least help with security.
jpnChrName: ……だが何もしねえのは流石に寝覚め悪ィ…… 仕方ねぇから警備くらいは引き受けてやるよ。
jpnSearchText:
……だが何もしねえのは流石に寝覚め悪ィ……
仕方ねぇから警備くらいは引き受けてやるよ。

engChrName: So, where should I keep an eye out?
engSearchText: So, where should I keep an eye out?
jpnChrName: んで、俺はどっちを見張ればいいんだ？
jpnSearchText: んで、俺はどっちを見張ればいいんだ？

engChrName: What the hell is going on?! I tried booking it as fast as I could...
engSearchText:
What the hell is going on?! I tried booking it as fast
as I could...
jpnChrName: ……何だってんだ！？ とにかく逃げてきちまったが……
jpnSearchText:
……何だってんだ！？
とにかく逃げてきちまったが……

engChrName: Is Sasha...? No, there's no way she'd bite the dust that easily, right?
engSearchText:
Is Sasha...? No, there's no way she'd bite the dust
that easily, right?
jpnChrName: サーシャの野郎…… いや、アイツがやられるなんて事は……
jpnSearchText:
サーシャの野郎……
いや、アイツがやられるなんて事は……

engChrName: No, no! Focus, damn it! I need to help the first years escape.
engSearchText:
No, no! Focus, damn it! I need to help the first
years escape.
