jpnChrName: クソッ、上手く考えが纏まらねえ……！ ともかく一年どもを逃がさねえと……
jpnSearchText:
クソッ、上手く考えが纏まらねえ……！
ともかく一年どもを逃がさねえと……

engChrName: Our first priority is taking care of evacuees! We've got food and water, so distribute it accordingly.
engSearchText:
Our first priority is taking care of evacuees! We've got
food and water, so distribute it accordingly.
jpnChrName: 近隣から避難してきた人の受け入れが第一！ 水と食料の配布も指示通りにお願いね！
jpnSearchText:
近隣から避難してきた人の受け入れが第一！
水と食料の配布も指示通りにお願いね！

engChrName: We'll set up a watch, too. If you see something suspicious, report it immediately.
engSearchText:
We'll set up a watch, too. If you see something
suspicious, report it immediately.
jpnChrName: 見張り役も立てるけど、何か異常があったら 即座に報告できるよう体制を！
jpnSearchText:
見張り役も立てるけど、何か異常があったら
即座に報告できるよう体制を！

engChrName: Aramis has taught us a lot about being independent and fending for ourselves. It's time we put those lessons to use!
engSearchText:
Aramis has taught us a lot about being independent
and fending for ourselves. It's time we put those
lessons to use!
jpnChrName: 私達が学んできた、アラミスの自主性の精神…… 今このためにあったものと思いなさい！
jpnSearchText:
私達が学んできた、アラミスの自主性の精神……
今このためにあったものと思いなさい！

engChrName: Yes, Captain Sasha!
engSearchText: Yes, Captain Sasha!
jpnChrName: はい、サーシャ部長！
jpnSearchText: はい、サーシャ部長！

engChrName: (Sasha is doing an amazing job. I've got to live up to her example!)
engSearchText:
(Sasha is doing an amazing job. I've got to live up to
her example!)
jpnChrName: （サーシャ先輩……やっぱり頼もしいですね。   私も負けないよう、全力を尽くさないと……！）
jpnSearchText:
（サーシャ先輩……やっぱり頼もしいですね。
私も負けないよう、全力を尽くさないと……！）

engChrName: Finally made it back. Had to take a different route after leaving the first years in Vantail, so that took a while.
engSearchText:
Finally made it back. Had to take a different route
after leaving the first years in Vantail, so that took
a while.
jpnChrName: いや～、ヴァンタイユで後輩たちを逃がしてから 迂回してたら時間かかっちゃってさ～！
jpnSearchText:
いや～、ヴァンタイユで後輩たちを逃がしてから
迂回してたら時間かかっちゃってさ～！

engChrName: I made it back with nothing but an orbal gun for self defense. That's freakin' nuts!
engSearchText:
I made it back with nothing but an orbal gun for
self defense. That's freakin' nuts!
jpnChrName: 護身用の銃一丁で戻ってくるのは 我ながら無茶だったかもねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
護身用の銃一丁で戻ってくるのは
我ながら無茶だったかもねぇ。

engChrName: But it looks like James managed to get everyone out just fine.
engSearchText:
But it looks like James managed to get everyone out
just fine.
jpnChrName: でもま、ジェイムスも上手いこと みんなを連れて来てくれたみたいだし。
jpnSearchText:
でもま、ジェイムスも上手いこと
みんなを連れて来てくれたみたいだし。

engChrName: I got to talk with Renne, too. It was just a bit, but with that settled, we can focus on the task at hand!
engSearchText:
I got to talk with Renne, too. It was just a bit, but
with that settled, we can focus on the task at hand!
jpnChrName: レンとも少しだけど連携できたし、 あとは私達で出来る事をするだけでしょ！
jpnSearchText:
レンとも少しだけど連携できたし、
あとは私達で出来る事をするだけでしょ！

engChrName: All right, Student Council! Let's get back in gear!
engSearchText: All right, Student Council! Let's get back in gear!
jpnChrName: ま、生徒会も後半戦が 始まる時期ってコトね♪
jpnSearchText:
ま、生徒会も後半戦が
始まる時期ってコトね♪

engChrName: There's a lot of club events coming up, but I think I'll prioritize getting the basketball club ready for this winter's nationals.
engSearchText:
There's a lot of club events coming up, but I think
I'll prioritize getting the basketball club ready for this
winter's nationals.
jpnChrName: 部活連もいくつか行事があるけど とりあえずバスケ部は冬の全国大会かな？
jpnSearchText:
部活連もいくつか行事があるけど
とりあえずバスケ部は冬の全国大会かな？

engChrName: I'm their captain, after all. It's on me to lead them to victory!
engSearchText:
I'm their captain, after all. It's on me to lead them
to victory!
jpnChrName: 曲がりなりにも部長だし みんなを優勝までエスコートしないとね！
jpnSearchText:
曲がりなりにも部長だし
みんなを優勝までエスコートしないとね！

engChrName: Okay! We've got finals after the festival, and we've gotta start planning the school festival after that, too.
engSearchText:
Okay! We've got finals after the festival, and we've
gotta start planning the school festival after that, too.
jpnChrName: さてさて、記念祭が過ぎれば期末試験。 来年の学藝祭の企画も始まるし──
jpnSearchText:
さてさて、記念祭が過ぎれば期末試験。
来年の学藝祭の企画も始まるし──

engChrName: Both the Student Council and my clubs will keep me very busy.
engSearchText:
Both the Student Council and my clubs will keep me
very busy.
jpnChrName: 生徒会も部活連（ウチ）も忙しくなるわよね～。
jpnSearchText: 生徒会も部活連（ウチ）も忙しくなるわよね～。

engChrName: Aww, I'd finally forgotten all about exams! Why did you have to remind me?
engSearchText:
Aww, I'd finally forgotten all about exams! Why did
you have to remind me?
jpnChrName: はぁ、試験の事はせっかく忘れてたのに…… 思い出させないでくださいよ～！
jpnSearchText:
はぁ、試験の事はせっかく忘れてたのに……
思い出させないでくださいよ～！

engChrName: Haha... Things will be really hectic for you, huh?
engSearchText: Haha... Things will be really hectic for you, huh?
jpnChrName: あはは……でも本当に 忙しくなりそうですよね。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……でも本当に
忙しくなりそうですよね。

engChrName: Make sure you don't miss the Revolution Festival! We can take great inspiration from it for our own school festival.
engSearchText:
Make sure you don't miss the Revolution Festival!
We can take great inspiration from it for our own
school festival.
jpnChrName: 学藝祭については記念祭の催しも 参考になりますし、しっかり見ておかないと。
jpnSearchText:
学藝祭については記念祭の催しも
参考になりますし、しっかり見ておかないと。

engChrName: An excellent idea.
engSearchText: An excellent idea.
jpnChrName: ええ、それがいいわ。
jpnSearchText: ええ、それがいいわ。

engChrName: I've little experience planning events like these, but I'll endeavor to make sure this tea party's most exquisite.
engSearchText:
I've little experience planning events like these, but
I'll endeavor to make sure this tea party's
most exquisite.
jpnChrName: こういった企画は私も初めてだし 楽しいお茶会になるよう努力するつもりよ。
jpnSearchText:
こういった企画は私も初めてだし
楽しいお茶会になるよう努力するつもりよ。

engChrName: I was hoping you'd hold a candle to Jenis after my transfer. Or to Thors, considering all I've heard from Tita.
engSearchText:
I was hoping you'd hold a candle to Jenis after
my transfer. Or to Thors, considering all I've heard
from Tita.
jpnChrName: 留学元の《ジェニス王立学園》や、親友がいた 《トールズ士官学院》からも面白い話を聞いてるし……
jpnSearchText:
留学元の《ジェニス王立学園》や、親友がいた
《トールズ士官学院》からも面白い話を聞いてるし……

engChrName: Agnès, Odette, Sasha? I have high hopes for you.
engSearchText: Agnès, Odette, Sasha? I have high hopes for you.
jpnChrName: アニエス、オデットとサーシャも 色々期待してるわよ？
jpnSearchText:
アニエス、オデットとサーシャも
色々期待してるわよ？

engChrName: Oooh, I don't like that! This is gonna be weird, I can feel it!
engSearchText:
Oooh, I don't like that! This is gonna be weird, I can
feel it!
jpnChrName: ひえぇ～……なんとなく とんでもない企画になりそうな予感が～……
jpnSearchText:
ひえぇ～……なんとなく
とんでもない企画になりそうな予感が～……

engChrName: I'm gonna be busy anyway, but seeing Renne get so into this is a little scary.
engSearchText:
I'm gonna be busy anyway, but seeing Renne get so
into this is a little scary.
jpnChrName: 部活連でも盛り上げるつもりだけど、 レンの本気はちょっと怖いかもね。
jpnSearchText:
部活連でも盛り上げるつもりだけど、
レンの本気はちょっと怖いかもね。

engChrName: Well, we don't have time to dawdle! Onwards, you guys! To the new year!
engSearchText:
Well, we don't have time to dawdle! Onwards,
you guys! To the new year!
jpnChrName: ま、いずれにせよ年度末にかけて 加速していくから、二人もしっかりね！
jpnSearchText:
ま、いずれにせよ年度末にかけて
加速していくから、二人もしっかりね！

engChrName: Of course!
engSearchText: Of course!
jpnChrName: はいっ！／はーい！！
jpnSearchText: はいっ！／はーい！！

engChrName: Ah. It's you. As I understand it, you and your group have done a lot for us.
engSearchText:
Ah. It's you. As I understand it, you and your group
have done a lot for us.
jpnChrName: おお、君たちか……どうやら色々と 動いてくれているようだが……
jpnSearchText:
おお、君たちか……どうやら色々と
動いてくれているようだが……

engChrName: I won't pry, don't worry. Best of luck in your endeavors, and may we all pull through this.
engSearchText:
I won't pry, don't worry. Best of luck in your
endeavors, and may we all pull through this.
jpnChrName: 深くは聞かんが……共にこの困難を 乗り越えるためにも、応援させてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
深くは聞かんが……共にこの困難を
乗り越えるためにも、応援させてくれ。

engChrName: The academy is taking in as many refugees as we can find. We have enough food and water to last for a while, at least.
engSearchText:
The academy is taking in as many refugees as we
can find. We have enough food and water to last for a
while, at least.
jpnChrName: 避難民は学校で可能な限り受け入れている。 水も食料もしばらくは持つはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
避難民は学校で可能な限り受け入れている。
水も食料もしばらくは持つはずだ。

engChrName: You don't have to worry about us. You've something to take care of, so go.
engSearchText:
You don't have to worry about us. You've something
to take care of, so go.
jpnChrName: ……こちらは心配しなくて良い、 君たちは為すべき事をしてきてくれ！
jpnSearchText:
……こちらは心配しなくて良い、
君たちは為すべき事をしてきてくれ！

engChrName: Haha, the students around here are all in high spirits.
engSearchText: Haha, the students around here are all in high spirits.
jpnChrName: ふふ、生徒たちの姿も見かけるが みな表情も明るくて何よりだ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、生徒たちの姿も見かけるが
みな表情も明るくて何よりだ。

engChrName: This year's been a challenging one. I only hope it helps to spur them on to keep growing.
engSearchText:
This year's been a challenging one. I only hope it
helps to spur them on to keep growing.
jpnChrName: 今年は年度頭から様々な事があったが…… 生徒を成長させてくれる糧になったと信じよう。
jpnSearchText:
今年は年度頭から様々な事があったが……
生徒を成長させてくれる糧になったと信じよう。

engChrName: At least today should serve to give them some respite. They should enjoy themselves.
engSearchText:
At least today should serve to give them some respite.
They should enjoy themselves.
jpnChrName: せめて今日は日頃の悩みも 忘れて楽しんで欲しいね。
jpnSearchText:
せめて今日は日頃の悩みも
忘れて楽しんで欲しいね。

engChrName: Oh. Hello, Agnès. You busy with that part time job you mentioned?
engSearchText:
Oh. Hello, Agnès. You busy with that part time job
you mentioned?
jpnChrName: おや、アニエス君。 例のアルバイト中のようだね。
jpnSearchText:
おや、アニエス君。
例のアルバイト中のようだね。

engChrName: Hello, Mr. Powell. Yes, that's right.
engSearchText: Hello, Mr. Powell. Yes, that's right.
jpnChrName: はい、パウエル先生もお疲れ様です。
jpnSearchText: はい、パウエル先生もお疲れ様です。

engChrName: You're Agnès' teacher? You look very smart!
engSearchText: You're Agnès' teacher? You look very smart!
jpnChrName: アニエスさんの先生…… とっても物知りな人みたいです！
jpnSearchText:
アニエスさんの先生……
とっても物知りな人みたいです！

engChrName: Mr. Powell teaches history and is in charge of the second year students.
engSearchText:
Mr. Powell teaches history and is in charge of the
second year students.
jpnChrName: ええ、パウエル先生は歴史担当で ２年生の学年主任でもあるんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、パウエル先生は歴史担当で
２年生の学年主任でもあるんですよ。

engChrName: I don't know how smart I really am, but I'll be glad to answer any questions you might have.
engSearchText:
I don't know how smart I really am, but I'll be glad to
answer any questions you might have.
jpnChrName: ははは、物知りかはともかく 知りたい事があれば聞いてくれたまえ。
jpnSearchText:
ははは、物知りかはともかく
知りたい事があれば聞いてくれたまえ。

engChrName: If I know the answer to them, at least.
engSearchText: If I know the answer to them, at least.
jpnChrName: 私に答えられる事なら──
jpnSearchText: 私に答えられる事なら──

engChrName: Oh. You're...
engSearchText: Oh. You're...

engChrName: ...Arkride? Van Arkride?
engSearchText: ...Arkride? Van Arkride?
jpnChrName: ………アークライド………… ヴァン・アークライド君だね？
jpnSearchText:
………アークライド…………
ヴァン・アークライド君だね？

engChrName: Huh?
engSearchText: Huh?
jpnChrName: ハン……？
jpnSearchText: ハン……？

engChrName: If you're familiar with Van...
engSearchText: If you're familiar with Van...
jpnChrName: ヴァン様をご存知という事は……
jpnSearchText: ヴァン様をご存知という事は……

engChrName: Wait, if you know Van...
engSearchText: Wait, if you know Van...
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんを知ってるって事は……
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさんを知ってるって事は……

engChrName: If he knows you, then...
engSearchText: If he knows you, then...
jpnChrName: あんたを知ってるって事は……
jpnSearchText: あんたを知ってるって事は……

engChrName: Man... Figured you would've forgotten all about me already.
engSearchText:
Man... Figured you would've forgotten all about
me already.
jpnChrName: やれやれ……てっきり 忘れられてるかと思ってましたが。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ……てっきり
忘れられてるかと思ってましたが。

engChrName: Nice seein' you, Mr. Powell.
engSearchText: Nice seein' you, Mr. Powell.
jpnChrName: お久しぶりですね、パウエル先生。
jpnSearchText: お久しぶりですね、パウエル先生。

engChrName: Forgotten? Impossible. You don't just forget students as special as you, Van.
engSearchText:
Forgotten? Impossible. You don't just forget students
as special as you, Van.
jpnChrName: 忘れるわけが無いだろう。 教師生活の中でも印象深い生徒だよ、君は。
jpnSearchText:
忘れるわけが無いだろう。
教師生活の中でも印象深い生徒だよ、君は。

engChrName: It's been seven long years. I am glad that, despite everything, you seem to be doing well.
engSearchText:
It's been seven long years. I am glad that, despite
everything, you seem to be doing well.
jpnChrName: あれから７年か……色々事情があったようだが ともあれ元気そうでほっとしたよ。
jpnSearchText:
あれから７年か……色々事情があったようだが
ともあれ元気そうでほっとしたよ。

engChrName: I'm doin' fine, thanks. Though I guess I made shit real rowdy around here, huh. Sorry 'bout that.
engSearchText:
I'm doin' fine, thanks. Though I guess I made shit
real rowdy around here, huh. Sorry 'bout that.
jpnChrName: ええ、ありがとうございます。 それとあの時はご迷惑をおかけして。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、ありがとうございます。
それとあの時はご迷惑をおかけして。

engChrName: Not at all. I do wish I'd been able to do more for you, as your teacher.
engSearchText:
Not at all. I do wish I'd been able to do more for you,
as your teacher.
jpnChrName: いいんだ、担任教師として 私ももっと力になりたかったが──
jpnSearchText:
いいんだ、担任教師として
私ももっと力になりたかったが──

engChrName: But I guess it's too late for such regrets by now, isn't it?
engSearchText:
But I guess it's too late for such regrets by now,
isn't it?
jpnChrName: もはや言っても詮無き事なんだろうな。
jpnSearchText: もはや言っても詮無き事なんだろうな。

engChrName: If there's anything I can do for you now, I hope you know you just have to ask.
engSearchText:
If there's anything I can do for you now, I hope you
know you just have to ask.
jpnChrName: せめて……私にできる事があれば言ってくれ。 最大限配慮させてもらうよ。
jpnSearchText:
せめて……私にできる事があれば言ってくれ。
最大限配慮させてもらうよ。

engChrName: 'Preciate it, but I really am fine. Thanks for the thought, though.
engSearchText:
'Preciate it, but I really am fine. Thanks for the
thought, though.
jpnChrName: はは、本当に大丈夫ですから。 お気持ちだけ受け取っておきますよ、先生。
jpnSearchText:
はは、本当に大丈夫ですから。
お気持ちだけ受け取っておきますよ、先生。

engChrName: (It hadn't even occurred to me that Van might have been one of Mr. Powell's students.)
engSearchText:
(It hadn't even occurred to me that Van might have
been one of Mr. Powell's students.)
jpnChrName: （まさか……パウエル先生が   ヴァンさんの担任教諭だったなんて……）
jpnSearchText:
（まさか……パウエル先生が
ヴァンさんの担任教諭だったなんて……）

engChrName: (So, Van studied at Aramis? That's new!)
engSearchText: (So, Van studied at Aramis? That's new!)
jpnChrName: （それにヴァンさんがアラミスの   生徒だったのも驚きですっ！）
jpnSearchText:
（それにヴァンさんがアラミスの
生徒だったのも驚きですっ！）

engChrName: (He did sorta give me that feel. He's just full of surprises, eh?)
engSearchText:
(He did sorta give me that feel. He's just full of
surprises, eh?)
jpnChrName: （ま、薄々感づいちゃいたが……   コイツ、色々隠してる事あるよな？）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、薄々感づいちゃいたが……
コイツ、色々隠してる事あるよな？）

engChrName: (Indeed. He will hopefully be open to discussing it with us sometime in the future.)
engSearchText:
(Indeed. He will hopefully be open to discussing it
with us sometime in the future.)
jpnChrName: （ええ……いつか話して下さると   嬉しいのですが……）
jpnSearchText:
（ええ……いつか話して下さると
嬉しいのですが……）

engChrName: (Yeah... I'd be curious to learn more myself.)
engSearchText: (Yeah... I'd be curious to learn more myself.)
jpnChrName: （うん……いつかちゃんと   聞きたい所だけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（うん……いつかちゃんと
聞きたい所だけど……）

engChrName: (Not a big deal, but it does kinda bother me.)
engSearchText: (Not a big deal, but it does kinda bother me.)
jpnChrName: （ま、別にいいんだけど   ちょっと癪に障るわよね。）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、別にいいんだけど
ちょっと癪に障るわよね。）

engChrName: So Agnès is working for you, then?
engSearchText: So Agnès is working for you, then?
jpnChrName: そうか……アニエス君のバイト先が 君だったとはね。
jpnSearchText:
そうか……アニエス君のバイト先が
君だったとはね。

engChrName: What a small and wonderful world we live in. But I'll leave you to it.
engSearchText:
What a small and wonderful world we live in. But I'll
leave you to it.
jpnChrName: 奇妙な巡り合わせを感じるが── 私が首を突っ込むことではなさそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
奇妙な巡り合わせを感じるが──
私が首を突っ込むことではなさそうだ。

engChrName: I'm relieved you seem well. I look forward to you visiting, if you ever feel like it.
engSearchText:
I'm relieved you seem well. I look forward to you
visiting, if you ever feel like it.
jpnChrName: 元気そうでほっとしたよ。 もし気が向いたら、また顔を見せてくれたまえ。
jpnSearchText:
元気そうでほっとしたよ。
もし気が向いたら、また顔を見せてくれたまえ。

engChrName: Sure. Take care of yourself, Mr. Powell. Keep an eye on Agnès, too.
engSearchText:
Sure. Take care of yourself, Mr. Powell. Keep an eye
on Agnès, too.
jpnChrName: ええ、先生もお体にお気をつけて。 アニエスにも良くしてやってください。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、先生もお体にお気をつけて。
アニエスにも良くしてやってください。

engChrName: (Van's acting just like Abi!)
engSearchText: (Van's acting just like Abi!)
jpnChrName: （ヴァンさん……   なんだかお父さん（アブ）みたいです！）
jpnSearchText:
（ヴァンさん……
なんだかお父さん（アブ）みたいです！）

engChrName: (Th-That's embarrassing...)
engSearchText: (Th-That's embarrassing...)
jpnChrName: （そ、それは流石に恥ずかしいですね……）
jpnSearchText: （そ、それは流石に恥ずかしいですね……）

engChrName: Thank you for your time today!
engSearchText: Thank you for your time today!
jpnChrName: それでは先生、今日もありがとうございました！
jpnSearchText: それでは先生、今日もありがとうございました！

engChrName: Of course! Good work today, everyone.
engSearchText: Of course! Good work today, everyone.
jpnChrName: はぁい、今日も練習お疲れ様♪
jpnSearchText: はぁい、今日も練習お疲れ様♪

engChrName: I know the Revolution Festival is almost here, but don't get too excited. Be safe on your way home.
engSearchText:
I know the Revolution Festival is almost here, but
don't get too excited. Be safe on your way home.
jpnChrName: 記念祭も近いけど浮かれ過ぎないで 気をつけて帰るのよっ。
jpnSearchText:
記念祭も近いけど浮かれ過ぎないで
気をつけて帰るのよっ。

engChrName: You look real cheery today, Ms. Sonia. Something good happen?
engSearchText:
You look real cheery today, Ms. Sonia.
Something good happen?
jpnChrName: 先生、何かご機嫌じゃないですか？ 何か良い事でもあったとか？
jpnSearchText:
先生、何かご機嫌じゃないですか？
何か良い事でもあったとか？

engChrName: I think Ms. Sonia is more pumped for the festival than we are.
engSearchText:
I think Ms. Sonia is more pumped for the festival
than we are.
jpnChrName: 先生こそ、記念祭で浮かれちゃったり しているんじゃありませんかぁ？
jpnSearchText:
先生こそ、記念祭で浮かれちゃったり
しているんじゃありませんかぁ？

engChrName: Oh, goodness! Not at all, I assure you!
engSearchText: Oh, goodness! Not at all, I assure you!
jpnChrName: そそ、そんな事ないんだから～！！
jpnSearchText: そそ、そんな事ないんだから～！！

engChrName: Anyway, be safe, everyone! Don't wanna get hurt and waste all your hard work for the winter tournament!
engSearchText:
Anyway, be safe, everyone! Don't wanna get hurt and
waste all your hard work for the winter tournament!
jpnChrName: ま、とにかく気をつけて帰りなさい。 冬の大会前に怪我したら台無しだしね！
jpnSearchText:
ま、とにかく気をつけて帰りなさい。
冬の大会前に怪我したら台無しだしね！

engChrName: (A blind date on the exact same day as the festival? That's impeccable timing.)
engSearchText:
(A blind date on the exact same day as the festival?
That's impeccable timing.)
jpnChrName: （ふふ、まさか記念祭の日に   お見合いの予定が入るなんて……）
jpnSearchText:
（ふふ、まさか記念祭の日に
お見合いの予定が入るなんて……）

engChrName: (Oh, how romantic! I guess the Goddess hasn't given up on me yet after all!)
engSearchText:
(Oh, how romantic! I guess the Goddess hasn't given
up on me yet after all!)
jpnChrName: （随分ロマンチックじゃないの、私もまだまだ   女神様に見捨てられてなかったのね♪）
jpnSearchText:
（随分ロマンチックじゃないの、私もまだまだ
女神様に見捨てられてなかったのね♪）

engChrName: I've seen you before. You're from the bar in the Blacklight District.
engSearchText:
I've seen you before. You're from the bar in the
Blacklight District.
jpnChrName: アンタは確か、黒芒街の酒場の……
jpnSearchText: アンタは確か、黒芒街の酒場の……

engChrName: I got mixed up in this mess, so I had to help people evacuate to the school.
engSearchText:
I got mixed up in this mess, so I had to help people
evacuate to the school.
jpnChrName: ハッ、巻き込まれて この学校に避難させてもらっててね。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、巻き込まれて
この学校に避難させてもらっててね。

engChrName: Don't you worry, though. I fought off all the devils on campus grounds.
engSearchText:
Don't you worry, though. I fought off all the devils on
campus grounds.
jpnChrName: まあ安心しな。 敷地内の“悪魔”どもは返り討ちにしたよ！
jpnSearchText:
まあ安心しな。
敷地内の“悪魔”どもは返り討ちにしたよ！

engChrName: You used to be a jaeger, yeah? Good to have someone to kick some ass around here.
engSearchText:
You used to be a jaeger, yeah? Good to have someone
to kick some ass around here.
jpnChrName: 元猟兵だったかよ？ そいつは頼もしいっつーか。
jpnSearchText:
元猟兵だったかよ？
そいつは頼もしいっつーか。

engChrName: Yes, absolutely. Please, keep everyone safe!
engSearchText: Yes, absolutely. Please, keep everyone safe!
jpnChrName: ええ、本当に…… どうか皆のこと、よろしくお願いします！！
jpnSearchText:
ええ、本当に……
どうか皆のこと、よろしくお願いします！！

engChrName: Sure, I'll keep an eye on the kids. For Yota's sake, no one's getting past me!
engSearchText:
Sure, I'll keep an eye on the kids. For Yota's sake, no
one's getting past me!
jpnChrName: ああ、任せておきな！ ヨータのためにも守り切ってみせるさ！！
jpnSearchText:
ああ、任せておきな！
ヨータのためにも守り切ってみせるさ！！

engChrName: You guys got something planned, right? Don't worry about us. I'll keep 'em safe, so get going!
engSearchText:
You guys got something planned, right? Don't worry
about us. I'll keep 'em safe, so get going!
jpnChrName: なんでも作戦だとかを始めるんだって？ ここは任せてとっとと行きな！
jpnSearchText:
なんでも作戦だとかを始めるんだって？
ここは任せてとっとと行きな！

engChrName: No one, devil or otherwise, is getting past me. I'll grind them all to a fine paste. For Yota!
engSearchText:
No one, devil or otherwise, is getting past me.
I'll grind them all to a fine paste. For Yota!
jpnChrName: ハッ、ヨータのためにも、手を出す奴は 悪魔だろうがブチのめしてやるさ！！
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、ヨータのためにも、手を出す奴は
悪魔だろうがブチのめしてやるさ！！

engChrName: (Yota, calm down a bit!)
engSearchText: (Yota, calm down a bit!)
jpnChrName: （ヨータったらこんなにはしゃいで……！）
jpnSearchText: （ヨータったらこんなにはしゃいで……！）

engChrName: Damn it... I should've done something sooner.
engSearchText: Damn it... I should've done something sooner.
jpnChrName: くっ……やはりもっと早くに 実行に移すべきだったね……
jpnSearchText:
くっ……やはりもっと早くに
実行に移すべきだったね……

engChrName: I can't believe I didn't realize how Yota felt. I feel so useless...
engSearchText:
I can't believe I didn't realize how Yota felt. I feel
so useless...
jpnChrName: アタシとした事が、ヨータの気持ちにも 気づいてやれず……不甲斐ないばかりさ。
jpnSearchText:
アタシとした事が、ヨータの気持ちにも
気づいてやれず……不甲斐ないばかりさ。

engChrName: Well, we should at least enjoy ourselves today.
engSearchText: Well, we should at least enjoy ourselves today.
jpnChrName: だが──そうさね、せめて今日は 二人で祭りを楽しむとしようかね……！
jpnSearchText:
だが──そうさね、せめて今日は
二人で祭りを楽しむとしようかね……！

engChrName: Heehee, we're giving out water!
engSearchText: Heehee, we're giving out water!
jpnChrName: えへへ、みんなにお水くばってるの～！
jpnSearchText: えへへ、みんなにお水くばってるの～！

engChrName: And we're giving out hugs, too! That'll make everyone feel better!
engSearchText:
And we're giving out hugs, too! That'll make
everyone feel better!
jpnChrName: それからギュ～ってしてあげるんだよ～っ！ そしたらみんな、ゲンキになるんだもん！！
jpnSearchText:
それからギュ～ってしてあげるんだよ～っ！
そしたらみんな、ゲンキになるんだもん！！

engChrName: (Oh... My darling Yota. Even at a time like this, you're such a sweetheart!)
engSearchText:
(Oh... My darling Yota. Even at a time like this,
you're such a sweetheart!)
jpnChrName: （くっ……こんな時でも天使そのものだね、   アタシのヨータは……！）
jpnSearchText:
（くっ……こんな時でも天使そのものだね、
アタシのヨータは……！）

engChrName: (I gather things are under control here.)
engSearchText: (I gather things are under control here.)
jpnChrName: （ふふ、こちらは   お任せして良さそうですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（ふふ、こちらは
お任せして良さそうですね。）

engChrName: (Agreed. Let's move on!)
engSearchText: (Agreed. Let's move on!)
jpnChrName: （ああ、一回りしたら先に進もう！）
jpnSearchText: （ああ、一回りしたら先に進もう！）

engChrName: Wooow! There's so many shops! And so many people!
engSearchText:
Wooow! There's so many shops! And so
many people!
jpnChrName: すっ、すっごーい！！ おみせがいっぱい！　それに人も！！
jpnSearchText:
すっ、すっごーい！！
おみせがいっぱい！　それに人も！！

engChrName: Mommy, look! It looks so fun!
engSearchText: Mommy, look! It looks so fun!
jpnChrName: ママもみて！　スッゴクたのしそうだよーっ！！
jpnSearchText: ママもみて！　スッゴクたのしそうだよーっ！！

engChrName: Aramis students are so capable. I'm glad my young lady will someday come to this school, too.
engSearchText:
Aramis students are so capable. I'm glad my young
lady will someday come to this school, too.
jpnChrName: ……アラミスの皆さま……頼もしいですね。 お嬢様も、いずれこの学校に……
jpnSearchText:
……アラミスの皆さま……頼もしいですね。
お嬢様も、いずれこの学校に……

engChrName: My lady and I are thankfully safe. We owe a lot to everyone here in Aramis.
engSearchText:
My lady and I are thankfully safe. We owe a
lot to everyone here in Aramis.
jpnChrName: ……それにしても、アラミスの皆さまのお陰で 私やお嬢様も助かる事は出来ましたが……
jpnSearchText:
……それにしても、アラミスの皆さまのお陰で
私やお嬢様も助かる事は出来ましたが……

engChrName: Still, Chief Rumsfeld worries me... I wish I could let him know we're safe.
engSearchText:
Still, Chief Rumsfeld worries me... I wish I could let
him know we're safe.
jpnChrName: ラムズフェルド主任もご心配されているでしょう、 なんとかして無事をお伝えできれば……
jpnSearchText:
ラムズフェルド主任もご心配されているでしょう、
なんとかして無事をお伝えできれば……

engChrName: I worried whether it'd be wise for me to be away, considering how busy things are.
engSearchText:
I worried whether it'd be wise for me to be away,
considering how busy things are.
jpnChrName: この忙しい状況で私が抜けて大丈夫か、 最初はやや不安でもありましたが……
jpnSearchText:
この忙しい状況で私が抜けて大丈夫か、
最初はやや不安でもありましたが……

engChrName: But Chief Rumsfeld gave me the okay, so I'm accompanying the young lady.
engSearchText:
But Chief Rumsfeld gave me the okay, so I'm
accompanying the young lady.
jpnChrName: ラムズフェルド主任に心配無用と言っていただき、 こうしてお嬢様の付き添いができました。
jpnSearchText:
ラムズフェルド主任に心配無用と言っていただき、
こうしてお嬢様の付き添いができました。

engChrName: I hope the young lady is able to enjoy today, and genuinely appreciate what the chief has done for her.
engSearchText:
I hope the young lady is able to enjoy today, and
genuinely appreciate what the chief has done for her.
jpnChrName: お嬢様には開放的な気分を味わって欲しいですしね、 主任の計らいには誠意をもって応えましょう。
jpnSearchText:
お嬢様には開放的な気分を味わって欲しいですしね、
主任の計らいには誠意をもって応えましょう。

engChrName: My lady has been enjoying herself quite a lot. I'm glad I was able to accompany her.
engSearchText:
My lady has been enjoying herself quite a lot.
I'm glad I was able to accompany her.
jpnChrName: ふふ、お嬢様がとても楽しんでいるようで、 付き添わせて頂いた甲斐がありました。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、お嬢様がとても楽しんでいるようで、
付き添わせて頂いた甲斐がありました。

engChrName: She's been talking more with her father, so she's been in a good mood.
engSearchText:
She's been talking more with her father, so she's been
in a good mood.
jpnChrName: お父様とも最近は連絡されていますし、 ご機嫌がよろしいようで……
jpnSearchText:
お父様とも最近は連絡されていますし、
ご機嫌がよろしいようで……

engChrName: Th-That's simply not true, Cremona! I... I 'm just taking advantage of the opportunity!
engSearchText:
Th-That's simply not true, Cremona! I... I 'm just
taking advantage of the opportunity!
jpnChrName: そ、そんなんじゃないわよクレモナ…… ただ、こういう機会は無駄にしたくないだけ！
jpnSearchText:
そ、そんなんじゃないわよクレモナ……
ただ、こういう機会は無駄にしたくないだけ！

engChrName: Father missed the festival, or have you forgotten? I certainly haven't!
engSearchText:
Father missed the festival, or have you forgotten?
I certainly haven't!
jpnChrName: お父様だって、結局記念祭に間に合ってないの、 別に許したわけじゃないんだからねっ！
jpnSearchText:
お父様だって、結局記念祭に間に合ってないの、
別に許したわけじゃないんだからねっ！

engChrName: That may be so, but I'm overjoyed nonetheless to see you so openly enjoy yourself.
engSearchText:
That may be so, but I'm overjoyed nonetheless to see
you so openly enjoy yourself.
jpnChrName: ふふ、それでもお嬢様が前向きに 楽しんでいるだけでも嬉しいものです。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、それでもお嬢様が前向きに
楽しんでいるだけでも嬉しいものです。

engChrName: Now, where shall we head after this? Perhaps to Riverside's concert hall?
engSearchText:
Now, where shall we head after this? Perhaps to
Riverside's concert hall?
jpnChrName: さて、この後はどこに行かれますか？ リバーサイドのライブハウスなどでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
さて、この後はどこに行かれますか？
リバーサイドのライブハウスなどでしょうか？

engChrName: Hmm... The Blue Score is hosting an idol concert today, so I'm not terribly interested.
engSearchText:
Hmm... The Blue Score is hosting an idol concert
today, so I'm not terribly interested.
jpnChrName: そうねぇ……《ブルースコア》は今日はアイドルの ライブらしくて、私好みではないわ。
jpnSearchText:
そうねぇ……《ブルースコア》は今日はアイドルの
ライブらしくて、私好みではないわ。

engChrName: Why don't we tour Aramis instead? I'm to enroll there in a few years, after all.
engSearchText:
Why don't we tour Aramis instead? I'm to enroll
there in a few years, after all.
jpnChrName: どうせなら、アラミスを見に行くのはどうかしら？ 私も何年かしたら入る予定なのだし……
jpnSearchText:
どうせなら、アラミスを見に行くのはどうかしら？
私も何年かしたら入る予定なのだし……

engChrName: Oh, goodness. To think my lady would make a choice like that based on her future...
engSearchText:
Oh, goodness. To think my lady would make a
choice like that based on her future...
jpnChrName: おや……お嬢様がご自身の将来を見据えて そのような選択をされるとは……
jpnSearchText:
おや……お嬢様がご自身の将来を見据えて
そのような選択をされるとは……

engChrName: You have matured so much this past year.
engSearchText: You have matured so much this past year.
jpnChrName: お嬢様、今年の出来事を通して 本当に大人になられているのですね……
jpnSearchText:
お嬢様、今年の出来事を通して
本当に大人になられているのですね……

engChrName: Cremona, stop it! This is embarrassing! I-I just felt we should take a look for good measure.
engSearchText:
Cremona, stop it! This is embarrassing! I-I just felt
we should take a look for good measure.
jpnChrName: は、恥ずかしい事言うものではないわよクレモナ！ ただ、少し下見がしたいというだけ！
jpnSearchText:
は、恥ずかしい事言うものではないわよクレモナ！
ただ、少し下見がしたいというだけ！

engChrName: For one, they'll be hosting their own festival in the spring, and I would very much like to go.
engSearchText:
For one, they'll be hosting their own festival in the
spring, and I would very much like to go.
jpnChrName: 春には学藝祭もあるのだし、 その時にも改めて来たいしね！
jpnSearchText:
春には学藝祭もあるのだし、
その時にも改めて来たいしね！

engChrName: Is the old man... Is Father safe? He was on his way to the capital. What if something happened to him?
engSearchText:
Is the old man... Is Father safe? He was on his way to
the capital. What if something happened to him?
jpnChrName: ……じいやは……首都に向かっている 途中のお父様は大丈夫かしら……！？
jpnSearchText:
……じいやは……首都に向かっている
途中のお父様は大丈夫かしら……！？

engChrName: The situation's a mess, b-but you're not a child anymore, Berzelia. Get a hold of yourself.
engSearchText:
The situation's a mess, b-but you're not a child
anymore, Berzelia. Get a hold of yourself.
jpnChrName: しょ、正直まだ状況が飲み込めてないけど…… 私も、子供じゃないなら何とか冷静に……
jpnSearchText:
しょ、正直まだ状況が飲み込めてないけど……
私も、子供じゃないなら何とか冷静に……

engChrName: A-Anyway... I need to let the old man know that I'm safe, if I can. I wouldn't want him to worry.
engSearchText:
A-Anyway... I need to let the old man know that I'm
safe, if I can. I wouldn't want him to worry.
jpnChrName: とにかくまずは……じいやに無事を知らせて、 少しでも安心してもらわないと。
jpnSearchText:
とにかくまずは……じいやに無事を知らせて、
少しでも安心してもらわないと。

engChrName: Now that Father and I have gotten to talk, I'm even more determined to not let any of this ruin everything!
engSearchText:
Now that Father and I have gotten to talk, I'm even
more determined to not let any of this
ruin everything!
jpnChrName: せっかく私もお父様と向き合えたのだもの、 こんな事で台無しにする訳には……！
jpnSearchText:
せっかく私もお父様と向き合えたのだもの、
こんな事で台無しにする訳には……！

engChrName: Father may not be here, but I'm grateful for him nonetheless. And for you, Cremona.
engSearchText:
Father may not be here, but I'm grateful for
him nonetheless. And for you, Cremona.
jpnChrName: ま、まあ……お父様と会えなくても、 じいややクレモナの計らいには感謝するわ！
jpnSearchText:
ま、まあ……お父様と会えなくても、
じいややクレモナの計らいには感謝するわ！

engChrName: I'll just have to enjoy myself on the double, for his sake, too!
engSearchText:
I'll just have to enjoy myself on the double, for his
sake, too!
jpnChrName: せいぜい、記念祭を拝めなかったお父様の分も 思い出を作っておくとするわ！
jpnSearchText:
せいぜい、記念祭を拝めなかったお父様の分も
思い出を作っておくとするわ！

engChrName: Shino! I didn't think you'd be here!
engSearchText: Shino! I didn't think you'd be here!
jpnChrName: シノさん……！ こちらにいらしたんですね。
jpnSearchText:
シノさん……！
こちらにいらしたんですね。

engChrName: Hello there. I evacuated into the school with everyone else.
engSearchText:
Hello there. I evacuated into the school with
everyone else.
jpnChrName: ええ、他の方々と一緒に 学校に避難していたのです。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、他の方々と一緒に
学校に避難していたのです。

engChrName: I'm guessing you managed to get things under control? Thank you so much.
engSearchText:
I'm guessing you managed to get things
under control? Thank you so much.
jpnChrName: 皆さんのお陰で状況も落ち着いた様子── 本当にありがとうございました。
jpnSearchText:
皆さんのお陰で状況も落ち着いた様子──
本当にありがとうございました。

engChrName: As for myself, I plan to help out in whatever way I can.
engSearchText: As for myself, I plan to help out in whatever way I can.
jpnChrName: 私も少しでも力になれるよう できる事をするつもりです。
jpnSearchText:
私も少しでも力になれるよう
できる事をするつもりです。

engChrName: So that's why you're handin' out drinks? Good work, thanks.
engSearchText:
So that's why you're handin' out drinks? Good
work, thanks.
jpnChrName: それでドリンクを出してくれてんのか…… サンキュー、心強いぜ。
jpnSearchText:
それでドリンクを出してくれてんのか……
サンキュー、心強いぜ。

engChrName: Keep an eye on the people here, yeah?
engSearchText: Keep an eye on the people here, yeah?
jpnChrName: ここいらの連中の事、どうか頼んだぜ！
jpnSearchText: ここいらの連中の事、どうか頼んだぜ！

engChrName: Of course. I'll do what I can.
engSearchText: Of course. I'll do what I can.
jpnChrName: ええ、お任せください。
jpnSearchText: ええ、お任せください。

engChrName: The rest of you take care of yourselves. I'll be awaiting your return.
engSearchText:
The rest of you take care of yourselves. I'll be
awaiting your return.
jpnChrName: 皆さんも、どうか無事のお帰りを お待ちしております。
jpnSearchText:
皆さんも、どうか無事のお帰りを
お待ちしております。

engChrName: For sure! We'll get this taken care of. Count on it!
engSearchText: For sure! We'll get this taken care of. Count on it!
jpnChrName: はい……！　必ず解決してきます。 どうか待っていてくださいね！
jpnSearchText:
はい……！　必ず解決してきます。
どうか待っていてくださいね！

engChrName: I'm serving drinks to the evacuees.
engSearchText: I'm serving drinks to the evacuees.
jpnChrName: 避難していた方々に ドリンクをお配りしている所です。
jpnSearchText:
避難していた方々に
ドリンクをお配りしている所です。

engChrName: It's honestly pure chaos. Some people aren't coping well with the anxiety.
engSearchText:
It's honestly pure chaos. Some people aren't coping
well with the anxiety.
jpnChrName: まだ事態は混沌としているようですね。 不安で押し潰されそうな方もいらっしゃる様子。
jpnSearchText:
まだ事態は混沌としているようですね。
不安で押し潰されそうな方もいらっしゃる様子。

engChrName: I'm doing what I can to help everyone here.
engSearchText: I'm doing what I can to help everyone here.
jpnChrName: せめてお支えできるよう、 私も力を尽くすといたしましょう。
jpnSearchText:
せめてお支えできるよう、
私も力を尽くすといたしましょう。

engChrName: The rest of you take care of yourselves. I'll be awaiting your return.
engSearchText:
The rest of you take care of yourselves. I'll be
awaiting your return.
jpnChrName: 皆さんも、どうか無事のお帰りを お待ちしておりますね。
jpnSearchText:
皆さんも、どうか無事のお帰りを
お待ちしておりますね。

engChrName: Welcome. It's a lovely day, isn't it? Perfect for the Revolution Festival.
engSearchText:
Welcome. It's a lovely day, isn't it? Perfect for the
Revolution Festival.
jpnChrName: いらっしゃいませ。 よく晴れて気持ちのいい記念祭となりましたね。
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃいませ。
よく晴れて気持ちのいい記念祭となりましたね。

engChrName: I'm grateful that we're still standing here today—in spite of everything that's happened.
engSearchText:
I'm grateful that we're still standing here today—in
spite of everything that's happened.
jpnChrName: 色々な事がありましたが この日を迎えられてよかったです。
jpnSearchText:
色々な事がありましたが
この日を迎えられてよかったです。

engChrName: No doubt you and your team have been working hard to maintain this peace.
engSearchText:
No doubt you and your team have been working hard
to maintain this peace.
jpnChrName: これもヴァンさんたちのお陰ですね。 この平和に感謝を──
jpnSearchText:
これもヴァンさんたちのお陰ですね。
この平和に感謝を──

engChrName: Allow me to thank you for your efforts. Please, do enjoy the festival.
engSearchText:
Allow me to thank you for your efforts. Please, do
enjoy the festival.
jpnChrName: ふふ、今日はせめて お祭りを楽しまれてくださいね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、今日はせめて
お祭りを楽しまれてくださいね。

engChrName: Heya, Shino.
engSearchText: Heya, Shino.
jpnChrName: よう、シノじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: よう、シノじゃねえか。

engChrName: Funny to see you in front of Aramis.
engSearchText: Funny to see you in front of Aramis.
jpnChrName: まさかアラミスの前にいらしてたなんて。
jpnSearchText: まさかアラミスの前にいらしてたなんて。

engChrName: Oh, right. I was looking for a good spot and I suppose I just ended up here.
engSearchText:
Oh, right. I was looking for a good spot and I
suppose I just ended up here.
jpnChrName: ええ、どこか良い場所を探しているうち ここにたどり着いてしまいまして。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、どこか良い場所を探しているうち
ここにたどり着いてしまいまして。

engChrName: The location is nice and quiet, and the view is just lovely.
engSearchText:
The location is nice and quiet, and the view is
just lovely.
jpnChrName: 街並みも美しいですし、 落ち着いていてよい場所ですね。
jpnSearchText:
街並みも美しいですし、
落ち着いていてよい場所ですね。

engChrName: And not only that, but my food is actually quite popular with the students.
engSearchText:
And not only that, but my food is actually quite
popular with the students.
jpnChrName: ちなみに学生さんには軽食類が人気ですよ。
jpnSearchText: ちなみに学生さんには軽食類が人気ですよ。

engChrName: Well, of course you'd want a snack after classes. You get hungry after so long!
engSearchText:
Well, of course you'd want a snack after classes.
You get hungry after so long!
jpnChrName: 授業の後にはお腹が空きますから 当然かと……！
jpnSearchText:
授業の後にはお腹が空きますから
当然かと……！

engChrName: No, I think you just don't eat enough, small fry.
engSearchText: No, I think you just don't eat enough, small fry.
jpnChrName: だから欠食児童かっつーの。
jpnSearchText: だから欠食児童かっつーの。

engChrName: I imagine the sports club members are especially appreciative.
engSearchText:
I imagine the sports club members are
especially appreciative.
jpnChrName: あはは……確かに運動部の子には 人気が出るかもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……確かに運動部の子には
人気が出るかもしれませんね。

engChrName: The location is nice and quiet, and the view is just lovely.
engSearchText:
The location is nice and quiet, and the view is
just lovely.
jpnChrName: 街並みも美しいですし、 落ち着いていてよい場所ですね。
jpnSearchText:
街並みも美しいですし、
落ち着いていてよい場所ですね。

engChrName: I've been looking for a good spot to set up during the Revolution Festival, and this might just be it.
engSearchText:
I've been looking for a good spot to set up during the
Revolution Festival, and this might just be it.
jpnChrName: 革命記念祭の出店場所も探していたのですが この辺りもいいかもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
革命記念祭の出店場所も探していたのですが
この辺りもいいかもしれませんね。

engChrName: The huge milkies—I-I mean! That professor took off in my car! And she's a way better driver than I am!
engSearchText:
The huge milkies—I-I mean! That professor took off
in my car! And she's a way better driver than I am!
jpnChrName: 俺の愛車を俺より乗りこなすなんて…… あの巨乳教授は一体……
jpnSearchText:
俺の愛車を俺より乗りこなすなんて……
あの巨乳教授は一体……

engChrName: I couldn't turn her down since she said they needed it for something important, but this is just driving me nuts!
engSearchText:
I couldn't turn her down since she said they needed it
for something important, but this is just driving
me nuts!
jpnChrName: 大事な作戦に使うとかで断れなかったんだが くうっ、気になりすぎるぜ……！
jpnSearchText:
大事な作戦に使うとかで断れなかったんだが
くうっ、気になりすぎるぜ……！

engChrName: ...Maybe I could go take a peek?
engSearchText: ...Maybe I could go take a peek?
jpnChrName: こっそり様子を見に行くってのもアリか……！？
jpnSearchText: こっそり様子を見に行くってのもアリか……！？

engChrName: Some Aramis students asked me to bring 'em here, so here I am!
engSearchText:
Some Aramis students asked me to bring 'em here, so
here I am!
jpnChrName: アラミスの学生に頼まれて ここまで送ってきた所なんスよ！
jpnSearchText:
アラミスの学生に頼まれて
ここまで送ってきた所なんスよ！

engChrName: Ain't lettin' Junifer and Graham steal all the glory!
engSearchText: Ain't lettin' Junifer and Graham steal all the glory!
jpnChrName: ユニファさんやグレアムさんだけに いいカッコさせないッスよ～っ！！
jpnSearchText:
ユニファさんやグレアムさんだけに
いいカッコさせないッスよ～っ！！

engChrName: Your driving skills are pretty epic, Hyades! You did a nice job dodging those monsters.
engSearchText:
Your driving skills are pretty epic, Hyades! You did a
nice job dodging those monsters.
jpnChrName: ああ、ヒアデスもドラテク上達したし うまく化け物をかわして来れたよな……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ヒアデスもドラテク上達したし
うまく化け物をかわして来れたよな……

engChrName: B-But my car! That professor with the, like, massive knockers took my car!
engSearchText:
B-But my car! That professor with the, like, massive
knockers took my car!
jpnChrName: けど俺の愛車は…… グスッ、あの巨乳教授に取られちまった！！
jpnSearchText:
けど俺の愛車は……
グスッ、あの巨乳教授に取られちまった！！

engChrName: And she's a way better driver than me! How is that fair?! Well, she did say she needed it to transport some equipment...
engSearchText:
And she's a way better driver than me! How is
that fair?! Well, she did say she needed it to transport
some equipment...
jpnChrName: 機材の運搬に使いたいって頼まれたんだが 俺より運転上手ェし、どうなってんだよ～っ！？
jpnSearchText:
機材の運搬に使いたいって頼まれたんだが
俺より運転上手ェし、どうなってんだよ～っ！？

engChrName: Are you referring to Essy? Come to think of it, she can be pretty wild behind the wheel...
engSearchText:
Are you referring to Essy? Come to think of it, she
can be pretty wild behind the wheel...
jpnChrName: えっと、エレ姉……？ そういえばハンドル握ると結構飛ばすけど……
jpnSearchText:
えっと、エレ姉……？
そういえばハンドル握ると結構飛ばすけど……

engChrName: Huh. Seriously? Wouldn't have guessed.
engSearchText: Huh. Seriously? Wouldn't have guessed.
jpnChrName: マジかよ……見かけによらねえっつうか。
jpnSearchText: マジかよ……見かけによらねえっつうか。

engChrName: Honestly, Downey. Are you still mad about it? That's kinda sad...
engSearchText:
Honestly, Downey. Are you still mad about it?
That's kinda sad...
jpnChrName: というかダウニーさん……そんなトコで 悔やんでたんスね……正直みみっちいッス……
jpnSearchText:
というかダウニーさん……そんなトコで
悔やんでたんスね……正直みみっちいッス……

engChrName: We gotta do whatever we can.
engSearchText: We gotta do whatever we can.
jpnChrName: ともかくオレたちも、 できる事をするつもりッス。
jpnSearchText:
ともかくオレたちも、
できる事をするつもりッス。

engChrName: Whether it's transporting things or people, or driving around to look for people who haven't evacuated yet.
engSearchText:
Whether it's transporting things or people, or driving
around to look for people who haven't evacuated yet.
jpnChrName: 頼まれた人や物を運んだり…… 逃げ遅れた人がいないか回るのもイイっスね。
jpnSearchText:
頼まれた人や物を運んだり……
逃げ遅れた人がいないか回るのもイイっスね。

engChrName: Ain't lettin' Junifer and Graham steal all the glory!
engSearchText: Ain't lettin' Junifer and Graham steal all the glory!
jpnChrName: ユニファさんやグレアムさんだけに いいカッコさせないッスよ～っ！！
jpnSearchText:
ユニファさんやグレアムさんだけに
いいカッコさせないッスよ～っ！！

engChrName: I managed to get in touch with Curtis. Oh, thank Aidios. That's a weight off my shoulders.
engSearchText:
I managed to get in touch with Curtis. Oh,
thank Aidios. That's a weight off my shoulders.
jpnChrName: カーチスと連絡がついてな。 良かったわい……まったくもってな……
jpnSearchText:
カーチスと連絡がついてな。
良かったわい……まったくもってな……

engChrName: But I know we still don't really know how to fix this.
engSearchText: But I know we still don't really know how to fix this.
jpnChrName: じゃがそれとは別に、この事態を 止めるための作戦も始まると聞く──
jpnSearchText:
じゃがそれとは別に、この事態を
止めるための作戦も始まると聞く──

engChrName: I'm not sure if there's a lot that I can do, but still...
engSearchText: I'm not sure if there's a lot that I can do, but still...
jpnChrName: ううむ、ワシらが直接 手伝える事はなさそうじゃが……
jpnSearchText:
ううむ、ワシらが直接
手伝える事はなさそうじゃが……

engChrName: This could be the key to our lives going back to normal! Please, do everything you can!
engSearchText:
This could be the key to our lives going back
to normal! Please, do everything you can!
jpnChrName: 元の生活に戻れるかどうかの瀬戸際じゃ！ どうか、よろしく頼んだぞ……！
jpnSearchText:
元の生活に戻れるかどうかの瀬戸際じゃ！
どうか、よろしく頼んだぞ……！

engChrName: It could be dangerous to move around now, so we'll have to settle down and do what we can from here.
engSearchText:
It could be dangerous to move around now, so we'll
have to settle down and do what we can from here.
jpnChrName: 今下手に動くのも危険そうじゃ。 ワシらはここでできる事をしようと思う。
jpnSearchText:
今下手に動くのも危険そうじゃ。
ワシらはここでできる事をしようと思う。

engChrName: We're all praying for your plan's success. But please, stay safe!
engSearchText:
We're all praying for your plan's success. But please,
stay safe!
jpnChrName: 作戦とやらの成功を祈っておる── どうか気を付けてな！
jpnSearchText:
作戦とやらの成功を祈っておる──
どうか気を付けてな！

engChrName: I'm so relieved, knowing how things are going over for Old Town, and for Curtis, too.
engSearchText:
I'm so relieved, knowing how things are going over
for Old Town, and for Curtis, too.
jpnChrName: 旧市街の様子が聞けて安心した── そうか、カーチスがな……
jpnSearchText:
旧市街の様子が聞けて安心した──
そうか、カーチスがな……

engChrName: I should take the time to talk to him some more, if I go back there.
engSearchText:
I should take the time to talk to him some more, if I
go back there.
jpnChrName: ……無事に帰れたら、あいつとも もっとゆっくり話をするとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
……無事に帰れたら、あいつとも
もっとゆっくり話をするとしよう。

engChrName: Yes! Just thinking about that makes me wanna keep going!
engSearchText:
Yes! Just thinking about that makes me wanna
keep going!
jpnChrName: うむうむ……そう考えるだけで 勇気が湧いてくるようじゃわい！
jpnSearchText:
うむうむ……そう考えるだけで
勇気が湧いてくるようじゃわい！

engChrName: I'm relieved to hear about Old Town. I'm still worried about Curtis, though...
engSearchText:
I'm relieved to hear about Old Town. I'm still worried
about Curtis, though...
jpnChrName: 旧市街の様子が聞けて安心した── カーチスの事は心配じゃが……
jpnSearchText:
旧市街の様子が聞けて安心した──
カーチスの事は心配じゃが……

engChrName: I should take the time to talk to him some more, if I go back there.
engSearchText:
I should take the time to talk to him some more, if I
go back there.
jpnChrName: ……無事に帰れたら、あいつとも もっとゆっくり話をするとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
……無事に帰れたら、あいつとも
もっとゆっくり話をするとしよう。

engChrName: I... I just have to trust that I'll get that chance.
engSearchText: I... I just have to trust that I'll get that chance.
jpnChrName: うむうむ……きっと…… 今はそう信じるとしよう……！
jpnSearchText:
うむうむ……きっと……
今はそう信じるとしよう……！

engChrName: I'm so relieved to have heard Curtis' voice!
engSearchText: I'm so relieved to have heard Curtis' voice!
jpnChrName: カーチスの声が聴けて安心したわ……！ 学生の皆さんには感謝しませんと！
jpnSearchText:
カーチスの声が聴けて安心したわ……！
学生の皆さんには感謝しませんと！

engChrName: Also, I must compliment Aramis' students. They're so capable, even in a situation like this.
engSearchText:
Also, I must compliment Aramis' students. They're so
capable, even in a situation like this.
jpnChrName: それに、こんな時だけれど アラミスの生徒たちの頼もしい事……！
jpnSearchText:
それに、こんな時だけれど
アラミスの生徒たちの頼もしい事……！

engChrName: Everyone's bustling about, doing what they can. This school is truly amazing.
engSearchText:
Everyone's bustling about, doing what they can.
This school is truly amazing.
jpnChrName: みんなできる事をしようと行動しているし、 改めて素晴らしい学校だと思うわ。
jpnSearchText:
みんなできる事をしようと行動しているし、
改めて素晴らしい学校だと思うわ。

engChrName: Once things are peaceful again, I'm going to tell Curtis all about this!
engSearchText:
Once things are peaceful again, I'm going to tell
Curtis all about this!
jpnChrName: 無事に平和が戻ったら── カーチスにも話してあげたいものね！
jpnSearchText:
無事に平和が戻ったら──
カーチスにも話してあげたいものね！

engChrName: I was so sure that my boy hated us now...
engSearchText: I was so sure that my boy hated us now...
jpnChrName: あの子がわたくしたちの事を── てっきり嫌われていると思っていたけれど……
jpnSearchText:
あの子がわたくしたちの事を──
てっきり嫌われていると思っていたけれど……

engChrName: I want to go home! Go home and hug him tight and never let go!
engSearchText:
I want to go home! Go home and hug him tight and
never let go!
jpnChrName: ああ、早く帰ってあげたいものだわ！ あの子を抱きしめてあげたい！
jpnSearchText:
ああ、早く帰ってあげたいものだわ！
あの子を抱きしめてあげたい！

engChrName: It's enough for us as long as Curtis is safe.
engSearchText: It's enough for us as long as Curtis is safe.
jpnChrName: カーチスが無事であれば、 わたくしたちはもう満足ですのに……
jpnSearchText:
カーチスが無事であれば、
わたくしたちはもう満足ですのに……

engChrName: Ah, I need to get back immediately! I hope he's doing okay!
engSearchText:
Ah, I need to get back immediately! I hope he's
doing okay!
jpnChrName: ああ、早く帰ってあげたいものだわ！ 今頃あの子、どうしているかしら……！
jpnSearchText:
ああ、早く帰ってあげたいものだわ！
今頃あの子、どうしているかしら……！

engChrName: Spriggan, please! You're all we have now!
engSearchText: Spriggan, please! You're all we have now!
jpnChrName: 解決屋さん、どうか貴方がたの活躍に 期待させてくださいな──！
jpnSearchText:
解決屋さん、どうか貴方がたの活躍に
期待させてくださいな──！

engChrName: I was attending mass with my wife, when all of this happened... What in the world is going on?
engSearchText:
I was attending mass with my wife, when all of
this happened... What in the world is going on?
jpnChrName: 妻とミサに参加していたんだが…… ……一体何が起きておるんだ……
jpnSearchText:
妻とミサに参加していたんだが……
……一体何が起きておるんだ……

engChrName: We left Curtis back at home in Old Town. I do hope he's safe...
engSearchText:
We left Curtis back at home in Old Town. I do hope
he's safe...
jpnChrName: くっ、旧市街の家に残してきた カーチスが無事だといいが……
jpnSearchText:
くっ、旧市街の家に残してきた
カーチスが無事だといいが……

engChrName: Oh, Goddess! Please protect our boy!
engSearchText: Oh, Goddess! Please protect our boy!
jpnChrName: ああ女神様、どうか あの子をお守りください──！
jpnSearchText:
ああ女神様、どうか
あの子をお守りください──！

engChrName: (They live on Old Town's outskirts, right?)
engSearchText: (They live on Old Town's outskirts, right?)
jpnChrName: （確か旧市街の外れにお住いの……）
jpnSearchText: （確か旧市街の外れにお住いの……）

engChrName: Umm, don't worry! Things have calmed down in Old Town!
engSearchText:
Umm, don't worry! Things have calmed down in
Old Town!
jpnChrName: あの、旧市街は一旦落ち着きましたから どうか安心してください！
jpnSearchText:
あの、旧市街は一旦落ち着きましたから
どうか安心してください！

engChrName: R-Really?!
engSearchText: R-Really?!
jpnChrName: そ、そうなんですの……！？
jpnSearchText: そ、そうなんですの……！？

engChrName: Have you gone to Old Town yourselves?!
engSearchText: Have you gone to Old Town yourselves?!
jpnChrName: 君たちまさか、 旧市街の様子を見てきたのかね！？
jpnSearchText:
君たちまさか、
旧市街の様子を見てきたのかね！？

engChrName: Yeah. Place is a whole lot quieter than here, actually.
engSearchText: Yeah. Place is a whole lot quieter than here, actually.
jpnChrName: ああ、こっちの状況よりはマシだったぜ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、こっちの状況よりはマシだったぜ。

engChrName: I talked with your son. Ain't got a scratch on him.
engSearchText: I talked with your son. Ain't got a scratch on him.
jpnChrName: あんたたちの息子とも話してきたが 怪我一つしちゃいなかった。
jpnSearchText:
あんたたちの息子とも話してきたが
怪我一つしちゃいなかった。

engChrName: He also asked me to tell you somethin'.
engSearchText: He also asked me to tell you somethin'.
jpnChrName: それに、伝言を言付かっていてな。
jpnSearchText: それに、伝言を言付かっていてな。

engChrName: Van relayed Curtis' message to Roman and Zora.
engSearchText: Van relayed Curtis' message to Roman and Zora.
jpnChrName: ローマンとゾーラに カーチスからの伝言を伝えた。
jpnSearchText:
ローマンとゾーラに
カーチスからの伝言を伝えた。

engChrName: Oh, dear! Our son said something like that?
engSearchText: Oh, dear! Our son said something like that?
jpnChrName: まあ！　あの子がそんな事を……
jpnSearchText: まあ！　あの子がそんな事を……

engChrName: He has so much trouble saying what he really feels. Such a silly boy...
engSearchText:
He has so much trouble saying what he really feels.
Such a silly boy...
jpnChrName: も、もう……！ あの子も素直じゃないんですから！
jpnSearchText:
も、もう……！
あの子も素直じゃないんですから！

engChrName: Haha... Still, I'm so relieved to hear he's safe, and he was even worried about us!
engSearchText:
Haha... Still, I'm so relieved to hear he's safe, and he
was even worried about us!
jpnChrName: ハハ……じゃが無事でいてくれて、 俺たちを案じてくれてほっとしたわい……！
jpnSearchText:
ハハ……じゃが無事でいてくれて、
俺たちを案じてくれてほっとしたわい……！

engChrName: Well, hearing that takes a load off my shoulders!
engSearchText: Well, hearing that takes a load off my shoulders!
jpnChrName: そうだったか…… いや、それが聞けただけで安心した！
jpnSearchText:
そうだったか……
いや、それが聞けただけで安心した！

engChrName: Thank you so much for letting us know! I know we're still in dire straits.
engSearchText:
Thank you so much for letting us know! I know we're
still in dire straits.
jpnChrName: 知らせてくれて感謝する！ 予断を許さない状況ではあるようだが──
jpnSearchText:
知らせてくれて感謝する！
予断を許さない状況ではあるようだが──

engChrName: I feel much calmer now.
engSearchText: I feel much calmer now.
jpnChrName: え、ええ、少しは 心が落ち着いた気がするわ。
jpnSearchText:
え、ええ、少しは
心が落ち着いた気がするわ。

engChrName: Umm, here. I'd like you to have these.
engSearchText: Umm, here. I'd like you to have these.
jpnChrName: あの、よければこれを……
jpnSearchText: あの、よければこれを……

engChrName: Obtained 4  .
engSearchText:
Obtained 4
.
jpnChrName: {CC_ITEM=ITEM_USE_LIFE_01}を４個手に入れた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_ITEM=ITEM_USE_LIFE_01}を４個手に入れた。

engChrName: It really isn't much, but I hope you'll accept it!
engSearchText: It really isn't much, but I hope you'll accept it!
jpnChrName: ささやかな品だけど どうかお持ちになって！
jpnSearchText:
ささやかな品だけど
どうかお持ちになって！

engChrName: Thank you very much. We'll make good use of these!
engSearchText: Thank you very much. We'll make good use of these!
jpnChrName: ありがとうございます── 大切に使わせていただきますね！
jpnSearchText:
ありがとうございます──
大切に使わせていただきますね！

engChrName: Everyone outside's gonna be okay, so please stay put.
engSearchText: Everyone outside's gonna be okay, so please stay put.
jpnChrName: 外の連中は何とかする── ここを動かないようにな！
jpnSearchText:
外の連中は何とかする──
ここを動かないようにな！

engChrName: You've not changed in the slightest. Even when we were kids you were like this. Do you have any idea how much I—
engSearchText:
You've not changed in the slightest. Even when we
were kids you were like this. Do you have any idea
how much I—
jpnChrName: まったく貴方は昔から── そもそも子供の時だって、私がどれだけ……！
jpnSearchText:
まったく貴方は昔から──
そもそも子供の時だって、私がどれだけ……！

engChrName: Look... I'm sorry, Elaine, but I don't think we've got time for this. We've gotta get a move on.
engSearchText:
Look... I'm sorry, Elaine, but I don't think we've got
time for this. We've gotta get a move on.
jpnChrName: わ、悪い……長くなりそうだから 行かせてもらうぜ……
jpnSearchText:
わ、悪い……長くなりそうだから
行かせてもらうぜ……

engChrName: Oh, no you don't! Get back here, Van! I'm not done talking to you!
engSearchText:
Oh, no you don't! Get back here, Van! I'm not done
talking to you!
jpnChrName: ──待 ち な さ い ！ 話はまだ終わってないわよ！？
jpnSearchText:
──待 ち な さ い ！
話はまだ終わってないわよ！？

engChrName: (You haven't changed either. You need to learn to take it easy a little...)
engSearchText:
(You haven't changed either. You need to learn to
take it easy a little...)
jpnChrName: （これでシラフっつーのが困ったもんだぜ……）
jpnSearchText: （これでシラフっつーのが困ったもんだぜ……）

engChrName: I met up with Rixia on the way. I guess we're going to the same place.
engSearchText:
I met up with Rixia on the way. I guess we're going to
the same place.
jpnChrName: リーシャとは途中で一緒になったんだけど どうやら行き先も大体同じみたいで。
jpnSearchText:
リーシャとは途中で一緒になったんだけど
どうやら行き先も大体同じみたいで。

engChrName: I'll leave Elaine to you. I'm sure you and the others will make it there.
engSearchText:
I'll leave Elaine to you. I'm sure you and the others
will make it there.
jpnChrName: ……エレインの事、よろしくね。 きっとヴァン達なら辿り着けると思うから。
jpnSearchText:
……エレインの事、よろしくね。
きっとヴァン達なら辿り着けると思うから。

engChrName: The East's desertification is always a pretty heavy discussion topic, but everyone looks like they're enjoying themselves.
engSearchText:
The East's desertification is always a pretty heavy
discussion topic, but everyone looks like they're
enjoying themselves.
jpnChrName: 大陸東部の不毛化の問題── 議題は重いけど、皆どこか楽しそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
大陸東部の不毛化の問題──
議題は重いけど、皆どこか楽しそうだな。

engChrName: They're all responsible for being the foundation of this day and age, so it would stand to reason that they'd get along quite well.
engSearchText:
They're all responsible for being the foundation of
this day and age, so it would stand to reason that
they'd get along quite well.
jpnChrName: やっぱり時代を築き上げて来た 同世代同士で仲が良いみたいだ。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり時代を築き上げて来た
同世代同士で仲が良いみたいだ。

engChrName: Ah, I'm also participating in the discussion, but if you need anything, please don't hesitate to ask.
engSearchText:
Ah, I'm also participating in the discussion, but if you
need anything, please don't hesitate to ask.
jpnChrName: あ、僕も話に混ぜてもらってるけど、 必要な時は声をかけてよね。
jpnSearchText:
あ、僕も話に混ぜてもらってるけど、
必要な時は声をかけてよね。

engChrName: Just in case, Bodyguard Mode is on today. We're on the lookout for anyone suspicious.
engSearchText:
Just in case, Bodyguard Mode is on today. We're on
the lookout for anyone suspicious.
jpnChrName: 念ノ為、今日モ警護モードヲ発動中。 不審者ガイナイカサーチスル。
jpnSearchText:
念ノ為、今日モ警護モードヲ発動中。
不審者ガイナイカサーチスル。

engChrName: Leave guarding the professor to FIO and XEROS!
engSearchText: Leave guarding the professor to FIO and XEROS!
jpnChrName: 博士ノ護衛ハＦＩＯト ＸＥＲＯＳニオ任セアレ！
jpnSearchText:
博士ノ護衛ハＦＩＯト
ＸＥＲＯＳニオ任セアレ！

engChrName: RUFF! RUFF!
engSearchText: RUFF! RUFF!
jpnChrName: ＢＯＷ！　ＢＯＷ！
jpnSearchText: ＢＯＷ！　ＢＯＷ！

engChrName: Well, they look cheery.
engSearchText: Well, they look cheery.
jpnChrName: おっ、心なしか嬉しそうにしてんな。
jpnSearchText: おっ、心なしか嬉しそうにしてんな。

engChrName: Must be happy about gettin' to see the professor for the first time in a while.
engSearchText:
Must be happy about gettin' to see the professor for
the first time in a while.
jpnChrName: コイツも久しぶりに 博士に会えて嬉しいのかね。
jpnSearchText:
コイツも久しぶりに
博士に会えて嬉しいのかね。

engChrName: Oh, hello, Albert! So, about Curtis...
engSearchText: Oh, hello, Albert! So, about Curtis...
jpnChrName: あっ、アルベール君！ カーチスさんの事なんですけど……
jpnSearchText:
あっ、アルベール君！
カーチスさんの事なんですけど……

engChrName: Agnès explained the situation regarding Curtis.
engSearchText: Agnès explained the situation regarding Curtis.
jpnChrName: アニエスはかいつまんで カーチスにまつわる状況を説明した。
jpnSearchText:
アニエスはかいつまんで
カーチスにまつわる状況を説明した。

engChrName: Yeah? That's good to know.
engSearchText: Yeah? That's good to know.
jpnChrName: そうか……それなら良かった。
jpnSearchText: そうか……それなら良かった。

engChrName: I guess now we just have to keep an eye on him. I'll bear that in mind.
engSearchText:
I guess now we just have to keep an eye on him.
I'll bear that in mind.
jpnChrName: 後は見守っていくしかないんだろうな…… 僕の方からも気にかけておく事にするよ。
jpnSearchText:
後は見守っていくしかないんだろうな……
僕の方からも気にかけておく事にするよ。

engChrName: Good job. I guess even you guys can do a good job every now and then.
engSearchText:
Good job. I guess even you guys can do a good job
every now and then.
jpnChrName: ……解決屋も、 たまにはいい仕事をするものなんだな。
jpnSearchText:
……解決屋も、
たまにはいい仕事をするものなんだな。

engChrName: If he did buy some kind of tablet, it's quite likely he got it from that man.
engSearchText:
If he did buy some kind of tablet, it's quite likely he
got it from that man.
jpnChrName: 彼がタブレットを買ったんだとしたら 例の男から買った可能性が高いだろう。
jpnSearchText:
彼がタブレットを買ったんだとしたら
例の男から買った可能性が高いだろう。

engChrName: He's been stressed out by both family and the upcoming exams. There's a lot weighing on him.
engSearchText:
He's been stressed out by both family and the
upcoming exams. There's a lot weighing on him.
jpnChrName: 受験のストレスか、家庭でのストレスか…… 元々、色々と抱えている様子ではあったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
受験のストレスか、家庭でのストレスか……
元々、色々と抱えている様子ではあったんだ。

engChrName: I hope you can help him.
engSearchText: I hope you can help him.
jpnChrName: どうか彼を助けてあげてくれ。
jpnSearchText: どうか彼を助けてあげてくれ。

engChrName: Yes, of course!
engSearchText: Yes, of course!
jpnChrName: はい、勿論です……！
jpnSearchText: はい、勿論です……！

engChrName: Ahem. I'm afraid the Student Council will be busy discussing other matters at length, so we won't have time for much else.
engSearchText:
Ahem. I'm afraid the Student Council will be busy
discussing other matters at length, so we won't have
time for much else.
jpnChrName: コホン、生徒会でも色々話し合う予定なんだ。 他の用事を入れる余裕はないな。
jpnSearchText:
コホン、生徒会でも色々話し合う予定なんだ。
他の用事を入れる余裕はないな。

engChrName: Oh, yeah? Is that right?
engSearchText: Oh, yeah? Is that right?
jpnChrName: へーえ、なるほどねぇ。
jpnSearchText: へーえ、なるほどねぇ。

engChrName: Can't bear to break a promise to a pretty lady, eh, casanova?
engSearchText:
Can't bear to break a promise to a pretty lady,
eh, casanova?
jpnChrName: ま、女との約束は最優先だよな～？
jpnSearchText: ま、女との約束は最優先だよな～？

engChrName: Stop teasing me! I-I didn't mean it like that!
engSearchText: Stop teasing me! I-I didn't mean it like that!
jpnChrName: ってからかわないでくれっ！！ 僕はそういう意味じゃなく──！
jpnSearchText:
ってからかわないでくれっ！！
僕はそういう意味じゃなく──！

engChrName: (What are they talking about?)
engSearchText: (What are they talking about?)
jpnChrName: （？　何の話だろう……）
jpnSearchText: （？　何の話だろう……）

engChrName: A-Anyway, we'll be busy during the festival.
engSearchText: A-Anyway, we'll be busy during the festival.
jpnChrName: と、ともかく記念祭には予定が入っている。
jpnSearchText: と、ともかく記念祭には予定が入っている。

engChrName: Besides, it's an important day for the Republic. I don't think it's appropriate to spend it so irreverently.
engSearchText:
Besides, it's an important day for the Republic.
I don't think it's appropriate to spend it
so irreverently.
jpnChrName: それに、共和国にとって大切な日だ。 浮つくのもどうかと僕は思うが。
jpnSearchText:
それに、共和国にとって大切な日だ。
浮つくのもどうかと僕は思うが。

engChrName: (I ain't buying that for a sec, but I guess I'll lay off.)
engSearchText: (I ain't buying that for a sec, but I guess I'll lay off.)
jpnChrName: （さっぱり説得力を感じねえが   ま、放っておいてやるか。）
jpnSearchText:
（さっぱり説得力を感じねえが
ま、放っておいてやるか。）

engChrName: Basically, you tried your luck with a bunch of girls and had zero luck. So now you're in desperate need for someone to spend the festival with?
engSearchText:
Basically, you tried your luck with a bunch of girls
and had zero luck. So now you're in desperate need
for someone to spend the festival with?
jpnChrName: ……で、女子に声をかけ回ったが全て空振り── それで記念祭を一緒に過ごす相手が欲しいと？
jpnSearchText:
……で、女子に声をかけ回ったが全て空振り──
それで記念祭を一緒に過ごす相手が欲しいと？

engChrName: This is ridiculous. Unsurprising, but ridiculous all the same. What are you even planning?
engSearchText:
This is ridiculous. Unsurprising, but ridiculous all
the same. What are you even planning?
jpnChrName: はぁ、まったく君は相変わらず 何をしているんだか……
jpnSearchText:
はぁ、まったく君は相変わらず
何をしているんだか……

engChrName: C'mon, man! A sausage party is better than being all alone!
engSearchText:
C'mon, man! A sausage party is better than being
all alone!
jpnChrName: 頼むよ～野郎だけでも、 ボッチで過ごすよかマシだからさぁ～。
jpnSearchText:
頼むよ～野郎だけでも、
ボッチで過ごすよかマシだからさぁ～。

engChrName: Also, y'know, extra manpower means extra sex appeal, yeah? The ladies will be flocking to us during the festival!
engSearchText:
Also, y'know, extra manpower means extra sex
appeal, yeah? The ladies will be flocking to us during
the festival!
jpnChrName: それにホラ、一緒なら当日に ナンパっつー手が使えなくもねーじゃん！？
jpnSearchText:
それにホラ、一緒なら当日に
ナンパっつー手が使えなくもねーじゃん！？

engChrName: Unbelievable... Well, unfortunately for you, I made arrangements with the Student Council. I suspect Julian will also be busy?
engSearchText:
Unbelievable... Well, unfortunately for you, I made
arrangements with the Student Council. I suspect
Julian will also be busy?
jpnChrName: やれやれ……生憎僕は生徒会の面々と約束がある。 ユリアンだって忙しいんじゃないのか？
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ……生憎僕は生徒会の面々と約束がある。
ユリアンだって忙しいんじゃないのか？

engChrName: No, actually. I don't have any plans.
engSearchText: No, actually. I don't have any plans.
jpnChrName: いや、僕は一応予定は入っていないな。
jpnSearchText: いや、僕は一応予定は入っていないな。

engChrName: I was hoping to have someone show me around the festival, in fact. Maybe you would be willing to?
engSearchText:
I was hoping to have someone show me around the
festival, in fact. Maybe you would be willing to?
jpnChrName: 丁度記念祭の案内も欲しかった事だし よかったらどうだい？
jpnSearchText:
丁度記念祭の案内も欲しかった事だし
よかったらどうだい？

engChrName: For real?! You, who could have your pick from all the hot babes at school, is choosing to go with me?!
engSearchText:
For real?! You, who could have your pick from all the
hot babes at school, is choosing to go with me?!
jpnChrName: マジか！？　お前なら女の子に 引っ張りだこかと思いきや、友情を取るとは……
jpnSearchText:
マジか！？　お前なら女の子に
引っ張りだこかと思いきや、友情を取るとは……

engChrName: Thanks, man! Julian, I freakin' love you!
engSearchText: Thanks, man! Julian, I freakin' love you!
jpnChrName: ありがとよ、ユリアン！！ 愛してるぜっ！！
jpnSearchText:
ありがとよ、ユリアン！！
愛してるぜっ！！

engChrName: You are utterly incomprehensible.
engSearchText: You are utterly incomprehensible.
jpnChrName: 本当に何をやっているんだ、君は……
jpnSearchText: 本当に何をやっているんだ、君は……

engChrName: Man, I thought WE were supposed to be the experts on dealin' with devils and shit. Crazy that orbal tech can do that for you now.
engSearchText:
Man, I thought WE were supposed to be the experts
on dealin' with devils and shit. Crazy that orbal tech
can do that for you now.
jpnChrName: 悪魔だの障壁だの、アタシらの領分だろうに 導力学で対抗できるってのはスゲーよな。
jpnSearchText:
悪魔だの障壁だの、アタシらの領分だろうに
導力学で対抗できるってのはスゲーよな。

engChrName: Marduk's real shady, but eh. Can't complain.
engSearchText: Marduk's real shady, but eh. Can't complain.
jpnChrName: ＭＫに関しては胡散臭せえ所もあるんだが…… つべこべ言ってる状況じゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
ＭＫに関しては胡散臭せえ所もあるんだが……
つべこべ言ってる状況じゃねえか。

engChrName: I still got my own shit to do as a Dominion.
engSearchText: I still got my own shit to do as a Dominion.
jpnChrName: とにかく守護騎士として 出来る限りの事はやらせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
とにかく守護騎士として
出来る限りの事はやらせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Man, I sure have been slackin' a lot. Leon's been pullin' my weight around, too.
engSearchText:
Man, I sure have been slackin' a lot. Leon's been
pullin' my weight around, too.
jpnChrName: ふうっ、最近リオン任せで ちょいとサボりすぎてたな……
jpnSearchText:
ふうっ、最近リオン任せで
ちょいとサボりすぎてたな……

engChrName: Stop wasting your time here, what the hell! I didn't go through all that trouble to look that up for you just so you can bitch out!
engSearchText:
Stop wasting your time here, what the hell! I didn't
go through all that trouble to look that up for you just
so you can bitch out!
jpnChrName: ──ってテメエら、折角“視て”やったのに なにをグズグズしてやがる！？
jpnSearchText:
──ってテメエら、折角“視て”やったのに
なにをグズグズしてやがる！？

engChrName: Get your ass in gear and fight them, already! Aren't you supposed to save that silver-haired kid?!
engSearchText:
Get your ass in gear and fight them, already!
Aren't you supposed to save that silver-haired kid?!
jpnChrName: とっととカチコミをかけやがれ！ あの銀髪小僧を助け出すんだろーが！？
jpnSearchText:
とっととカチコミをかけやがれ！
あの銀髪小僧を助け出すんだろーが！？

engChrName: I'll kick your ass if you miss this chance! Come on, fight!
engSearchText:
I'll kick your ass if you miss this chance! Come
on, fight!
jpnChrName: 機を逃すんじゃねえ！ とっととカチ込みをかけやがれ！
jpnSearchText:
機を逃すんじゃねえ！
とっととカチ込みをかけやがれ！

engChrName: I'll, uh, catch up with you guys later. I'm not tired, just catching my breath!
engSearchText:
I'll, uh, catch up with you guys later. I'm not tired,
just catching my breath!
jpnChrName: その、アタシもちょいとばかり 息を整えたら加勢してやるからよ！
jpnSearchText:
その、アタシもちょいとばかり
息を整えたら加勢してやるからよ！

engChrName: You're being real freakin' annoying! Buzz off, or I'm gonna MAKE you buzz off!
engSearchText:
You're being real freakin' annoying! Buzz off, or I'm
gonna MAKE you buzz off!
jpnChrName: ……オイ、気が散るだろうが。 ウロチョロして邪魔すんじゃねえ！
jpnSearchText:
……オイ、気が散るだろうが。
ウロチョロして邪魔すんじゃねえ！

engChrName: Man, I suck ass at clairvoyance. Leon's supposed to be the good one at it.
engSearchText:
Man, I suck ass at clairvoyance. Leon's supposed to
be the good one at it.
jpnChrName: ったく、霊視なんざ本当なら リオンの方が得意なんだけどよ……
jpnSearchText:
ったく、霊視なんざ本当なら
リオンの方が得意なんだけどよ……

engChrName: Sorry 'bout that.
engSearchText: Sorry 'bout that.
jpnChrName: おっと、そいつは悪かったな。
jpnSearchText: おっと、そいつは悪かったな。

engChrName: This place looks like it's gonna be real annoying.
engSearchText: This place looks like it's gonna be real annoying.
jpnChrName: ──どうやらここの地区は 他よりも厄介な仕掛けがありそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
──どうやらここの地区は
他よりも厄介な仕掛けがありそうだ。

engChrName: Sorry 'bout that. I know it's a pain, but we're doing this for Quatre.
engSearchText:
Sorry 'bout that. I know it's a pain, but we're
doing this for Quatre.
jpnChrName: 面倒かけて済まねえが カトルのためにも宜しく頼むぜ。
jpnSearchText:
面倒かけて済まねえが
カトルのためにも宜しく頼むぜ。

engChrName: Don't get me wrong. I still don't trust that you don't got anything to do with this shit.
engSearchText:
Don't get me wrong. I still don't trust that you don't
got anything to do with this shit.
jpnChrName: この状況にテメエがどれだけ 噛んでるかは知らねえが……
jpnSearchText:
この状況にテメエがどれだけ
噛んでるかは知らねえが……

engChrName: But you look pretty damn desperate to save both the city and that friend of yours.
engSearchText:
But you look pretty damn desperate to save both the
city and that friend of yours.
jpnChrName: 仲間の為にも街の為にも 必死こいてるその意気込みは買ってやるよ。
jpnSearchText:
仲間の為にも街の為にも
必死こいてるその意気込みは買ってやるよ。

engChrName: You got a whole lot to prove, spriggan. You're gonna be in some deep shit if you back down from this one.
engSearchText:
You got a whole lot to prove, spriggan. You're gonna
be in some deep shit if you back down from this one.
jpnChrName: ま、精々この状況を覆して 行動で示してみせな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、精々この状況を覆して
行動で示してみせな。

engChrName: Don't worry. Wasn't plannin' to.
engSearchText: Don't worry. Wasn't plannin' to.
jpnChrName: ああ……元からそのつもりだ。
jpnSearchText: ああ……元からそのつもりだ。

jpnChrName: （ヴァンさん……？）
jpnSearchText: （ヴァンさん……？）

engChrName: This demon sphere's a real pain in the ass.
engSearchText: This demon sphere's a real pain in the ass.
jpnChrName: ちなみに、確かにここの魔球は 面倒な“陣”を築いてるみてーだ。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに、確かにここの魔球は
面倒な“陣”を築いてるみてーだ。

engChrName: How the hell is this fair?! I can't figure out the last part of this shitty ass game!
engSearchText:
How the hell is this fair?! I can't figure out the last
part of this shitty ass game!
jpnChrName: それも最後の一手だけが見つからねぇ、 反則上等のフザけたゲームをな。
jpnSearchText:
それも最後の一手だけが見つからねぇ、
反則上等のフザけたゲームをな。

engChrName: Figures. I thought somethin' was off.
engSearchText: Figures. I thought somethin' was off.
jpnChrName: ハン……成程な。 どこか匂うと思ったんだが。
jpnSearchText:
ハン……成程な。
どこか匂うと思ったんだが。

engChrName: You and Miss Yin here do what you can in the meantime.
engSearchText:
You and Miss Yin here do what you can in
the meantime.
jpnChrName: まずはその銀色のヤツを頼りに やれるだけはやってみろ。
jpnSearchText:
まずはその銀色のヤツを頼りに
やれるだけはやってみろ。

engChrName: If I figure this shit out, I'll let you know telepathically.
engSearchText: If I figure this shit out, I'll let you know telepathically.
jpnChrName: 最後の一手だけは“視えた”ら 念話で伝えてやるからよ。
jpnSearchText:
最後の一手だけは“視えた”ら
念話で伝えてやるからよ。

engChrName: Hey, Rixia. You mind givin' us a hand with those talismans of yours?
engSearchText:
Hey, Rixia. You mind givin' us a hand with those
talismans of yours?
jpnChrName: ──リーシャ、お前もせいぜい 符術で力になってやりな。
jpnSearchText:
──リーシャ、お前もせいぜい
符術で力になってやりな。

engChrName: Of course.
engSearchText: Of course.
jpnChrName: ええ、任せてください。
jpnSearchText: ええ、任せてください。

engChrName: (Clairvoyance AND telepathy?!)
engSearchText: (Clairvoyance AND telepathy?!)
jpnChrName: （霊視……それに念話ですか！）
jpnSearchText: （霊視……それに念話ですか！）

engChrName: (Something tells me this chick shouldn't be dumping all these trade secrets on us.)
engSearchText:
(Something tells me this chick shouldn't be dumping
all these trade secrets on us.)
jpnChrName: （オイオイ、結局   全部バラしてんじゃねーか。）
jpnSearchText:
（オイオイ、結局
全部バラしてんじゃねーか。）

engChrName: (It can be a quality, depending on how you look at it.)
engSearchText: (It can be a quality, depending on how you look at it.)
jpnChrName: （まあ、そこがこの娘の   得難い長所でもあるのだがな。）
jpnSearchText:
（まあ、そこがこの娘の
得難い長所でもあるのだがな。）

engChrName: This demon sphere's a real pain in the ass.
engSearchText: This demon sphere's a real pain in the ass.
jpnChrName: 確かにここの魔球は 面倒な“陣”を築いてるみてーだ。
jpnSearchText:
確かにここの魔球は
面倒な“陣”を築いてるみてーだ。

engChrName: You and Miss Yin here do what you can in the meantime.
engSearchText:
You and Miss Yin here do what you can in
the meantime.
jpnChrName: まずはその銀色のヤツを頼りに やれるだけはやってみな。
jpnSearchText:
まずはその銀色のヤツを頼りに
やれるだけはやってみな。

engChrName: If I figure this shit out, I'll let you know telepathically.
engSearchText: If I figure this shit out, I'll let you know telepathically.
jpnChrName: 最後の一手だけは“視えた”ら 念話で伝えてやるからよ。
jpnSearchText:
最後の一手だけは“視えた”ら
念話で伝えてやるからよ。

engChrName: Aren't you full of surprises.
engSearchText: Aren't you full of surprises.
jpnChrName: クク、アンタにあんな一面があるなんて 少し意外だったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
クク、アンタにあんな一面があるなんて
少し意外だったぜ。

engChrName: By the way, Leon should be patrolling around the Blacklight District.
engSearchText:
By the way, Leon should be patrolling around the
Blacklight District.
jpnChrName: ちなみにリオンのヤツは黒芒街の方を 巡回してるはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにリオンのヤツは黒芒街の方を
巡回してるはずだ。

engChrName: All these shady characters are taking advantage of the festival to gather.
engSearchText:
All these shady characters are taking advantage of the
festival to gather.
jpnChrName: 記念祭に乗じて、裏社会のやつらが 首都に集まってるみたいだからな。
jpnSearchText:
記念祭に乗じて、裏社会のやつらが
首都に集まってるみたいだからな。

engChrName: Well, I can't say more than that. Confidential, and only for Master's ears.
engSearchText:
Well, I can't say more than that. Confidential, and
only for Master's ears.
jpnChrName: ま、一応は守秘義務があってな。 先生以外にゃまだ明かせねぇんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、一応は守秘義務があってな。
先生以外にゃまだ明かせねぇんだ。

engChrName: Leon's gonna be spending the next few days in Edith's outskirts.
engSearchText:
Leon's gonna be spending the next few days in
Edith's outskirts.
jpnChrName: お察しのように、これからリオンと 数日ほど首都界隈で動くつもりだが……
jpnSearchText:
お察しのように、これからリオンと
数日ほど首都界隈で動くつもりだが……

engChrName: Best wishes to you guys or whatever. I'll give ya a hand if those bad predictions of mine turn out to be true.
engSearchText:
Best wishes to you guys or whatever. I'll give ya a
hand if those bad predictions of mine turn out to
be true.
jpnChrName: そっちはそっちで精々頑張りな。 悪い予感が当たったら力を貸すからよ。
jpnSearchText:
そっちはそっちで精々頑張りな。
悪い予感が当たったら力を貸すからよ。

engChrName: How generous of you. (Bad predictions, huh...)
engSearchText:
How generous of you.
(Bad predictions, huh...)
jpnChrName: ハン、そいつはどうも。 （……悪い予感、か………）
jpnSearchText:
ハン、そいつはどうも。
（……悪い予感、か………）

engChrName: Even if our spriggan here won't appreciate our well wishes, I do sincerely hope you all will be safe out there.
engSearchText:
Even if our spriggan here won't appreciate our well
wishes, I do sincerely hope you all will be safe
out there.
jpnChrName: まあ、タフな裏解決屋さんはともかく、 それ以外の方はどうか気をつけて。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、タフな裏解決屋さんはともかく、
それ以外の方はどうか気をつけて。

engChrName: This might be the calm right before the storm, after all.
engSearchText:
This might be the calm right before the storm,
after all.
jpnChrName: 全てが解決したと思っていた矢先に 何か起きるのは良くある話ですしね。
jpnSearchText:
全てが解決したと思っていた矢先に
何か起きるのは良くある話ですしね。

engChrName: Ah...
engSearchText: Ah...

engChrName: ...Leon.
engSearchText: ...Leon.
jpnChrName: ……リオン。
jpnSearchText: ……リオン。

engChrName: Pardon me if I've overstepped, but I imagine you're of the same mind, right?
engSearchText:
Pardon me if I've overstepped, but I imagine you're of
the same mind, right?
jpnChrName: フフ、言葉が過ぎましたか。 ですが貴方自身も同感なのでは？
jpnSearchText:
フフ、言葉が過ぎましたか。
ですが貴方自身も同感なのでは？

engChrName: I mean, never hurts to be careful.
engSearchText: I mean, never hurts to be careful.
jpnChrName: ま、用心しておくに 越したことはねえのは同感だぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、用心しておくに
越したことはねえのは同感だぜ。

engChrName: (No way he didn't know with how he's acting.)
engSearchText: (No way he didn't know with how he's acting.)
jpnChrName: （……しかしコイツの態度、   ひょっとしなくてもあの事を……）
jpnSearchText:
（……しかしコイツの態度、
ひょっとしなくてもあの事を……）

engChrName: Well, I can't imagine you'll be in much danger if you have our teacher with you.
engSearchText:
Well, I can't imagine you'll be in much danger if you
have our teacher with you.
jpnChrName: まあ、先生もいることですし そうそう万が一も無いでしょうが。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、先生もいることですし
そうそう万が一も無いでしょうが。

engChrName: I'll pray for your safety. Even yours, Arkride.
engSearchText: I'll pray for your safety. Even yours, Arkride.
jpnChrName: どうかくれぐれも気をつけて。 ──勿論、アークライドさんも。
jpnSearchText:
どうかくれぐれも気をつけて。
──勿論、アークライドさんも。

engChrName: Don't really need it, but thanks for worrying.
engSearchText: Don't really need it, but thanks for worrying.
jpnChrName: ヘッ…… 過分なご配慮、痛み入るぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ヘッ……
過分なご配慮、痛み入るぜ。

engChrName: The assault plan will hopefully go well.
engSearchText: The assault plan will hopefully go well.
jpnChrName: 突入作戦、上手くいくといいのですが──
jpnSearchText: 突入作戦、上手くいくといいのですが──

engChrName: This is the moment of truth. Whatever comes, there's no backing down now. Please stay safe, everyone.
engSearchText:
This is the moment of truth. Whatever comes, there's
no backing down now. Please stay safe, everyone.
jpnChrName: ともあれ、ここが正念場……後には引けません。 皆さんもどうかお気をつけて。
jpnSearchText:
ともあれ、ここが正念場……後には引けません。
皆さんもどうかお気をつけて。

engChrName: Oh. Come to think of it, Ilya and Sully said they wanted some pictures of the capital...
engSearchText:
Oh. Come to think of it, Ilya and Sully said they
wanted some pictures of the capital...
jpnChrName: あっ……そういえば、イリアさんやシュリちゃんに 首都の写真を撮ってくるよう言われていたんでした。
jpnSearchText:
あっ……そういえば、イリアさんやシュリちゃんに
首都の写真を撮ってくるよう言われていたんでした。

engChrName: I'd love it if they could also see the place where I was born and raised. Him, too.
engSearchText:
I'd love it if they could also see the place where I was
born and raised. Him, too.
jpnChrName: あの人にも私が生まれ育った街を 見て欲しいですし……
jpnSearchText:
あの人にも私が生まれ育った街を
見て欲しいですし……

engChrName: Hmm... Maybe I'll take care of that and then go for a nice walk.
engSearchText:
Hmm... Maybe I'll take care of that and then go for a
nice walk.
jpnChrName: この後は景色のいい所を探して 少し散歩でもしてみましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
この後は景色のいい所を探して
少し散歩でもしてみましょうか。

engChrName: Oooh, 'him'? Come on, spill! Is it that boyfriend of yours I keep hearing about? You can't hide him forever, you know!
engSearchText:
Oooh, 'him'? Come on, spill! Is it that boyfriend of
yours I keep hearing about? You can't hide him
forever, you know!
jpnChrName: あっ、あの人って言うと噂の彼？ 隅に置けないわね、このこの～！
jpnSearchText:
あっ、あの人って言うと噂の彼？
隅に置けないわね、このこの～！

engChrName: C-Come on, Judith! It's not like that...
engSearchText: C-Come on, Judith! It's not like that...
jpnChrName: も、もうジュディスったら。 そういうのじゃないから……！
jpnSearchText:
も、もうジュディスったら。
そういうのじゃないから……！

engChrName: This is the first incident this big since the Retributive Tower, I think.
engSearchText:
This is the first incident this big since the
Retributive Tower, I think.
jpnChrName: これだけの大規模な異変は “バベル”の時以来だね。
jpnSearchText:
これだけの大規模な異変は
“バベル”の時以来だね。

engChrName: Probably...
engSearchText: Probably...
jpnChrName: そうですね……
jpnSearchText: そうですね……

engChrName: But we don't have Lloyd—I mean, we don't have the Special Support Section or Class VII for backup this time. Or any other backup, for that matter.
engSearchText:
But we don't have Lloyd—I mean, we don't have the
Special Support Section or Class VII for backup
this time. Or any other backup, for that matter.
jpnChrName: あの時とは違って、ロイドさん──特務支援課や Ⅶ組、同業者のあの人達はいませんが。
jpnSearchText:
あの時とは違って、ロイドさん──特務支援課や
Ⅶ組、同業者のあの人達はいませんが。

engChrName: But if it's to protect the place where I was born—my second home—I will brandish my blade without hesitation.
engSearchText:
But if it's to protect the place where I was born—my
second home—I will brandish my blade
without hesitation.
jpnChrName: 大切な故郷や、第二の故郷を守る為にも、 この大剣で脅威を退けるまでです。
jpnSearchText:
大切な故郷や、第二の故郷を守る為にも、
この大剣で脅威を退けるまでです。

engChrName: Yep. And I'm a Republic bracer at the moment.
engSearchText: Yep. And I'm a Republic bracer at the moment.
jpnChrName: ん……わたしも今は共和国の所属だし。
jpnSearchText: ん……わたしも今は共和国の所属だし。

engChrName: I'll back you up so we can ensure the safety of the citizens and the city.
engSearchText:
I'll back you up so we can ensure the safety of the
citizens and the city.
jpnChrName: 民間人と街の安全を守る為、 全力でサポートさせてもらう。
jpnSearchText:
民間人と街の安全を守る為、
全力でサポートさせてもらう。

engChrName: You two are hitting it off nicely.
engSearchText: You two are hitting it off nicely.
jpnChrName: 二人とも仲が良さそうじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: 二人とも仲が良さそうじゃねえか。

engChrName: Didn't you two team up durin' the Crossbell incident anyway?
engSearchText:
Didn't you two team up durin' the Crossbell
incident anyway?
jpnChrName: そういやクロスベルで異変があった時は 一緒に行動してたんだったか？
jpnSearchText:
そういやクロスベルで異変があった時は
一緒に行動してたんだったか？

engChrName: We did. To be fair, we already knew each other before that, though.
engSearchText:
We did. To be fair, we already knew each other
before that, though.
jpnChrName: まあね。 それ以前から縁はあったけど。
jpnSearchText:
まあね。
それ以前から縁はあったけど。

engChrName: Yeah. Though come to think of it, I don't think we'd been together in the Republic before.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Though come to think of it, I don't think we'd
been together in the Republic before.
jpnChrName: 思えば、共和国でこうして お話しているのも不思議な気分になりますね。
jpnSearchText:
思えば、共和国でこうして
お話しているのも不思議な気分になりますね。

engChrName: Though I guess this isn't the time to reminisce.
engSearchText: Though I guess this isn't the time to reminisce.
jpnChrName: ……とはいえ、今は思い出に 浸ってばかりもいられません。
jpnSearchText:
……とはいえ、今は思い出に
浸ってばかりもいられません。

engChrName: I won't be joining the assault. Have my own stuff to do, and I need to make sure civilians are safe.
engSearchText:
I won't be joining the assault. Have my own stuff to
do, and I need to make sure civilians are safe.
jpnChrName: わたし達は民間人の安全を確保しつつ、 突入作戦とは別口で動くつもり。
jpnSearchText:
わたし達は民間人の安全を確保しつつ、
突入作戦とは別口で動くつもり。

engChrName: I'll let you worry about Elaine.
engSearchText: I'll let you worry about Elaine.
jpnChrName: エレインの事、宜しく頼んだよ。
jpnSearchText: エレインの事、宜しく頼んだよ。

engChrName: Yeah. I'll handle her...
engSearchText: Yeah. I'll handle her...
jpnChrName: ああ……任せておいてくれ。
jpnSearchText: ああ……任せておいてくれ。

engChrName: So all of this is Almata's fault? Hmm...
engSearchText: So all of this is Almata's fault? Hmm...
jpnChrName: 此度の騒動、アルマータどもが 引き起こしたようだが、ふむ………
jpnSearchText:
此度の騒動、アルマータどもが
引き起こしたようだが、ふむ………

engChrName: Hey, old man. What's on your mind?
engSearchText: Hey, old man. What's on your mind?
jpnChrName: 爺さん、何を考えてやがる？
jpnSearchText: 爺さん、何を考えてやがる？

engChrName: Nothing important. Just recalling an old conversation.
engSearchText: Nothing important. Just recalling an old conversation.
jpnChrName: なに、少々昔話を思い出していたまでよ。
jpnSearchText: なに、少々昔話を思い出していたまでよ。

engChrName: But if I'm correct in my assumptions, this ordeal might be a lot more complicated than we first thought.
engSearchText:
But if I'm correct in my assumptions, this ordeal
might be a lot more complicated than we
first thought.
jpnChrName: しかし儂の推測が正しければ 此度の騒動、厄介な背景もありそうじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
しかし儂の推測が正しければ
此度の騒動、厄介な背景もありそうじゃ。

engChrName: I might need to study the situation in more detail.
engSearchText: I might need to study the situation in more detail.
jpnChrName: 儂も大局を見定める必要があろう。
jpnSearchText: 儂も大局を見定める必要があろう。

engChrName: I'll be keeping an eye out for how Fan and Cao decide to proceed. And you, too, Aaron.
engSearchText:
I'll be keeping an eye out for how Fan and Cao
decide to proceed. And you, too, Aaron.
jpnChrName: そしてこの局面でファンやツァオがどう動くのか── アーロン、おぬしの立ち居振る舞いもな。
jpnSearchText:
そしてこの局面でファンやツァオがどう動くのか──
アーロン、おぬしの立ち居振る舞いもな。

engChrName: So you're just gonna sit back and watch?
engSearchText: So you're just gonna sit back and watch?
jpnChrName: ハッ、高みの見物って訳か……
jpnSearchText: ハッ、高みの見物って訳か……

engChrName: Fine by me. Just means I can do whatever I want. I'll give you a real show.
engSearchText:
Fine by me. Just means I can do whatever I want.
I'll give you a real show.
jpnChrName: いいぜ、好きなだけ見てりゃいいさ。 俺も勝手にやらせてもらうからよ。
jpnSearchText:
いいぜ、好きなだけ見てりゃいいさ。
俺も勝手にやらせてもらうからよ。

engChrName: I might need to study the situation in more detail.
engSearchText: I might need to study the situation in more detail.
jpnChrName: どうやら儂も大局を 見定める必要がありそうじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
どうやら儂も大局を
見定める必要がありそうじゃ。

engChrName: I'll be keeping an eye out for how Fan and Cao decide to proceed. And you, too, Aaron.
engSearchText:
I'll be keeping an eye out for how Fan and Cao
decide to proceed. And you, too, Aaron.
jpnChrName: そしてこの局面でファンやツァオがどう動くのか── アーロン、おぬしの立ち居振る舞いもな。
jpnSearchText:
そしてこの局面でファンやツァオがどう動くのか──
アーロン、おぬしの立ち居振る舞いもな。

engChrName: The professor is really bold for someone who presents herself as calm and laidback.
engSearchText:
The professor is really bold for someone who presents
herself as calm and laidback.
jpnChrName: ふぉふぉ、博士は相変わらず、 大人しそうに見えて食えない御仁じゃな。
jpnSearchText:
ふぉふぉ、博士は相変わらず、
大人しそうに見えて食えない御仁じゃな。

engChrName: The matter of the East is certainly not unrelated to Heiyue, especially as we accept Eastern immigrants.
engSearchText:
The matter of the East is certainly not unrelated to
Heiyue, especially as we accept Eastern immigrants.
jpnChrName: 大陸東部の件は移民を受け入れている 黒月としても無関係ではない。
jpnSearchText:
大陸東部の件は移民を受け入れている
黒月としても無関係ではない。

engChrName: I look forward to hearing what she's planning.
engSearchText: I look forward to hearing what she's planning.
jpnChrName: 聞かせてもらうとしようかの、 博士の提案とやらを。
jpnSearchText:
聞かせてもらうとしようかの、
博士の提案とやらを。

engChrName: This cutting-edge Marduk terminal is great, but Renne's technical skills are just mesmerizing!
