engSearchText:
This cutting-edge Marduk terminal is great, but
Renne's technical skills are just mesmerizing!
jpnChrName: ＭＫ社の最新端末の性能もすごいけど、 レンさんの技術力もホントにすごいんだよ～！
jpnSearchText:
ＭＫ社の最新端末の性能もすごいけど、
レンさんの技術力もホントにすごいんだよ～！

engChrName: Even the professor was speechless. I've clearly got a looot to learn as her disciple!
engSearchText:
Even the professor was speechless. I've clearly got a
looot to learn as her disciple!
jpnChrName: 博士も舌を巻いちゃうくらいだし、 わたしも門下生として負けてられないなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
博士も舌を巻いちゃうくらいだし、
わたしも門下生として負けてられないなぁ。

engChrName: Oh, Yang's helping out, too. He's already gone ahead, though, so we'll meet up later.
engSearchText:
Oh, Yang's helping out, too. He's already gone ahead,
though, so we'll meet up later.
jpnChrName: ちなみにヤン兄さんも協力してくれてるよ～。 先行してくれてるから、合流はまた後になるけど～。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにヤン兄さんも協力してくれてるよ～。
先行してくれてるから、合流はまた後になるけど～。

engChrName: We've got to stop this Pandemonium—whatever it takes!
engSearchText:
We've got to stop this Pandemonium—whatever
it takes!
jpnChrName: とにかく……汎魔化とかいう現象は 絶対にここで阻止しなきゃね～……！
jpnSearchText:
とにかく……汎魔化とかいう現象は
絶対にここで阻止しなきゃね～……！

engChrName: I'm reeeally worried, but let's give it our best, Quatre!
engSearchText: I'm reeeally worried, but let's give it our best, Quatre!
jpnChrName: 心配だけど……お互いに頑張ろうねカトル君～！
jpnSearchText: 心配だけど……お互いに頑張ろうねカトル君～！

engChrName: Of course. It's encouraging having you here, Essy.
engSearchText: Of course. It's encouraging having you here, Essy.
jpnChrName: うん、エレ姉達がいてくれて本当に頼もしいよ。
jpnSearchText: うん、エレ姉達がいてくれて本当に頼もしいよ。

engChrName: Looks like FIO got caught up patrolling some really dangerous areas.
engSearchText:
Looks like FIO got caught up patrolling some really
dangerous areas.
jpnChrName: ＦＩＯのやつは相当危険な所を 探し回ってやがったみたいでな。
jpnSearchText:
ＦＩＯのやつは相当危険な所を
探し回ってやがったみたいでな。

engChrName: I've got 'em fixed up, but do watch out.
engSearchText: I've got 'em fixed up, but do watch out.
jpnChrName: 俺の方で修繕しておいたが 気を付けてみてやってくれ。
jpnSearchText:
俺の方で修繕しておいたが
気を付けてみてやってくれ。

engChrName: Also, I brought a basic set of tools and equipment. If you need any work done, I'll do what I can.
engSearchText:
Also, I brought a basic set of tools and equipment.
If you need any work done, I'll do what I can.
jpnChrName: それと、最低限の道具や工具も持って来てある。 必要な物があれば手を貸してやるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
それと、最低限の道具や工具も持って来てある。
必要な物があれば手を貸してやるぜ。

engChrName: You better bring Quatre and XEROS back, you hear me?
engSearchText:
You better bring Quatre and XEROS back, you
hear me?
jpnChrName: カトルの事もＸＥＲＯＳの事も 必ず連れ戻して来いよ。
jpnSearchText:
カトルの事もＸＥＲＯＳの事も
必ず連れ戻して来いよ。

engChrName: Yeah, you got it.
engSearchText: Yeah, you got it.
jpnChrName: ああ、勿論だ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、勿論だ。

engChrName: All right. Whose weapon do you need me to work on?
engSearchText:
All right. Whose weapon do you need me to
work on?
jpnChrName: で、誰の武器パーツが必要なんだ？
jpnSearchText: で、誰の武器パーツが必要なんだ？

engChrName: Could you make me a stun caliber?
engSearchText: Could you make me a stun caliber?
jpnChrName: なら──俺の撃剣（スタンキャリバー）を頼めるか？
jpnSearchText: なら──俺の撃剣（スタンキャリバー）を頼めるか？

engChrName: Could you make Agnès an orbal staff?
engSearchText: Could you make Agnès an orbal staff?
jpnChrName: なら── アニエスの導力杖（オーバルスタッフ）を頼めるか。
jpnSearchText:
なら──
アニエスの導力杖（オーバルスタッフ）を頼めるか。

engChrName: A-Are you sure? I appreciate it.
engSearchText: A-Are you sure? I appreciate it.
jpnChrName: い、いいんですか…… ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText:
い、いいんですか……
ありがとうございます。

engChrName: Could you make Feri a rifleblade?
engSearchText: Could you make Feri a rifleblade?
jpnChrName: なら── フェリの突撃剣（アサルトソード）を頼めるか。
jpnSearchText:
なら──
フェリの突撃剣（アサルトソード）を頼めるか。

engChrName: Oh, thank you so much! This is an honor!
engSearchText: Oh, thank you so much! This is an honor!
jpnChrName: ありがとうございます、光栄です！
jpnSearchText: ありがとうございます、光栄です！

engChrName: Could you make Aaron a set of twin blades?
engSearchText: Could you make Aaron a set of twin blades?
jpnChrName: なら── アーロンの双星剣を頼めるか。
jpnSearchText:
なら──
アーロンの双星剣を頼めるか。

engChrName: You clearly know who'll get the most out of it.
engSearchText: You clearly know who'll get the most out of it.
jpnChrName: ヘッ、分かってんじゃねえかオッサン。
jpnSearchText: ヘッ、分かってんじゃねえかオッサン。

engChrName: Could you make Risette a blade gear?
engSearchText: Could you make Risette a blade gear?
jpnChrName: なら── リゼットのブレードギアを頼めるか。
jpnSearchText:
なら──
リゼットのブレードギアを頼めるか。

engChrName: Oh, goodness. Most appreciated, thank you.
engSearchText: Oh, goodness. Most appreciated, thank you.
jpnChrName: すみません、ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText: すみません、ありがとうございます。

engChrName: Could you make Quatre an orbal pulse gun?
engSearchText: Could you make Quatre an orbal pulse gun?
jpnChrName: なら── カトルのパルスガンを頼めるか。
jpnSearchText:
なら──
カトルのパルスガンを頼めるか。

engChrName: R-Really? Thank you, Van.
engSearchText: R-Really? Thank you, Van.
jpnChrName: い、いいんですか…… すみません、ヴァンさん。
jpnSearchText:
い、いいんですか……
すみません、ヴァンさん。

engChrName: Could you make Judith a shooting star whip?
engSearchText: Could you make Judith a shooting star whip?
jpnChrName: なら── ジュディスの流星鞭（ステラビュート）を頼めるか。
jpnSearchText:
なら──
ジュディスの流星鞭（ステラビュート）を頼めるか。

engChrName: My, you're a gentleman!
engSearchText: My, you're a gentleman!
jpnChrName: フフ、いい心がけね。
jpnSearchText: フフ、いい心がけね。

engChrName: Could you make Master some gauntlets?
engSearchText: Could you make Master some gauntlets?
jpnChrName: なら──師父（せんせい）の籠手を頼めるか。
jpnSearchText: なら──師父（せんせい）の籠手を頼めるか。

engChrName: Hmm? Well, thank you, Van.
engSearchText: Hmm? Well, thank you, Van.
jpnChrName: ふむ、すまぬなヴァン。
jpnSearchText: ふむ、すまぬなヴァン。

engChrName: Sorry. Need a moment to think about it.
engSearchText: Sorry. Need a moment to think about it.
jpnChrName: すまねえ、もう少し 考える時間をもらっていいか？
jpnSearchText:
すまねえ、もう少し
考える時間をもらっていいか？

engChrName: Take your time.
engSearchText: Take your time.
jpnChrName: ハッ、別に構わねえよ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、別に構わねえよ。

engChrName: Leave this to me.
engSearchText: Leave this to me.
jpnChrName: 任せときな。
jpnSearchText: 任せときな。

engChrName: Van's group retrieved the equipment from Old Town and had Giscard work on their weapons.
engSearchText:
Van's group retrieved the equipment from Old Town
and had Giscard work on their weapons.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちは旧市街の工房を借りて、 ジスカール親方に武器を造ってもらうのだった。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちは旧市街の工房を借りて、
ジスカール親方に武器を造ってもらうのだった。

engChrName: There! All finished!
engSearchText: There! All finished!
jpnChrName: そらよ、完成だ！
jpnSearchText: そらよ、完成だ！

engChrName: Obtained  .
engSearchText:
Obtained
.
jpnChrName: {CC_ITEM=ITEM_WEAP_M_VAN_80}を手に入れた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_ITEM=ITEM_WEAP_M_VAN_80}を手に入れた。

engChrName: This is one hell of a weapon.
engSearchText: This is one hell of a weapon.
jpnChrName: こいつは……すげえ武器だな。
jpnSearchText: こいつは……すげえ武器だな。

engChrName: Obtained  .
engSearchText:
Obtained
.
jpnChrName: {CC_ITEM=ITEM_WEAP_M_AGNES_80}を手に入れた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_ITEM=ITEM_WEAP_M_AGNES_80}を手に入れた。

engChrName: Oh, goodness. This is a very high-performance staff.
engSearchText: Oh, goodness. This is a very high-performance staff.
jpnChrName: これは……すごい性能ですね。
jpnSearchText: これは……すごい性能ですね。

engChrName: Obtained  .
engSearchText:
Obtained
.
jpnChrName: {CC_ITEM=ITEM_WEAP_M_FERI_80}を手に入れた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_ITEM=ITEM_WEAP_M_FERI_80}を手に入れた。

engChrName: Th-This weapon's incredible!
engSearchText: Th-This weapon's incredible!
jpnChrName: これは──素晴らしい武器ですね！
jpnSearchText: これは──素晴らしい武器ですね！

engChrName: Obtained  .
engSearchText:
Obtained
.
jpnChrName: {CC_ITEM=ITEM_WEAP_M_AARON_80}を手に入れた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_ITEM=ITEM_WEAP_M_AARON_80}を手に入れた。

engChrName: Damn. These things are crazy.
engSearchText: Damn. These things are crazy.
jpnChrName: ハッ、こいつはすげえワザモンだな。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、こいつはすげえワザモンだな。

engChrName: Obtained  .
engSearchText:
Obtained
.
jpnChrName: {CC_ITEM=ITEM_WEAP_M_RISETTE_80}を手に入れた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_ITEM=ITEM_WEAP_M_RISETTE_80}を手に入れた。

engChrName: My, the craftsmanship is exquisite.
engSearchText: My, the craftsmanship is exquisite.
jpnChrName: これは……見事な逸品ですね。
jpnSearchText: これは……見事な逸品ですね。

engChrName: Obtained  .
engSearchText:
Obtained
.
jpnChrName: {CC_ITEM=ITEM_WEAP_M_QUATRE_80}を手に入れた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_ITEM=ITEM_WEAP_M_QUATRE_80}を手に入れた。

engChrName: This is quite powerful.
engSearchText: This is quite powerful.
jpnChrName: これは……凄まじい出力ですね。
jpnSearchText: これは……凄まじい出力ですね。

engChrName: Obtained  .
engSearchText:
Obtained
.
jpnChrName: {CC_ITEM=ITEM_WEAP_M_JUDITH_80}を手に入れた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_ITEM=ITEM_WEAP_M_JUDITH_80}を手に入れた。

engChrName: Oooh, I can't believe how good this weapon is!
engSearchText: Oooh, I can't believe how good this weapon is!
jpnChrName: 驚いた──本当に見事な武器ね。
jpnSearchText: 驚いた──本当に見事な武器ね。

engChrName: Obtained  .
engSearchText:
Obtained
.
jpnChrName: {CC_ITEM=ITEM_WEAP_M_BERGARD_80}を手に入れた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_ITEM=ITEM_WEAP_M_BERGARD_80}を手に入れた。

engChrName: Oho. This is a marvelous weapon.
engSearchText: Oho. This is a marvelous weapon.
jpnChrName: ほう……これは見事な武器だな。
jpnSearchText: ほう……これは見事な武器だな。

engChrName: Your skills are the real deal. No wonder you're the head of Basel's artisans.
engSearchText:
Your skills are the real deal. No wonder you're the
head of Basel's artisans.
jpnChrName: にしても、見事な腕前だぜ。 伊達にバーゼルの職人を束ねてねえな。
jpnSearchText:
にしても、見事な腕前だぜ。
伊達にバーゼルの職人を束ねてねえな。

engChrName: It's nothing special. Plenty of folks can make weapons like those.
engSearchText:
It's nothing special. Plenty of folks can make weapons
like those.
jpnChrName: ヘッ、このくらい俺じゃなくても出来ら。
jpnSearchText: ヘッ、このくらい俺じゃなくても出来ら。

engChrName: Anyway, if you pick up any more Onyx Steel, you let me know.
engSearchText:
Anyway, if you pick up any more Onyx Steel, you let
me know.
jpnChrName: ともあれ、またどっかで 黒玉鋼が手に入ったら俺に言え。
jpnSearchText:
ともあれ、またどっかで
黒玉鋼が手に入ったら俺に言え。

engChrName: If you're okay with me working it, I'll always be glad to.
engSearchText:
If you're okay with me working it, I'll always be
glad to.
jpnChrName: 俺の腕で良けりゃあ、いつでも振るってやる。
jpnSearchText: 俺の腕で良けりゃあ、いつでも振るってやる。

engChrName: 'Preciate it, Supervisor.
engSearchText: 'Preciate it, Supervisor.
jpnChrName: はは、助かるぜ親方。
jpnSearchText: はは、助かるぜ親方。

engChrName: Hmph. The elder's not changed one bit. Still just as overbearing and obstinate as I remember.
engSearchText:
Hmph. The elder's not changed one bit. Still just as
overbearing and obstinate as I remember.
jpnChrName: ったく、浮かれた格好をしてやがる所も含めて 長老殿も相変わらずみてえだな。
jpnSearchText:
ったく、浮かれた格好をしてやがる所も含めて
長老殿も相変わらずみてえだな。

engChrName: Maybe the success of the new Red Star factory and the high-speed orbal net infrastructure will teach him to ease off a little.
engSearchText:
Maybe the success of the new Red Star factory and
the high-speed orbal net infrastructure will teach him
to ease off a little.
jpnChrName: 高速導力ネットに紅星（レッドスター）の新規工場…… コイツで今度こそ鼻を明かしてやるのは勿論だが。
jpnSearchText:
高速導力ネットに紅星（レッドスター）の新規工場……
コイツで今度こそ鼻を明かしてやるのは勿論だが。

engChrName: He's a shrewd one, when it comes to money. There are some things we still need to work on.
engSearchText:
He's a shrewd one, when it comes to money.
There are some things we still need to work on.
jpnChrName: 資金繰りに関して腕があるのは確かだ。 協力出来る所はしていかねえとな。
jpnSearchText:
資金繰りに関して腕があるのは確かだ。
協力出来る所はしていかねえとな。

engChrName: Oh? I see you got your hands on some Onyx Steel.
engSearchText: Oh? I see you got your hands on some Onyx Steel.
jpnChrName: ほう、黒玉鋼が手に入ったのか。
jpnSearchText: ほう、黒玉鋼が手に入ったのか。

engChrName: All right. Whose weapon do you need me to work on?
engSearchText:
All right. Whose weapon do you need me to
work on?
jpnChrName: いいぜ、誰の武器パーツが必要だ？
jpnSearchText: いいぜ、誰の武器パーツが必要だ？

engChrName: You bet I can.
engSearchText: You bet I can.
jpnChrName: 任せときな。
jpnSearchText: 任せときな。

engChrName: Van's group retrieved the equipment from Old Town and had Giscard work on their weapons.
engSearchText:
Van's group retrieved the equipment from Old Town
and had Giscard work on their weapons.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちは旧市街の工房を借りて、 ジスカール親方に武器を造ってもらうのだった。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちは旧市街の工房を借りて、
ジスカール親方に武器を造ってもらうのだった。

engChrName: Here you go! All done!
engSearchText: Here you go! All done!
jpnChrName: そらよ、完成だ！
jpnSearchText: そらよ、完成だ！

engSearchText:

engChrName: Seein' you go at it never fails to impress.
engSearchText: Seein' you go at it never fails to impress.
jpnChrName: ハッ、何度見ても惚れ惚れすんな。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、何度見ても惚れ惚れすんな。

engChrName: Thanks, Supervisor.
engSearchText: Thanks, Supervisor.
jpnChrName: あんがとよ、親方。
jpnSearchText: あんがとよ、親方。

engChrName: Hmph. The elder's not changed one bit. Still just as overbearing and obstinate as I remember.
engSearchText:
Hmph. The elder's not changed one bit. Still just as
overbearing and obstinate as I remember.

資金繰りに関して腕があるのは確かだ。
協力出来る所はしていかねえとな。

engChrName: I'm glad to have reliable allies that can show us the way through this debacle.
engSearchText:
I'm glad to have reliable allies that can show us the
way through this debacle.
jpnChrName: 頼もしい方々がいて下さったおかげで 突破口は見えてきました。
jpnSearchText:
頼もしい方々がいて下さったおかげで
突破口は見えてきました。

engChrName: All of this was possible due to the bonds you forged.
engSearchText: All of this was possible due to the bonds you forged.
jpnChrName: それもこれも、貴方が紡いできた絆があればこそ……
jpnSearchText: それもこれも、貴方が紡いできた絆があればこそ……

engChrName: We will open a path for you. Make any and all preparations you need.
engSearchText:
We will open a path for you. Make any and all
preparations you need.
jpnChrName: 皆さんの道を必ずや切り拓いてみせましょう。 どうか準備は万全になさってくださいね。
jpnSearchText:
皆さんの道を必ずや切り拓いてみせましょう。
どうか準備は万全になさってくださいね。

engChrName: And do come back safe. We'll be waiting for this fixer agency of yours to return.
engSearchText:
And do come back safe. We'll be waiting for this fixer
agency of yours to return.
jpnChrName: そして無事に帰って来て下さい──みなが 解決事務所の皆さんの帰りを待っているのですから。
jpnSearchText:
そして無事に帰って来て下さい──みなが
解決事務所の皆さんの帰りを待っているのですから。

engChrName: Of course. Thank you, Gran.
engSearchText: Of course. Thank you, Gran.
jpnChrName: うん……ありがとう博士（グランマ）。
jpnSearchText: うん……ありがとう博士（グランマ）。

engChrName: Don't worry. We'll take care of things.
engSearchText: Don't worry. We'll take care of things.
jpnChrName: ま、しっかりケジメをつけて来ますよ。
jpnSearchText: ま、しっかりケジメをつけて来ますよ。

engChrName: This Pandemonium's not just Almata's work. There's a lot more to it than we currently know.
engSearchText:
This Pandemonium's not just Almata's work.
There's a lot more to it than we currently know.
jpnChrName: アルマータによって引き起こされた“汎魔（パンデモニウム）化”ですが…… この状況には多方面からの思惑が感じられますね。
jpnSearchText:
アルマータによって引き起こされた“汎魔（パンデモニウム）化”ですが……
この状況には多方面からの思惑が感じられますね。

engChrName: Regardless of that, I think you and your team are just what we need to blaze a path through this nightmare and bring forth a new day, Van.
engSearchText:
Regardless of that, I think you and your team are just
what we need to blaze a path through this nightmare
and bring forth a new day, Van.
jpnChrName: ですが“悪夢”を切り拓く資格を持っているのは 恐らくヴァンさん、そして皆さんのみでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
ですが“悪夢”を切り拓く資格を持っているのは
恐らくヴァンさん、そして皆さんのみでしょう。

engChrName: I'll do whatever I can to assist you, of course. But please help Quatre.
engSearchText:
I'll do whatever I can to assist you, of course.
But please help Quatre.
jpnChrName: 私も出来る限り力添えさせて頂きます。 ──カトルの事をどうか頼みましたよ。
jpnSearchText:
私も出来る限り力添えさせて頂きます。
──カトルの事をどうか頼みましたよ。

engChrName: Of course! We'll be sure to save him!
engSearchText: Of course! We'll be sure to save him!
jpnChrName: はい、必ず助け出してみせます……！
jpnSearchText: はい、必ず助け出してみせます……！

engChrName: Solving the East's desertification is not something one can do alone. It'll require a lot of cooperation, from a lot of different parties.
engSearchText:
Solving the East's desertification is not something
one can do alone. It'll require a lot of cooperation,
from a lot of different parties.
jpnChrName: 東部の不毛化問題を本当の意味で解決する為には 多くの方の協力が不可欠です。
jpnSearchText:
東部の不毛化問題を本当の意味で解決する為には
多くの方の協力が不可欠です。

engChrName: It pleases me to see there's someone from my own generation I can count on.
engSearchText:
It pleases me to see there's someone from my own
generation I can count on.
jpnChrName: ふふ、頼れる同世代の方がいると心強いですね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、頼れる同世代の方がいると心強いですね。

engChrName: You're all on patrol, no? Good work, but be careful to not burn yourselves out.
engSearchText:
You're all on patrol, no? Good work, but be careful to
not burn yourselves out.
jpnChrName: それと、皆さんは街の巡回中でしたか。 頼もしい限りですがどうか無理はなさらずに。
jpnSearchText:
それと、皆さんは街の巡回中でしたか。
頼もしい限りですがどうか無理はなさらずに。

engChrName: Today's the day of the Revolution Festival. Rest and relaxation are just as important a part of working hard.
engSearchText:
Today's the day of the Revolution Festival. Rest and
relaxation are just as important a part of
working hard.
jpnChrName: 今日は折角の革命記念祭ですからね。 時には息抜きも大切かと思いますよ。
jpnSearchText:
今日は折角の革命記念祭ですからね。
時には息抜きも大切かと思いますよ。

engChrName: What is it? You need something from me?
engSearchText: What is it? You need something from me?
jpnChrName: どうした？　俺に用事か。
jpnSearchText: どうした？　俺に用事か。

engChrName: Yeah. Wanted you to check somethin' out.
engSearchText: Yeah. Wanted you to check somethin' out.
jpnChrName: 少し見て貰いたいモンがあってな。 博士もいるなら丁度よかったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
少し見て貰いたいモンがあってな。
博士もいるなら丁度よかったぜ。

engChrName: And what would that be?
engSearchText: And what would that be?
jpnChrName: ふふ、一体なんでしょう。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、一体なんでしょう。

engChrName: Van showed them the Onyx Steel.
engSearchText: Van showed them the Onyx Steel.
jpnChrName: ヴァンは二人に黒玉鋼を見せた。
jpnSearchText: ヴァンは二人に黒玉鋼を見せた。

engChrName: Color me surprised. This is some real Onyx Steel.
engSearchText: Color me surprised. This is some real Onyx Steel.
jpnChrName: 驚いた……こいつは黒玉鋼じゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: 驚いた……こいつは黒玉鋼じゃねえか。

engChrName: Quite a rare sight in the Republic.
engSearchText: Quite a rare sight in the Republic.
jpnChrName: 共和国で見つかるのは非常に稀……
jpnSearchText: 共和国で見つかるのは非常に稀……

engChrName: It's also known as Star Steel. It is a dangerously strong metal.
engSearchText:
It's also known as Star Steel. It is a dangerously
strong metal.
jpnChrName: 別名・星鋼とも呼ばれる、 脅威的な硬度を持つ鉱石ですね。
jpnSearchText:
別名・星鋼とも呼ばれる、
脅威的な硬度を持つ鉱石ですね。

engChrName: Being quite honest, I've never had the chance to see some in person before.
engSearchText:
Being quite honest, I've never had the chance to see
some in person before.
jpnChrName: 実際にこの目で見たのは初めてですが。
jpnSearchText: 実際にこの目で見たのは初めてですが。

engChrName: I thought if anyone might know about it, it would be either of you two. Professor. Supervisor.
engSearchText:
I thought if anyone might know about it, it would be
either of you two. Professor. Supervisor.
jpnChrName: 流石は博士に親方。 この鉱石のことをご存じなんですね。
jpnSearchText:
流石は博士に親方。
この鉱石のことをご存じなんですね。

engChrName: Even I have only seen it once before, when I was younger.
engSearchText:
Even I have only seen it once before, when I
was younger.
jpnChrName: つっても、俺も若い頃に一度見ただけだが。
jpnSearchText: つっても、俺も若い頃に一度見ただけだが。

engChrName: As I recall, only a precious few blacksmiths in the East were skilled enough to work with it.
engSearchText:
As I recall, only a precious few blacksmiths in the
East were skilled enough to work with it.
jpnChrName: そん時は確か、東方でも指折りの名工にしか 加工できないっつう話だったな。
jpnSearchText:
そん時は確か、東方でも指折りの名工にしか
加工できないっつう話だったな。

engChrName: Looking at it, though, this isn't just one thing. It's a Zemurian Ore alloy.
engSearchText:
Looking at it, though, this isn't just one thing. It's a
Zemurian Ore alloy.
jpnChrName: だが今なら分かるぜ……こいつは ゼムリア鉱を含んだ特殊な合金だってことがな。
jpnSearchText:
だが今なら分かるぜ……こいつは
ゼムリア鉱を含んだ特殊な合金だってことがな。

engChrName: Zemurian Ore? That rings a bell...
engSearchText: Zemurian Ore? That rings a bell...
jpnChrName: ゼムリア鉱……聞いたことはあるな。
jpnSearchText: ゼムリア鉱……聞いたことはあるな。

engChrName: Aren't the Empire's Divine Knights made from that stuff?
engSearchText:
Aren't the Empire's Divine Knights made from
that stuff?
jpnChrName: 確か帝国の《騎神》が そいつで出来てたんじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
確か帝国の《騎神》が
そいつで出来てたんじゃねえか。

engChrName: That they are.
engSearchText: That they are.
jpnChrName: ええ、その通りよ。
jpnSearchText: ええ、その通りよ。

engChrName: Incidentally, it was Albert who devised how to process Zemurian Ore.
engSearchText:
Incidentally, it was Albert who devised how to
process Zemurian Ore.
jpnChrName: ちなみにゼムリア鉱の加工法は アルバートが……
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにゼムリア鉱の加工法は
アルバートが……

engChrName: Following that, Gerhard established a means to process an alloy of it called Black Zemurian Ore.
engSearchText:
Following that, Gerhard established a means to
process an alloy of it called Black Zemurian Ore.
jpnChrName: その合金でもある黒ゼムリア鉱については ゲルハルトが加工法を確立しているわ。
jpnSearchText:
その合金でもある黒ゼムリア鉱については
ゲルハルトが加工法を確立しているわ。

engChrName: All three disciples sure get around, huh.
engSearchText: All three disciples sure get around, huh.
jpnChrName: って、おなじみ三高弟かよ。
jpnSearchText: って、おなじみ三高弟かよ。

engChrName: For their names to be spoken of, even in relation to this... They're amazing.
engSearchText:
For their names to be spoken of, even in relation
to this... They're amazing.
jpnChrName: ここでも名前が出てくるなんて…… つくづくすごい人たちだね。
jpnSearchText:
ここでも名前が出てくるなんて……
つくづくすごい人たちだね。

engChrName: Haha, that they are. They even manage to surprise me, on occasion.
engSearchText:
Haha, that they are. They even manage to surprise
me, on occasion.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そうね。 私も背筋が伸びる思いよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、そうね。
私も背筋が伸びる思いよ。

engChrName: This would be as hard to process—harder, even— than Black Zemurian Ore.
engSearchText:
This would be as hard to process—harder, even—
than Black Zemurian Ore.
jpnChrName: つうわけで、加工難易度は黒ゼムリア鉱に 匹敵するレベルかそれ以上ってとこだろうが……
jpnSearchText:
つうわけで、加工難易度は黒ゼムリア鉱に
匹敵するレベルかそれ以上ってとこだろうが……

engChrName: I have, however, studied the professors' ore processing methods. Given enough time, I might be able to make it happen.
engSearchText:
I have, however, studied the professors' ore
processing methods. Given enough time, I might be
able to make it happen.
jpnChrName: 博士たちが確立した加工法なら頭に入ってるからな。 俺なら黒玉鋼を扱うことができるはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
博士たちが確立した加工法なら頭に入ってるからな。
俺なら黒玉鋼を扱うことができるはずだ。

engChrName: Frankly, it's a good opportunity to test my skills. If you want me to make a weapon out of it, I'll do it. No charge.
engSearchText:
Frankly, it's a good opportunity to test my skills.
If you want me to make a weapon out of it, I'll do it.
No charge.
jpnChrName: ま、こちらとしてもいい機会だ。 武器を造るってんならタダで引き受けてやるよ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、こちらとしてもいい機会だ。
武器を造るってんならタダで引き受けてやるよ。

engChrName: Well, I ain't sayin' no to that.
engSearchText: Well, I ain't sayin' no to that.
jpnChrName: はは、そいつは助かるぜ。
jpnSearchText: はは、そいつは助かるぜ。

engChrName: Thank you very much, Supervisor.
engSearchText: Thank you very much, Supervisor.
jpnChrName: ありがとうございます、親方。
jpnSearchText: ありがとうございます、親方。

engChrName: Nothing to thank me for, lad.
engSearchText: Nothing to thank me for, lad.
jpnChrName: どうってことはねえ。
jpnSearchText: どうってことはねえ。

engChrName: Full disclosure, making weapons with this amount is only going to be enough to arm a single person.
engSearchText:
Full disclosure, making weapons with this amount is
only going to be enough to arm a single person.
jpnChrName: ちなみにこの量なら、一人分の メインパーツを造ってやれるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにこの量なら、一人分の
メインパーツを造ってやれるだろう。

engChrName: The bigger issue is figuring out a good space to work...
engSearchText:
The bigger issue is figuring out a good space
to work...
jpnChrName: 問題は作業場だが……
jpnSearchText: 問題は作業場だが……

engChrName: Maybe the workshop in Old Town? Doubt they'd turn me down if I said it was for Chief Engineer Giscard.
engSearchText:
Maybe the workshop in Old Town? Doubt they'd
turn me down if I said it was for Chief
Engineer Giscard.
jpnChrName: それなら旧市街の修理屋はどうだ。 親方の名前を出せば喜んで貸してくれんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
それなら旧市街の修理屋はどうだ。
親方の名前を出せば喜んで貸してくれんだろ。

engChrName: All right, then. I'll trust you.
engSearchText: All right, then. I'll trust you.
jpnChrName: ヘッ、なら手配は任せたぜ。
jpnSearchText: ヘッ、なら手配は任せたぜ。

engChrName: Once you've chosen who's getting what, come talk to me.
engSearchText:
Once you've chosen who's getting what, come talk
to me.
jpnChrName: 誰の武器にするか決まったら声をかけな。
jpnSearchText: 誰の武器にするか決まったら声をかけな。

engChrName: Got it.
engSearchText: Got it.
jpnChrName: 了解だ。
jpnSearchText: 了解だ。

engChrName: *sigh* Thank the Goddess I was doing business near the school. Brought some good stock with me when I booked it.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Thank the Goddess I was doing business near
the school. Brought some good stock with me when I
booked it.
jpnChrName: ふぅ～、学校の近くで営業していて幸いでした、 それなりに物を持って逃げ込めましたよー。
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ～、学校の近くで営業していて幸いでした、
それなりに物を持って逃げ込めましたよー。

engChrName: Things look like they're under control over here. They've got some kinda plan figured out, too.
engSearchText:
Things look like they're under control over here.
They've got some kinda plan figured out, too.
jpnChrName: まあ、この近辺は落ち着いて、何やら 作戦もあるとは聞きますけど……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、この近辺は落ち着いて、何やら
作戦もあるとは聞きますけど……

engChrName: Who knows how long that'll take, though. I'm happy to provide food while I'm here, as long as no one minds mantou.
engSearchText:
Who knows how long that'll take, though. I'm happy
to provide food while I'm here, as long as no one
minds mantou.
jpnChrName: いつまで立て籠るかもわかりませんしねー。 饅頭で良ければ、食料備蓄の足しになればー。
jpnSearchText:
いつまで立て籠るかもわかりませんしねー。
饅頭で良ければ、食料備蓄の足しになればー。

engChrName: I got sent here from Langport, but I'd rather be doing business there than here!
engSearchText:
I got sent here from Langport, but I'd rather be doing
business there than here!
jpnChrName: 煌都から出張でーす、本当はいつも通り 煌都でお仕事したかったですけどー。
jpnSearchText:
煌都から出張でーす、本当はいつも通り
煌都でお仕事したかったですけどー。

engChrName: But hey. The owner says 'bonus,' I say, 'how high,' you know?
engSearchText:
But hey. The owner says 'bonus,' I say, 'how high,'
you know?
jpnChrName: オーナーがボーナス弾んでくれると言うので、 頑張る事にしましたー。
jpnSearchText:
オーナーがボーナス弾んでくれると言うので、
頑張る事にしましたー。

engChrName: I get it, I totally do. The students love these mantou, so business is booming.
engSearchText:
I get it, I totally do. The students love these mantou,
so business is booming.
jpnChrName: いやー、でも確かにこれは儲かりそうですねー。 饅頭、学生さんに大人気ですー。
jpnSearchText:
いやー、でも確かにこれは儲かりそうですねー。
饅頭、学生さんに大人気ですー。

engChrName: Man, I'm still in shock. Speechless, and really scared. Basel was nothing.
engSearchText:
Man, I'm still in shock. Speechless, and really scared.
Basel was nothing.
jpnChrName: さっきは驚いたというか、流石に 怖かったよ……バーゼルの時の比じゃなくて……
jpnSearchText:
さっきは驚いたというか、流石に
怖かったよ……バーゼルの時の比じゃなくて……

engChrName: I gathered all I could and fled into the subway. But I probably would've been mincemeat if it hadn't been for that bracer.
engSearchText:
I gathered all I could and fled into the subway. But I
probably would've been mincemeat if it hadn't been
for that bracer.
jpnChrName: 持てる物を持ちだして、地下鉄に避難していたけど、 遊撃士の人が来てくれなかったら……
jpnSearchText:
持てる物を持ちだして、地下鉄に避難していたけど、
遊撃士の人が来てくれなかったら……

engChrName: I should probably be grateful that I'm neither frozen nor a dozen fleshy bits in some monster's mouth...
engSearchText:
I should probably be grateful that I'm neither frozen
nor a dozen fleshy bits in some monster's mouth...
jpnChrName: まあ、僕が“動ける”のも生きてここに来れたのも きっと縁なんだろうね……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、僕が“動ける”のも生きてここに来れたのも
きっと縁なんだろうね……

engChrName: Brought some food with me. Hope it'll help everyone relax a little.
engSearchText:
Brought some food with me. Hope it'll help everyone
relax a little.
jpnChrName: 最低限の食べ物は持ってこれたし、 せめて皆の休息に役立てればいいな。
jpnSearchText:
最低限の食べ物は持ってこれたし、
せめて皆の休息に役立てればいいな。

engChrName: Man, who knows what would've happened to me and the guy in the food truck if it hadn't been for that bracer.
engSearchText:
Man, who knows what would've happened to me and
the guy in the food truck if it hadn't been for
that bracer.
jpnChrName: いやぁ、あっちにいるキッチンカーの屋台の兄ちゃん 共々、遊撃士に助けられなきゃ危なかったですわ。
jpnSearchText:
いやぁ、あっちにいるキッチンカーの屋台の兄ちゃん
共々、遊撃士に助けられなきゃ危なかったですわ。

engChrName: Bracers are always on top of things. You can really count on them, wherever you are.
engSearchText:
Bracers are always on top of things. You can really
count on them, wherever you are.
jpnChrName: ほんと、遊撃士ってのはどこに行っても 頼りになるもんですなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
ほんと、遊撃士ってのはどこに行っても
頼りになるもんですなぁ。

engChrName: I heard that there's some kinda plan cooking? Even without that, a lot of people are still out there, fighting.
engSearchText:
I heard that there's some kinda plan cooking?
Even without that, a lot of people are still out
there, fighting.
jpnChrName: ところで、この後何やら作戦を行うとか、そうで なくとも戦っている人が大勢いるとの事で。
jpnSearchText:
ところで、この後何やら作戦を行うとか、そうで
なくとも戦っている人が大勢いるとの事で。

engChrName: I brought all the food I could fit in my bag. Maybe it'll help some folks get some energy back. We've got a tough road ahead.
engSearchText:
I brought all the food I could fit in my bag.
Maybe it'll help some folks get some energy back.
We've got a tough road ahead.
jpnChrName: 一応、鞄に入る分の食料は持って来やしたんで…… スタミナでも付けてもらえれば幸いですわ。
jpnSearchText:
一応、鞄に入る分の食料は持って来やしたんで……
スタミナでも付けてもらえれば幸いですわ。
……………………………………

engChrName: Well, that's another dead end for me.
engSearchText: Well, that's another dead end for me.
jpnChrName: ……このやり方も駄目、か。
jpnSearchText: ……このやり方も駄目、か。

engChrName: I guess going above board for this is going to keep getting me nowhere fast.
engSearchText:
I guess going above board for this is going to keep
getting me nowhere fast.
jpnChrName: やっぱり正規の検索方法だと 限界があるみたい……
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり正規の検索方法だと
限界があるみたい……

engChrName: *sigh* I think I'll have to take her advice after all.
engSearchText: *sigh* I think I'll have to take her advice after all.
jpnChrName: ………………はぁ、こうなったら 先輩のアドバイスに従うしか……
jpnSearchText:
………………はぁ、こうなったら
先輩のアドバイスに従うしか……

engChrName: As bad as I feel exploiting loopholes in the law...
engSearchText: As bad as I feel exploiting loopholes in the law...
jpnChrName: 導力ネット法の隙を突くやり方…… ………ううっ、後ろめたいけど………
jpnSearchText:
導力ネット法の隙を突くやり方……
………ううっ、後ろめたいけど………

engChrName: Bingo.
engSearchText: Bingo.
jpnSearchText: ───────見つけた。

engChrName: It was stolen from an antique shop in the capital last weekend? But because it could have been stolen goods, the shop never reported it...
engSearchText:
It was stolen from an antique shop in the capital
last weekend? But because it could have been stolen
goods, the shop never reported it...
jpnChrName: 先週末に首都某古物商から強奪……？ ……盗品の可能性もあるため届け出ず……
jpnSearchText:
先週末に首都某古物商から強奪……？
……盗品の可能性もあるため届け出ず……
………………………………………

engChrName: This has trouble written all over it.
engSearchText: This has trouble written all over it.
jpnChrName: これって…… 間違いなくトラブル、だよね。
jpnSearchText:
これって……
間違いなくトラブル、だよね。

engChrName: I have no idea if this person even exists, but let's plug in that code she gave me...
engSearchText:
I have no idea if this person even exists, but let's plug
in that code she gave me...
jpnChrName: ……いるかどうかも分からない人。 “合い言葉”は先輩の教えてくれた通り──
jpnSearchText:
……いるかどうかも分からない人。
“合い言葉”は先輩の教えてくれた通り──

engChrName: 4SPG/for SPRIGGAN
engSearchText: 4SPG/for SPRIGGAN
jpnChrName: ４ＳＰＧ／for SPRIGGAN
jpnSearchText: ４ＳＰＧ／for SPRIGGAN

engChrName: Oh! It worked after all.
engSearchText: Oh! It worked after all.
jpnChrName: ……っ………！ こっちも“本当”、だったみたい。
jpnSearchText:
……っ………！
こっちも“本当”、だったみたい。

engChrName: Arkride Solutions Office 5-21-3 #201, Eighth District
engSearchText:
Arkride Solutions Office
5-21-3 #201, Eighth District
jpnChrName: アークライド解決事務所 イーディス８区 ５丁目２１番地３ー２０１号
jpnSearchText:
アークライド解決事務所
イーディス８区 ５丁目２１番地３ー２０１号

engChrName: Aren't you going to say anything, Dad? Anything at all?
engSearchText:
Aren't you going to say anything, Dad? Anything
at all?
jpnChrName: ……お父さん、どうして── なんで何も言ってくれないんですか……？
jpnSearchText:
……お父さん、どうして──
なんで何も言ってくれないんですか……？

engChrName: You aren't going to tell me to give up my dangerous part-time job? Or not to go traveling without permission?
engSearchText:
You aren't going to tell me to give up my dangerous
part-time job? Or not to go traveling
without permission?
jpnChrName: 危険なアルバイトはやめろとか、 無断で地方に行ったりするなとか……！
jpnSearchText:
危険なアルバイトはやめろとか、
無断で地方に行ったりするなとか……！

engChrName: Your grades meet my expectations, your attendance is solid, and your lateness the other day was relatively minor.
engSearchText:
Your grades meet my expectations, your attendance is
solid, and your lateness the other day was
relatively minor.
jpnChrName: 成績も期待通り、出席日数も守っている。 先日の遅刻についても許容範囲だ。
jpnSearchText:
成績も期待通り、出席日数も守っている。
先日の遅刻についても許容範囲だ。

engChrName: Your reputation as part of the Student Council is also excellent. As far as the public eye is concerned, you're conducting yourself well.
engSearchText:
Your reputation as part of the Student Council is
also excellent. As far as the public eye is concerned,
you're conducting yourself well.
jpnChrName: 生徒会庶務としての評判もいい── 世間一般的にはよくやっているだろう。
jpnSearchText:
生徒会庶務としての評判もいい──
世間一般的にはよくやっているだろう。

engChrName: I see no reason to dictate what you do with your personal time.
engSearchText:
I see no reason to dictate what you do with your
personal time.
jpnChrName: その意味で“プライベート”にまで 口を出す必要は感じないというだけだ。
jpnSearchText:
その意味で“プライベート”にまで
口を出す必要は感じないというだけだ。
………っ………………

engChrName: I will ask but two things of you, Agnès.
engSearchText: I will ask but two things of you, Agnès.
jpnChrName: アニエス、お前に望むのは２つ。
jpnSearchText: アニエス、お前に望むのは２つ。

engChrName: One is to avoid causing any direct trouble for me. The other is to do nothing that would embarrass your mother.
engSearchText:
One is to avoid causing any direct trouble for me.
The other is to do nothing that would embarrass
your mother.
jpnChrName: 私を煩わせないこと──そして 母さんに恥じない行動を心がけること。
jpnSearchText:
私を煩わせないこと──そして
母さんに恥じない行動を心がけること。

engChrName: As long as you honor those two requests, your life is yours to live.
engSearchText:
As long as you honor those two requests, your life is
yours to live.
jpnChrName: それが守れるならば行動の制限はしない。
jpnSearchText: それが守れるならば行動の制限はしない。

engChrName: And...if you require assistance with anything, you know who to call. They will handle almost anything for you.
engSearchText:
And...if you require assistance with anything, you
know who to call. They will handle almost anything
for you.
jpnChrName: 困ったことがあれば彼らに言いなさい、 大抵は応えるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
困ったことがあれば彼らに言いなさい、
大抵は応えるだろう。

engChrName: They could probably spare you from needing to do that job of yours in the first place, even.
engSearchText:
They could probably spare you from needing to do
that job of yours in the first place, even.
jpnChrName: わざわざバイトをする “手間”も省けると思うがね──
jpnSearchText:
わざわざバイトをする
“手間”も省けると思うがね──

engChrName: On the morning of the second day of the five day weekend, Van contacted Nina to confirm that they would be accepting her request.
engSearchText:
On the morning of the second day of the five day
weekend, Van contacted Nina to confirm that they
would be accepting her request.
jpnChrName: ５連休の２日目──ヴァンは朝のうちに 正式に依頼を請けることをニナに連絡した。
jpnSearchText:
５連休の２日目──ヴァンは朝のうちに
正式に依頼を請けることをニナに連絡した。

engChrName: Their goal was to be in Tharbad in time for morning the next day, which would require setting off the night before.
engSearchText:
Their goal was to be in Tharbad in time for morning
the next day, which would require setting off the
night before.
jpnChrName: そして、翌日早くに現地入りするためには、 前日の“夜”に出発する必要があり……
jpnSearchText:
そして、翌日早くに現地入りするためには、
前日の“夜”に出発する必要があり……

engChrName: As such, they all had to rush to get ready for four days and three nights away from the office.
engSearchText:
As such, they all had to rush to get ready for four days
and three nights away from the office.
jpnChrName: 事務所の面々はそれぞれ、 三泊四日の旅の準備を済ませるのだった。
jpnSearchText:
事務所の面々はそれぞれ、
三泊四日の旅の準備を済ませるのだった。

engChrName: Capital of Calvard, Edith Fifth District, Auber
engSearchText:
Capital of Calvard, Edith
Fifth District, Auber
jpnChrName: 首都イーディス５区　オーベル地区
jpnSearchText: 首都イーディス５区　オーベル地区

engChrName: Aramis Academy
engSearchText: Aramis Academy
jpnChrName: アラミス高等学校
jpnSearchText: アラミス高等学校

engChrName: Class 1-A Sixth Period - History of the Republic
engSearchText: Class 1-A Sixth Period - History of the Republic
jpnChrName: １年Ａ組──６限目・共和国史
jpnSearchText: １年Ａ組──６限目・共和国史

engChrName: Roughly one hundred years ago, the Calvardian monarchy was approaching its breaking point.
engSearchText:
Roughly one hundred years ago, the Calvardian
monarchy was approaching its breaking point.
jpnChrName: ──およそ百年前、カルバードの王政は もはや限界を迎えつつあった。
jpnSearchText:
──およそ百年前、カルバードの王政は
もはや限界を迎えつつあった。

engChrName: Outside of Calvard, the vast empire in East Zemuria had fallen, and the Empire had annexed Crossbell for the umpteenth time.
engSearchText:
Outside of Calvard, the vast empire in East Zemuria
had fallen, and the Empire had annexed Crossbell for
the umpteenth time.
jpnChrName: 大陸東部の巨大皇国の崩壊と衰退── そして帝国による何度目かのクロスベル併合。
jpnSearchText:
大陸東部の巨大皇国の崩壊と衰退──
そして帝国による何度目かのクロスベル併合。

engChrName: Meanwhile, at home, citizens were starving, and the aristocracy ruled with an iron fist, ignoring the people's suffering.
engSearchText:
Meanwhile, at home, citizens were starving, and the
aristocracy ruled with an iron fist, ignoring the
people's suffering.
jpnChrName: 更には大規模な飢饉も発生し、 貴族による圧政によって民が喘ぎ苦しむ中……
jpnSearchText:
更には大規模な飢饉も発生し、
貴族による圧政によって民が喘ぎ苦しむ中……

engChrName: This led to a group of unlikely heroes standing up to fight against injustice—led by Sheena Dirke, a firebrand student.
engSearchText:
This led to a group of unlikely heroes standing up to
fight against injustice—led by Sheena Dirke, a
firebrand student.
jpnChrName: 立ち上がったのは当時の王立大学に在籍していた 《シーナ・ディルク》と、その盟友たちだった。
jpnSearchText:
立ち上がったのは当時の王立大学に在籍していた
《シーナ・ディルク》と、その盟友たちだった。

engChrName: At the time, few were willing to lend an ear to the seeming pipe-dream of democratic revolution that she spoke of.
engSearchText:
At the time, few were willing to lend an ear to the
seeming pipe-dream of democratic revolution that
she spoke of.
jpnChrName: 当時幻想でしかなかった“民主革命”の理念──
jpnSearchText: 当時幻想でしかなかった“民主革命”の理念──

engChrName: But in due course, it began to resonate with the young in particular, and before long, she found herself leading a popular movement.
engSearchText:
But in due course, it began to resonate with the young
in particular, and before long, she found herself
leading a popular movement.
jpnChrName: それは若者を中心に人々を惹きつけ、 ムーブメントを巻き起こしたという。
jpnSearchText:
それは若者を中心に人々を惹きつけ、
ムーブメントを巻き起こしたという。

engChrName: The elites of the time fought hard to keep her movement at bay, causing many to lose their lives, and for Sheena herself to be locked away.
engSearchText:
The elites of the time fought hard to keep her
movement at bay, causing many to lose their lives,
and for Sheena herself to be locked away.
jpnChrName: 徹底的な弾圧によって多くの若者が犠牲となり、 彼女自身投獄されるなどの憂き目に遭いながら……
jpnSearchText:
徹底的な弾圧によって多くの若者が犠牲となり、
彼女自身投獄されるなどの憂き目に遭いながら……

engChrName: But they could not stop the 'movement' from becoming a Revolutionary Army with Dirke as its symbol. It was this army that toppled the kingdom.
engSearchText:
But they could not stop the 'movement' from
becoming a Revolutionary Army with Dirke as
its symbol. It was this army that toppled the kingdom.
jpnChrName: やがてシーナは、自ら革命解放軍の旗印となり、 旧王制を打ち倒すことに成功した。
jpnSearchText:
やがてシーナは、自ら革命解放軍の旗印となり、
旧王制を打ち倒すことに成功した。

engChrName: Even then, she still had the betrayal of her friend— Auguste the philosopher—and the invasion of the Empire's provincial armies to contend with...
engSearchText:
Even then, she still had the betrayal of her friend—
Auguste the philosopher—and the invasion of the
Empire's provincial armies to contend with...
jpnChrName: 盟友であった思想家オーギュストの独裁や 帝国の貴族領邦軍による侵攻なども乗り越え……
jpnSearchText:
盟友であった思想家オーギュストの独裁や
帝国の貴族領邦軍による侵攻なども乗り越え……

engChrName: But in the end, Sheena Dirke went on to become Calvard's first president and achieved a great many things during her time in power.
engSearchText:
But in the end, Sheena Dirke went on to become
Calvard's first president and achieved a great many
things during her time in power.
jpnChrName: シーナ・ディルクは《カルバード共和国》の 初代首班に就任、その後も多くの偉業を成し遂げる。
jpnSearchText:
シーナ・ディルクは《カルバード共和国》の
初代首班に就任、その後も多くの偉業を成し遂げる。

engChrName: Ms. Claudel, could you give us an example or two?
engSearchText: Ms. Claudel, could you give us an example or two?
jpnChrName: 中でも代表的なものは──クローデル君。
jpnSearchText: 中でも代表的なものは──クローデル君。

engChrName: Of course!
engSearchText: Of course!
jpnChrName: はい……！
jpnSearchText: はい……！

engChrName: Her most well-known achievements are the Calvardian Constitution, which guides us to this day, and Edith's designation as our capital.
engSearchText:
Her most well-known achievements are the
Calvardian Constitution, which guides us to this day, and
Edith's designation as our capital.
jpnChrName: まずは現代に続く《共和国憲章》の宣言、 そしてイーディスへの遷都が浮かびますが……
jpnSearchText:
まずは現代に続く《共和国憲章》の宣言、
そしてイーディスへの遷都が浮かびますが……

engChrName: However, I think that the founding of this very academy also deserves a special mention.
engSearchText:
However, I think that the founding of this very
academy also deserves a special mention.
jpnChrName: この《アラミス高等学校》の創設と 経緯についても注目したいです。
jpnSearchText:
この《アラミス高等学校》の創設と
経緯についても注目したいです。

engChrName: The opinions of a great many thinkers, including her comrade, the artist Aramis, were reflected in its creation...
engSearchText:
The opinions of a great many thinkers, including her
comrade, the artist Aramis, were reflected in
its creation...
jpnChrName: 彼女の同志である芸術家アラミスを始めとする 多くの意見を取り入れたのはもちろん……
jpnSearchText:
彼女の同志である芸術家アラミスを始めとする
多くの意見を取り入れたのはもちろん……

engChrName: ...but even the royal academy in neighboring Liberl, and a military academy in Erebonia—our enemies at the time—served as inspirations.
engSearchText:
...but even the royal academy in neighboring Liberl,
and a military academy in Erebonia—our enemies at
the time—served as inspirations.
jpnChrName: 隣国リベールの王立学校だけでなく、 敵国だった帝国の士官学校まで参考にしたとか。
jpnSearchText:
隣国リベールの王立学校だけでなく、
敵国だった帝国の士官学校まで参考にしたとか。

engChrName: Aramis was founded to be a place where people of all races, nationalities, and beliefs could come together for the benefit of all...
engSearchText:
Aramis was founded to be a place where people of all
races, nationalities, and beliefs could come together
for the benefit of all...
jpnChrName: 人種や国境、主義や思想の隔たりなく多くを取り入れ、 “より良い物”へと昇華していく……
jpnSearchText:
人種や国境、主義や思想の隔たりなく多くを取り入れ、
“より良い物”へと昇華していく……

engChrName: ...and I believe that as a result, it is a perfect embodiment of the ideals upon which our Republic was established.
engSearchText:
...and I believe that as a result, it is a perfect
embodiment of the ideals upon which our Republic
was established.
jpnChrName: 共和国となったカルバードを体現した 重要な功績の一つだったと思います。
jpnSearchText:
共和国となったカルバードを体現した
重要な功績の一つだったと思います。

engChrName: Quite so. Among her accomplishments, that one is especially pivotal.
engSearchText:
Quite so. Among her accomplishments, that one is
especially pivotal.
jpnChrName: よろしい、彼女を語る上で外せない要素だろう。
jpnSearchText: よろしい、彼女を語る上で外せない要素だろう。

engChrName: Aramis became the first head of this academy, and the influence his works had on the field of art cannot be—
engSearchText:
Aramis became the first head of this academy, and
the influence his works had on the field of art cannot
be—
jpnChrName: さて、我が校の初代学長でもあるアラミスだが、 彼の作品は芸術史にも多大な影響を──
jpnSearchText:
さて、我が校の初代学長でもあるアラミスだが、
彼の作品は芸術史にも多大な影響を──

engChrName: (Boy, Agnès is so smart!)
engSearchText: (Boy, Agnès is so smart!)
jpnChrName: （今日もイケてんなぁ～、アニエスちゃんは！）
jpnSearchText: （今日もイケてんなぁ～、アニエスちゃんは！）

engChrName: (She's so pretty, too...)
engSearchText: (She's so pretty, too...)
jpnChrName: （うーん、相変わらず絵になるなぁ……）
jpnSearchText: （うーん、相変わらず絵になるなぁ……）

engChrName: (Talk about stiff competition, huh?)
engSearchText: (Talk about stiff competition, huh?)
jpnChrName: （いや～、ライバルが多そうだねぇ。）
jpnSearchText: （いや～、ライバルが多そうだねぇ。）

engChrName: (Sh-Shush! Pay attention to the lesson!)
engSearchText: (Sh-Shush! Pay attention to the lesson!)
jpnChrName: （う、うるさいっ、授業に集中しろ。）
jpnSearchText: （う、うるさいっ、授業に集中しろ。）

engChrName: Homeroom — After Class
engSearchText: Homeroom — After Class
jpnChrName: 放課後──ホームルーム
jpnSearchText: 放課後──ホームルーム

engChrName: Now, as I'm sure you're aware, next week marks the beginning of your educational visitations.
engSearchText:
Now, as I'm sure you're aware, next week marks the
beginning of your educational visitations.
jpnChrName: えー、いよいよ来週には “視察研修”が迫っているが……
jpnSearchText:
えー、いよいよ来週には
“視察研修”が迫っているが……

engChrName: However, there are still a few of you who haven't chosen where they want to go.
engSearchText:
However, there are still a few of you who haven't
chosen where they want to go.
jpnChrName: まだ行き先を選択してない者も 数名いるようだね。
jpnSearchText:
まだ行き先を選択してない者も
数名いるようだね。

engChrName: Much like the school festival in April, this is a test of what you can do independently.
engSearchText:
Much like the school festival in April, this is a test of
what you can do independently.
jpnChrName: ４月にあった《学藝祭》と同じく、 生徒の自主性に任されたカリキュラムだ。
jpnSearchText:
４月にあった《学藝祭》と同じく、
生徒の自主性に任されたカリキュラムだ。

engChrName: You'll need to book your own lodgings as well, so I expect these last few submissions by the start of next week.
engSearchText:
You'll need to book your own lodgings as well, so I
expect these last few submissions by the start of
next week.
jpnChrName: 宿泊先の予約もあるから 週明けまでには届けを出すように。
jpnSearchText:
宿泊先の予約もあるから
週明けまでには届けを出すように。

engChrName: That will be all. If you would, Class Representative?
engSearchText: That will be all. If you would, Class Representative?
jpnChrName: それじゃあ、学級委員。
jpnSearchText: それじゃあ、学級委員。

engChrName: Yes, sir.
engSearchText: Yes, sir.
jpnChrName: はい。
jpnSearchText: はい。

engChrName: Stand. Bow.
engSearchText: Stand. Bow.
jpnChrName: 起立──礼。
jpnSearchText: 起立──礼。

engChrName: I know it's out of the country, but Crossbell's a top contender for sure!
engSearchText:
I know it's out of the country, but Crossbell's a top
contender for sure!
jpnChrName: やっぱ外国だけど 大本命はクロスベルだろ！
jpnSearchText:
やっぱ外国だけど
大本命はクロスベルだろ！

engChrName: Yeah! I'm dying to see Arc en Ciel in person!
engSearchText: Yeah! I'm dying to see Arc en Ciel in person!
jpnChrName: うんうん、あの《アルカンシェル》も 見てみたいもんねー！
jpnSearchText:
うんうん、あの《アルカンシェル》も
見てみたいもんねー！

engChrName: I'm interested in Crossbell, too, but I want to visit somewhere quintessentially Calvardian this time.
engSearchText:
I'm interested in Crossbell, too, but I want to visit
somewhere quintessentially Calvardian this time.
jpnChrName: ふむ、確かに気になりますけど できれば共和国ならではの場所が……
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、確かに気になりますけど
できれば共和国ならではの場所が……

engChrName: Oración looks so pretty! I can't wait!
engSearchText: Oración looks so pretty! I can't wait!
jpnChrName: オラシオンとか絶対綺麗だよね～。 ホント今から楽しみ！
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンとか絶対綺麗だよね～。
ホント今から楽しみ！

engChrName: Langport or Messeldam wouldn't be bad choices, either! I wanna go see the ocean!
engSearchText:
Langport or Messeldam wouldn't be bad
choices, either! I wanna go see the ocean!
jpnChrName: ラングポートかメッセルダムもいいよな！ 海とか見てみて～！
jpnSearchText:
ラングポートかメッセルダムもいいよな！
海とか見てみて～！

engChrName: I'm quite interested in Tharbad, too, especially after that film festival they just held.
engSearchText:
I'm quite interested in Tharbad, too, especially after
that film festival they just held.
jpnChrName: うーん、映画祭もあったし サルバッドも気になってるんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、映画祭もあったし
サルバッドも気になってるんだけど……

engChrName: So, what's eating away at you?
engSearchText: So, what's eating away at you?
jpnChrName: それで、何を悩んでるの？
jpnSearchText: それで、何を悩んでるの？

engChrName: Umm... What do you mean?
engSearchText: Umm... What do you mean?
jpnChrName: え、えっと…… 別に悩んだりはしてないけど。
jpnSearchText:
え、えっと……
別に悩んだりはしてないけど。

engChrName: We're talking about where you want to visit, of course.
engSearchText:
We're talking about where you want to visit,
of course.
jpnChrName: アラミス１、２年次の独自カリキュラム、 『視察研修』──
jpnSearchText:
アラミス１、２年次の独自カリキュラム、
『視察研修』──

engChrName: Admittedly, the whole thing isn't a compulsory part of our curriculum, so any first or second year can choose not to go...
engSearchText:
Admittedly, the whole thing isn't a compulsory part
of our curriculum, so any first or second year can
choose not to go...
jpnChrName: まあ、あくまで選択制だから あえて行かない生徒もいるみたいだが。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、あくまで選択制だから
あえて行かない生徒もいるみたいだが。

engChrName: ...but you're not seriously considering passing it up, are you?
engSearchText:
...but you're not seriously considering passing it up,
are you?
jpnChrName: まさか……行くかどうか迷っているのか？
jpnSearchText: まさか……行くかどうか迷っているのか？

engChrName: Ahaha... Was I that easy to read?
engSearchText: Ahaha... Was I that easy to read?
jpnChrName: あはは……２人にはお見通しですね。
jpnSearchText: あはは……２人にはお見通しですね。

engChrName: Well, you both already know about my circumstances, and I suppose they're not worth hiding to begin with, but...
engSearchText:
Well, you both already know about my circumstances,
and I suppose they're not worth hiding to begin
with, but...
jpnChrName: その、もう知られてますし 隠すまでもないことですけど……
jpnSearchText:
その、もう知られてますし
隠すまでもないことですけど……

engChrName: ...I still don't know whether my job will need us to go anywhere, so I'm waiting until the last minute to decide.
engSearchText:
...I still don't know whether my job will need us to go
anywhere, so I'm waiting until the last minute
to decide.
jpnChrName: バイト先の状況もまだ分からないので ギリギリまでは考えようかなと。
jpnSearchText:
バイト先の状況もまだ分からないので
ギリギリまでは考えようかなと。

engChrName: I knew it... *sigh*
engSearchText: I knew it... *sigh*
jpnChrName: ……やっぱりか。
jpnSearchText: ……やっぱりか。

engChrName: You do seem to take a lot of business trips with that gig, huh?
engSearchText:
You do seem to take a lot of business trips with that
gig, huh?
jpnChrName: なんか出張とか多いみたいだしね～。
jpnSearchText: なんか出張とか多いみたいだしね～。

engChrName: They got another new face recently, though, right? That concierge-maid woman?
engSearchText:
They got another new face recently, though, right?
That concierge-maid woman?
jpnChrName: でも、新しい人も入ってきてるんでしょ？ サービスコンシェルジュ？さんだっけ。
jpnSearchText:
でも、新しい人も入ってきてるんでしょ？
サービスコンシェルジュ？さんだっけ。

engChrName: Oh! Or are you concerned she's going to get a lead on you? She IS supposed to be really pretty.
engSearchText:
Oh! Or are you concerned she's going to get a lead
on you? She IS supposed to be really pretty.
jpnChrName: あ、すっごい美人らしいから 後れをとりたくないのかな～？
jpnSearchText:
あ、すっごい美人らしいから
後れをとりたくないのかな～？

engChrName: Th-That's not the issue here.
engSearchText: Th-That's not the issue here.
jpnChrName: そ、そういうのじゃなくてっ。
jpnSearchText: そ、そういうのじゃなくてっ。

engChrName: Heehee. Sounds like someone's having fun in here.
engSearchText: Heehee. Sounds like someone's having fun in here.
jpnChrName: ふふ、盛り上がってるみたいね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、盛り上がってるみたいね。

engChrName: Oh! Renne!
engSearchText: Oh! Renne!
jpnChrName: あ、レン先輩！
jpnSearchText: あ、レン先輩！

engChrName: Phew... Good afternoon.
engSearchText: Phew... Good afternoon.
jpnChrName: ふう……お疲れ様です。
jpnSearchText: ふう……お疲れ様です。

engChrName: The same to you.
engSearchText: The same to you.
jpnChrName: ええ、今日もよろしく。
jpnSearchText: ええ、今日もよろしく。

engChrName: I'll be doing a bit of visitation-ing myself, incidentally, since I enrolled this year.
engSearchText:
I'll be doing a bit of visitation-ing myself,
incidentally, since I enrolled this year.
jpnChrName: ちなみに私も今年編入だから 視察研修には行くつもりでね。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに私も今年編入だから
視察研修には行くつもりでね。

engChrName: If we end up going to the same place, I'll do what I can to help with your lodgings.
engSearchText:
If we end up going to the same place, I'll do what I
can to help with your lodgings.
jpnChrName: もし、同じ行き先だった場合、 宿の手配の融通は利かせてあげるわ。
jpnSearchText:
もし、同じ行き先だった場合、
宿の手配の融通は利かせてあげるわ。

engChrName: By the way, I think it's fine to leave your decision until the last minute if you're that concerned about your work-school balance. ❤
engSearchText:
By the way, I think it's fine to leave your decision
until the last minute if you're that concerned about
your work-school balance. ❤
jpnChrName: ギリギリまで迷ってもいいわよ？ バイト先との兼ね合いを考えたいなら❤
jpnSearchText:
ギリギリまで迷ってもいいわよ？
バイト先との兼ね合いを考えたいなら❤

engChrName: *sigh* You're teasing me again, aren't you? Still, I appreciate you saying so.
engSearchText:
*sigh* You're teasing me again, aren't you? Still, I
appreciate you saying so.
jpnChrName: もう…… でもありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText:
もう……
でもありがとうございます。

engChrName: Well, either way, I'd way rather stick with you, Agnès.
engSearchText:
Well, either way, I'd way rather stick with
you, Agnès.
jpnChrName: うーん、でもやっぱりあたしは アニエスと一緒がいいかなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、でもやっぱりあたしは
アニエスと一緒がいいかなぁ。

engChrName: That's why you haven't picked either, right, Albert?
engSearchText: That's why you haven't picked either, right, Albert?
jpnChrName: だからアルベールも まだ決めてないんだよね～？
jpnSearchText:
だからアルベールも
まだ決めてないんだよね～？

engChrName: I-I just don't want to rush into a decision.
engSearchText: I-I just don't want to rush into a decision.
jpnChrName: し、慎重に考えてるだけだっ。
jpnSearchText: し、慎重に考えてるだけだっ。

engChrName: Where are YOU planning on going, anyway? Crossbell like so many others?
engSearchText:
Where are YOU planning on going, anyway?
Crossbell like so many others?
jpnChrName: ちなみにブライト先輩はどちらに…… やっぱり人気のクロスベルですか？
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにブライト先輩はどちらに……
やっぱり人気のクロスベルですか？

engChrName: Actually, I know...a few too many people there for that to be a good choice.
engSearchText:
Actually, I know...a few too many people there for
that to be a good choice.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そこは馴染みがあるし 知り合いも多いから逆に外すつもりよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、そこは馴染みがあるし
知り合いも多いから逆に外すつもりよ。

engChrName: I've visited Langport and Oración plenty, too, and Tharbad isn't quite as enticing with the festival over...
engSearchText:
I've visited Langport and Oración plenty, too, and
Tharbad isn't quite as enticing with the festival over...
jpnChrName: かといって煌都や古都にも何回か行ってるし、 サルバッドも映画祭が終わっちゃったし……
jpnSearchText:
かといって煌都や古都にも何回か行ってるし、
サルバッドも映画祭が終わっちゃったし……

engChrName: (I really wonder about her sometimes...)
engSearchText: (I really wonder about her sometimes...)
jpnChrName: （うーん、先輩って一体……）
jpnSearchText: （うーん、先輩って一体……）

engChrName: (She's just one big mystery...)
engSearchText: (She's just one big mystery...)
jpnChrName: （相変わらず謎の多い人だな……）
jpnSearchText: （相変わらず謎の多い人だな……）

engChrName: No, I've made my mind up to go somewhere else entirely.
engSearchText:
No, I've made my mind up to go somewhere
else entirely.
jpnChrName: だから──“あの街”に 改めて行きたいと思っているわ。
jpnSearchText:
だから──“あの街”に
改めて行きたいと思っているわ。

engChrName: A city that's like no other for experiencing both Calvard's history and its innovation, filled with wisdom and technology.
engSearchText:
A city that's like no other for experiencing both
Calvard's history and its innovation, filled with
wisdom and technology.
jpnChrName: カルバードの学問と技術の粋を集めた 歴史と革新に触れられる唯一無二の都市。
jpnSearchText:
カルバードの学問と技術の粋を集めた
歴史と革新に触れられる唯一無二の都市。

engChrName: A place where you can see the future of the Xipha standard, the orbal network, and so much more. ♪
engSearchText:
A place where you can see the future of the Xipha
standard, the orbal network, and so much more. ♪
jpnChrName: ザイファ規格に導力ネットワーク、 それ以外も含めて見所満載でしょうし♪
jpnSearchText:
ザイファ規格に導力ネットワーク、
それ以外も含めて見所満載でしょうし♪

engChrName: Oh!
engSearchText: Oh!

engChrName: You mean...
engSearchText: You mean...
jpnChrName: それって───
jpnSearchText: それって───

engChrName: Roughly 2 hours prior...
engSearchText: Roughly 2 hours prior...
jpnChrName: ２時間ほど前──
jpnSearchText: ２時間ほど前──

engChrName: October 18th, 8:50PM
engSearchText: October 18th, 8:50PM

engChrName: Whew. That was another close one. But it looks like I've made it in time for curfew...just.
engSearchText:
Whew. That was another close one. But it looks like
I've made it in time for curfew...just.
jpnChrName: ふう、またギリギリになっちゃった。 何とか門限には間に合ったかな……？
jpnSearchText:
ふう、またギリギリになっちゃった。
何とか門限には間に合ったかな……？

engChrName: I'll have to try and get back to my room without running into the dorm mother.
engSearchText:
I'll have to try and get back to my room without
running into the dorm mother.
jpnChrName: えっと、寮母さんと鉢合わせないよう タイミングを見計らって……
jpnSearchText:
えっと、寮母さんと鉢合わせないよう
タイミングを見計らって……

engChrName: *sigh* I think Van is proving a bad influence on me...
engSearchText: *sigh* I think Van is proving a bad influence on me...
jpnChrName: ……ううっ、ヴァンさんの 影響を受けちゃっているような……
jpnSearchText:
……ううっ、ヴァンさんの
影響を受けちゃっているような……

engChrName: (I need to keep living my own life and making my own decisions—not letting others make them for me.)
engSearchText:
(I need to keep living my own life and making my
own decisions—not letting others make them
for me.)
jpnChrName: （……頑張らないと。   誰に流されるでもなく私の意志で。）
jpnSearchText:
（……頑張らないと。
誰に流されるでもなく私の意志で。）

engChrName: (If I do...)
engSearchText: (If I do...)
jpnChrName: （そうすれば、きっと──）
jpnSearchText: （そうすれば、きっと──）

engChrName: I trust you've made up your mind?
engSearchText: I trust you've made up your mind?
jpnChrName: ──“返事”は決まったようですね？
jpnSearchText: ──“返事”は決まったようですね？

engChrName: Yes. I imagine Van will be contacting you with our answer soon.
engSearchText:
Yes. I imagine Van will be contacting you with our
answer soon.
jpnChrName: ……はい、ヴァンさんからも 改めて連絡があるかと思います。
jpnSearchText:
……はい、ヴァンさんからも
改めて連絡があるかと思います。

engChrName: Excellent. Where you'll be going for your educational visitation is also decided, then?
engSearchText:
Excellent. Where you'll be going for your
educational visitation is also decided, then?
jpnChrName: それは結構── では研修先も決まりですか。
jpnSearchText:
それは結構──
では研修先も決まりですか。

engChrName: ...Nothing gets past you, does it?
engSearchText: ...Nothing gets past you, does it?
jpnChrName: ……っ…… 全てお見通しだったんですね……
jpnSearchText:
……っ……
全てお見通しだったんですね……

engChrName: Just how much does he...does Dad know?
engSearchText: Just how much does he...does Dad know?
jpnChrName: あの人は──父はどこまで……？
jpnSearchText: あの人は──父はどこまで……？

engChrName: Not just in general...but about the Blacklight District, too.
engSearchText:
Not just in general...but about the Blacklight
District, too.
jpnChrName: それにあの場所…… 《黒芒街》という所の在り方も──
jpnSearchText:
それにあの場所……
《黒芒街》という所の在り方も──

engChrName: Reports are regularly given to him on pertinent developments—and I have every reason to believe he reads them.
engSearchText:
Reports are regularly given to him on pertinent
developments—and I have every reason to believe he
reads them.
jpnChrName: 報告書は都度お渡ししています。 一応、目は通されているようですよ？
jpnSearchText:
報告書は都度お渡ししています。
一応、目は通されているようですよ？

engChrName: As for the place you reference... Haha. I will refrain from commenting there.
engSearchText:
As for the place you reference... Haha. I will refrain
from commenting there.
jpnChrName: あの場所については── フフ、まあ差し控えておきましょう。
jpnSearchText:
あの場所については──
フフ、まあ差し控えておきましょう。

engChrName: ...Everything is being done with Dad's approval, isn't it?
engSearchText:
...Everything is being done with Dad's approval,
isn't it?
jpnChrName: ……やっぱり、父の采配なんですね。
jpnSearchText: ……やっぱり、父の采配なんですね。

engChrName: That place is meant to serve as somewhere the overly ripened juices from the fruit of our unprecedented prosperity can pool and gel.
engSearchText:
That place is meant to serve as somewhere the overly
ripened juices from the fruit of our unprecedented
prosperity can pool and gel.
jpnChrName: かつてない繁栄の果実の、 熟れすぎた滴りを受け止める器……
jpnSearchText:
かつてない繁栄の果実の、
熟れすぎた滴りを受け止める器……

engChrName: A place where the malice and desires of a certain subset of the population can be isolated and effectively controlled.
engSearchText:
A place where the malice and desires of a certain
subset of the population can be isolated and
effectively controlled.
jpnChrName: 群がる欲望や悪意を隔離して 効果的にコントロールするための……
jpnSearchText:
群がる欲望や悪意を隔離して
効果的にコントロールするための……

engChrName: You truly are sharp—and from more than the influence of your new job. There is no resisting blood, I see.
engSearchText:
You truly are sharp—and from more than the
influence of your new job. There is no resisting blood,
I see.
jpnChrName: バイト先の指南、だけではありませんか。 ……さすが血は争えませんね。
jpnSearchText:
バイト先の指南、だけではありませんか。
……さすが血は争えませんね。

engChrName: Perhaps you might even consider following the path of the MacDowell family's young scion?
engSearchText:
Perhaps you might even consider following the path
of the MacDowell family's young scion?
jpnChrName: クロスベルのマクダエル家に倣うのも また一興なのでは？
jpnSearchText:
クロスベルのマクダエル家に倣うのも
また一興なのでは？

engChrName: ...Excuse me. Good night.
engSearchText: ...Excuse me. Good night.
jpnChrName: っ…… 失礼します、お休みなさい……！
jpnSearchText:
っ……
失礼します、お休みなさい……！

engChrName: Agnès! My goodness, do you realize how close you are to breaking curfew?!
engSearchText:
Agnès! My goodness, do you realize how close you
are to breaking curfew?!
jpnChrName: まあアニエスさん……！？ こんな時間まで──門限ギリギリですよ！
jpnSearchText:
まあアニエスさん……！？
こんな時間まで──門限ギリギリですよ！

engChrName: I'm so sorry for being late!
engSearchText: I'm so sorry for being late!
jpnChrName: す、すみませんっ、遅くなってしまい……
jpnSearchText: す、すみませんっ、遅くなってしまい……

engChrName: Heh. Perhaps I pushed her a little far.
engSearchText: Heh. Perhaps I pushed her a little far.
jpnChrName: フフ、いじめすぎたか。
jpnSearchText: フフ、いじめすぎたか。

engChrName: It's a bad habit I have when it comes to Elaine, too— even if I'd still like to believe I'm better than he is.
engSearchText:
It's a bad habit I have when it comes to Elaine, too—
even if I'd still like to believe I'm better than he is.
jpnChrName: エレイン相手といい悪い癖だな…… まああの馬鹿よりはマシだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
エレイン相手といい悪い癖だな……
まああの馬鹿よりはマシだろうが。

engChrName: We won't be able to count on the guild this time. Hmm, I'll need another play.
engSearchText:
We won't be able to count on the guild this time.
Hmm, I'll need another play.
jpnChrName: 今回はギルドも当てにはできん。 ……やはり別の手も打っておくか。
jpnSearchText:
今回はギルドも当てにはできん。
……やはり別の手も打っておくか。

engChrName: *sigh* He really is a crafty one.
engSearchText: *sigh* He really is a crafty one.
jpnChrName: ……ふう、食えないお兄さんね。
jpnSearchText: ……ふう、食えないお兄さんね。

engChrName: But I suppose this is just a message from Aidios telling me to see what's going on for myself.
engSearchText:
But I suppose this is just a message from Aidios
telling me to see what's going on for myself.
jpnChrName: でも、これも女神の導きかしら？ そろそろ自分の目で確かめろっていう。
jpnSearchText:
でも、これも女神の導きかしら？
そろそろ自分の目で確かめろっていう。

engChrName: I'll also have to take charge of the younger students... Heehee. This is going to be busier than a simple tea party.
engSearchText:
I'll also have to take charge of the younger students...
Heehee. This is going to be busier than a simple
tea party.
jpnChrName: 後輩たちの引率もあるけど…… ふふ、お茶会以上に忙しくなりそうね。
jpnSearchText:
後輩たちの引率もあるけど……
ふふ、お茶会以上に忙しくなりそうね。

engChrName: They contacted the rest of their group and agreed to meet with them at the nearest subway station.
engSearchText:
They contacted the rest of their group and agreed to
meet with them at the nearest subway station.
jpnChrName: その後、待機組に連絡し 地下鉄駅で合流した後……
jpnSearchText:
その後、待機組に連絡し
地下鉄駅で合流した後……

engChrName: They then rode the train together to the Auber District.
engSearchText:
They then rode the train together to the
Auber District.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちはイーディス五区、 オーベル地区に到着するのだった。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちはイーディス五区、
オーベル地区に到着するのだった。

engChrName: Capital of Calvard, Edith Fifth District, Auber
engSearchText:
Capital of Calvard, Edith
Fifth District, Auber
jpnChrName: 首都イーディス五区 オーベル地区
jpnSearchText:
首都イーディス五区
オーベル地区

engChrName: Whoa! That cathedral is huge!
engSearchText: Whoa! That cathedral is huge!
jpnChrName: わあっ……大きな聖堂ですねぇ。
jpnSearchText: わあっ……大きな聖堂ですねぇ。

engChrName: That's Edith Cathedral. It's the second largest cathedral in all of Calvard.
engSearchText:
That's Edith Cathedral. It's the second largest
cathedral in all of Calvard.
jpnChrName: イーディス大聖堂、ですね。 共和国で二番目に大きい聖堂です。
jpnSearchText:
イーディス大聖堂、ですね。
共和国で二番目に大きい聖堂です。

engChrName: The biggest one's up north, right? Wait—
engSearchText: The biggest one's up north, right? Wait—
jpnChrName: 確か一番は北にあるアレだったな。 っと──
jpnSearchText:
確か一番は北にあるアレだったな。
っと──

engChrName: They're all wearing the same uniform as Agnès! Is that your school?
engSearchText:
They're all wearing the same uniform as Agnès!
Is that your school?
jpnChrName: アニエスさんの制服と同じ…… わぁ、もしかしてそちらが！
jpnSearchText:
アニエスさんの制服と同じ……
わぁ、もしかしてそちらが！

engChrName: Heehee. That it is. That's Aramis Academy.
engSearchText: Heehee. That it is. That's Aramis Academy.
jpnChrName: ふふ、はい──私の通っている アラミス高等学校になりますね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、はい──私の通っている
アラミス高等学校になりますね。

engChrName: I've never experienced the whole 'school life' thing, so I'm kind of jealous that you get to.
engSearchText:
I've never experienced the whole 'school life' thing, so
I'm kind of jealous that you get to.
jpnChrName: 学校生活か……うーん、 ちょっと憧れるものがあるわねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
学校生活か……うーん、
ちょっと憧れるものがあるわねぇ。

engChrName: It's a really famous school, too. I considered applying myself at one point.
engSearchText:
It's a really famous school, too. I considered applying
myself at one point.
jpnChrName: しかも有名な名門校だよね。 以前、受験も検討したけど……
jpnSearchText:
しかも有名な名門校だよね。
以前、受験も検討したけど……

engChrName: Heh. If there are any more out of this world students like that purple-haired chick, I bet it'd be a fun time.
engSearchText:
Heh. If there are any more out of this world students
like that purple-haired chick, I bet it'd be a fun time.
jpnChrName: ハン、オメーの先輩みてぇな ヤバイのがいるなら楽しそうだが。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、オメーの先輩みてぇな
ヤバイのがいるなら楽しそうだが。

engChrName: Renne is a rather special case, I'm afraid...
engSearchText: Renne is a rather special case, I'm afraid...
jpnChrName: まあ、あの人は流石に規格外かと……
jpnSearchText: まあ、あの人は流石に規格外かと……

engChrName: I also suspect our math and science curriculums would be too easy for someone who helps out at the Institute of Science like you, Quatre.
engSearchText:
I also suspect our math and science curriculums would
be too easy for someone who helps out at the Institute
of Science like you, Quatre.
jpnChrName: 授業も理数系だと、理科大学の助手をしている カトル君には物足りないでしょうし。
jpnSearchText:
授業も理数系だと、理科大学の助手をしている
カトル君には物足りないでしょうし。

engChrName: Let's switch our brains to work mode, people.
engSearchText: Let's switch our brains to work mode, people.
jpnChrName: ったく、和むのはいいが とりあえずお仕事に向かうぞ。
jpnSearchText:
ったく、和むのはいいが
とりあえずお仕事に向かうぞ。

engChrName: We can access the abandoned subway line from a side road next to the cathedral, correct?
engSearchText:
We can access the abandoned subway line from a side
road next to the cathedral, correct?
jpnChrName: 地下鉄廃路線……大聖堂横の 脇道に入口があるようですね？
jpnSearchText:
地下鉄廃路線……大聖堂横の
脇道に入口があるようですね？

engChrName: Yes, that's right. I'll show you the way.
engSearchText: Yes, that's right. I'll show you the way.
jpnChrName: はい、場所は分かります。 案内しますね。
jpnSearchText:
はい、場所は分かります。
案内しますね。

engChrName: That building further down the road is our dormitory—and this one next to us is a famous cake shop.
engSearchText:
That building further down the road is our
dormitory—and this one next to us is a famous
cake shop.
jpnChrName: 奥の建物が学生寮ですね。 その手前が有名なケーキ屋さんです。
jpnSearchText:
奥の建物が学生寮ですね。
その手前が有名なケーキ屋さんです。

engChrName: Yup. This is the famous Andalucía Pâtisserie.
engSearchText: Yup. This is the famous Andalucía Pâtisserie.
jpnChrName: パティスリー《アンダルシア》だな。
jpnSearchText: パティスリー《アンダルシア》だな。

engChrName: It's owned by a legendary pâtissier who's a master of his craft, and whose limited edition seasonal cakes are always the talk of the town—
engSearchText:
It's owned by a legendary pâtissier who's a master of
his craft, and whose limited edition seasonal cakes are
always the talk of the town—
jpnChrName: 熟練のパティシエが腕を振るっていて 季節の限定ケーキは毎度目眩くような──
jpnSearchText:
熟練のパティシエが腕を振るっていて
季節の限定ケーキは毎度目眩くような──

engChrName: Something something, work mode brains?
engSearchText: Something something, work mode brains?
jpnChrName: ったく、どっちが和んでんだか。
jpnSearchText: ったく、どっちが和んでんだか。

engChrName: The cakes you guys let me try have all been amazing, so I'm not surprised they're famous!
engSearchText:
The cakes you guys let me try have all been amazing,
so I'm not surprised they're famous!
jpnChrName: たまにお裾分けしてもらってますけど ホントーに絶品ですよねっ。
jpnSearchText:
たまにお裾分けしてもらってますけど
ホントーに絶品ですよねっ。

engChrName: Nina's bought me some stuff from there, too, and I couldn't agree more.
engSearchText:
Nina's bought me some stuff from there, too, and I
couldn't agree more.
jpnChrName: ああ、あたしも食べたことあるわね。 ニナの差し入れだったような……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、あたしも食べたことあるわね。
ニナの差し入れだったような……

engChrName: Perhaps we can treat ourselves to some cakes on our way back to the office when this task is complete.
engSearchText:
Perhaps we can treat ourselves to some cakes on our
way back to the office when this task is complete.
jpnChrName: ふふ、帰りに何か 買って帰ってもよさそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、帰りに何か
買って帰ってもよさそうですね。

engChrName: The day approached with much suspense both at home and abroad, for what was to come following a memorial service set for Creil...
engSearchText:
The day approached with much suspense both at
home and abroad, for what was to come following a
memorial service set for Creil...
jpnChrName: ……一方、革命記念祭でクレイユ村の 追悼式典が決まったことに加えて──
jpnSearchText:
……一方、革命記念祭でクレイユ村の
追悼式典が決まったことに加えて──

engChrName: ...was the unveiling of the Republican Army's next generation of weapons.
engSearchText:
...was the unveiling of the Republican Army's next
generation of weapons.
jpnChrName: 共和国軍の次世代兵装の披露も改めて発表され、 国内外の注目が否が応でも集まっていく。
jpnSearchText:
共和国軍の次世代兵装の披露も改めて発表され、
国内外の注目が否が応でも集まっていく。

engChrName: The air here is about as polluted as in the Seiden District.
engSearchText:
The air here is about as polluted as in the
Seiden District.
jpnChrName: こちらもサイデン地区と 同程度の瘴気の強さかと……！
jpnSearchText:
こちらもサイデン地区と
同程度の瘴気の強さかと……！

engChrName: Damn it. The next sphere's right on the grounds of Aramis, huh?
engSearchText:
Damn it. The next sphere's right on the grounds of
Aramis, huh?
jpnChrName: クソ、アラミスの敷地にか……！
jpnSearchText: クソ、アラミスの敷地にか……！

engChrName: There's a barrier standing between us and it, too!
engSearchText: There's a barrier standing between us and it, too!
jpnChrName: しかも校門の前に 《結界》が現れています……！
jpnSearchText:
しかも校門の前に
《結界》が現れています……！

engChrName: What, like two districts wasn't enough?!
engSearchText: What, like two districts wasn't enough?!
jpnChrName: チッ、タイレルとサイデンに 続いてかよ……！
jpnSearchText:
チッ、タイレルとサイデンに
続いてかよ……！

engChrName: Be on guard! We have company!
engSearchText: Be on guard! We have company!
jpnChrName: いかん──こちらだ！
jpnSearchText: いかん──こちらだ！

engChrName: What the—
engSearchText: What the—

engChrName: Two big ones! They're blocking our exit!
engSearchText: Two big ones! They're blocking our exit!
jpnChrName: デカブツが２体── しかも退路を断ちやがったか！？
jpnSearchText:
デカブツが２体──
しかも退路を断ちやがったか！？

engChrName: Y-You don't think they were waiting to ambush us, do you?!
engSearchText:
Y-You don't think they were waiting to ambush us,
do you?!
jpnChrName: ま、まさかわたしたちを 待ち受けて……！？
jpnSearchText:
ま、まさかわたしたちを
待ち受けて……！？

engChrName: Aww, come on... Not more of these things.
engSearchText: Aww, come on... Not more of these things.
jpnChrName: オイオイ…… まだ出てやがるのかよ。
jpnSearchText:
オイオイ……
まだ出てやがるのかよ。

engChrName: It's like there's no end to them.
engSearchText: It's like there's no end to them.
jpnChrName: はい──これでは 切りがありませんね。
jpnSearchText:
はい──これでは
切りがありませんね。

engChrName: Farewell! Flying Swallow!
engSearchText: Farewell! Flying Swallow!
jpnChrName: さらばです──飛燕爪斬！！
jpnSearchText: さらばです──飛燕爪斬！！

engChrName: Let's do this, partner! HAAAH!
engSearchText: Let's do this, partner! HAAAH!
jpnChrName: 行くぜ相棒── だりゃあああっ！！
jpnSearchText:
行くぜ相棒──
だりゃあああっ！！

engChrName: HRAAAAAAH!
engSearchText: HRAAAAAAH!
jpnChrName: オラァアアアアアアッ……！！
jpnSearchText: オラァアアアアアアッ……！！

engChrName: Holy shit...
engSearchText: Holy shit...
jpnChrName: おいおい……
jpnSearchText: おいおい……

engChrName: Glad they're not here to fight us...
engSearchText: Glad they're not here to fight us...
jpnChrName: リーシャもそうだけど とんでもなさすぎでしょ……
jpnSearchText:
リーシャもそうだけど
とんでもなさすぎでしょ……

engChrName: I'm so glad to see you're all safe.
engSearchText: I'm so glad to see you're all safe.
jpnChrName: ふふ、無事でよかった。 ジュディスに裏解決屋の皆さんも。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、無事でよかった。
ジュディスに裏解決屋の皆さんも。

engChrName: Likewise—except I didn't think for a second that anything could threaten YOU.
engSearchText:
Likewise—except I didn't think for a second that
anything could threaten YOU.
jpnChrName: ま、流石あんたは 無事だとは思ってたけどね。
jpnSearchText:
ま、流石あんたは
無事だとは思ってたけどね。

engChrName: Leon told me you guys were bustin' your asses, and looks like he wasn't wrong.
engSearchText:
Leon told me you guys were bustin' your asses, and
looks like he wasn't wrong.
jpnChrName: はは、リオンのヤツから聞いたが バリバリ動いてるみたいじゃねぇか。
jpnSearchText:
はは、リオンのヤツから聞いたが
バリバリ動いてるみたいじゃねぇか。

engChrName: Not that you'd dream of slacking with our master breathin' down your neck.
engSearchText:
Not that you'd dream of slacking with our master
breathin' down your neck.
jpnChrName: ま、先生が付いてるなら当然だけどな。
jpnSearchText: ま、先生が付いてるなら当然だけどな。

engChrName: I am simply giving them a little moral support— nothing more.
engSearchText:
I am simply giving them a little moral support—
nothing more.
jpnChrName: フフ、あくまで ささやかな助力のみだが。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、あくまで
ささやかな助力のみだが。

engChrName: *sigh* Looks like you've already caught each other up on what's going on.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Looks like you've already caught each other up
on what's going on.
jpnChrName: ふう、どうやらある程度 情報は共有できてるようだが……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、どうやらある程度
情報は共有できてるようだが……

engChrName: Oh, by the way. You haven't seen Quatre, have you?
engSearchText: Oh, by the way. You haven't seen Quatre, have you?
jpnChrName: そういえばウチの事務所の カトルを見なかったか？
jpnSearchText:
そういえばウチの事務所の
カトルを見なかったか？

engChrName: I believe Elaine was in this area, too.
engSearchText: I believe Elaine was in this area, too.
jpnChrName: それにエレイン──《剣の乙女》が こちらに来ていた筈だが。
jpnSearchText:
それにエレイン──《剣の乙女》が
こちらに来ていた筈だが。

engChrName: N-Now that you mention it...
engSearchText: N-Now that you mention it...
jpnChrName: そ、そういえば……
jpnSearchText: そ、そういえば……

engChrName: She was with you in the pâtisserie, wasn't she?
engSearchText: She was with you in the pâtisserie, wasn't she?
jpnChrName: パティスリーでご一緒でしたね？
jpnSearchText: パティスリーでご一緒でしたね？

engChrName: I hear that she was with you in the pâtisserie before the crisis?
engSearchText:
I hear that she was with you in the pâtisserie before
the crisis?
jpnChrName: たしかパティスリーで ご一緒だったとか？
jpnSearchText:
たしかパティスリーで
ご一緒だったとか？

engChrName: Yeah. All this stuff went down just after we finished paying.
engSearchText:
Yeah. All this stuff went down just after we
finished paying.
jpnChrName: ああ、会計し終わったタイミングで あの異変が発生しやがってな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、会計し終わったタイミングで
あの異変が発生しやがってな。

engChrName: But she said she was leaving this district to us and ran off.
engSearchText:
But she said she was leaving this district to us and
ran off.
jpnChrName: この街区をアタシらに任せて あっという間に行っちまったんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
この街区をアタシらに任せて
あっという間に行っちまったんだよ。

engChrName: Nothin' catches Beauty's Blade off guard. Dunno where she went, though.
engSearchText:
Nothin' catches Beauty's Blade off guard.
Dunno where she went, though.
jpnChrName: 流石のフットワークっつーか…… 何処に向かったのかは分からねぇが。
jpnSearchText:
流石のフットワークっつーか……
何処に向かったのかは分からねぇが。

engChrName: Sounds about right...
engSearchText: Sounds about right...
jpnChrName: そうなのか……
jpnSearchText: そうなのか……

engChrName: I wonder where she could have gone?
engSearchText: I wonder where she could have gone?
jpnChrName: どちらに向かったんでしょう……？
jpnSearchText: どちらに向かったんでしょう……？

engChrName: I wish we knew where Quatre was, too.
engSearchText: I wish we knew where Quatre was, too.
jpnChrName: カトルさんは……変ですね。
jpnSearchText: カトルさんは……変ですね。

engChrName: We split up and searched for him after our enemy's last message, but he was nowhere to be found.
engSearchText:
We split up and searched for him after our enemy's
last message, but he was nowhere to be found.
jpnChrName: 先ほどの敵からの通信の後、 手分けして調べに出たんですが……
jpnSearchText:
先ほどの敵からの通信の後、
手分けして調べに出たんですが……

engChrName: R-Really? That's worrying...
engSearchText: R-Really? That's worrying...
jpnChrName: そ、そうなんですかっ？
jpnSearchText: そ、そうなんですかっ？

engChrName: Ehh, he's got his drones with him, so I'm sure he's fine.
engSearchText:
Ehh, he's got his drones with him, so I'm sure
he's fine.
jpnChrName: フン、黒いのと銀色のもいるし 滅多なことにはならねえだろうが──
jpnSearchText:
フン、黒いのと銀色のもいるし
滅多なことにはならねえだろうが──

engChrName: Van and friends sighted.
engSearchText: Van and friends sighted.
jpnChrName: ヴァンタチ、見ツケタ──！
jpnSearchText: ヴァンタチ、見ツケタ──！

engChrName: FIO!
engSearchText: FIO!
jpnChrName: ＦＩＯちゃん……！
jpnSearchText: ＦＩＯちゃん……！

engChrName: It's one of his little things!
engSearchText: It's one of his little things!
jpnChrName: あの銀髪小僧の……？
jpnSearchText: あの銀髪小僧の……？

engChrName: I-It doesn't seem to be floating very steadily, though...
engSearchText: I-It doesn't seem to be floating very steadily, though...
jpnChrName: な、なんだか フラフラしているような……
jpnSearchText:
な、なんだか
フラフラしているような……

engChrName: What happened to your master, FIO? Is XEROS with you?
engSearchText:
What happened to your master, FIO? Is XEROS
with you?
jpnChrName: ＦＩＯ、主人はどうした？ ＸＥＲＯＳも一緒にいるのか？
jpnSearchText:
ＦＩＯ、主人はどうした？
ＸＥＲＯＳも一緒にいるのか？

engChrName: Negative. The location of XEROS is unknown.
engSearchText: Negative. The location of XEROS is unknown.
jpnChrName: 否定、ＸＥＲＯＳノ位置ハロスト。
jpnSearchText: 否定、ＸＥＲＯＳノ位置ハロスト。

engChrName: All signs suggest that Quatre was absorbed into the space within that demon sphere.
engSearchText:
All signs suggest that Quatre was absorbed into the
space within that demon sphere.
jpnChrName: カトルハ──アチラノ“魔球”ノ 内部亜空間ニ取リ込マレタト推定。
jpnSearchText:
カトルハ──アチラノ“魔球”ノ
内部亜空間ニ取リ込マレタト推定。

engChrName: Shit...!
engSearchText: Shit...!
jpnChrName: チイッ……！
jpnSearchText: チイッ……！

engChrName: So he got captured like Agnès and I did!
engSearchText: So he got captured like Agnès and I did!
jpnChrName: あたしやアニエスと同じ……！
jpnSearchText: あたしやアニエスと同じ……！

engChrName: We were too late...
engSearchText: We were too late...
jpnChrName: 一足遅かったか……！
jpnSearchText: 一足遅かったか……！

engChrName: Wha—?! There's so many of them!
engSearchText: Wha—?! There's so many of them!
jpnChrName: ！？　この数は──！
jpnSearchText: ！？　この数は──！

engChrName: It's too dangerous to stay here! We need to go!
engSearchText: It's too dangerous to stay here! We need to go!
jpnChrName: 流石に危険です！ いったん退きましょう！
jpnSearchText:
流石に危険です！
いったん退きましょう！

engChrName: The cathedral's not far! C'mon!
engSearchText: The cathedral's not far! C'mon!
jpnChrName: 大聖堂だ、付いて来い！
jpnSearchText: 大聖堂だ、付いて来い！

engChrName: They hurried inside the cathedral where they would be safe.
engSearchText:
They hurried inside the cathedral where they would
be safe.
jpnChrName: その後、大聖堂にいったん避難した後……
jpnSearchText: <C1>その後、大聖堂にいったん避難した後……

engChrName: Once inside, they shared what they each knew on the crisis that was occurring.
engSearchText:
Once inside, they shared what they each knew on the
crisis that was occurring.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちはセリスや昼間見かけた面々と 改めて状況を確認するのだった。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちはセリスや昼間見かけた面々と
改めて状況を確認するのだった。

engChrName: Damn it all... So that's where Quatre is.
engSearchText: Damn it all... So that's where Quatre is.
jpnChrName: クソッ、まさかカトルが……
jpnSearchText: クソッ、まさかカトルが……
…………………………………

engChrName: Van, you said that those absorbed by a demon sphere are not in any immediate danger, correct?
engSearchText:
Van, you said that those absorbed by a demon sphere
are not in any immediate danger, correct?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、魔球に取り込まれても しばらくは大丈夫だったのですよね？
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさん、魔球に取り込まれても
しばらくは大丈夫だったのですよね？

engChrName: That's right. We can't make any guarantees, but they came out unharmed in every case so far.
engSearchText:
That's right. We can't make any guarantees, but they
came out unharmed in every case so far.
jpnChrName: ええ──断言はできませんが アニエスたちの場合は無事でした。
jpnSearchText:
ええ──断言はできませんが
アニエスたちの場合は無事でした。

engChrName: That's right. So I'm sure Quatre is just fine, too!
engSearchText: That's right. So I'm sure Quatre is just fine, too!
jpnChrName: はい……！ だからきっと大丈夫です！
jpnSearchText:
はい……！
だからきっと大丈夫です！

engChrName: Yeah. Maxim and I barely had a scratch on us.
engSearchText: Yeah. Maxim and I barely had a scratch on us.
jpnChrName: そうね……あたしやマクシムさんも 一応は大丈夫だったし。
jpnSearchText:
そうね……あたしやマクシムさんも
一応は大丈夫だったし。

engChrName: Though I wish we knew what the spheres were 'capturing' people for...
engSearchText:
Though I wish we knew what the spheres were
'capturing' people for...
jpnChrName: なんの目的で捕まえてるのか ちょっと分かりませんけど……
jpnSearchText:
なんの目的で捕まえてるのか
ちょっと分かりませんけど……

engChrName: That is not hard to discern. They are simply absorbing those who bear a close connection.
engSearchText:
That is not hard to discern. They are simply
absorbing those who bear a close connection.
jpnChrName: 知れたこと──縁のある者を ただ取り込んでいるだけであろう。
jpnSearchText:
知れたこと──縁のある者を
ただ取り込んでいるだけであろう。

engChrName: And by that, I do not mean close to Almata, but rather the 'key' at the center of this predicament.
engSearchText:
And by that, I do not mean close to Almata, but
rather the 'key' at the center of this predicament.
jpnChrName: それもアルマータではなく、 鍵となる者に近しい面々をな。
jpnSearchText:
それもアルマータではなく、
鍵となる者に近しい面々をな。

engChrName: Wait. Say what?
engSearchText: Wait. Say what?
jpnChrName: 爺さん、アンタ……
jpnSearchText: 爺さん、アンタ……

engChrName: Just how much do you know about all of this?
engSearchText: Just how much do you know about all of this?
jpnChrName: ……どこまで知っている？
jpnSearchText: ……どこまで知っている？

engChrName: Age begets wisdom, and wisdom allows one to see that which the young cannot.
engSearchText:
Age begets wisdom, and wisdom allows one to see
that which the young cannot.
jpnChrName: なに、この歳まで生きていると 色々見えてくるだけということよ。
jpnSearchText:
なに、この歳まで生きていると
色々見えてくるだけということよ。

engChrName: I imagine the professor and the Roaring Lion are of the same mind.
engSearchText:
I imagine the professor and the Roaring Lion are of
the same mind.
jpnChrName: 恐らく博士や獅子殿も同じであろう？
jpnSearchText: 恐らく博士や獅子殿も同じであろう？

engChrName: I will refrain from comment.
engSearchText: I will refrain from comment.
jpnChrName: ……さて、な。
jpnSearchText: ……さて、な。

engChrName: You're making me feel bad for not having a clue what's going on, y'know.
engSearchText:
You're making me feel bad for not having a clue
what's going on, y'know.
jpnChrName: チッ、分からねえオレに 当てつけられてる気分だが……
jpnSearchText:
チッ、分からねえオレに
当てつけられてる気分だが……

engChrName: But either way, all this can wait. Our first priority's gotta be getting Quatre outta that sphere and smashing it up, no?
engSearchText:
But either way, all this can wait. Our first priority's
gotta be getting Quatre outta that sphere and
smashing it up, no?
jpnChrName: まずはカトルの救出に、魔球ってのを ブチ壊すのが優先じゃねえのか！？
jpnSearchText:
まずはカトルの救出に、魔球ってのを
ブチ壊すのが優先じゃねえのか！？

engChrName: You're not wrong—especially since we're against the clock now.
engSearchText:
