You're not wrong—especially since we're against the
clock now.
jpnChrName: ああ、既にカウントダウンが 始まっている状況でもある──
jpnSearchText:
ああ、既にカウントダウンが
始まっている状況でもある──

engChrName: Let's go get him. C'mon, FIO.
engSearchText: Let's go get him. C'mon, FIO.
jpnChrName: さくっと迎えに行ってきますよ。 ──ＦＩＯ、付いてきてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
さくっと迎えに行ってきますよ。
──ＦＩＯ、付いてきてくれ。

engChrName: Understood.
engSearchText: Understood.
jpnChrName: 了解、ヴァン。
jpnSearchText: 了解、ヴァン。

engChrName: Which means we'll have to get rid of that barrier!
engSearchText: Which means we'll have to get rid of that barrier!
jpnChrName: まずは障壁の解除、ですねっ！
jpnSearchText: まずは障壁の解除、ですねっ！

engChrName: Indeed. To do that, we will need to begin by surveying the surrounding area once more.
engSearchText:
Indeed. To do that, we will need to begin by
surveying the surrounding area once more.
jpnChrName: ええ、この周辺を 改めて探る必要がありそうです。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、この周辺を
改めて探る必要がありそうです。

engChrName: Thank you all. We are counting on you.
engSearchText: Thank you all. We are counting on you.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんたち…… ありがとう、よろしく頼みます。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんたち……
ありがとう、よろしく頼みます。

engChrName: You need not thank us. He's our friend, and we care about him, too.
engSearchText:
You need not thank us. He's our friend, and we care
about him, too.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、カトル君は 私たちの大切な仲間ですから。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、カトル君は
私たちの大切な仲間ですから。

engChrName: I will accompany you. This would not have happened if we had simply worked together in the first place.
engSearchText:
I will accompany you. This would not have happened
if we had simply worked together in the first place.
jpnChrName: ──私もご一緒します。 手分けせずに行動すべきでした。
jpnSearchText:
──私もご一緒します。
手分けせずに行動すべきでした。

engChrName: *sigh* This isn't your fault at all. You really do take things too personally...
engSearchText:
*sigh* This isn't your fault at all. You really do take
things too personally...
jpnChrName: ふう、あんたのせいじゃないでしょ。 相変わらず生真面目なんだから。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、あんたのせいじゃないでしょ。
相変わらず生真面目なんだから。

engChrName: Still, I ain't gonna say no to the help.
engSearchText: Still, I ain't gonna say no to the help.
jpnChrName: だが助かるぜ、よろしくな。
jpnSearchText: だが助かるぜ、よろしくな。

engChrName: The same to all of you.
engSearchText: The same to all of you.
jpnChrName: はい、こちらこそ。
jpnSearchText: はい、こちらこそ。

engChrName: I'd offer to come with you myself, but it looks like you've got more than enough help already.
engSearchText:
I'd offer to come with you myself, but it looks like
you've got more than enough help already.
jpnChrName: ならアタシも……と言いたい所だが 先生もいるなら流石に過剰だな。
jpnSearchText:
ならアタシも……と言いたい所だが
先生もいるなら流石に過剰だな。

engChrName: So I'm gonna use a little trick of mine to see if I can't aid you from here.
engSearchText:
So I'm gonna use a little trick of mine to see if I can't
aid you from here.
jpnChrName: ちょいと裏技を使って探ってみるから いったん任せたぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ちょいと裏技を使って探ってみるから
いったん任せたぜ。

engChrName: Oh?
engSearchText: Oh?
jpnChrName: 裏技だと……？
jpnSearchText: 裏技だと……？

engChrName: I believe we can depend on her here. She may not seem the part, but she is one of the finest knights in the church.
engSearchText:
I believe we can depend on her here. She may not
seem the part, but she is one of the finest knights in
the church.
jpnChrName: フフ、それなりに当てには出来よう。 これでも騎士たちの頂点の一人ゆえな。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、それなりに当てには出来よう。
これでも騎士たちの頂点の一人ゆえな。

engChrName: Well, sorry for not seeming the part!
engSearchText: Well, sorry for not seeming the part!
jpnChrName: こ、これでもって何なんスか！
jpnSearchText: こ、これでもって何なんスか！

engChrName: If I use my Stigma even I can handle clairvoyance, even if I suck at it otherwise—oops.
engSearchText:
If I use my Stigma even I can handle clairvoyance,
even if I suck at it otherwise—oops.
jpnChrName: アタシだって聖痕を使えば 苦手な霊視くらい──とと。
jpnSearchText:
アタシだって聖痕を使えば
苦手な霊視くらい──とと。

engChrName: Ahaha...
engSearchText: Ahaha...
jpnChrName: あはは……
jpnSearchText: あはは……

engChrName: We'll pretend we didn't hear that. We're countin' on you.
engSearchText:
We'll pretend we didn't hear that. We're countin'
on you.
jpnChrName: ま、聞かなかった事にするぜ。 そっちは宜しくな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、聞かなかった事にするぜ。
そっちは宜しくな。

engChrName: Y-You do that! Now get going!
engSearchText: Y-You do that! Now get going!
jpnChrName: う、うるせえ！ いいからとっとと行きやがれ！
jpnSearchText:
う、うるせえ！
いいからとっとと行きやがれ！

engChrName: FIO and Rixia are now temporarily accompanying you.
engSearchText:
FIO and Rixia are now temporarily
accompanying you.
jpnChrName: ＦＩＯが同行し、リーシャが ゲストとして一時的に加入しました。
jpnSearchText:
ＦＩＯが同行し、リーシャが
ゲストとして一時的に加入しました。

engChrName: Press  to use FIO's search functionality.
engSearchText: Press  to use FIO's search functionality.
jpnChrName: でＦＩＯのサーチ機能を使用できます。
jpnSearchText: <C1>でＦＩＯのサーチ機能を使用できます。

engChrName: Use it to investigate all of the  points in the area.
engSearchText: Use it to investigate all of the  points in the area.
jpnChrName: サーチ機能を使用してエリア内にある </C>ポイントを調査しましょう。
jpnSearchText:
サーチ機能を使用してエリア内にある
ポイントを調査しましょう。

engChrName: GRR... RUFF!
engSearchText: GRR... RUFF!
jpnChrName: ＧＲＲＲＲＲ……ＢＯＷ！！
jpnSearchText: ＧＲＲＲＲＲ……ＢＯＷ！！

engChrName: Three biological reactions detected! Prediction: Quatre, Yumé, and Paulette!
engSearchText:
Three biological reactions detected!
Prediction: Quatre, Yumé, and Paulette!
jpnChrName: 生体反応ヲ検知……！ カトル、ユメ、ポーレットト推定！
jpnSearchText:
生体反応ヲ検知……！
カトル、ユメ、ポーレットト推定！

engChrName: It's not just Quatre?!
engSearchText: It's not just Quatre?!
jpnChrName: ……！ カトルさんだけじゃなくて！？
jpnSearchText:
……！
カトルさんだけじゃなくて！？

engChrName: We weren't expecting to find Yumé and Paulette here, too!
engSearchText:
We weren't expecting to find Yumé and Paulette
here, too!
jpnChrName: まさかユメちゃんたちまで 一緒だったなんてね……！
jpnSearchText:
まさかユメちゃんたちまで
一緒だったなんてね……！

engChrName: We were gonna bust this thing up anyway. Now we can get three people for one!
engSearchText:
We were gonna bust this thing up anyway. Now we
can get three people for one!
jpnChrName: ハッ、コイツをブチ砕いたら まとめて解放できるってことか！
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、コイツをブチ砕いたら
まとめて解放できるってことか！

engChrName: Here it comes!
engSearchText: Here it comes!
jpnChrName: ──来るぞ！
jpnSearchText: ──来るぞ！

engChrName: Ugh!
engSearchText: Ugh!
jpnChrName: くうっ……！
jpnSearchText: くうっ……！

engChrName: Such negative energy!
engSearchText: Such negative energy!
jpnChrName: この陰の気は……！
jpnSearchText: この陰の気は……！

engChrName: This will not be an easy battle!
engSearchText: This will not be an easy battle!
jpnChrName: やはり並大抵では無いか……！
jpnSearchText: やはり並大抵では無いか……！

engChrName: *pant* *pant* Hey, I'm here now!
engSearchText: *pant* *pant* Hey, I'm here now!
jpnChrName: はあはあ──待たせちまったな！！
jpnSearchText: はあはあ──待たせちまったな！！

engChrName: Celis! Your timing couldn't have been better!
engSearchText: Celis! Your timing couldn't have been better!
jpnChrName: セリス、参ったか！
jpnSearchText: セリス、参ったか！

engChrName: Thanks for comin'! Can you give us a hand?
engSearchText: Thanks for comin'! Can you give us a hand?
jpnChrName: 悪い──手を貸してくれ！
jpnSearchText: 悪い──手を貸してくれ！

engChrName: Damn right, I can!
engSearchText: Damn right, I can!
jpnChrName: ヘッ、たりめーだ！
jpnSearchText: ヘッ、たりめーだ！

engChrName: Searing seal of mine, shining from the abyss...
engSearchText: Searing seal of mine, shining from the abyss...
jpnChrName: 『我が深淵にて震えし赫灼（かくしゃく）の刻印よ──』
jpnSearchText: 『我が深淵にて震えし赫灼（かくしゃく）の刻印よ──』

engChrName: Overflow from within me and become a great stream to quell this evil!
engSearchText:
Overflow from within me and become a great stream
to quell this evil!
jpnChrName: 『轟き溢れて悪鬼を砕く奔流と化せ──！』
jpnSearchText: 『轟き溢れて悪鬼を砕く奔流と化せ──！』

engChrName: Now's our chance, everyone!
engSearchText: Now's our chance, everyone!
jpnChrName: 今です皆さん──！
jpnSearchText: 今です皆さん──！

engChrName: Right!
engSearchText: Right!
jpnChrName: はいっ……！
jpnSearchText: はいっ……！

engChrName: Understood!
engSearchText: Understood!
jpnChrName: 参ります──！
jpnSearchText: 参ります──！

engChrName: No, you don't! You're up against me!
engSearchText: No, you don't! You're up against me!
jpnChrName: ハッ、させるかよ！ タイマンだコラああああっ！！
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、させるかよ！
タイマンだコラああああっ！！

engChrName: Heh. They did it, huh?
engSearchText: Heh. They did it, huh?
jpnChrName: ハッ、やるじゃねーか。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、やるじゃねーか。

engChrName: Whoaaa...
engSearchText: Whoaaa...
jpnChrName: ほえええ……
jpnSearchText: ほえええ……

engChrName: We're back outside!
engSearchText: We're back outside!
jpnChrName: ……戻りましたね……
jpnSearchText: ……戻りましたね……

engChrName: So those spheres can deploy their own phase spaces... It defies all imagination...
engSearchText:
So those spheres can deploy their own phase spaces...
It defies all imagination...
jpnChrName: 固有位相空間の展開…… ……結構とんでもないヤツだね……
jpnSearchText:
固有位相空間の展開……
……結構とんでもないヤツだね……

engChrName: Still, I expected you to be here a little sooner— though I did have faith you would come for me.
engSearchText:
Still, I expected you to be here a little sooner—
though I did have faith you would come for me.
jpnChrName: 予想よりもちょっと遅かったかな？ まあ、来るとは信じてたけどね。
jpnSearchText:
予想よりもちょっと遅かったかな？
まあ、来るとは信じてたけどね。

engChrName: We don't take customer complaints, kiddo.
engSearchText: We don't take customer complaints, kiddo.
jpnChrName: ヘッ、言ってろや。
jpnSearchText: ヘッ、言ってろや。

engChrName: But I'm happy you believed in us!
engSearchText: But I'm happy you believed in us!
jpnChrName: えへへ…… 信じててくれたんですねっ！
jpnSearchText:
えへへ……
信じててくれたんですねっ！

engChrName: Sounds like you were doin' your part while we were away, too. Good work.
engSearchText:
Sounds like you were doin' your part while we were
away, too. Good work.
jpnChrName: 手分けして動いてくれたみたいだし 頑張ったじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
手分けして動いてくれたみたいだし
頑張ったじゃねえか。

engChrName: Shame you ended up gettin' caught, but at least you left FIO to pick up where you left off.
engSearchText:
Shame you ended up gettin' caught, but at least you
left FIO to pick up where you left off.
jpnChrName: 捕まっちまったのは課題だが ＦＩＯたちに託したのは良かったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
捕まっちまったのは課題だが
ＦＩＯたちに託したのは良かったぜ。

engChrName: S-Stop touching me, already!
engSearchText: S-Stop touching me, already!
jpnChrName: だ、だから 気安く撫でないでってば……！
jpnSearchText:
だ、だから
気安く撫でないでってば……！

engChrName: Heehee. I'm glad everything worked out in the end, Quatre.
engSearchText:
Heehee. I'm glad everything worked out in the
end, Quatre.
jpnChrName: うふふ…… 良かったわね、カトル君。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ……
良かったわね、カトル君。

engChrName: Van! Van! I want attention!
engSearchText: Van! Van! I want attention!
jpnChrName: ヴァン、ユメもユメも～！
jpnSearchText: ヴァン、ユメもユメも～！

engChrName: All right, all right. You did real good, too, Yumes.
engSearchText: All right, all right. You did real good, too, Yumes.
jpnChrName: おお、ユメも頑張ったな。
jpnSearchText: おお、ユメも頑張ったな。

engChrName: Thank you for your help, Rixia. And you, Celis.
engSearchText: Thank you for your help, Rixia. And you, Celis.
jpnChrName: リーシャさん、セリスさんも 本当にありがとうございました。
jpnSearchText:
リーシャさん、セリスさんも
本当にありがとうございました。

engChrName: The fact that we needed it stings a little, but we appreciate it all the same.
engSearchText:
The fact that we needed it stings a little, but we
appreciate it all the same.
jpnChrName: ふう、ちょっと悔しいけど 流石に助かっちゃったわ。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、ちょっと悔しいけど
流石に助かっちゃったわ。

engChrName: Oh, not at all.
engSearchText: Oh, not at all.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、いえいえ。
jpnSearchText: ふふっ、いえいえ。

engChrName: Dealing with devils is part of my job description anyway.
engSearchText:
Dealing with devils is part of my job
description anyway.
jpnChrName: ま、悪魔絡みっつーなら 本職でもあるし気にすんなよ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、悪魔絡みっつーなら
本職でもあるし気にすんなよ。

engChrName: Well, now! You actually pulled it off!
engSearchText: Well, now! You actually pulled it off!
jpnChrName: おお、何とかやったみてえだなァ！
jpnSearchText: おお、何とかやったみてえだなァ！

engChrName: Quatre... Thank goodness you're safe.
engSearchText: Quatre... Thank goodness you're safe.
jpnChrName: カトル……良かった。
jpnSearchText: カトル……良かった。

engChrName: Professor! Supervisor!
engSearchText: Professor! Supervisor!
jpnChrName: 博士、親方も……！
jpnSearchText: 博士、親方も……！

engChrName: What, did you tag along to check on us, too, Gien?
engSearchText: What, did you tag along to check on us, too, Gien?
jpnChrName: なんだ、爺さんも 様子を見に来てくれたのかよ？
jpnSearchText:
なんだ、爺さんも
様子を見に来てくれたのかよ？

engChrName: I feared you would have need of these weary bones. Not so, fortunately.
engSearchText:
I feared you would have need of these weary bones.
Not so, fortunately.
jpnChrName: フ…… 老骨に鞭打たずに済んで何よりだ。
jpnSearchText:
フ……
老骨に鞭打たずに済んで何よりだ。

engChrName: Regardless, Pandemonium's influence still reigns here. We should hurry back to the cathedral.
engSearchText:
Regardless, Pandemonium's influence still
reigns here. We should hurry back to the cathedral.
jpnChrName: まだ汎魔化は続いている。 疾（と）く聖堂に戻るがいい。
jpnSearchText:
まだ汎魔化は続いている。
疾（と）く聖堂に戻るがいい。

engChrName: They hurried back to the cathedral together, where the exhausted Yumé and Paulette were able to enjoy some warm soup and relax.
engSearchText:
They hurried back to the cathedral together, where
the exhausted Yumé and Paulette were able to
enjoy some warm soup and relax.
jpnChrName: その後、消耗していたユメたちに 温かいスープなどを出してもらいつつ……
jpnSearchText:
その後、消耗していたユメたちに
温かいスープなどを出してもらいつつ……

engChrName: Afterwards, Elder Gien and Professor Hamilton told them of a past crisis that was disturbingly similar to their current predicament.
engSearchText:
Afterwards, Elder Gien and Professor Hamilton told
them of a past crisis that was disturbingly similar to
their current predicament.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちは博士やギエン老から 今回と似たような事例について話を聞いた。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちは博士やギエン老から
今回と似たような事例について話を聞いた。

engChrName: So the situation in Langport forty years ago was like this, too?!
engSearchText:
So the situation in Langport forty years ago was like
this, too?!
jpnChrName: それじゃあ４０年前の煌都でも 似たようなことがあったのか……！？
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ４０年前の煌都でも
似たようなことがあったのか……！？

engChrName: Indeed. No one was frozen in time, admittedly...
engSearchText: Indeed. No one was frozen in time, admittedly...
jpnChrName: うむ、その時は 時空停止までは起こさなんだが……
jpnSearchText:
うむ、その時は
時空停止までは起こさなんだが……

engChrName: ...but the Tyrant took control of the city's people using the dragon veins from Heilong Cheng Zhai.
engSearchText:
...but the Tyrant took control of the city's people
using the dragon veins from Heilong Cheng Zhai.
jpnChrName: 黒龍城砦に君臨した《大君》が 龍脈を通じて街の者を支配したのだ。
jpnSearchText:
黒龍城砦に君臨した《大君》が
龍脈を通じて街の者を支配したのだ。

engChrName: Invisible spirits ran rampant through Langport's streets, stealing the energy of those who lived.
engSearchText:
Invisible spirits ran rampant through Langport's
streets, stealing the energy of those who lived.
jpnChrName: その際、見えざる悪鬼が街に現れ、 人の生気を奪ったこともあったな。
jpnSearchText:
その際、見えざる悪鬼が街に現れ、
人の生気を奪ったこともあったな。

engChrName: I remember hearing something similar from my own father.
engSearchText:
I remember hearing something similar from my
own father.
jpnChrName: ………私も父から聞きました。
jpnSearchText: ………私も父から聞きました。

engChrName: I do remember hearing about something crazy going on down there many years back.
engSearchText:
I do remember hearing about something crazy going
on down there many years back.
jpnChrName: たしかに大昔、ラングポートで ヤバイ事件があったのは聞いたが……
jpnSearchText:
たしかに大昔、ラングポートで
ヤバイ事件があったのは聞いたが……

engChrName: If I was asked to name more recent parallels, there are also the crises in Crossbell and Liberl four and six years ago respectively...
engSearchText:
If I was asked to name more recent parallels, there are
also the crises in Crossbell and Liberl four and six
years ago respectively...
jpnChrName: ……そこまで昔ではないとすると ６年前のリベールや４年前のクロスベル。
jpnSearchText:
……そこまで昔ではないとすると
６年前のリベールや４年前のクロスベル。

engChrName: As well as the civil war in the Empire four years ago, and the Battle of Jormungandr two years ago.
engSearchText:
As well as the civil war in the Empire four years ago,
and the Battle of Jormungandr two years ago.
jpnChrName: そして４年前の帝国での内乱や、 ２年前のヨルムンガンド戦役もでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
そして４年前の帝国での内乱や、
２年前のヨルムンガンド戦役もでしょうか。

engChrName: Hmm...
engSearchText: Hmm...

engChrName: Those stemmed in part from a great curse that spread across the land through the earth veins. They also spawned devils as well.
engSearchText:
Those stemmed in part from a great curse that spread
across the land through the earth veins. They also
spawned devils as well.
jpnChrName: 地脈を通じた巨大な“呪い”…… 悪魔なども出現していたそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
地脈を通じた巨大な“呪い”……
悪魔なども出現していたそうですね。

engChrName: R-Really?
engSearchText: R-Really?
jpnChrName: そ、そこまでだったんですか……
jpnSearchText: そ、そこまでだったんですか……

engChrName: ...So what're we supposed to infer from the fact that what's going on here is similar to all that?
engSearchText:
...So what're we supposed to infer from the fact that
what's going on here is similar to all that?
jpnChrName: ……今回の首都の出来事も それに近い状況になっていると？
jpnSearchText:
……今回の首都の出来事も
それに近い状況になっていると？

engChrName: I don't know. To my knowledge, the current time freeze has never happened anywhere before.
engSearchText:
I don't know. To my knowledge, the current time
freeze has never happened anywhere before.
jpnChrName: 分かりません……時空停止というのは 過去、無かったことのようですし。
jpnSearchText:
分かりません……時空停止というのは
過去、無かったことのようですし。

engChrName: Realizing Pandemonium on a country or even continent-wide scale is no mean feat.
engSearchText:
Realizing Pandemonium on a country or even
continent-wide scale is no mean feat.
jpnChrName: 共和国、そして大陸全土の汎魔化も そこまで簡単には実現しないでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
共和国、そして大陸全土の汎魔化も
そこまで簡単には実現しないでしょう。

engChrName: Especially in the area near a certain church-related facility. Am I wrong?
engSearchText:
Especially in the area near a certain
church-related facility. Am I wrong?
jpnChrName: 特に“あの施設”がある場所周辺は。 そうではありませんか？
jpnSearchText:
特に“あの施設”がある場所周辺は。
そうではありませんか？

engChrName: You are very astute.
engSearchText: You are very astute.
jpnChrName: ………慧眼、痛み入る。
jpnSearchText: ………慧眼、痛み入る。

engChrName: You're not one of the three disciples for nothing, huh?
engSearchText:
You're not one of the three disciples for
nothing, huh?
jpnChrName: すげーなアンタ…… さすが三高弟の一人っつーか。
jpnSearchText:
すげーなアンタ……
さすが三高弟の一人っつーか。

engChrName: We're talking about the primal grounds, right? The original the others are based on bein' in Arteria.
engSearchText:
We're talking about the primal grounds, right?
The original the others are based on bein' in Arteria.
jpnChrName: 『始まりの地』だったか…… 本体がアルテリアにあるという。
jpnSearchText:
『始まりの地』だったか……
本体がアルテリアにあるという。

engChrName: The nearest one isn't anywhere in the capital though, right? Never mind here.
engSearchText:
The nearest one isn't anywhere in the capital
though, right? Never mind here.
jpnChrName: だが──この大聖堂も含めて 首都にあるわけじゃないんですよね？
jpnSearchText:
だが──この大聖堂も含めて
首都にあるわけじゃないんですよね？

engChrName: You are correct. Unlike the Empire's capital, this city didn't exist before the Middle Ages.
engSearchText:
You are correct. Unlike the Empire's capital, this city
didn't exist before the Middle Ages.
jpnChrName: うむ、この地は帝都などと違い、 中世以降に築かれた都だからな。
jpnSearchText:
うむ、この地は帝都などと違い、
中世以降に築かれた都だからな。

engChrName: It should come as no surprise that it is light on spiritual protection.
engSearchText:
It should come as no surprise that it is light on
spiritual protection.
jpnChrName: 霊的な備えが薄いのも仕方あるまい。
jpnSearchText: 霊的な備えが薄いのも仕方あるまい。

engChrName: On the plus side, at least that means the primal ground isn't gonna be used maliciously like it was in the Empire.
engSearchText:
On the plus side, at least that means the primal
ground isn't gonna be used maliciously like it was in
the Empire.
jpnChrName: ま、帝都みたいに最悪の形で 利用されないだけマシかもしんねーが。
jpnSearchText:
ま、帝都みたいに最悪の形で
利用されないだけマシかもしんねーが。

engChrName: I feel like, right now, we're hearing a hell of a lot of stuff we shouldn't be...
engSearchText:
I feel like, right now, we're hearing a hell of a lot of
stuff we shouldn't be...
jpnChrName: おいおい、ヤベー話が 次々と出てきてるんだが……
jpnSearchText:
おいおい、ヤベー話が
次々と出てきてるんだが……

engChrName: Still, I suppose what it all boils down to is that we need to be just a little cautious when appraising the current crisis, correct?
engSearchText:
Still, I suppose what it all boils down to is that we
need to be just a little cautious when appraising the
current crisis, correct?
jpnChrName: ……要は過大評価も過小評価もせずに ちゃんと現状を見極めろってことだね？
jpnSearchText:
……要は過大評価も過小評価もせずに
ちゃんと現状を見極めろってことだね？

engChrName: Precisely.
engSearchText: Precisely.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そういうことです。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、そういうことです。

engChrName: Van, I believe you and you alone hold the key to quelling this chaos.
engSearchText:
Van, I believe you and you alone hold the key to
quelling this chaos.
jpnChrName: ──ヴァンさん、おそらく貴方は 今回の件の鍵を握っているのでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
──ヴァンさん、おそらく貴方は
今回の件の鍵を握っているのでしょう。

engChrName: The devices that your great-grandfather left you will no doubt be essential as well, Agnès.
engSearchText:
The devices that your great-grandfather left you will
no doubt be essential as well, Agnès.
jpnChrName: そしてアニエスさん、貴女の 曾お祖父様が残した遺産についても……
jpnSearchText:
そしてアニエスさん、貴女の
曾お祖父様が残した遺産についても……

engChrName: However, I don't believe you should obsess over the negative aspects of your role in this. Instead, take a close look at your surroundings.
engSearchText:
However, I don't believe you should obsess over the
negative aspects of your role in this. Instead, take a
close look at your surroundings.
jpnChrName: ですが思い詰めて自分だけでと 視野を狭くする必要などありません。
jpnSearchText:
ですが思い詰めて自分だけでと
視野を狭くする必要などありません。

engChrName: Most of this city's people are frozen, but so many are not.
engSearchText:
Most of this city's people are frozen, but so many
are not.
jpnChrName: 多くの人が停止していますが 動ける人も少なからずいる様子──
jpnSearchText:
多くの人が停止していますが
動ける人も少なからずいる様子──

engChrName: And the sheer number who are not is a testament to just how many bonds and friendships you have formed with everyone around you.
engSearchText:
And the sheer number who are not is a testament to
just how many bonds and friendships you have
formed with everyone around you.
jpnChrName: 言い換えればそれは貴方たちが 築いてきた絆であり、縁でしょうから。
jpnSearchText:
言い換えればそれは貴方たちが
築いてきた絆であり、縁でしょうから。

engChrName: Professor Hamilton...
engSearchText: Professor Hamilton...
jpnChrName: ハミルトン博士……
jpnSearchText: ハミルトン博士……

engChrName: Heh.
engSearchText: Heh.

engChrName: I dunno what to say. How am I even supposed to argue with that?
engSearchText:
I dunno what to say. How am I even supposed to
argue with that?
jpnChrName: 参りました…… グウの音も出ないとはこの事だ。
jpnSearchText:
参りました……
グウの音も出ないとはこの事だ。

engChrName: I know that what's happening is my problem, but even now I still don't hold all the answers as to what's goin' on.
engSearchText:
I know that what's happening is my problem, but
even now I still don't hold all the answers as to what's
goin' on.
jpnChrName: ──正直、俺自身の問題とはいえ 完全な確信があるわけじゃない。
jpnSearchText:
──正直、俺自身の問題とはいえ
完全な確信があるわけじゃない。

engChrName: But I'll try not to dwell too much on that, and remember how many people have got my back.
engSearchText:
But I'll try not to dwell too much on that, and
remember how many people have got my back.
jpnChrName: ですが自分自身を決めつけないで 少し広い視野で当たってみます。
jpnSearchText:
ですが自分自身を決めつけないで
少し広い視野で当たってみます。

engChrName: Van...
engSearchText: Van...
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……

engChrName: I'm glad to hear that. I'm sure that will be the key to opening a path forward.
engSearchText:
I'm glad to hear that. I'm sure that will be the key to
opening a path forward.
jpnChrName: ええ、今はそれでいいわ。 きっと道は拓けるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、今はそれでいいわ。
きっと道は拓けるでしょう。

engChrName: Right. And we'll be right there with you, of course.
engSearchText: Right. And we'll be right there with you, of course.
jpnChrName: うん──当然僕も付き合うよ。
jpnSearchText: うん──当然僕も付き合うよ。

engChrName: I don't feel like I've just been drawn into this randomly.
engSearchText:
I don't feel like I've just been drawn into
this randomly.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんのことはともかく この一件、僕にとっても他人事じゃない。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんのことはともかく
この一件、僕にとっても他人事じゃない。

engChrName: This must be at least somewhat connected to my birth and circumstances as well.
engSearchText:
This must be at least somewhat connected to my
birth and circumstances as well.
jpnChrName: 僕自身の生まれと事情にも…… 少し関係していそうな気がするんだ。
jpnSearchText:
僕自身の生まれと事情にも……
少し関係していそうな気がするんだ。

engChrName: Oh!
engSearchText: Oh!

engChrName: Why, Mom? Why, Dad?
engSearchText: Why, Mom? Why, Dad?
jpnChrName: どうして……… ……パパ……ママ………
jpnSearchText:
どうして………
……パパ……ママ………

engChrName: I don't...want this... I don't want to be...
engSearchText: I don't...want this... I don't want to be...
jpnChrName: ………わたし………ぼく………… ……──しになんかになりたく………
jpnSearchText:
………わたし………ぼく…………
……──しになんかになりたく………

engChrName: Quatre...
engSearchText: Quatre...
jpnChrName: カトル君……
jpnSearchText: カトル君……
………………………………

engChrName: (I wonder if... No, this is no time to be speculating.)
engSearchText: (I wonder if... No, this is no time to be speculating.)
jpnChrName: （……もしかして………   ううん──憶測は禁物ね。）
jpnSearchText:
（……もしかして………
ううん──憶測は禁物ね。）

engChrName: We'll be countin' on you, Arkride Solutions technical advisor. Gonna have to keep your grandson on the clock a while longer, Professor.
engSearchText:
We'll be countin' on you, Arkride Solutions
technical advisor. Gonna have to keep your grandson
on the clock a while longer, Professor.
jpnChrName: ああ、当てにしてるぜ技術担当。 ──博士、お孫さんをお借りしますよ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、当てにしてるぜ技術担当。
──博士、お孫さんをお借りしますよ。

engChrName: Of course. I can tell that he, FIO, and XEROS are as much a part of your group as anyone.
engSearchText:
Of course. I can tell that he, FIO, and XEROS are as
much a part of your group as anyone.
jpnChrName: ええ、ＦＩＯやＸＥＲＯＳ共々 もう貴方たちの一員でしょうから。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、ＦＩＯやＸＥＲＯＳ共々
もう貴方たちの一員でしょうから。

engChrName: Do your best, Quatre. But always behave like an engineer should: calmly and methodically.
engSearchText:
Do your best, Quatre. But always behave like an
engineer should: calmly and methodically.
jpnChrName: カトル──しっかりとやってきなさい。 ただし技術者らしく冷静に、確実にね。
jpnSearchText:
カトル──しっかりとやってきなさい。
ただし技術者らしく冷静に、確実にね。

engChrName: I will, Gran!
engSearchText: I will, Gran!
jpnChrName: うん……お祖母ちゃん（グランマ）！
jpnSearchText: うん……お祖母ちゃん（グランマ）！

engChrName: Heh. You're an artisan of Basel, lad. Go do us proud.
engSearchText: Heh. You're an artisan of Basel, lad. Go do us proud.
jpnChrName: ヘッ、バーゼル職人の一人として しっかりやってくるんだぞ！
jpnSearchText:
ヘッ、バーゼル職人の一人として
しっかりやってくるんだぞ！

engChrName: ...Do they remind you of Cao and your grandchildren?
engSearchText:
...Do they remind you of Cao and
your grandchildren?
jpnChrName: ……お孫さんたちに ツァオさんを思い出しますか？
jpnSearchText:
……お孫さんたちに
ツァオさんを思い出しますか？

engChrName: Including Aaron, of course.
engSearchText: Including Aaron, of course.
jpnChrName: それと、そちらのアーロンさんも。
jpnSearchText: それと、そちらのアーロンさんも。

engChrName: Heh. You have grown emotional, Yin—though perhaps that is a source of strength to you now as well.
engSearchText:
Heh. You have grown emotional, Yin—though
perhaps that is a source of strength to you now
as well.
jpnChrName: フ……ぬるくなったな《銀（イン）》。 それが手に入れた強さかもしれぬが。
jpnSearchText:
フ……ぬるくなったな《銀（イン）》。
それが手に入れた強さかもしれぬが。

engChrName: Anyway, not to interrupt everyone's goodfeels bonding time, but what are we gonna do next?
engSearchText:
Anyway, not to interrupt everyone's goodfeels
bonding time, but what are we gonna do next?
jpnChrName: ──和むのは構わねえが こっから先はどうすんだ？
jpnSearchText:
──和むのは構わねえが
こっから先はどうすんだ？

engChrName: We've got all our people together now, so are we gonna hit up the other spheres?
engSearchText:
We've got all our people together now, so are we
gonna hit up the other spheres?
jpnChrName: 事務所メンバーは全員揃った。 他のエリアの魔球にでも当たるかよ？
jpnSearchText:
事務所メンバーは全員揃った。
他のエリアの魔球にでも当たるかよ？

engChrName: Hmm... I was thinkin' that at first, but the rest of them are likely in the city's southern suburbs.
engSearchText:
Hmm... I was thinkin' that at first, but the rest of
them are likely in the city's southern suburbs.
jpnChrName: そうだな……残っているのは どこも首都の南の郊外エリアの筈だ。
jpnSearchText:
そうだな……残っているのは
どこも首都の南の郊外エリアの筈だ。

engChrName: Even if we do have my pickup back now, that's a bit of a trek.
engSearchText:
Even if we do have my pickup back now, that's a bit
of a trek.
jpnChrName: 車があるとはいえ ここからだと厳しいかもしれねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
車があるとはいえ
ここからだと厳しいかもしれねぇな。

engChrName: Indeed. There are some impassable areas on the way, too.
engSearchText:
Indeed. There are some impassable areas on the
way, too.
jpnChrName: はい……幾つかの地点で 通行不能にもなっている様ですし。
jpnSearchText:
はい……幾つかの地点で
通行不能にもなっている様ですし。

engChrName: Then that just leaves...
engSearchText: Then that just leaves...
jpnChrName: そ、そうすると残るは……！
jpnSearchText: そ、そうすると残るは……！

engChrName: The place this catastrophe first began—the Vantail District.
engSearchText:
The place this catastrophe first began—the
Vantail District.
jpnChrName: 異変の発生地点── あのヴァンタイユ地区ですか。
jpnSearchText:
異変の発生地点──
あのヴァンタイユ地区ですか。

engChrName: That's right. The area Melchior says he's got protected with a giant barrier.
engSearchText:
That's right. The area Melchior says he's got
protected with a giant barrier.
jpnChrName: ……メルキオルによれば巨大な 《結界》が周りに張られてるらしいね。
jpnSearchText:
……メルキオルによれば巨大な
《結界》が周りに張られてるらしいね。

engChrName: He said we'd need to go around destroying all of the demon spheres to get through it, right?
engSearchText:
He said we'd need to go around destroying all of the
demon spheres to get through it, right?
jpnChrName: ええ、それに各地の魔球を全部壊せば 何とかなるかもって言ってたわね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、それに各地の魔球を全部壊せば
何とかなるかもって言ってたわね。

engChrName: Yeah. He could be lying out his ass, mind. But either way, I do wanna know what things are like in there.
engSearchText:
Yeah. He could be lying out his ass, mind. But either
way, I do wanna know what things are like in there.
jpnChrName: ……本当かどうかはともかく、 内部の状況くらいは知りたい所だな。
jpnSearchText:
……本当かどうかはともかく、
内部の状況くらいは知りたい所だな。

engChrName: Maybe we should go check it out.
engSearchText: Maybe we should go check it out.
jpnChrName: 一度偵察に行ってみるか、それとも……
jpnSearchText: 一度偵察に行ってみるか、それとも……

engChrName: Hmm... I wish we could ask Auclair what she managed to learn.
engSearchText:
Hmm... I wish we could ask Auclair what she
managed to learn.
jpnChrName: むう、そうなるとオークレールあたりの 情報が知りたい所だな。
jpnSearchText:
むう、そうなるとオークレールあたりの
情報が知りたい所だな。

engChrName: She said she was going to look into what was causing this.
engSearchText:
She said she was going to look into what was
causing this.
jpnChrName: 『元凶を探る』なんて言ってたし。
jpnSearchText: 『元凶を探る』なんて言ってたし。

engChrName: She did?!
engSearchText: She did?!
jpnChrName: そうなのか……！？
jpnSearchText: そうなのか……！？

engChrName: Sh-She did run off in the direction of the pillar, come to think of it.
engSearchText:
Sh-She did run off in the direction of the pillar, come
to think of it.
jpnChrName: た、確かにエレインさん、 光の柱の方に向かったような。
jpnSearchText:
た、確かにエレインさん、
光の柱の方に向かったような。

engChrName: Which would mean she was heading towards the Vantail District.
engSearchText:
Which would mean she was heading towards the
Vantail District.
jpnChrName: あれの真下がちょうど ヴァンタイユ地区でしたね……
jpnSearchText:
あれの真下がちょうど
ヴァンタイユ地区でしたね……

engChrName: Elaine was the lovely lady who helped us!
engSearchText: Elaine was the lovely lady who helped us!
jpnChrName: エレインおねーちゃん？ ユメたちをたすけてくれたよー！
jpnSearchText:
エレインおねーちゃん？
ユメたちをたすけてくれたよー！

engChrName: W-Wait!
engSearchText: W-Wait!
jpnChrName: そ、それって……！
jpnSearchText: そ、それって……！

engChrName: You saw her?!
engSearchText: You saw her?!
jpnChrName: ヴァンタイユから避難する時に あいつを見かけたのか……！？
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンタイユから避難する時に
あいつを見かけたのか……！？

engChrName: That's right. Maxim dragged the two of us away from Vantail, where we were when the crisis began...
engSearchText:
That's right. Maxim dragged the two of us away from
Vantail, where we were when the crisis began...
jpnChrName: ええ、マクシムさんに引っ張られて あの場所から逃げたのだけど……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、マクシムさんに引っ張られて
あの場所から逃げたのだけど……

engChrName: But on the way, we ended up getting separated from him, and that's when she showed up and rescued us.
engSearchText:
But on the way, we ended up getting separated from
him, and that's when she showed up and rescued us.
jpnChrName: 途中、離れ離れになって── その時にエレインさんに助けられたの。
jpnSearchText:
途中、離れ離れになって──
その時にエレインさんに助けられたの。

engChrName: She was with a woman on a motorbike—and it was that woman who then saw us to safety.
engSearchText:
She was with a woman on a motorbike—and it was
that woman who then saw us to safety.
jpnChrName: その後、一緒にいたバイクの女性に 私たちは送ってもらったのだけど……
jpnSearchText:
その後、一緒にいたバイクの女性に
私たちは送ってもらったのだけど……

engChrName: That must've been Hermès!
engSearchText: That must've been Hermès!
jpnChrName: エルメスか……！
jpnSearchText: エルメスか……！

engChrName: Heh. That sounds like her, all right.
engSearchText: Heh. That sounds like her, all right.
jpnChrName: ハッ、あの女どもならそのくらい やってのけるかもしれねえな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、あの女どもならそのくらい
やってのけるかもしれねえな。

engChrName: What happened to Elaine after that, then?
engSearchText: What happened to Elaine after that, then?
jpnChrName: それで、その後エレインさんは！？
jpnSearchText: それで、その後エレインさんは！？

engChrName: She said something about saying 'hi' to you for her and then ran off!
engSearchText:
She said something about saying 'hi' to you for her and
then ran off!
jpnChrName: ヴァンによろしくってゆって ぴゅーって走っていっちゃった。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンによろしくってゆって
ぴゅーって走っていっちゃった。

engChrName: But it was towards that shiny pillar thingy, yeah!
engSearchText: But it was towards that shiny pillar thingy, yeah!
jpnChrName: キラキラした柱のほうだったかな～。
jpnSearchText: キラキラした柱のほうだったかな～。

engChrName: Thinking back, though, not long after that, the area she ran into lit up and some kind of symbol appeared.
engSearchText:
Thinking back, though, not long after that, the area
she ran into lit up and some kind of symbol appeared.
jpnChrName: でもその後、そちらの方角が光って 何か紋様みたいなものが現れて……
jpnSearchText:
でもその後、そちらの方角が光って
何か紋様みたいなものが現れて……

engChrName: Could that have been the barrier?
engSearchText: Could that have been the barrier?
jpnChrName: それがその“結界”なのかしら？
jpnSearchText: それがその“結界”なのかしら？

engChrName: Hmm... If that's true, she must've slipped in there on her own before the barrier really went up.
engSearchText:
Hmm... If that's true, she must've slipped in there on
her own before the barrier really went up.
jpnChrName: そうか……すると一人だけ結界の 内側に入りやがったのかもしれねえな。
jpnSearchText:
そうか……すると一人だけ結界の
内側に入りやがったのかもしれねえな。

engChrName: First the crazy stuff she pulled in Oración, now this... She really is something else.
engSearchText:
First the crazy stuff she pulled in Oración, now this...
She really is something else.
jpnChrName: ……オラシオンの時といい、 ったく大したヤツだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
……オラシオンの時といい、
ったく大したヤツだぜ。

engChrName: Van...
engSearchText: Van...
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……

engChrName: I-I'm sure she's just fine! She's really strong, after all.
engSearchText: I-I'm sure she's just fine! She's really strong, after all.
jpnChrName: だ、大丈夫ですよ……！ ものすごく強い人ですしっ。
jpnSearchText:
だ、大丈夫ですよ……！
ものすごく強い人ですしっ。

engChrName: Indeed. I do not doubt that she is working to resolve this in her own way.
engSearchText:
Indeed. I do not doubt that she is working to resolve
this in her own way.
jpnChrName: うむ、今ごろ彼女なりに 事態の打開に動いているはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
うむ、今ごろ彼女なりに
事態の打開に動いているはずだ。

engChrName: Yeah. So we've gotta let her do her thing while we handle stuff that can only be done from the outside.
engSearchText:
Yeah. So we've gotta let her do her thing while we
handle stuff that can only be done from the outside.
jpnChrName: ええ、だとしたら外側の俺たちも 出来ることをやるだけでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、だとしたら外側の俺たちも
出来ることをやるだけでしょう。

engChrName: I wanna enlist the help of the others so that we can—
engSearchText: I wanna enlist the help of the others so that we can—
jpnChrName: 何とか他の連中とも連携して──
jpnSearchText: 何とか他の連中とも連携して──

engChrName: Are they calling us again?!
engSearchText: Are they calling us again?!
jpnChrName: またあの連中……！？
jpnSearchText: またあの連中……！？

engChrName: I don't think so. I'd say the fact that only Ms. Claudel is being called indicates...
engSearchText:
I don't think so. I'd say the fact that only Ms. Claudel
is being called indicates...
jpnChrName: いえ、掛かってきたのが アニエス様だけということは……
jpnSearchText:
いえ、掛かってきたのが
アニエス様だけということは……

engChrName: Oh!
engSearchText: Oh!

engChrName: Hello, Agnès. I see you're all gathered?
engSearchText: Hello, Agnès. I see you're all gathered?
jpnChrName: ごきげんよう、アニエス。 ヴァンさんたちも全員いるかしら？
jpnSearchText:
ごきげんよう、アニエス。
ヴァンさんたちも全員いるかしら？

engChrName: Renne!
engSearchText: Renne!
jpnChrName: レン先輩……！
jpnSearchText: レン先輩……！

engChrName: You got the communications network back online?!
engSearchText: You got the communications network back online?!
jpnChrName: 通信網を復活しやがったか！
jpnSearchText: 通信網を復活しやがったか！

engChrName: Sh-She really is somethin' else, huh?
engSearchText: Sh-She really is somethin' else, huh?
jpnChrName: と、とんでもねえ小娘だな……
jpnSearchText: と、とんでもねえ小娘だな……

engChrName: She's a bona fide genius, that's for sure.
engSearchText: She's a bona fide genius, that's for sure.
jpnChrName: いやはや── マジモンの天才じゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
いやはや──
マジモンの天才じゃねえか。

engChrName: I wouldn't expect any less from her. I take it this is a simulation of the orbal network rather than the actual one, then?
engSearchText:
I wouldn't expect any less from her. I take it this is a
simulation of the orbal network rather than the actual
one, then?
jpnChrName: ふふ、さすがねレンさん。 すると仮想モードということかしら？
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、さすがねレンさん。
すると仮想モードということかしら？

engChrName: Oh, I didn't know Professor Hamilton was with you. Yes, that's right, but you still should be able to use it for everything you need.
engSearchText:
Oh, I didn't know Professor Hamilton was with you.
Yes, that's right, but you still should be able to use it
for everything you need.
jpnChrName: あら、博士もいたのね。 ええ──でも必要な機能は使える筈よ。
jpnSearchText:
あら、博士もいたのね。
ええ──でも必要な機能は使える筈よ。

engChrName: I contacted Associate Professor Esmeray and Professor Cronkite just before calling all of you, but I would appreciate your help as well.
engSearchText:
I contacted Associate Professor Esmeray and
Professor Cronkite just before calling all of you, but I
would appreciate your help as well.
jpnChrName: ちょうどエスメレー准教授と クロンカイト教授に連絡したけど……
jpnSearchText:
ちょうどエスメレー准教授と
クロンカイト教授に連絡したけど……

engChrName: We need as many heads as we can working on how to get through that barrier.
engSearchText:
We need as many heads as we can working on how to
get through that barrier.
jpnChrName: 例の《結界》の件もあるし、 博士の知恵を借りられないかしら？
jpnSearchText:
例の《結界》の件もあるし、
博士の知恵を借りられないかしら？

engChrName: Of course. I have an orbal computer here with me, so I can get to work right away.
engSearchText:
Of course. I have an orbal computer here with me, so
I can get to work right away.
jpnChrName: ええ、端末は持ってきていますし 早速検討を始めましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、端末は持ってきていますし
早速検討を始めましょうか。

engChrName: I guess this means we can call each other's Xiphas again?
engSearchText:
I guess this means we can call each other's
Xiphas again?
jpnChrName: とりあえずザイファ同士なら もう通信ができるみたいです。
jpnSearchText:
とりあえずザイファ同士なら
もう通信ができるみたいです。

engChrName: Man, that's awesome.
engSearchText: Man, that's awesome.
jpnChrName: マジかよ……！
jpnSearchText: マジかよ……！

engChrName: It sure looks like it! I've got a pile of unread mail here.
engSearchText: It sure looks like it! I've got a pile of unread mail here.
jpnChrName: ……うん！ メールも届き始めている！
jpnSearchText:
……うん！
メールも届き始めている！

engChrName: Would you like me to contact your friends and family, too?
engSearchText:
Would you like me to contact your friends and
family, too?
jpnChrName: ポーレット様──ビクトル様と マクシム様にご連絡しましょうか？
jpnSearchText:
ポーレット様──ビクトル様と
マクシム様にご連絡しましょうか？

engChrName: Could you?! Oh, thank you!
engSearchText: Could you?! Oh, thank you!
jpnChrName: ……！ ええ、よろしくお願いします。
jpnSearchText:
……！
ええ、よろしくお願いします。

engChrName: I wanna know if they're okay, too!
engSearchText: I wanna know if they're okay, too!
jpnChrName: おじーちゃんにオジサン？
jpnSearchText: おじーちゃんにオジサン？

engChrName: Renne really is amazing.
engSearchText: Renne really is amazing.
jpnChrName: 本当に凄いです……レン先輩。
jpnSearchText: 本当に凄いです……レン先輩。

engChrName: Yeah. The air's all full of hope all of a sudden just 'cause of her.
engSearchText:
Yeah. The air's all full of hope all of a sudden just
'cause of her.
jpnChrName: ああ、何とかなりそうな空気に 一気に持って行きやがったな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、何とかなりそうな空気に
一気に持って行きやがったな。

engChrName: I should try callin' Elaine just in—
engSearchText: I should try callin' Elaine just in—
jpnChrName: そうだ、念のためエレインにも──
jpnSearchText: そうだ、念のためエレインにも──

engChrName: Ghh... Ugh...!
engSearchText: Ghh... Ugh...!
jpnChrName: ぐううっ……！
jpnSearchText: ぐううっ……！

engChrName: Van!
engSearchText: Van!
jpnChrName: ！　ヴァンさん……！？
jpnSearchText: ！　ヴァンさん……！？

engChrName: What's up with you all of a sudden?!
engSearchText: What's up with you all of a sudden?!
jpnChrName: ちょ、どうしたのよ！？
jpnSearchText: ちょ、どうしたのよ！？

engChrName: They're just interrupting us?!
engSearchText: They're just interrupting us?!
jpnChrName: つ、通話の途中で……！？
jpnSearchText: つ、通話の途中で……！？

engChrName: These blasted...! Trying to force their way into our ca—
engSearchText:
These blasted...! Trying to force their way into our
ca—
jpnChrName: 強制割り込み──！ やってくれるじゃないの！
jpnSearchText:
強制割り込み──！
やってくれるじゃないの！

engChrName: The demon spheres in the 3rd, 11th, and 12th districts have been destroyed.
engSearchText:
The demon spheres in the 3rd, 11th, and 12th
districts have been destroyed.
jpnChrName: ──３区オーベル、１１区シャルダン、 １２区グランサーキットの魔球が消滅した。
jpnSearchText:
──３区オーベル、１１区シャルダン、
１２区グランサーキットの魔球が消滅した。

engChrName: Big congrats! I see you've managed to get your communications network back online, too, which means we're ramping up for the grand finale.
engSearchText:
Big congrats! I see you've managed to get your
communications network back online, too, which
means we're ramping up for the grand finale.
jpnChrName: おめでとう！ 通信網も復活したし、ようやく最終幕だね！
jpnSearchText:
おめでとう！
通信網も復活したし、ようやく最終幕だね！

engChrName: Yet you still have a whole two and a half hours to spare... Looks like I made this a little too easy.
engSearchText:
Yet you still have a whole two and a half hours
to spare... Looks like I made this a little too easy.
jpnChrName: カウントダウンは２時間３０分だけど ちょっと余裕がありすぎるかな？
jpnSearchText:
カウントダウンは２時間３０分だけど
ちょっと余裕がありすぎるかな？

engChrName: I wouldn't want you to feel bored during the big climax, though. Which is why I've decided to add ANOTHER barrier around Vantail!
engSearchText:
I wouldn't want you to feel bored during the big
climax, though. Which is why I've decided to add
ANOTHER barrier around Vantail!
jpnChrName: そこで大サービス── ヴァンタイユの結界を二重にしておくよ！
jpnSearchText:
そこで大サービス──
ヴァンタイユの結界を二重にしておくよ！
……！

engChrName: What?!
engSearchText: What?!
jpnChrName: 何ですって……！
jpnSearchText: 何ですって……！

engChrName: Oh, no...
engSearchText: Oh, no...

engChrName: This isn't good...
engSearchText: This isn't good...
jpnChrName: ……コイツは………
jpnSearchText: ……コイツは………

engChrName: Ahaha! I think I might have overdone it a little—but your chances aren't zero, so maybe hope will prevail!
engSearchText:
Ahaha! I think I might have overdone it a little—but
your chances aren't zero, so maybe hope
will prevail!
jpnChrName: アハハ、やりすぎちゃったかな？ でも大丈夫、可能性はゼロじゃない筈！
jpnSearchText:
アハハ、やりすぎちゃったかな？
でも大丈夫、可能性はゼロじゃない筈！

engChrName: Well, keep up the good work! Your end is in sight! ㈱
engSearchText: Well, keep up the good work! Your end is in sight! ㈱
jpnChrName: ──それじゃあ、最期まで頑張ってね㈱
jpnSearchText: ──それじゃあ、最期まで頑張ってね㈱

engChrName: (Not like we couldn't see this coming... It's just close to the worst hand we could've possibly been dealt.)
engSearchText:
(Not like we couldn't see this coming... It's just close
to the worst hand we could've possibly been dealt.)
jpnChrName: （……予想していた状況だ。   ま、最悪に近いパターンだが……）
jpnSearchText:
（……予想していた状況だ。
ま、最悪に近いパターンだが……）

engChrName: (If it really comes to it...)
engSearchText: (If it really comes to it...)

engChrName: That scumbag's really done it this time!
engSearchText: That scumbag's really done it this time!
jpnChrName: ──ふざっけんじゃないわよ！！
jpnSearchText: <S5>──ふざっけんじゃないわよ！！

engChrName: Who does he think he is?! Well if he thinks this is gonna make us give up, he's got another thing coming!
engSearchText:
Who does he think he is?! Well if he thinks this is
gonna make us give up, he's got another
thing coming!
jpnChrName: ホントもうなんなのアイツ！？ 誰が諦めてなんてやるもんですか！
jpnSearchText:
ホントもうなんなのアイツ！？
誰が諦めてなんてやるもんですか！

engChrName: You're absolutely right, Judith.
engSearchText: You're absolutely right, Judith.
jpnChrName: ジュディス……そうね。
jpnSearchText: ジュディス……そうね。

engChrName: I couldn't agree more!
engSearchText: I couldn't agree more!
jpnChrName: わたしも同じくですっ……！
jpnSearchText: わたしも同じくですっ……！

engChrName: Heh. I imagine he is frustrated that we were able to restore communications and destroy all the spheres so quickly.
engSearchText:
Heh. I imagine he is frustrated that we were able to
restore communications and destroy all the spheres
so quickly.
jpnChrName: フフ……この早さで魔球全てを破壊され、 通信網を復活されたのが効いたやもしれぬ。
jpnSearchText:
フフ……この早さで魔球全てを破壊され、
通信網を復活されたのが効いたやもしれぬ。

engChrName: Yeah. What he's doin' pisses me off, but it's just proof he's really starting to lose his cool.
engSearchText:
Yeah. What he's doin' pisses me off, but it's just proof
he's really starting to lose his cool.
jpnChrName: ああ──ムカつくが余裕が 無くなってきた証拠じゃねえのか？
jpnSearchText:
ああ──ムカつくが余裕が
無くなってきた証拠じゃねえのか？

engChrName: That makes sense to me.
engSearchText: That makes sense to me.
jpnChrName: ヘッ、確かにあり得そうだなァ。
jpnSearchText: ヘッ、確かにあり得そうだなァ。

engChrName: We still have two and a half hours left. That should be enough time to formulate a strategy.
engSearchText:
We still have two and a half hours left. That should
be enough time to formulate a strategy.
jpnChrName: カウントダウンはまだ２時間半── 何らかの手段は講じられる筈です。
jpnSearchText:
カウントダウンはまだ２時間半──
何らかの手段は講じられる筈です。

engChrName: Indeed. It's time to put our heads together, combine our strength, and show them what we can really do when we're united.
engSearchText:
Indeed. It's time to put our heads together, combine
our strength, and show them what we can really do
when we're united.
jpnChrName: ええ、皆の知恵と力を結集し、 何としても届けるとしましょう。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、皆の知恵と力を結集し、
何としても届けるとしましょう。

engChrName: We'll do all that we can to get you into the Vantail District.
engSearchText:
We'll do all that we can to get you into the
Vantail District.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん── 貴方たち裏解決屋をヴァンタイユ地区へ。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさん──
貴方たち裏解決屋をヴァンタイユ地区へ。

engChrName: Indeed. If you can get in there, victory is as good as ours.
engSearchText:
Indeed. If you can get in there, victory is as good
as ours.
jpnChrName: そうね──それが出来れば 今回の勝負は私たちの勝ちよ。
jpnSearchText:
そうね──それが出来れば
今回の勝負は私たちの勝ちよ。

engChrName: You've got plenty of collaborators waiting to help you, too! ♪
engSearchText:
You've got plenty of collaborators waiting to help
you, too! ♪
jpnChrName: 協力者も少なくなさそうだしね♪
jpnSearchText: <C1>協力者も少なくなさそうだしね♪

engChrName: You've got everyone all together in a group conversation!
engSearchText:
You've got everyone all together in a
group conversation!
jpnChrName: 会議アプリの多人数モード……！
jpnSearchText: 会議アプリの多人数モード……！

engChrName: Whoa...
engSearchText: Whoa...
jpnChrName: ほえ～……
jpnSearchText: ほえ～……

engChrName: Heehee. There are so many people.
engSearchText: Heehee. There are so many people.
jpnChrName: ふふ、こんなにも……
jpnSearchText: ふふ、こんなにも……

engChrName: These are just some of the bonds and connections that Van has formed with his actions...
engSearchText:
These are just some of the bonds and connections
that Van has formed with his actions...
jpnChrName: これが……ヴァンさんが 結んできた縁と絆……
jpnSearchText:
これが……ヴァンさんが
結んできた縁と絆……

engChrName: Heehee. You really are fortunate, Van.
engSearchText: Heehee. You really are fortunate, Van.
jpnChrName: ふふっ……本当に果報者ね。
jpnSearchText: ふふっ……本当に果報者ね。

engChrName: Man... I dunno what to say, you guys.
engSearchText: Man... I dunno what to say, you guys.
jpnChrName: ったく揃いも揃って……
jpnSearchText: ったく揃いも揃って……

engChrName: All right. I don't care how long I'm in debt to you guys for this. Gimme all you got!
engSearchText:
All right. I don't care how long I'm in debt to you
guys for this. Gimme all you got!
jpnChrName: ──分かった、 デカイ借りになっても構うもんか！
jpnSearchText:
──分かった、
デカイ借りになっても構うもんか！

engChrName: I'm countin' on you all—so you better step up!
engSearchText: I'm countin' on you all—so you better step up!
jpnChrName: よろしく頼むぜ──アンタたち！
jpnSearchText: よろしく頼むぜ──アンタたち！

engChrName: Right!
engSearchText: Right!
jpnChrName: おおっ……！
jpnSearchText: おおっ……！

engChrName: We never managed to get in touch with Elaine in the end, did we?
engSearchText:
We never managed to get in touch with Elaine in the
end, did we?
jpnChrName: ……結局エレインさんとは 連絡が取れずじまいでしたね。
jpnSearchText:
……結局エレインさんとは
連絡が取れずじまいでしたね。

engChrName: Yeah. I suspect those barriers around the Vantail District are impeding the signal.
engSearchText:
Yeah. I suspect those barriers around the Vantail
District are impeding the signal.
jpnChrName: うん……あの二重結界に 通信が阻まれてるんだと思う。
jpnSearchText:
うん……あの二重結界に
通信が阻まれてるんだと思う。

engChrName: No doubt. I'm sure she's just fine in there, though.
engSearchText: No doubt. I'm sure she's just fine in there, though.
jpnChrName: だろうな…… だが、あいつなら大丈夫だ。
jpnSearchText:
だろうな……
だが、あいつなら大丈夫だ。

engChrName: Me, too! We've just got to get in there ourselves and find her!
engSearchText:
Me, too! We've just got to get in there ourselves and
find her!
jpnChrName: はいっ！　何としても入り込んで 合流しないとですねっ。
jpnSearchText:
はいっ！　何としても入り込んで
合流しないとですねっ。

engChrName: Heh. She is kinda scary, but she'll be a huge help on our side.
engSearchText:
Heh. She is kinda scary, but she'll be a huge help on
our side.
jpnChrName: ハン、おっかない女だが 間違いなく百人力だろうからな。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、おっかない女だが
間違いなく百人力だろうからな。

engChrName: So glad I managed to catch you!
engSearchText: So glad I managed to catch you!
jpnChrName: よかった、間に合ったわね！
jpnSearchText: よかった、間に合ったわね！

engChrName: Hermès!
engSearchText: Hermès!
jpnChrName: エルメスか……！
jpnSearchText: エルメスか……！

engChrName: We had heard you were with Ms. Auclair.
engSearchText: We had heard you were with Ms. Auclair.
jpnChrName: エレイン様と共に 行動されていたようですが……
jpnSearchText:
エレイン様と共に
行動されていたようですが……

engChrName: I was for a while, helping her to get around.
engSearchText: I was for a while, helping her to get around.
jpnChrName: ええ、最初のうちは 足を提供していたんだけど。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、最初のうちは
足を提供していたんだけど。

engChrName: But eventually she entrusted me with that mother and child's safety and went off alone—and then that barrier appeared.
engSearchText:
But eventually she entrusted me with that mother and
child's safety and went off alone—and then that
barrier appeared.
jpnChrName: あの親子を託して単身乗り込んだ後、 あんな《結界》が現れちゃって……
jpnSearchText:
あの親子を託して単身乗り込んだ後、
あんな《結界》が現れちゃって……

engChrName: I'm so sorry, Arkride. I should've stopped her.
engSearchText: I'm so sorry, Arkride. I should've stopped her.
jpnChrName: ごめんなさい、アークライド。 ちゃんと止めておけば良かった。
jpnSearchText:
ごめんなさい、アークライド。
ちゃんと止めておけば良かった。

engChrName: Don't get too hung up about it. Bracers like her have their own way of doin' things.
engSearchText:
Don't get too hung up about it. Bracers like her have
their own way of doin' things.
jpnChrName: いや、あいつなりの 遊撃士の流儀で動いただけだろう。
jpnSearchText:
いや、あいつなりの
遊撃士の流儀で動いただけだろう。

engChrName: We're heading in ourselves, either way.
engSearchText: We're heading in ourselves, either way.
jpnChrName: お前さんが気に病む必要はねえさ。 ──どうせ俺たちも入るしな。
jpnSearchText:
お前さんが気に病む必要はねえさ。
──どうせ俺たちも入るしな。

engChrName: Of course!
engSearchText: Of course!
jpnChrName: はい……！
jpnSearchText: はい……！

engChrName: We were actually about to start preparing to do so.
engSearchText: We were actually about to start preparing to do so.
jpnChrName: 丁度そのための準備を 始めようとしていた所でな。
jpnSearchText:
丁度そのための準備を
始めようとしていた所でな。

engChrName: Really? That's a relief.
engSearchText: Really? That's a relief.
jpnChrName: そっか……フフ。
jpnSearchText: <C1>そっか……フフ。

engChrName: I'm happy to resume my usual service for you, by the way. It's the least I can do by way of apology.
engSearchText:
I'm happy to resume my usual service for you, by
the way. It's the least I can do by way of apology.
jpnChrName: お詫びと言ったらなんだけど 例のサービス、再開させてもらうわ。
jpnSearchText:
お詫びと言ったらなんだけど
例のサービス、再開させてもらうわ。

engChrName: I've found plenty of good routes around the city, so I can gather whatever you need and see it delivered to you.
engSearchText:
I've found plenty of good routes around the city, so I
can gather whatever you need and see it delivered
to you.
jpnChrName: 一通りのルートを見つけたから どんな物でも調達してあげるわよ。
jpnSearchText:
一通りのルートを見つけたから
どんな物でも調達してあげるわよ。

engChrName: Heh. Cheers, that'll be a big help.
engSearchText: Heh. Cheers, that'll be a big help.
jpnChrName: ヘッ、そいつは助かるぜ。
jpnSearchText: ヘッ、そいつは助かるぜ。

engChrName: We're counting on you!
engSearchText: We're counting on you!
jpnChrName: よろしく頼むわよ、運び屋さん！
jpnSearchText: よろしく頼むわよ、運び屋さん！

engChrName: Just give me a call if you need me. I'm at your service!
engSearchText: Just give me a call if you need me. I'm at your service!
jpnChrName: ええ──いつでも呼んで頂戴。
jpnSearchText: <C1>ええ──いつでも呼んで頂戴。

engChrName: All right, we've got less than two hours left. It's almost time to wrap up this thing.
engSearchText:
All right, we've got less than two hours left.
It's almost time to wrap up this thing.
jpnChrName: さて、大詰めだ── 残り時間は１時間ちょいか。
jpnSearchText:
さて、大詰めだ──
残り時間は１時間ちょいか。

engChrName: Indeed. Everyone else's preparations are expected to be done around the one hour mark.
engSearchText:
Indeed. Everyone else's preparations are expected to
be done around the one hour mark.
jpnChrName: はい、カウントダウン１時間前に 全ての準備が整う見込みです。
jpnSearchText:
はい、カウントダウン１時間前に
全ての準備が整う見込みです。

engChrName: We're going to need to head for the expressway into the Vantail District, right?
engSearchText:
We're going to need to head for the expressway into
the Vantail District, right?
jpnChrName: ヴァンタイユ地区へ通じる 『首都高一号線』に向かうんですね？
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンタイユ地区へ通じる
『首都高一号線』に向かうんですね？

engChrName: Yeah. But this is gonna be our final battle, so we gotta make absolutely sure we're ready for it.
engSearchText:
Yeah. But this is gonna be our final battle, so we
gotta make absolutely sure we're ready for it.
jpnChrName: ああ、それまでに正真正銘、 最後の準備を整えるとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、それまでに正真正銘、
最後の準備を整えるとしよう。

engChrName: We're countin' on you, Quatre.
engSearchText: We're countin' on you, Quatre.
jpnChrName: カトル、改めてよろしく頼むぞ。
jpnSearchText: カトル、改めてよろしく頼むぞ。

engChrName: Of course. FIO and XEROS are in top form, too.
engSearchText: Of course. FIO and XEROS are in top form, too.
jpnChrName: うん──任せてよ。 ＦＩＯにＸＥＲＯＳも万全だ。
jpnSearchText:
うん──任せてよ。
ＦＩＯにＸＥＲＯＳも万全だ。

engChrName: Then let's move!
engSearchText: Then let's move!
jpnChrName: ハッ、そんじゃあ行くか！
jpnSearchText: ハッ、そんじゃあ行くか！

engChrName: Onward and upward!
engSearchText: Onward and upward!
jpnChrName: れっつ・ごー、ですねっ！
jpnSearchText: れっつ・ごー、ですねっ！

engChrName: Quatre rejoined the party.
engSearchText: Quatre rejoined the party.
jpnChrName: カトルがパーティに合流しました。
jpnSearchText: <C1>カトルがパーティに合流しました。

engChrName: You can now access the Custom menu from Orbment in the main menu once more.
engSearchText:
You can now access the Custom menu from
Orbment in the main menu once more.
jpnChrName: メインメニューのオーブメント画面からの、 「オーブメント改造」が使用できるようになりました。
jpnSearchText:
メインメニューのオーブメント画面からの、
「オーブメント改造」が使用できるようになりました。

engChrName: Feri can no longer use the Procyon Fang craft.
engSearchText: Feri can no longer use the Procyon Fang craft.
jpnChrName: フェリの使用可能なクラフトから 「プロキオンファング」が外れました。
jpnSearchText:
フェリの使用可能なクラフトから
「プロキオンファング」が外れました。

engChrName: You can use Hermès' courier service once more. To request a delivery, inspect Van's car and select the Order Delivery option.
engSearchText:
You can use Hermès' courier service once more.
To request a delivery, inspect Van's car and select
the Order Delivery option.
jpnChrName: エルメスのバイク便が復活しました。 車を調べて「運び屋を利用する」で依頼ができます。
jpnSearchText:
エルメスのバイク便が復活しました。
車を調べて「運び屋を利用する」で依頼ができます。

engChrName: When you wish to advance the main story, inspect the car or open the Travel menu and choose Head to Expressway 1 in the Auber District.
engSearchText:
When you wish to advance the main story, inspect
the car or open the Travel menu and choose
Head to Expressway 1 in the Auber District.
jpnChrName: ストーリーを進める場合、 車を調べるか移動メニューから、行き先として オーベル地区の首都高一号線に向かうを選択してください。
jpnSearchText:
ストーリーを進める場合、
車を調べるか移動メニューから、行き先として
オーベル地区の首都高一号線に向かうを選択してください。

engChrName: Van... You and your crew are off, then?
engSearchText: Van... You and your crew are off, then?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、みんなも……もう行くのね？
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん、みんなも……もう行くのね？

engChrName: Yeah. Don't got a lot of time left anyway.
engSearchText: Yeah. Don't got a lot of time left anyway.
jpnChrName: ああ、もうあまり 時間が残ってねえみたいだしな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、もうあまり
時間が残ってねえみたいだしな。

engChrName: We gotta get this taken care of—
engSearchText: We gotta get this taken care of—
jpnChrName: 早い所片付けて──
jpnSearchText: 早い所片付けて──

engChrName: Oh.
engSearchText: Oh.
jpnChrName: っと……
jpnSearchText: っと……

engChrName: Yumé?
engSearchText: Yumé?
jpnChrName: ユメちゃん？
jpnSearchText: ユメちゃん？

engChrName: Van... You're coming back, right?
engSearchText: Van... You're coming back, right?
jpnChrName: ヴァン…… ちゃんと、戻ってくるよね？
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン……
ちゃんと、戻ってくるよね？

engChrName: Yeah, yeah. Don't worry, kiddo. I'm just stepping out for a bit.
engSearchText:
Yeah, yeah. Don't worry, kiddo. I'm just stepping out
for a bit.
jpnChrName: ……心配すんな。 ちょっと行ってくるだけだっての。
jpnSearchText:
……心配すんな。
ちょっと行ってくるだけだっての。

engChrName: We need to hold a party after everything's done, yeah? Back home at Montmart.
engSearchText:
We need to hold a party after everything's
done, yeah? Back home at Montmart.
jpnChrName: 色々あったことだし、モンマルトに戻ったら またお疲れ会でもやらねぇとな。
jpnSearchText:
色々あったことだし、モンマルトに戻ったら
またお疲れ会でもやらねぇとな。

engChrName: ...You promise?
engSearchText: ...You promise?
jpnChrName: ……ヤクソク、する？
jpnSearchText: ……ヤクソク、する？

engChrName: Yeah. I promise.
engSearchText: Yeah. I promise.
jpnChrName: ああ、約束だ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、約束だ。

engChrName: Okay... Okay!
engSearchText: Okay... Okay!
jpnChrName: ん……分かった！
jpnSearchText: ん……分かった！

engChrName: Agnès, Feri, everyone, please take care of Van!
engSearchText: Agnès, Feri, everyone, please take care of Van!
jpnChrName: アニエスちゃん、フェリちゃんたちも ヴァンのコト、よろしくねー！
jpnSearchText:
アニエスちゃん、フェリちゃんたちも
ヴァンのコト、よろしくねー！

engChrName: What? I don't need—
engSearchText: What? I don't need—
jpnChrName: っておい……
jpnSearchText: っておい……

engChrName: Heehee, of course we will, Yumé!
engSearchText: Heehee, of course we will, Yumé!
jpnChrName: ふふっ、任せてください……！
jpnSearchText: ふふっ、任せてください……！

engChrName: We're all coming back safe!
engSearchText: We're all coming back safe!
jpnChrName: 絶対みんなで戻ってくるから！
jpnSearchText: 絶対みんなで戻ってくるから！

engChrName: Well, if everyone's done giving their permission, can we go now—
engSearchText:
Well, if everyone's done giving their permission, can
we go now—
jpnChrName: ……ったく。 ま、これでお許しも出たことだし──
jpnSearchText:
……ったく。
ま、これでお許しも出たことだし──

engChrName: Paulette! Yumé!
engSearchText: Paulette! Yumé!
jpnChrName: ポーレット、ユメ──！！
jpnSearchText: ポーレット、ユメ──！！

engChrName: Oh, Maxim...
engSearchText: Oh, Maxim...
jpnChrName: マクシムさん……
jpnSearchText: マクシムさん……

engChrName: Y-You're both safe! Oh, thank you, Goddess. Thank you!
engSearchText:
Y-You're both safe! Oh, thank you, Goddess.
Thank you!
jpnChrName: ぶ、無事だったんだな……！ うう、良かった、本当に良かったぁ……！
jpnSearchText:
ぶ、無事だったんだな……！
うう、良かった、本当に良かったぁ……！

engChrName: Calm down there, champ. Don't just barge in and start freaking out.
engSearchText:
Calm down there, champ. Don't just barge in and start
freaking out.
jpnChrName: いきなり乱入してきて 取り乱しすぎだろ、チャンピオン。
jpnSearchText:
いきなり乱入してきて
取り乱しすぎだろ、チャンピオン。

engChrName: I think it's fair for him to freak out a little.
engSearchText: I think it's fair for him to freak out a little.
jpnChrName: あはは……仕方ありませんよ。
jpnSearchText: あはは……仕方ありませんよ。

engChrName: Maxim's crying again!
engSearchText: Maxim's crying again!
jpnChrName: オジサン、また泣いてるの～？
jpnSearchText: オジサン、また泣いてるの～？

engChrName: I appreciate your concern, Maxim... And I'm glad you're doing well, too.
engSearchText:
I appreciate your concern, Maxim... And I'm glad
you're doing well, too.
jpnChrName: 心配してくれてありがとう、マクシムさん。 ……貴方の方も怪我はないみたいね。
jpnSearchText:
心配してくれてありがとう、マクシムさん。
……貴方の方も怪我はないみたいね。

engChrName: I...really am glad you're safe.
engSearchText: I...really am glad you're safe.
jpnChrName: 無事でよかったわ、本当に。
jpnSearchText: 無事でよかったわ、本当に。

engChrName: Paulette!
engSearchText: Paulette!
jpnChrName: ポ、ポーレットぉ……！！
jpnSearchText: ポ、ポーレットぉ……！！

engChrName: Man, what a sad sack. Can we go now?
engSearchText: Man, what a sad sack. Can we go now?
jpnChrName: つくづく格好つかねぇオッサンだな…… ま、とっとと行くとするか。
jpnSearchText:
つくづく格好つかねぇオッサンだな……
ま、とっとと行くとするか。

engChrName: Yes. We ought to give them some privacy.
engSearchText: Yes. We ought to give them some privacy.
jpnChrName: ええ、お邪魔しては悪いですし。
jpnSearchText: ええ、お邪魔しては悪いですし。

engChrName: *sniff* W-Wait up!
engSearchText: *sniff* W-Wait up!
jpnChrName: グス──待ってくれ、君たち！
jpnSearchText: グス──待ってくれ、君たち！

engChrName: I can't even begin to repay you for helping Paulette and Yumé.
engSearchText:
I can't even begin to repay you for helping Paulette
and Yumé.
jpnChrName: ポーレットたちのこと、 礼を言っても言い切れないくらいだ。
jpnSearchText:
ポーレットたちのこと、
礼を言っても言い切れないくらいだ。

engChrName: It barely cuts it as thanks, but I'd like to give you all special seats to the Z1 Grand Prix.
engSearchText:
It barely cuts it as thanks, but I'd like to give you all
special seats to the Z1 Grand Prix.
jpnChrName: 代わりと言ってはなんだが、いずれ君たちを Ｚ１グランプリの特別観戦席に招待させてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
代わりと言ってはなんだが、いずれ君たちを
Ｚ１グランプリの特別観戦席に招待させてくれ。

engChrName: You better make sure you come back to enjoy it!
engSearchText: You better make sure you come back to enjoy it!
jpnChrName: ──だから必ず無事に戻ってくるんだ、いいね！
jpnSearchText: ──だから必ず無事に戻ってくるんだ、いいね！

engChrName: I would actually like seeing the grand prix.
engSearchText: I would actually like seeing the grand prix.
jpnChrName: うーん、ちょっと興味はあるかな？
jpnSearchText: うーん、ちょっと興味はあるかな？

engChrName: Got it, champ.
engSearchText: Got it, champ.
jpnChrName: ……ハッ、了解だチャンピオン。
jpnSearchText: ……ハッ、了解だチャンピオン。

engChrName: Come back soon, everyone!
engSearchText: Come back soon, everyone!
jpnChrName: みんな、早く帰ってきてね～～！
jpnSearchText: みんな、早く帰ってきてね～～！

engChrName: All right, I think I largely understand.
engSearchText: All right, I think I largely understand.
jpnChrName: ……なるほど、話は判りました。
jpnSearchText: ……なるほど、話は判りました。

engChrName: While I don't intend to encourage your illicit activities...
engSearchText:
While I don't intend to encourage your
illicit activities...
jpnChrName: 貴方がたの非合法活動そのものを 認めるつもりはありませんが──
jpnSearchText:
貴方がたの非合法活動そのものを
認めるつもりはありませんが──

engChrName: ...I do, however, agree that something must be done about Almata and their legacy.
engSearchText:
...I do, however, agree that something must be done
about Almata and their legacy.
jpnChrName: かの者たち（アルマータ）の負の遺産について 何とかしたいのは私としても同じです。
jpnSearchText:
かの者たち（アルマータ）の負の遺産について
何とかしたいのは私としても同じです。

engChrName: You're welcome to come and go from here as needed while you're in the capital.
engSearchText:
You're welcome to come and go from here as needed
while you're in the capital.
jpnChrName: 首都での活動の際には遠慮なく こちらを利用すると宜しいでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
首都での活動の際には遠慮なく
こちらを利用すると宜しいでしょう。

engChrName: How very kind of you.
engSearchText: How very kind of you.
jpnChrName: ハハ、ありがてえ。
jpnSearchText: ハハ、ありがてえ。

engChrName: Nah, but seriously. I appreciate the help. I was kinda expectin' every higher up in the Congregation for Divine Worship to have a stick jammed up their—
engSearchText:
Nah, but seriously. I appreciate the help. I was kinda
expectin' every higher up in the Congregation for
Divine Worship to have a stick jammed up their—
jpnChrName: お堅い典礼省のお偉いさんの割には 話が早くて助かりますよ。
jpnSearchText:
お堅い典礼省のお偉いさんの割には
話が早くて助かりますよ。

engChrName: Celis, you're being rude.
engSearchText: Celis, you're being rude.
jpnChrName: 失礼ですよ、セリスさん。
jpnSearchText: 失礼ですよ、セリスさん。

engChrName: However, I will agree that it's a little surprising.
engSearchText: However, I will agree that it's a little surprising.
jpnChrName: ──ですがどうやら 気を遣わせてしまったようですね？
jpnSearchText:
──ですがどうやら
気を遣わせてしまったようですね？

engChrName: Hardly. Let's just say that arrangements had been made by someone else already.
engSearchText:
Hardly. Let's just say that arrangements had been
made by someone else already.
jpnChrName: いえ、これもあの方の 配慮があればこそでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
いえ、これもあの方の
配慮があればこそでしょう。

engChrName: And speaking of them.
engSearchText: And speaking of them.
jpnChrName: ──と、噂をすれば。
jpnSearchText: ──と、噂をすれば。

engChrName: My, what a coincidence.
engSearchText: My, what a coincidence.
jpnChrName: はは、偶然ですね。
jpnSearchText: はは、偶然ですね。

engChrName: Father Bark—wait, shit. I mean, Master Bergard!
engSearchText: Father Bark—wait, shit. I mean, Master Bergard!
jpnChrName: バルク── いやベルガルド先生！
jpnSearchText:
バルク──
いやベルガルド先生！

engChrName: Celis, Leon. It's been about a week.
engSearchText: Celis, Leon. It's been about a week.
jpnChrName: 一週間ぶりか、セリスにリオン。
jpnSearchText: 一週間ぶりか、セリスにリオン。

engChrName: Nice to see you, too, Bishop Orwell. It's been a while. I appreciate you making arrangements.
engSearchText:
Nice to see you, too, Bishop Orwell. It's been a while.
I appreciate you making arrangements.
jpnChrName: オーウェル殿もご無沙汰している。 配慮して頂いたようでありがたい。
jpnSearchText:
オーウェル殿もご無沙汰している。
配慮して頂いたようでありがたい。

engChrName: Don't mention it. We might not be part of the same organization, but you always did well by me when you were on active duty.
engSearchText:
Don't mention it. We might not be part of the same
organization, but you always did well by me when you
were on active duty.
jpnChrName: いえいえ、貴方には現役の頃から 省の隔てなくお世話になっていますから。
jpnSearchText:
いえいえ、貴方には現役の頃から
省の隔てなくお世話になっていますから。

engChrName: Now, if you'll excuse me, I shall take my leave. Take however much time you need, all of you.
engSearchText:
Now, if you'll excuse me, I shall take my leave.
Take however much time you need, all of you.
jpnChrName: それでは私はこれで── ごゆっくり、両卿にベルガルド殿も。
jpnSearchText:
それでは私はこれで──
ごゆっくり、両卿にベルガルド殿も。

engChrName: Guess they probably would've kicked us out the door if it wasn't for you, eh, Master?
engSearchText:
Guess they probably would've kicked us out the door
if it wasn't for you, eh, Master?
jpnChrName: やれやれ、アタシらというより 先生の仲立ちあっての待遇ってわけか。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、アタシらというより
先生の仲立ちあっての待遇ってわけか。

engChrName: Though we've managed quite a lot on our own.
engSearchText: Though we've managed quite a lot on our own.
jpnChrName: まあ、ただでさえ独断専行で 色々とやっちゃいましたからねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、ただでさえ独断専行で
色々とやっちゃいましたからねぇ。

engChrName: Now, now. Don't be so put out. Building bridges where there used to be none takes time.
engSearchText:
Now, now. Don't be so put out. Building bridges
where there used to be none takes time.
jpnChrName: まあ、そう拗ねるでない。 元より容易くは埋まらぬ類いの溝だ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、そう拗ねるでない。
元より容易くは埋まらぬ類いの溝だ。

engChrName: So, what's the current status? I do not believe the rubble's been cleared in Oración yet.
engSearchText:
So, what's the current status? I do not believe the
rubble's been cleared in Oración yet.
jpnChrName: しかしオラシオンの瓦礫の撤去は まだ終わっておらぬのにどうしたのだ？
jpnSearchText:
しかしオラシオンの瓦礫の撤去は
まだ終わっておらぬのにどうしたのだ？

engChrName: Right. About that...
engSearchText: Right. About that...
jpnChrName: ええ、それについては──
jpnSearchText: ええ、それについては──

engChrName: Oh. You're still sticking with these jerks, Master?
engSearchText: Oh. You're still sticking with these jerks, Master?
jpnChrName: って先生、まだそいつらと 一緒に行動してるんスか？
jpnSearchText:
って先生、まだそいつらと
一緒に行動してるんスか？

engChrName: I was under the impression you were merely accompanying them as matter of necessity and that you'd part ways after business was settled in Oración.
engSearchText:
I was under the impression you were merely
accompanying them as matter of necessity and that
you'd part ways after business was settled in Oración.
jpnChrName: ふむ、てっきり古都での件のみ 手を貸しただけかと思いましたが。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、てっきり古都での件のみ
手を貸しただけかと思いましたが。

engChrName: You know you can just say hello, right?
engSearchText: You know you can just say hello, right?
jpnChrName: ハン、ご挨拶じゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: ハン、ご挨拶じゃねえか。

engChrName: Ain't gonna deny we're not cut from the cleanest cloth.
engSearchText:
Ain't gonna deny we're not cut from the
cleanest cloth.
jpnChrName: ま、たしかにこちとら 胡散臭いグレーな稼業だしなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、たしかにこちとら
胡散臭いグレーな稼業だしなぁ。

engChrName: Let us just say it's a complicated matter. For the time being, it would be far more beneficial to stick with them than act alone.
engSearchText:
Let us just say it's a complicated matter. For the time
being, it would be far more beneficial to stick with
them than act alone.
jpnChrName: フフ、例の件の後始末がつくまでは せめて見届けるつもりでな。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、例の件の後始末がつくまでは
せめて見届けるつもりでな。

engChrName: It isn't too unlike the reason that brought you to the capital in the first place.
engSearchText:
It isn't too unlike the reason that brought you to the
capital in the first place.
jpnChrName: おぬしらが首都に来たのと 似たような理由かもしれぬが。
jpnSearchText:
おぬしらが首都に来たのと
似たような理由かもしれぬが。

engChrName: Heh, you never pull a punch.
engSearchText: Heh, you never pull a punch.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、お見通しか。
jpnSearchText: やれやれ、お見通しか。

engChrName: We left the Second Dominion in charge of cleaning up that mess.
engSearchText:
We left the Second Dominion in charge of cleaning
up that mess.
jpnChrName: ええ──旧王宮の瓦礫撤去は 副長たちに任せてきましたよ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ──旧王宮の瓦礫撤去は
副長たちに任せてきましたよ。

engChrName: Those partitions of his should help look for shit faster than I ever could.
engSearchText:
Those partitions of his should help look for shit faster
than I ever could.
jpnChrName: あの人の《匣》ならアタシらより 遙かに効率的に捜せそうですからね。
jpnSearchText:
あの人の《匣》ならアタシらより
遙かに効率的に捜せそうですからね。

engChrName: Abbas' team also arrived to lend a hand.
engSearchText: Abbas' team also arrived to lend a hand.
jpnChrName: それとアッバスさんの部隊が 手伝いに駆け付けてくれましてね。
jpnSearchText:
それとアッバスさんの部隊が
手伝いに駆け付けてくれましてね。

engChrName: He's been acting separately from Wazy quite often lately.
engSearchText:
He's been acting separately from Wazy quite
often lately.
jpnChrName: あの人も最近、ワジ君と別に 独自に動いていることが多くて。
jpnSearchText:
あの人も最近、ワジ君と別に
独自に動いていることが多くて。

engChrName: Though I guess that's what you ought to expect of a master of the Kunlun school.
engSearchText:
Though I guess that's what you ought to expect of a
master of the Kunlun school.
jpnChrName: さすがは先生の《崑崙流》の 直弟子の一人と言いますか。
jpnSearchText:
さすがは先生の《崑崙流》の
直弟子の一人と言いますか。

engChrName: Heh. I will leave you two to it, then. I'm glad you're doing well.
engSearchText:
Heh. I will leave you two to it, then. I'm glad you're
doing well.
jpnChrName: フ……なるほどな。 ２人とも息災そうで何よりだ。
jpnSearchText:
フ……なるほどな。
２人とも息災そうで何よりだ。

engChrName: Hopefully I will get to see them sometime. Kevin and Gaius, too.
engSearchText:
Hopefully I will get to see them sometime. Kevin and
Gaius, too.
jpnChrName: いずれケビンやガイウス共々、 改めて挨拶できるといいのだが。
jpnSearchText:
いずれケビンやガイウス共々、
改めて挨拶できるといいのだが。

engChrName: Please. Maybe that'll get 'em off our backs.
engSearchText: Please. Maybe that'll get 'em off our backs.
jpnChrName: いや、マジでそうしてくださいよ。 色々突っ込まれまくってんですから。
jpnSearchText:
いや、マジでそうしてくださいよ。
色々突っ込まれまくってんですから。

engChrName: The commander's not said shit, so they're botherin' us about it instead.
engSearchText:
The commander's not said shit, so they're botherin' us
about it instead.
jpnChrName: ったくアタシらを問い詰める前に 黙ってた総長を問い詰めろってんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ったくアタシらを問い詰める前に
黙ってた総長を問い詰めろってんだ。

engChrName: That's the commander for you. Were they to upset her, she would sooner drink them under the table than speak frankly. They are aware of that.
engSearchText:
That's the commander for you. Were they to upset
her, she would sooner drink them under the table
than speak frankly. They are aware of that.
jpnChrName: フフ、まあ総長ですからねぇ。 みんな酔い潰されたくないでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、まあ総長ですからねぇ。
みんな酔い潰されたくないでしょう。

engChrName: They're having fun.
engSearchText: They're having fun.
jpnChrName: うーん、盛り上がってますねぇ。
jpnSearchText: うーん、盛り上がってますねぇ。

engChrName: How much of a big deal is gramps? Someone's fawning over him everywhere we go.
engSearchText:
How much of a big deal is gramps?
Someone's fawning over him everywhere we go.
jpnChrName: しかし爺さんもホント大物だよな。 どんだけ慕われてんだっつの。
jpnSearchText:
しかし爺さんもホント大物だよな。
どんだけ慕われてんだっつの。

engChrName: He looks to be very well acquainted and respected by a lot of high ranking individuals.
engSearchText:
He looks to be very well acquainted and respected by
a lot of high ranking individuals.
jpnChrName: ふふ、しかも聞いているだけで 凄そうな方々ばかりみたいですし。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、しかも聞いているだけで
凄そうな方々ばかりみたいですし。

engChrName: He's got a lot of apprentices outside the church, like me.
engSearchText:
He's got a lot of apprentices outside the church,
like me.
jpnChrName: 加えて、俺みたいな教会外の弟子が 何人もいるくらいだからな。
jpnSearchText:
加えて、俺みたいな教会外の弟子が
何人もいるくらいだからな。

engChrName: But...
engSearchText: But...
jpnChrName: だが──
jpnSearchText: だが──

engChrName: (Why would these idiots be all the way here? What's so important to leave artifact retrieval to someone else?)
engSearchText:
(Why would these idiots be all the way here?
What's so important to leave artifact retrieval to
someone else?)
jpnChrName: （遺物回収が専門のこいつらが   同僚に任せて首都に来た理由か……）
jpnSearchText:
（遺物回収が専門のこいつらが
同僚に任せて首都に来た理由か……）

engChrName: (They were talking about Almata's legacy? Could that mean... No, it can't, can it?)
engSearchText:
(They were talking about Almata's legacy? Could
that mean... No, it can't, can it?)
jpnChrName: （連中（アルマータ）の負の遺産とか言ってたが   ………もしかすると───いや。）
jpnSearchText:
（連中（アルマータ）の負の遺産とか言ってたが
………もしかすると───いや。）

engChrName: Hmm?
engSearchText: Hmm?

engChrName: Somethin' buggin' you, Arkride? Need to let some steam off?
engSearchText:
Somethin' buggin' you, Arkride? Need to let some
steam off?
jpnChrName: ハッ、なんだアークライド。 ひょっとして暴れたりねぇってか？
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、なんだアークライド。
ひょっとして暴れたりねぇってか？

engChrName: We never declared a proper victor for that little game, so why don'tcha square up for another round?
engSearchText:
We never declared a proper victor for that little game,
so why don'tcha square up for another round?
jpnChrName: 前回のゲームじゃカチ合わなかったし、 何だったら改めて勝負するかよ？
jpnSearchText:
前回のゲームじゃカチ合わなかったし、
何だったら改めて勝負するかよ？

engChrName: Mind chillin' for just one second? If you've got some pent up energy, go bother someone else.
engSearchText:
Mind chillin' for just one second? If you've got some
pent up energy, go bother someone else.
jpnChrName: なんでそうなるんだっつーの…… 暴れ足りないなら他を当たってくれ。
jpnSearchText:
なんでそうなるんだっつーの……
暴れ足りないなら他を当たってくれ。

engChrName: 'Sides, lotta other players are out here in the capital today.
engSearchText:
'Sides, lotta other players are out here in the
capital today.
jpnChrName: どうやらゲームの参加者の何割かは、 物見遊山で首都に来てるみたいだしな。
jpnSearchText:
どうやらゲームの参加者の何割かは、
物見遊山で首都に来てるみたいだしな。

engChrName: Not that that might have anything to do with why you two are here.
engSearchText:
Not that that might have anything to do with why
you two are here.
jpnChrName: ま、アンタらの目当ては そいつらってわけでもなさそうだが。
jpnSearchText:
ま、アンタらの目当ては
そいつらってわけでもなさそうだが。

engChrName: Tch.
engSearchText: Tch.
jpnChrName: へえ……？
jpnSearchText: へえ……？

engChrName: Do feel free to guess.
engSearchText: Do feel free to guess.
jpnChrName: フフ、そのあたりは ご想像にお任せしましょう。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、そのあたりは
ご想像にお任せしましょう。

engChrName: I'd love to hope for nothing to happen whatsoever, but we're not naïve enough to let our guard down. We're merely here as insurance.
engSearchText:
I'd love to hope for nothing to happen whatsoever,
but we're not naïve enough to let our guard down.
We're merely here as insurance.
jpnChrName: 何も起きなければ良し── 僕たちはあくまで備えるだけです。
jpnSearchText:
何も起きなければ良し──
僕たちはあくまで備えるだけです。

engChrName: Not unlike you, spriggan.
engSearchText: Not unlike you, spriggan.
jpnChrName: 貴方たち裏解決屋（スプリガン）同様、ね。
jpnSearchText: 貴方たち裏解決屋（スプリガン）同様、ね。

engChrName: Fine. Guess you've got a point.
engSearchText: Fine. Guess you've got a point.
jpnChrName: ハン……ごもっともだ。
jpnSearchText: ハン……ごもっともだ。

engChrName: Hmm...
engSearchText: Hmm...

engChrName: (They get along like cats and dogs.)
engSearchText: (They get along like cats and dogs.)
jpnChrName: （な、なんだかちょっと   ピリピリしているような……？）
jpnSearchText:
（な、なんだかちょっと
ピリピリしているような……？）

engChrName: (They're not even trying to hide it.)
engSearchText: (They're not even trying to hide it.)
jpnChrName: （そうだね……結構露骨かも。）
jpnSearchText: （そうだね……結構露骨かも。）

engChrName: (Pretty boy over there looks like he has a bone to pick with Van.)
engSearchText:
(Pretty boy over there looks like he has a bone to pick
with Van.)
jpnChrName: （フン、どうやら優男の方が   何やらヴァンに含みがあるようだが。）
jpnSearchText:
（フン、どうやら優男の方が
何やらヴァンに含みがあるようだが。）

engChrName: (But I don't think it has anything to do with Bergard.)
engSearchText:
(But I don't think it has anything to do
with Bergard.)
jpnChrName: （うーん、ベルガルドさん絡みって   雰囲気でもなさそうだけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（うーん、ベルガルドさん絡みって
雰囲気でもなさそうだけど……）

engChrName: (It doesn't look like Mr. Zeman is the cause of the animosity, however.)
engSearchText:
(It doesn't look like Mr. Zeman is the cause of
the animosity, however.)
jpnChrName: （ふむ……ベルガルド様が原因という   雰囲気では無さそうですが。）
jpnSearchText:
（ふむ……ベルガルド様が原因という
雰囲気では無さそうですが。）

engChrName: Oh, man. These pancakes are THE shit!
engSearchText: Oh, man. These pancakes are THE shit!
jpnChrName: おっ…… ウメーなここのケーキ！？
jpnSearchText:
おっ……
ウメーなここのケーキ！？

engChrName: You really do know what you're talking about!
engSearchText: You really do know what you're talking about!
jpnChrName: さすがアンタの お勧めなだけはあるじゃねえか！
jpnSearchText:
さすがアンタの
お勧めなだけはあるじゃねえか！

engChrName: You're right, it IS good! The butter gives it such richness, and the flavor only deepens the longer I taste it.
engSearchText:
You're right, it IS good! The butter gives it such
richness, and the flavor only deepens the longer I
taste it.
jpnChrName: 本当に……濃厚なバターの香りと 幾重もの風味が口いっぱいに解けて。
jpnSearchText:
本当に……濃厚なバターの香りと
幾重もの風味が口いっぱいに解けて。

engChrName: I'm glad you enjoy them. They've been one of my favorites since I was a student.
engSearchText:
I'm glad you enjoy them. They've been one of my
favorites since I was a student.
jpnChrName: ふふ、気に入ってくれて良かった。 学生時代からのお気に入りなんです。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、気に入ってくれて良かった。
学生時代からのお気に入りなんです。

engChrName: Though I'm nowhere near their biggest fan. I know someone who could probably talk at length about every—
engSearchText:
Though I'm nowhere near their biggest fan. I know
someone who could probably talk at length about
every—
jpnChrName: まあ私以上に贔屓にしているのがいて、 全品制覇してましたけど──
jpnSearchText:
まあ私以上に贔屓にしているのがいて、
全品制覇してましたけど──

engChrName: Wait, Van? When did you get here?!
engSearchText: Wait, Van? When did you get here?!
jpnChrName: ってヴァン、何時の間に！？
jpnSearchText: ってヴァン、何時の間に！？

engChrName: Gettin' real cozy there, talkin' about personal information. Guess you can be laidback sometimes when you want to, A-rank bracer.
engSearchText:
Gettin' real cozy there, talkin' about
personal information. Guess you can be laidback
sometimes when you want to, A-rank bracer.
jpnChrName: ったく個人情報をペラペラと。 Ａ級ともあろう者が弛んでんな。
jpnSearchText:
ったく個人情報をペラペラと。
Ａ級ともあろう者が弛んでんな。

engChrName: Ahaha... Hello, everyone. Haven't seen you since the afterparty.
engSearchText:
Ahaha... Hello, everyone. Haven't seen you since
the afterparty.
jpnChrName: あはは……皆さん、 先日の打ち上げ以来ですね。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……皆さん、
先日の打ち上げ以来ですね。

engChrName: Hi, there! I guess this is the first time since the afterparty we get to talk.
engSearchText:
Hi, there! I guess this is the first time since the
afterparty we get to talk.
jpnChrName: えへへ、みなさん、 先日の打ち上げ以来ですね。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、みなさん、
先日の打ち上げ以来ですね。

engChrName: That's one bunch of women that could kick some serious ass. Haven't seen you ladies since the afterparty.
engSearchText:
That's one bunch of women that could kick some
serious ass. Haven't seen you ladies since
the afterparty.
jpnChrName: 打ち上げぶりだが…… 女傑どもが揃い踏みかよ。
jpnSearchText:
打ち上げぶりだが……
女傑どもが揃い踏みかよ。

engChrName: Greetings, everyone. I don't believe we've had a chance to meet since the afterparty.
engSearchText:
Greetings, everyone. I don't believe we've had a
chance to meet since the afterparty.
jpnChrName: フフ……皆様、 先日の打ち上げ以来ですね。
jpnSearchText:
フフ……皆様、
先日の打ち上げ以来ですね。

engChrName: Ah. Hello, everyone. Haven't seen you since the afterparty.
engSearchText:
Ah. Hello, everyone. Haven't seen you since
the afterparty.
jpnChrName: えっと、皆さん、 先日の打ち上げ以来ですね。
jpnSearchText:
えっと、皆さん、
先日の打ち上げ以来ですね。

engChrName: Elaine, Celis! Heya, I haven't seen you since the afterparty!
engSearchText:
Elaine, Celis! Heya, I haven't seen you since
the afterparty!
jpnChrName: 打ち上げぶりね、 エレインさん、セリスさんも。
jpnSearchText:
打ち上げぶりね、
エレインさん、セリスさんも。

engChrName: And you, Rixia. You're gonna be going on the three o'clock train, right?
engSearchText:
And you, Rixia. You're gonna be going on the three
o'clock train, right?
jpnChrName: リーシャはたしか、 ３時くらいの列車だったっけ？
jpnSearchText:
リーシャはたしか、
３時くらいの列車だったっけ？

engChrName: Yes. I was planning on picking up some souvenirs before I headed back.
engSearchText:
Yes. I was planning on picking up some souvenirs
before I headed back.
jpnChrName: うん、最後にお土産を 買ってから帰ろうと思って。
jpnSearchText:
うん、最後にお土産を
買ってから帰ろうと思って。

engChrName: I haven't seen your group since the afterparty.
engSearchText: I haven't seen your group since the afterparty.
jpnChrName: フフ、先日の打ち上げ以来か。
jpnSearchText: フフ、先日の打ち上げ以来か。

engChrName: Hey, Master. You're here, too?
engSearchText: Hey, Master. You're here, too?
jpnChrName: って、先生もいたんスか。
jpnSearchText: って、先生もいたんスか。

engChrName: Leon and I split up. We're just lookin' around, like you.
engSearchText:
Leon and I split up. We're just lookin' around,
like you.
jpnChrName: いや～、そっちと同じく リオンと手分けして回ってるんだが。
jpnSearchText:
いや～、そっちと同じく
リオンと手分けして回ってるんだが。

engChrName: I was almost done with my round when I bumped into these two.
engSearchText:
I was almost done with my round when I bumped
into these two.
jpnChrName: 一回りしたところで偶然、 こっちの２人に出くわしちまってな。
jpnSearchText:
一回りしたところで偶然、
こっちの２人に出くわしちまってな。

engChrName: We got to talk a bit during the afterparty and stuff, so I said why not take a break and chat a li'l.
engSearchText:
We got to talk a bit during the afterparty and stuff, so
I said why not take a break and chat a li'l.
jpnChrName: 打ち上げの時に話してたのもあって 一休みがてらここに入ったワケだ。
jpnSearchText:
打ち上げの時に話してたのもあって
一休みがてらここに入ったワケだ。

engChrName: I'll be heading back to Crossbell after this.
engSearchText: I'll be heading back to Crossbell after this.
jpnChrName: ふふ、私はこの後、 クロスベルに戻るつもりですが……
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、私はこの後、
クロスベルに戻るつもりですが……
