engChrName: But I'm glad I was able to be here for the festival. I don't come home often, but I'm glad I did this time. It was worth it.
engSearchText:
But I'm glad I was able to be here for the festival.
I don't come home often, but I'm glad I did this time.
It was worth it.
jpnChrName: 無事、記念祭に立ち会えて良かった。 久々に里帰りした甲斐があったと思います。
jpnSearchText:
無事、記念祭に立ち会えて良かった。
久々に里帰りした甲斐があったと思います。

engChrName: Right...
engSearchText: Right...
jpnChrName: そうか……
jpnSearchText: そうか……

engChrName: Nothing says you can't come again in a year.
engSearchText: Nothing says you can't come again in a year.
jpnChrName: ハン、なら年一くらいで 戻ってくりゃあいいだろうに。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、なら年一くらいで
戻ってくりゃあいいだろうに。

engChrName: I mean, you can always pop by next year.
engSearchText: I mean, you can always pop by next year.
jpnChrName: ふう……だったら年一くらいは 戻ってきなさいっての。
jpnSearchText:
ふう……だったら年一くらいは
戻ってきなさいっての。

engChrName: Why not make a habit of it?
engSearchText: Why not make a habit of it?
jpnChrName: ま、だったらこれからも 戻ってくればいいんじゃないか？
jpnSearchText:
ま、だったらこれからも
戻ってくればいいんじゃないか？

engChrName: I would love to, but Arc en Ciel keeps me so busy I might not be able to. I'll definitely keep it in mind, though.
engSearchText:
I would love to, but Arc en Ciel keeps me so busy I
might not be able to. I'll definitely keep it in
mind, though.
jpnChrName: そうね……舞台次第だけど これからはもう少し考えてみる。
jpnSearchText:
そうね……舞台次第だけど
これからはもう少し考えてみる。

engChrName: I would love to, but Arc en Ciel keeps me so busy I might not be able to. I'll definitely keep it in mind, though.
engSearchText:
I would love to, but Arc en Ciel keeps me so busy I
might not be able to. I'll definitely keep it in
mind, though.
jpnChrName: そうですね……舞台次第ですが これからはもう少し考えてみます。
jpnSearchText:
そうですね……舞台次第ですが
これからはもう少し考えてみます。

engChrName: Ahem. While there's nothing wrong with keeping an eye on things, of course...
engSearchText:
Ahem. While there's nothing wrong with keeping an
eye on things, of course...
jpnChrName: コホン……それはそうと、 見回りするのは結構だけど。
jpnSearchText:
コホン……それはそうと、
見回りするのは結構だけど。

engChrName: You should maybe hold off on taking any strange jobs today.
engSearchText:
You should maybe hold off on taking any strange
jobs today.
jpnChrName: 今日くらいは怪しげな依頼を 請けるのは止めておきなさいよ？
jpnSearchText:
今日くらいは怪しげな依頼を
請けるのは止めておきなさいよ？

engChrName: Yes, the last remnants of A were taken out as of three days ago and it doesn't look like anyone else is on the move yet...
engSearchText:
Yes, the last remnants of A were taken out as of three
days ago and it doesn't look like anyone else is on the
move yet...
jpnChrName: ３日前の件で《Ａ》残党も壊滅── 他の勢力が動いている気配もないわ。
jpnSearchText:
３日前の件で《Ａ》残党も壊滅──
他の勢力が動いている気配もないわ。

engChrName: ...but it doesn't hurt to be cautious. There will definitely be pushback, so this calm before the storm is time you should take to rest and recover.
engSearchText:
...but it doesn't hurt to be cautious. There will
definitely be pushback, so this calm before the storm
is time you should take to rest and recover.
jpnChrName: いつ揺れ戻しがあるか判らないんだから こういう時こそ気力を蓄えておくように。
jpnSearchText:
いつ揺れ戻しがあるか判らないんだから
こういう時こそ気力を蓄えておくように。

engChrName: Yeah, yeah, I get it. Look at you, still playing the part of good vice prez.
engSearchText:
Yeah, yeah, I get it. Look at you, still playing the part
of good vice prez.
jpnChrName: へいへい、判ってるっつーの。 相変わらずの副会長気質だな。
jpnSearchText:
へいへい、判ってるっつーの。
相変わらずの副会長気質だな。

engChrName: Just like that time you drilled a lecture into my skull when you caught me skipping classes to come here.
engSearchText:
Just like that time you drilled a lecture into my skull
when you caught me skipping classes to come here.
jpnChrName: 俺がサボってここの新作を堪能してる時も 目ざとく嗅ぎつけて説教しに来るしよ。
jpnSearchText:
俺がサボってここの新作を堪能してる時も
目ざとく嗅ぎつけて説教しに来るしよ。

engChrName: Why, exactly, are you making it look like it was my fault? That was entirely on you!
engSearchText:
Why, exactly, are you making it look like it was
my fault? That was entirely on you!
jpnChrName: あ、あれは一から十まで 貴方が悪いんでしょうがっ……！
jpnSearchText:
あ、あれは一から十まで
貴方が悪いんでしょうがっ……！

engChrName: And may I remind you I was the Student Council PRESIDENT after the second year? You did a campaign speech for me!
engSearchText:
And may I remind you I was the Student Council
PRESIDENT after the second year? You did a
campaign speech for me!
jpnChrName: それに私は２年からは生徒会長！ 応援演説したのも貴方でしょう！？
jpnSearchText:
それに私は２年からは生徒会長！
応援演説したのも貴方でしょう！？

engChrName: Not so much 'did' as 'René dumped it on me last minute.'
engSearchText:
Not so much 'did' as 'René dumped it on me
last minute.'
jpnChrName: あー、ルネのヤツが土壇場で 俺に押し付けやがったんだよな……
jpnSearchText:
あー、ルネのヤツが土壇場で
俺に押し付けやがったんだよな……

engChrName: Winged most of it, to be honest. But hey, it worked! You can't complain.
engSearchText:
Winged most of it, to be honest. But hey, it worked!
You can't complain.
jpnChrName: おかげで少しばかり盛る羽目になったが ま、結果オーライってもんだろ？
jpnSearchText:
おかげで少しばかり盛る羽目になったが
ま、結果オーライってもんだろ？

engChrName: Oh, can't complain. Especially about that part about me beating up those thugs and busting corrupt staff. That really helped my campaign!
engSearchText:
Oh, can't complain. Especially about that part about
me beating up those thugs and busting corrupt staff.
That really helped my campaign!
jpnChrName: えーえー、不良チームを叩きのめしただの、 悪徳業者を告発しただの尾ひれをつけてね！
jpnSearchText:
えーえー、不良チームを叩きのめしただの、
悪徳業者を告発しただの尾ひれをつけてね！

engChrName: Do you have ANY idea how scared everyone was to approach me the year after my election?!
engSearchText:
Do you have ANY idea how scared everyone was to
approach me the year after my election?!
jpnChrName: 就任してから一年半、どれだけ 周りから怖がられたと思ってるの！？
jpnSearchText:
就任してから一年半、どれだけ
周りから怖がられたと思ってるの！？

engChrName: Okay, but...that actually, literally happened.
engSearchText: Okay, but...that actually, literally happened.
jpnChrName: いや……だって事実じゃん。
jpnSearchText: いや……だって事実じゃん。

engChrName: And don't forget about gettin' flooded with fan mail after the fact. I'd say it prepared you real nice for your current job, eh?
engSearchText:
And don't forget about gettin' flooded with fan mail
after the fact. I'd say it prepared you real nice for your
current job, eh?
jpnChrName: それにファンレターも大量だったんだろ？ むしろ今の人気のリハーサルって事で。
jpnSearchText:
それにファンレターも大量だったんだろ？
むしろ今の人気のリハーサルって事で。

engChrName: YOU!
engSearchText: YOU!

engChrName: (Haha, they're so close it's adorable.)
engSearchText: (Haha, they're so close it's adorable.)
jpnChrName: （ふふっ、仲良しですね。）
jpnSearchText: （ふふっ、仲良しですね。）

engChrName: (And they're REALLY not going out?)
engSearchText: (And they're REALLY not going out?)
jpnChrName: （なあ……コレ、   付き合ってるとかじゃねえんだよな？）
jpnSearchText:
（なあ……コレ、
付き合ってるとかじゃねえんだよな？）

engChrName: (As I understand it, not anymore.)
engSearchText: (As I understand it, not anymore.)
jpnChrName: （えっと……今はそうじゃない、   とは聞いていますけど。）
jpnSearchText:
（えっと……今はそうじゃない、
とは聞いていますけど。）

engChrName: (Apparently they did long ago, but not anymore.)
engSearchText: (Apparently they did long ago, but not anymore.)
jpnChrName: （えと、昔はそうだったけど、   今は違うみたいですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（えと、昔はそうだったけど、
今は違うみたいですね。）

engChrName: (Apparently had the hots for each other back in the day, but not anymore. Dunno if I buy that crap.)
engSearchText:
(Apparently had the hots for each other back in the
day, but not anymore. Dunno if I buy that crap.)
jpnChrName: （昔は付き合ってたそうだが   クク、今も怪しいんじゃねえのか？）
jpnSearchText:
（昔は付き合ってたそうだが
クク、今も怪しいんじゃねえのか？）

engChrName: (I dare say that is something only they can answer for you.)
engSearchText:
(I dare say that is something only they can answer
for you.)
jpnChrName: （フフ……本当の所は   ご本人たち次第ではないかと。）
jpnSearchText:
（フフ……本当の所は
ご本人たち次第ではないかと。）

engChrName: (Hmm. Not from what I've heard, no. At least not now.)
engSearchText:
(Hmm. Not from what I've heard, no. At least
not now.)
jpnChrName: （えっと、今はそうじゃないとは   聞いてるけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（えっと、今はそうじゃないとは
聞いてるけど……）

engChrName: (I guess they USED to be an item...)
engSearchText: (I guess they USED to be an item...)
jpnChrName: （ま、昔はそうだったらしいけど   今はどうなのかしらね……？）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、昔はそうだったらしいけど
今はどうなのかしらね……？）

engChrName: (That is a question only they have the answer to.)
engSearchText: (That is a question only they have the answer to.)
jpnChrName: （フフ、本当のところは   本人たち次第ではあろう。）
jpnSearchText:
（フフ、本当のところは
本人たち次第ではあろう。）

engChrName: Hey, everyone. Keeping an eye on things?
engSearchText: Hey, everyone. Keeping an eye on things?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんたち。 さっそく回ってるんだね。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんたち。
さっそく回ってるんだね。

engChrName: Yup. I heard Professor Hamilton's come by?
engSearchText: Yup. I heard Professor Hamilton's come by?
jpnChrName: ああ──ハミルトン博士も こちらに来られてたんですか。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──ハミルトン博士も
こちらに来られてたんですか。

engChrName: Professor Hamilton! I'd heard you had come by.
engSearchText: Professor Hamilton! I'd heard you had come by.
jpnChrName: ハミルトン博士……！ こちらに来られてたんですか。
jpnSearchText:
ハミルトン博士……！
こちらに来られてたんですか。

engChrName: Hello there, and happy Revolution Festival. Haven't seen you this past month.
engSearchText:
Hello there, and happy Revolution Festival.
Haven't seen you this past month.
jpnChrName: ふふ、一月ぶりですね。 革命記念祭、おめでとう。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、一月ぶりですね。
革命記念祭、おめでとう。

engChrName: Oh, hello. It's been some time. A-And, um...it's a surprise to see you here, as well.
engSearchText:
Oh, hello. It's been some time. A-And, um...it's a
surprise to see you here, as well.
jpnChrName: ご無沙汰しています……！ そ、それに──
jpnSearchText:
ご無沙汰しています……！
そ、それに──

engChrName: It's been a while. And, uh...I didn't expect to see you here.
engSearchText:
It's been a while. And, uh...I didn't expect to see
you here.
jpnChrName: お久しぶりですっ。 えと、それに──
jpnSearchText:
お久しぶりですっ。
えと、それに──

engChrName: Hey there, old man. What are you doing here with the Professor?
engSearchText:
Hey there, old man. What are you doing here with
the Professor?
jpnChrName: それに爺さん…… 今年はアンタも来てたのか。
jpnSearchText:
それに爺さん……
今年はアンタも来てたのか。

engChrName: A pleasure to see you again. And it seems you have an unexpected acquaintance.
engSearchText:
A pleasure to see you again. And it seems you have an
unexpected acquaintance.
jpnChrName: ご無沙汰しております。 それと──
jpnSearchText:
ご無沙汰しております。
それと──

engChrName: I was going to stop by to pay my respects as well later.
engSearchText: I was going to stop by to pay my respects as well later.
jpnChrName: うん、後で僕も一緒に 参拝するつもりだったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
うん、後で僕も一緒に
参拝するつもりだったんだ。

engChrName: But that aside, I didn't think that you two knew each other.
engSearchText:
But that aside, I didn't think that you two knew
each other.
jpnChrName: それより──
jpnSearchText: それより──

engChrName: (So that's the famous professor.) Wait, but what're you doing here with her?
engSearchText:
(So that's the famous professor.)
Wait, but what're you doing here with her?
jpnChrName: （この人があの有名な……） そ、それはともかく──
jpnSearchText:
（この人があの有名な……）
そ、それはともかく──

engChrName: It has been about half a month for me, Professor. Good to see you are also well, Giscard.
engSearchText:
It has been about half a month for me, Professor.
Good to see you are also well, Giscard.
jpnChrName: 半月ぶりですな、博士。 ジスカール殿は久しぶりだ。
jpnSearchText:
半月ぶりですな、博士。
ジスカール殿は久しぶりだ。

engChrName: So it has. Though we missed each other, didn't we?
engSearchText: So it has. Though we missed each other, didn't we?
jpnChrName: ふふ、そうですね。 入れ違いにはなってしまいましたが。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、そうですね。
入れ違いにはなってしまいましたが。

engChrName: Bark—no. It's Bergard now, right? Good to see you again.
engSearchText:
Bark—no. It's Bergard now, right? Good to see
you again.
jpnChrName: バルク──いやベルガルドさんだったか。 ハハッ、改めてよろしく頼むぜ。
jpnSearchText:
バルク──いやベルガルドさんだったか。
ハハッ、改めてよろしく頼むぜ。

engChrName: Huh. How 'bout that. Thought you mighta known each other.
engSearchText:
Huh. How 'bout that. Thought you mighta known
each other.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、面識があるらしいのは 聞いてましたが──それにしても。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、面識があるらしいのは
聞いてましたが──それにしても。

engChrName: Well, we're roughly the same age, after all. We've met before, here and there.
engSearchText:
Well, we're roughly the same age, after all. We've met
before, here and there.
jpnChrName: ま、博士とは同年代ではあるし、 昔からそれなりに親交はあるからの～。
jpnSearchText:
ま、博士とは同年代ではあるし、
昔からそれなりに親交はあるからの～。

engChrName: Both the Great Spire and the Luozhou Bridge are the professor's designs, after all.
engSearchText:
Both the Great Spire and the Luozhou Bridge are
the professor's designs, after all.
jpnChrName: あの《煌天楼》や《羅州大橋》なんかも 博士の設計じゃ。
jpnSearchText:
あの《煌天楼》や《羅州大橋》なんかも
博士の設計じゃ。

engChrName: I'd heard about that.
engSearchText: I'd heard about that.
jpnChrName: ああ、そうらしいなァ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、そうらしいなァ。

engChrName: Really? I had heard of them before, but I never knew...
engSearchText:
Really? I had heard of them before, but I
never knew...
jpnChrName: そうだったんだ…… 名前は聞いてるけど。
jpnSearchText:
そうだったんだ……
名前は聞いてるけど。

engChrName: Is that correct? I only knew of them by name.
engSearchText: Is that correct? I only knew of them by name.
jpnChrName: そうだったのですか…… 名前は存じておりますが。
jpnSearchText:
そうだったのですか……
名前は存じておりますが。

engChrName: Oooh! You're talking about the big building and the bridge connecting the two districts!
engSearchText:
Oooh! You're talking about the big building and the
bridge connecting the two districts!
jpnChrName: あ……あの大きなビルや ２つの街区を結ぶ橋ですよね！
jpnSearchText:
あ……あの大きなビルや
２つの街区を結ぶ橋ですよね！

engChrName: I had no idea...
engSearchText: I had no idea...
jpnChrName: そうだったんですか……
jpnSearchText: そうだったんですか……

engChrName: Oh, right. That's the big building and the bridge that connects the two districts?
engSearchText:
Oh, right. That's the big building and the bridge that
connects the two districts?
jpnChrName: ああ、あの大きなビルに ２街区を結んでる橋だっけ？
jpnSearchText:
ああ、あの大きなビルに
２街区を結んでる橋だっけ？

engChrName: That brings back memories.
engSearchText: That brings back memories.
jpnChrName: フフ……懐かしい話だ。
jpnSearchText: フフ……懐かしい話だ。

engChrName: I still remember how the budget was so tight regarding the specs that it could make both workers and artisans weep.
engSearchText:
I still remember how the budget was so tight
regarding the specs that it could make both workers
and artisans weep.
jpnChrName: ハン、仕様と予算がギリギリだったから 職人と業者泣かせではあったけどな。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、仕様と予算がギリギリだったから
職人と業者泣かせではあったけどな。

engChrName: All the mira in the world, and you couldn't cut us some slack.
engSearchText:
All the mira in the world, and you couldn't cut us
some slack.
jpnChrName: 唸るほどミラを持ってんだから ちったあ余裕を持たせろってんだ。
jpnSearchText:
唸るほどミラを持ってんだから
ちったあ余裕を持たせろってんだ。

engChrName: You've quite the low opinion on Langport businessmen. Do remember, no expense was spared when it came to worker safety.
engSearchText:
You've quite the low opinion on
Langport businessmen. Do remember, no expense
was spared when it came to worker safety.
jpnChrName: 煌都商人を舐めてもらっちゃ困るの～。 それに安全には最大限配慮したじゃろ？
jpnSearchText:
煌都商人を舐めてもらっちゃ困るの～。
それに安全には最大限配慮したじゃろ？

engChrName: As far as I'm concerned, it's the artisan's task to see a plan realized at a reasonable price. The professor's plans should not be an exception.
engSearchText:
As far as I'm concerned, it's the artisan's task to see a
plan realized at a reasonable price. The professor's
plans should not be an exception.
jpnChrName: 博士の素晴らしい設計を如何に適正価格で 実現できるか──職人の腕の見せ所じゃろ。
jpnSearchText:
博士の素晴らしい設計を如何に適正価格で
実現できるか──職人の腕の見せ所じゃろ。

engChrName: I swear! Just you wait till the high-speed orbal network expansions and the new Red Star factory are done!
engSearchText:
I swear! Just you wait till the high-speed orbal
network expansions and the new Red Star factory
are done!
jpnChrName: ぐぬぬ、今進めてる高速導力ネットに 紅星（レッドスター）の新規工場……
jpnSearchText:
ぐぬぬ、今進めてる高速導力ネットに
紅星（レッドスター）の新規工場……

engChrName: You won't have a single complaint once those are done! And then I don't want to see you be so stingy with bonuses!
engSearchText:
You won't have a single complaint once those
are done! And then I don't want to see you be so
stingy with bonuses!
jpnChrName: グウの音も出ないように仕上げた暁には 今度こそ“色”を付けてもらうからな！？
jpnSearchText:
グウの音も出ないように仕上げた暁には
今度こそ“色”を付けてもらうからな！？

engChrName: Heh. Is that so? I am very much looking forward to it now, I assure you.
engSearchText:
Heh. Is that so? I am very much looking forward to it
now, I assure you.
jpnChrName: ふぉふぉ、楽しみにしてるぞい。
jpnSearchText: ふぉふぉ、楽しみにしてるぞい。

engChrName: Huh. I'd heard people talk about them bickering. Guess that's how it's always been for them.
engSearchText:
Huh. I'd heard people talk about them bickering.
Guess that's how it's always been for them.
jpnChrName: うーん、話は聞いてたけど 昔からああみたいだね……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、話は聞いてたけど
昔からああみたいだね……

engChrName: The old man looks like he's having fun.
engSearchText: The old man looks like he's having fun.
jpnChrName: ま、爺さんがあそこまで 上機嫌なのも珍しいけどなァ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、爺さんがあそこまで
上機嫌なのも珍しいけどなァ。

engChrName: Well, they're both largely responsible for the Republic's development. They might bicker like dogs, but they get along quite well.
engSearchText:
Well, they're both largely responsible for the
Republic's development. They might bicker like dogs,
but they get along quite well.
jpnChrName: ふふ、共和国の近代化を担ってきた人同士、 あれで気が合ってるみたいですけどね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、共和国の近代化を担ってきた人同士、
あれで気が合ってるみたいですけどね。

engChrName: The orbal network continues growing, and the distance between people in the Republic continues to shrink with it. The entire continent will follow.
engSearchText:
The orbal network continues growing, and the
distance between people in the Republic continues to
shrink with it. The entire continent will follow.
jpnChrName: ──導力ネットが各地を結びつつある今、 国内、いえ大陸の距離は更に縮まるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
──導力ネットが各地を結びつつある今、
国内、いえ大陸の距離は更に縮まるでしょう。

engChrName: Which brings us to the topic at hand, that being the current state of the Eastern part of the continent. I trust you understand what I mean, Gien.
engSearchText:
Which brings us to the topic at hand, that being the
current state of the Eastern part of the continent.
I trust you understand what I mean, Gien.
jpnChrName: 大陸東部の諸問題についても── 今後とも宜しくお願いしますね、ギエンさん。
jpnSearchText:
大陸東部の諸問題についても──
今後とも宜しくお願いしますね、ギエンさん。

engChrName: Ah...
engSearchText: Ah...

engChrName: (I understand what she's talking about.)
engSearchText: (I understand what she's talking about.)
jpnChrName: （なるほど、そういう……）
jpnSearchText: （なるほど、そういう……）

engChrName: Heh. You really are not someone to be underestimated, Professor.
engSearchText:
Heh. You really are not someone to be
underestimated, Professor.
jpnChrName: フフ、やはり貴女こそ 一筋縄ではいかぬ御仁じゃろう。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、やはり貴女こそ
一筋縄ではいかぬ御仁じゃろう。

engChrName: Shall we move on to the main topic, then?
engSearchText: Shall we move on to the main topic, then?
jpnChrName: ──承った、博士。 それでは本題</R>に入るとしようか。
jpnSearchText:
──承った、博士。
それでは本題に入るとしようか。

engChrName: Gladly.
engSearchText: Gladly.
jpnChrName: ええ、喜んで。
jpnSearchText: ええ、喜んで。

engChrName: (This is about the desertification happening in eastern Zemuria. Even the president's been getting involved.)
engSearchText:
(This is about the desertification happening in
eastern Zemuria. Even the president's been
getting involved.)
jpnChrName: （大統領も踏み込んでいた   大陸東部の不毛化の問題……）
jpnSearchText:
（大統領も踏み込んでいた
大陸東部の不毛化の問題……）

engChrName: (Your Gran's one hell of a woman.)
engSearchText: (Your Gran's one hell of a woman.)
jpnChrName: （やっぱり凄ぇな、お前の祖母さんは。）
jpnSearchText: （やっぱり凄ぇな、お前の祖母さんは。）

engChrName: (Agreed. This matter is one that no one should turn a blind eye to.)
engSearchText:
(Agreed. This matter is one that no one should turn a
blind eye to.)
jpnChrName: （ええ……本来であれば誰しもが   他人事では無いはずですから。）
jpnSearchText:
（ええ……本来であれば誰しもが
他人事では無いはずですから。）

engChrName: (Well, this will affect everyone, sooner or later.)
engSearchText: (Well, this will affect everyone, sooner or later.)
jpnChrName: （えと……本当ならわたし全員の   問題でもある筈なんですよね。）
jpnSearchText:
（えと……本当ならわたし全員の
問題でもある筈なんですよね。）

engChrName: (Yeah. This shit's got to do with all of us. Even the old man can see that.)
engSearchText:
(Yeah. This shit's got to do with all of us. Even the
old man can see that.)
jpnChrName: （本来なら俺ら全員に関わる問題……   流石の爺さんも認めざるを得ねえか。）
jpnSearchText:
（本来なら俺ら全員に関わる問題……
流石の爺さんも認めざるを得ねえか。）

engChrName: (I mean, this problem affects everyone. The professor is even more impressive than the rumors said, though...)
engSearchText:
(I mean, this problem affects everyone. The professor
is even more impressive than the rumors
said, though...)
jpnChrName: （本来あたしたち全員が関わる問題……   なるほど、噂以上の人みたいね。）
jpnSearchText:
（本来あたしたち全員が関わる問題……
なるほど、噂以上の人みたいね。）

engChrName: (Heh... I understand. This is a problem no one can really ignore.)
engSearchText:
(Heh... I understand. This is a problem no one can
really ignore.)
jpnChrName: （フフ……本来我ら全員が   向き合わなくてはならぬ問題だからな。）
jpnSearchText:
（フフ……本来我ら全員が
向き合わなくてはならぬ問題だからな。）

engChrName: (Well, yeah. She's been an important figurehead for half a century.)
engSearchText:
(Well, yeah. She's been an important figurehead for
half a century.)
jpnChrName: （あはは……そりゃまあ。   伊達に半世紀も現役じゃないよね。）
jpnSearchText:
（あはは……そりゃまあ。
伊達に半世紀も現役じゃないよね。）

engChrName: (Well, yeah. She's been an important figurehead for half a century.)
engSearchText:
(Well, yeah. She's been an important figurehead for
half a century.)
jpnChrName: （あはは……そりゃまあ。   伊達に半世紀も現役じゃないよね。）
jpnSearchText:
（あはは……そりゃまあ。
伊達に半世紀も現役じゃないよね。）

engChrName: Come to think of it... I believe they were going to hammer out the last bits of the plan in the Aramis Student Council room.
engSearchText:
Come to think of it... I believe they were going to
hammer out the last bits of the plan in the Aramis
Student Council room.
jpnChrName: そういえば……作戦の最後の詰めは アラミスの生徒会室を使っているそうです。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば……作戦の最後の詰めは
アラミスの生徒会室を使っているそうです。

engChrName: Oh, really?
engSearchText: Oh, really?
jpnChrName: ええっ、そうなんですか！？
jpnSearchText: ええっ、そうなんですか！？

engChrName: Yeah. Prez enhanced the local connections so it's probably as good a place as any to finish it all up.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Prez enhanced the local connections so it's
probably as good a place as any to finish it all up.
jpnChrName: ああ、現会長が回線を強化してるから 最終調整にはおあつらえ向きらしい。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、現会長が回線を強化してるから
最終調整にはおあつらえ向きらしい。

engChrName: Professor Hamilton's sticking around, right?
engSearchText: Professor Hamilton's sticking around, right?
jpnChrName: たしかハミルトン博士たちも ギリギリまでいるんじゃなかったか？
jpnSearchText:
たしかハミルトン博士たちも
ギリギリまでいるんじゃなかったか？

engChrName: Yeah. I think Essy said she'd be here, too.
engSearchText: Yeah. I think Essy said she'd be here, too.
jpnChrName: うん、エレ姉も付き合うとか 言ってたかな。
jpnSearchText:
うん、エレ姉も付き合うとか
言ってたかな。

engChrName: Sounds like they're gonna be really busy. Maybe we shouldn't bother them...
engSearchText:
Sounds like they're gonna be really busy. Maybe we
shouldn't bother them...
jpnChrName: うーん、忙しそうだし 邪魔するのも申し訳ないけど……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、忙しそうだし
邪魔するのも申し訳ないけど……

engChrName: I can't imagine it would hurt to stop by, at least for moral support.
engSearchText:
I can't imagine it would hurt to stop by, at least for
moral support.
jpnChrName: 陣中見舞いくらいはしても 宜しいかもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
陣中見舞いくらいはしても
宜しいかもしれませんね。

engChrName: Guess we're paying Miss Perfect's school a visit. Oh, and our esteemed chief's alma mater, too.
engSearchText:
Guess we're paying Miss Perfect's school a visit.
Oh, and our esteemed chief's alma mater, too.
jpnChrName: クク、そんじゃあ小娘の学校にして 所長殿の母校に入るとすっか。
jpnSearchText:
クク、そんじゃあ小娘の学校にして
所長殿の母校に入るとすっか。

engChrName: I mean, I never graduated.
engSearchText: I mean, I never graduated.
jpnChrName: ま、つっても俺は中退だがな。
jpnSearchText: ま、つっても俺は中退だがな。

engChrName: Heehee! Sounds exciting!
engSearchText: Heehee! Sounds exciting!
jpnChrName: えへへ…… ちょっとワクワクします！
jpnSearchText:
えへへ……
ちょっとワクワクします！

engChrName: Let me show you to the Student Council room, then. It's on the fourth floor.
engSearchText:
Let me show you to the Student Council room, then.
It's on the fourth floor.
jpnChrName: それじゃあ生徒会室がある ４階に案内しますね。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ生徒会室がある
４階に案内しますね。

engChrName: *sigh* It's frustrating, but I have to admit it's performing quite well.
engSearchText:
*sigh* It's frustrating, but I have to admit it's
performing quite well.
jpnChrName: ふう…… 悔しいけど流石の性能ね。
jpnSearchText:
ふう……
悔しいけど流石の性能ね。

engChrName: I wonder what's the whole story behind this...
engSearchText: I wonder what's the whole story behind this...
jpnChrName: うーん、つくづくどんな背景が あるのか気になるけど～……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、つくづくどんな背景が
あるのか気になるけど～……

engChrName: We can talk about that later. Right now, our goal is maximizing the plan's success rate.
engSearchText:
We can talk about that later. Right now, our goal is
maximizing the plan's success rate.
jpnChrName: 詮索は後にしましょう。 今は成功率を少しでも上げておかないと。
jpnSearchText:
詮索は後にしましょう。
今は成功率を少しでも上げておかないと。

engChrName: Celis, could you measure the spiritual wavelength pattern through the Xipha one more time?
engSearchText:
Celis, could you measure the spiritual wavelength
pattern through the Xipha one more time?
jpnChrName: セリスさん、ザイファを通じて霊波パターンを もう一度計測させてもらえないかしら？
jpnSearchText:
セリスさん、ザイファを通じて霊波パターンを
もう一度計測させてもらえないかしら？

engChrName: Sure, whatever. No problem. (Maybe if I knew what the hell I'm doing...)
engSearchText:
Sure, whatever. No problem.
(Maybe if I knew what the hell I'm doing...)
jpnChrName: え、ええ、そいつは構いませんけど。 （何やってんだかサッパリ分からねえが……）
jpnSearchText:
え、ええ、そいつは構いませんけど。
（何やってんだかサッパリ分からねえが……）

engChrName: Pardon us. Mind if we come in?
engSearchText: Pardon us. Mind if we come in?
jpnChrName: 済みません、お邪魔しても よろしいでしょうか……？
jpnSearchText:
済みません、お邪魔しても
よろしいでしょうか……？

engChrName: Oh, you came to visit? Feel free to come in.
engSearchText: Oh, you came to visit? Feel free to come in.
jpnChrName: あら、来たのね。 もちろん構わないわよ。
jpnSearchText:
あら、来たのね。
もちろん構わないわよ。

engChrName: Wow! This is what a Student Council room looks like on the inside!
engSearchText:
Wow! This is what a Student Council room looks like
on the inside!
jpnChrName: わぁ……！ ここが“せーとかいしつ”……！
jpnSearchText:
わぁ……！
ここが“せーとかいしつ”……！

engChrName: Oooh, even I'd be thrilled to learn in a place as classy as this.
engSearchText:
Oooh, even I'd be thrilled to learn in a place as classy
as this.
jpnChrName: うーん、さすが建物にも趣があるし、 なかなか素敵な学び舎みたいね。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、さすが建物にも趣があるし、
なかなか素敵な学び舎みたいね。

engChrName: Gran, Essy, Renne? We've come to visit.
engSearchText: Gran, Essy, Renne? We've come to visit.
jpnChrName: 博士（グランマ）、エレ姉にレンさんも 陣中見舞いに来たよ。
jpnSearchText:
博士（グランマ）、エレ姉にレンさんも
陣中見舞いに来たよ。

engChrName: Oh, it's the punkass knight.
engSearchText: Oh, it's the punkass knight.
jpnChrName: って教会のヤンキー騎士もか？
jpnSearchText: って教会のヤンキー騎士もか？

engChrName: You're lending a hand here, are you?
engSearchText: You're lending a hand here, are you?
jpnChrName: ほう、おぬしまで 付き合っているとはな？
jpnSearchText:
ほう、おぬしまで
付き合っているとはな？

engChrName: Why don'tcha say that again and see how much of a punk I can be?! ...But anyway, it's apparently got something to do with the plan.
engSearchText:
Why don'tcha say that again and see how much of a
punk I can be?! ...But anyway, it's apparently got
something to do with the plan.
jpnChrName: 誰がヤンキーだこら……！ ──いや、作戦関係らしくてね。
jpnSearchText:
誰がヤンキーだこら……！
──いや、作戦関係らしくてね。

engChrName: Leon already went ahead, by the way.
engSearchText: Leon already went ahead, by the way.
jpnChrName: ちなみにリオンのヤツは先行して 現地に向かってますよ。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにリオンのヤツは先行して
現地に向かってますよ。

engChrName: I see. We'll inquire with him once we're on location.
engSearchText: I see. We'll inquire with him once we're on location.
jpnChrName: 成程……子細については 現地で聞かせて頂くとして。
jpnSearchText:
成程……子細については
現地で聞かせて頂くとして。

engChrName: I see you were able to obtain one of Marduk's latest terminals.
engSearchText:
I see you were able to obtain one of Marduk's
latest terminals.
jpnChrName: どうやらＭＫ社の最新端末まで 調達されたようですね？
jpnSearchText:
どうやらＭＫ社の最新端末まで
調達されたようですね？

engChrName: We did. It's the only way we could access the orbal network in virtual mode.
engSearchText:
We did. It's the only way we could access the orbal
network in virtual mode.
jpnChrName: ええ、導力ネットを仮想モードで 動かす上で頼らざるを得なかったから。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、導力ネットを仮想モードで
動かす上で頼らざるを得なかったから。

engChrName: Don't worry so much about the specifics. We'll talk about everything during the mission.
engSearchText:
Don't worry so much about the specifics. We'll talk
about everything during the mission.
jpnChrName: ま、そのあたりのタネ明かしも含めて 作戦時に教えてあげるから安心して～。
jpnSearchText:
ま、そのあたりのタネ明かしも含めて
作戦時に教えてあげるから安心して～。

engChrName: Got it. Wasn't worried anyway. I trust you guys.
engSearchText: Got it. Wasn't worried anyway. I trust you guys.
jpnChrName: 了解だ──元よりアンタらには 全幅の信頼を置かせてもらってるからな。
jpnSearchText:
了解だ──元よりアンタらには
全幅の信頼を置かせてもらってるからな。

engChrName: Glad to have your assistance, Professor. And the rest of you, too. Celis, do what you can for them.
engSearchText:
Glad to have your assistance, Professor. And the rest
of you, too. Celis, do what you can for them.
jpnChrName: 博士もどうか宜しくお願いする。 セリス、おぬしもどうか頼んだぞ。
jpnSearchText:
博士もどうか宜しくお願いする。
セリス、おぬしもどうか頼んだぞ。

engChrName: You got it, boss! (When I figure out what the hell to do, but hey.)
engSearchText:
You got it, boss!
(When I figure out what the hell to do, but hey.)
jpnChrName: ええ──合点承知です！ （イマイチよく分からねぇけど。）
jpnSearchText:
ええ──合点承知です！
（イマイチよく分からねぇけど。）

engChrName: We'll head to the rendezvous point in about an hour.
engSearchText: We'll head to the rendezvous point in about an hour.
jpnChrName: 小一時間ほどしたら 私たちも合流地点へと向かいます。
jpnSearchText:
小一時間ほどしたら
私たちも合流地点へと向かいます。

engChrName: Van, Agnès, everyone. Make sure everyone's ready for the mission.
engSearchText:
Van, Agnès, everyone. Make sure everyone's ready for
the mission.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、アニエスさんたちも。 お互い万全の態勢で臨むとしましょう。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさん、アニエスさんたちも。
お互い万全の態勢で臨むとしましょう。

engChrName: Got it.
engSearchText: Got it.
jpnChrName: ええ……！
jpnSearchText: ええ……！

engChrName: Understood!
engSearchText: Understood!
jpnChrName: よろしくお願いします！
jpnSearchText: よろしくお願いします！

engChrName: Commencing proximity probe.
engSearchText: Commencing proximity probe.
jpnChrName: 周辺ノ探査ヲ開始。
jpnSearchText: 周辺ノ探査ヲ開始。

engChrName: Response found! Heat signature detected!
engSearchText: Response found! Heat signature detected!
jpnChrName: 発見ハッケン！　熱源反応ヲ感知！
jpnSearchText: 発見ハッケン！　熱源反応ヲ感知！

engChrName: Commencing proximity probe.
engSearchText: Commencing proximity probe.
jpnChrName: 周辺ノ探査ヲ開始。
jpnSearchText: 周辺ノ探査ヲ開始。

engChrName: Response found! Heat signature detected!
engSearchText: Response found! Heat signature detected!
jpnChrName: 発見ハッケン！　熱源反応ヲ感知！
jpnSearchText: 発見ハッケン！　熱源反応ヲ感知！

engChrName: Commencing proximity probe.
engSearchText: Commencing proximity probe.
jpnChrName: 周辺ノ探査ヲ開始。
jpnSearchText: 周辺ノ探査ヲ開始。

engChrName: Response found! Heat signature detected!
engSearchText: Response found! Heat signature detected!
jpnChrName: 発見ハッケン！　熱源反応ヲ感知！
jpnSearchText: 発見ハッケン！　熱源反応ヲ感知！

engChrName: Right here, then?
engSearchText: Right here, then?
jpnChrName: ここら辺でいいか？
jpnSearchText: ここら辺でいいか？

engChrName: Yes. The dorms are close by, so this should be a good spot.
engSearchText:
Yes. The dorms are close by, so this should be a
good spot.
jpnChrName: はい、寮まではすぐそこなので ここで大丈夫です。
jpnSearchText:
はい、寮まではすぐそこなので
ここで大丈夫です。

engChrName: Umm... I'm not really sure if I can put this to words...
engSearchText: Umm... I'm not really sure if I can put this to words...
jpnChrName: その……うまく言えませんけど。
jpnSearchText: その……うまく言えませんけど。

engChrName: ...but Arkride Solutions means the world to me, now. You're just as important to me as my family.
engSearchText:
...but Arkride Solutions means the world to me, now.
You're just as important to me as my family.
jpnChrName: 今の私にとって解決事務所は── 家族と同じくらい大切な場所になっています。
jpnSearchText:
今の私にとって解決事務所は──
家族と同じくらい大切な場所になっています。

engChrName: And I don't think I'm the only one who feels that way, either.
engSearchText:
And I don't think I'm the only one who feels that
way, either.
jpnChrName: ……きっと他の皆さんも 同じように思っているはずですよ？
jpnSearchText:
……きっと他の皆さんも
同じように思っているはずですよ？

engChrName: I'm sorry. Maybe now's not the time for that...
engSearchText: I'm sorry. Maybe now's not the time for that...
jpnChrName: すみません、いきなり 変なことを言ってしまって。
jpnSearchText:
すみません、いきなり
変なことを言ってしまって。

engChrName: But anyway, thank you for seeing me this far. I look forward to the trip!
engSearchText:
But anyway, thank you for seeing me this far. I look
forward to the trip!
jpnChrName: ええと、送って頂いてありがとうございました。 今度の旅行も宜しくお願いしますね……！
jpnSearchText:
ええと、送って頂いてありがとうございました。
今度の旅行も宜しくお願いしますね……！

engChrName: Sure. See you later.
engSearchText: Sure. See you later.
jpnChrName: おう、それじゃあな。
jpnSearchText: おう、それじゃあな。

engChrName: That sure caught me off guard.
engSearchText: That sure caught me off guard.
jpnChrName: ったく、一本取られちまったな。
jpnSearchText: ったく、一本取られちまったな。

engChrName: I appreciate the thought. I just wish she wouldn't waste it on someone like me...
engSearchText:
I appreciate the thought. I just wish she wouldn't
waste it on someone like me...
jpnChrName: 気持ちはありがたいが…… ──俺には過ぎたモンだろ。
jpnSearchText:
気持ちはありがたいが……
──俺には過ぎたモンだろ。

engChrName: After that, Van spent part of the night driving before resuming his patrol.
engSearchText:
After that, Van spent part of the night driving before
resuming his patrol.
jpnChrName: その後ヴァンは車を走らせ、 夜の街の散策へと戻るのだった。
jpnSearchText:
その後ヴァンは車を走らせ、
夜の街の散策へと戻るのだった。

engChrName: Van's group decided to take a short break.
engSearchText: Van's group decided to take a short break.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、 しばしの休憩をとることになり──
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、
しばしの休憩をとることになり──

engChrName: Everyone split up so they could spend their free time as they pleased.
engSearchText:
Everyone split up so they could spend their free time
as they pleased.
jpnChrName: 一時的に解散して、 それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。
jpnSearchText:
一時的に解散して、
それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。

engChrName: Well, damn. This place is lively. The festival's atmosphere is kinda contagious.
engSearchText:
Well, damn. This place is lively. The festival's
atmosphere is kinda contagious.
jpnChrName: へえ、なかなか賑わってるじゃねえか。 この祭りの雰囲気は悪くねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
へえ、なかなか賑わってるじゃねえか。
この祭りの雰囲気は悪くねぇな。

engChrName: Hmm... Wonder what everyone's up to.
engSearchText: Hmm... Wonder what everyone's up to.
jpnChrName: さて、面白そうなことをやってるヤツは……
jpnSearchText: さて、面白そうなことをやってるヤツは……

engChrName: (Is that Feri?)
engSearchText: (Is that Feri?)
jpnChrName: （あれは……フェリ？）
jpnSearchText: （あれは……フェリ？）

engChrName: Oh, Van!
engSearchText: Oh, Van!
jpnChrName: ……あっ、ヴァンさん！
jpnSearchText: ……あっ、ヴァンさん！

engChrName: Funny running into you!
engSearchText: Funny running into you!
jpnChrName: えへへ……見つかっちゃいましたね。
jpnSearchText: えへへ……見つかっちゃいましたね。

engChrName: You looked like you were having fun. Wasn't expecting you to be part of the event.
engSearchText:
You looked like you were having fun.
Wasn't expecting you to be part of the event.
jpnChrName: 興味ありそうにしてると思ったが、 まさかイベントに参加してたとはな。
jpnSearchText:
興味ありそうにしてると思ったが、
まさかイベントに参加してたとはな。

engChrName: Caught me off guard. Don't get me wrong, though. Song's nice.
engSearchText:
Caught me off guard. Don't get me wrong, though.
Song's nice.
jpnChrName: お前さんにしては珍しいじゃないか？ さっきの“唄”は流石だったが。
jpnSearchText:
お前さんにしては珍しいじゃないか？
さっきの“唄”は流石だったが。

engChrName: Aww, thank you!
engSearchText: Aww, thank you!
jpnChrName: えへへ、ありがとうございますっ。
jpnSearchText: えへへ、ありがとうございますっ。

engChrName: Actually, I got a letter from Abi just a bit ago.
engSearchText: Actually, I got a letter from Abi just a bit ago.
jpnChrName: 実は、この前お父さん（アブ）から手紙が届きまして。
jpnSearchText: 実は、この前お父さん（アブ）から手紙が届きまして。

engChrName: He said I'll be participating in the Kruga village's New Year's Festival!
engSearchText:
He said I'll be participating in the Kruga village's
New Year's Festival!
jpnChrName: 年始に《クルガの里》で行われる 新年祭に参加する事になったんです。
jpnSearchText:
年始に《クルガの里》で行われる
新年祭に参加する事になったんです。

engChrName: I'll be the priestess this year.
engSearchText: I'll be the priestess this year.
jpnChrName: それで、今年はわたしが “巫女役”を担う事になりまして……
jpnSearchText:
それで、今年はわたしが
“巫女役”を担う事になりまして……

engChrName: A priestess, huh? That some kinda Kruga New Year's tradition?
engSearchText:
A priestess, huh? That some kinda Kruga New
Year's tradition?
jpnChrName: 新年祭に巫女役か。 クルガの里の伝統行事って所か？
jpnSearchText:
新年祭に巫女役か。
クルガの里の伝統行事って所か？

engChrName: Yup! We thank the Winged Goddess, Arusha, for her guidance and pray for her to bless the upcoming year.
engSearchText:
Yup! We thank the Winged Goddess, Arusha, for her
guidance and pray for her to bless the upcoming year.
jpnChrName: はい、去年の焔と翼の女神（アルーシャ）の導きに感謝しつつ、 新年の新たな加護を祈祷する儀式なんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
はい、去年の焔と翼の女神（アルーシャ）の導きに感謝しつつ、
新年の新たな加護を祈祷する儀式なんですよ。

engChrName: A woman in the village is chosen every year to play the role of priestess and sing the Song of Flames.
engSearchText:
A woman in the village is chosen every year to play
the role of priestess and sing the Song of Flames.
jpnChrName: 巫女役はその“焔の唄”を唄う役で、 毎年里の女性から選ばれるんです。
jpnSearchText:
巫女役はその“焔の唄”を唄う役で、
毎年里の女性から選ばれるんです。

engChrName: This will actually be my first time back home...
engSearchText: This will actually be my first time back home...
jpnChrName: ……その、わたしが里を出てから、 これが初めての帰省になりますから。
jpnSearchText:
……その、わたしが里を出てから、
これが初めての帰省になりますから。

engChrName: I'll show them how much I've grown when I play the role of priestess!
engSearchText:
I'll show them how much I've grown when I play the
role of priestess!
jpnChrName: “巫女役”を通して、わたしの成長ぶりを 里の皆に見て欲しいと思いまして。
jpnSearchText:
“巫女役”を通して、わたしの成長ぶりを
里の皆に見て欲しいと思いまして。

engChrName: And I guess I thought that by performing here, I could learn something that'll make me stand out from all the other priestesses.
engSearchText:
And I guess I thought that by performing here,
I could learn something that'll make me
stand out from all the other priestesses.
jpnChrName: 今までの巫女役とはちょっと違う “何か”を得るためにイベントに参加したんです。
jpnSearchText:
今までの巫女役とはちょっと違う
“何か”を得るためにイベントに参加したんです。

engChrName: Okay, I guess that makes sense. Practicing here could help with that.
engSearchText:
Okay, I guess that makes sense. Practicing here could
help with that.
jpnChrName: ハッ、なるほど。 たしかに絶好の場かもしれないな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、なるほど。
たしかに絶好の場かもしれないな。

engChrName: I can try lending you a hand, since your pops told me to take care of you.
engSearchText:
I can try lending you a hand, since your pops told me
to take care of you.
jpnChrName: 親父さんからお前の事を頼まれてる手前、 俺も手伝ってやる義務がありそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
親父さんからお前の事を頼まれてる手前、
俺も手伝ってやる義務がありそうだ。

engChrName: Would you?! Thank you!
engSearchText: Would you?! Thank you!
jpnChrName: いいんですかっ……！？ えへへ……ありがとうございますっ！
jpnSearchText:
いいんですかっ……！？
えへへ……ありがとうございますっ！

engChrName: Don't go givin' thanks yet. I don't know a lick about singing. We might need someone else...
engSearchText:
Don't go givin' thanks yet. I don't know a lick
about singing. We might need someone else...
jpnChrName: とはいえ、俺はそっち方面に明るいわけじゃねえ。 いいアドバイザーでもいればいいが──
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、俺はそっち方面に明るいわけじゃねえ。
いいアドバイザーでもいればいいが──

engChrName: Wait, is that...
engSearchText: Wait, is that...
jpnChrName: あれっ？ あそこにいるのって……！
jpnSearchText:
あれっ？
あそこにいるのって……！

engChrName: Van? And Feri, too!
engSearchText: Van? And Feri, too!
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、それに フェリちゃんじゃないですか……！
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさん、それに
フェリちゃんじゃないですか……！

engChrName: Saara! Shaheena! Hi!
engSearchText: Saara! Shaheena! Hi!
jpnChrName: サァラさん、シャヒーナさんっ。
jpnSearchText: サァラさん、シャヒーナさんっ。

engChrName: Well, ain't that a stroke of luck. Couldn't have asked for anyone better.
engSearchText:
Well, ain't that a stroke of luck. Couldn't have asked
for anyone better.
jpnChrName: ハッ、これまた 丁度いい所に来てくれたじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、これまた
丁度いい所に来てくれたじゃねえか。

engChrName: Oh, I see! Umm, excuse me! Could I ask you two something?
engSearchText:
Oh, I see! Umm, excuse me! Could I ask you
two something?
jpnChrName: あっ、なるほど……！ あの、お二人にご相談が──
jpnSearchText:
あっ、なるほど……！
あの、お二人にご相談が──

engChrName: After explaining the situation, Saara and Shaheena happily agreed to help.
engSearchText:
After explaining the situation, Saara and Shaheena
happily agreed to help.
jpnChrName: サァラとシャヒーナに事情を説明し、 協力を頼むと快く引き受けてくれた。
jpnSearchText:
サァラとシャヒーナに事情を説明し、
協力を頼むと快く引き受けてくれた。

engChrName: To start, they had Feri sing for them so they could evaluate her.
engSearchText:
To start, they had Feri sing for them so they could
evaluate her.
jpnChrName: まずは試しに今のフェリの唄を 聞いてもらうことになり……
jpnSearchText:
まずは試しに今のフェリの唄を
聞いてもらうことになり……

engChrName: Feri, you're fantastic!
engSearchText: Feri, you're fantastic!
jpnChrName: フェリちゃん、素晴らしかったです……！
jpnSearchText: フェリちゃん、素晴らしかったです……！

engChrName: That was enchanting! It had a dignified and serene feeling to it.
engSearchText:
That was enchanting! It had a dignified and serene
feeling to it.
jpnChrName: 気高さと静謐さが感じられるような…… 神秘的な歌でした。
jpnSearchText:
気高さと静謐さが感じられるような……
神秘的な歌でした。

engChrName: It's not an easy song, but you give it an identity of your own when you sing it.
engSearchText:
It's not an easy song, but you give it an identity of
your own when you sing it.
jpnChrName: うんうん、そんな難しい歌を “自分の唄”として歌いこなしてるし。
jpnSearchText:
うんうん、そんな難しい歌を
“自分の唄”として歌いこなしてるし。

engChrName: Anyone listening to you will understand just how much this means to you. Emotions on full display like that draw people in.
engSearchText:
Anyone listening to you will understand just how
much this means to you. Emotions on full display like
that draw people in.
jpnChrName: 一生懸命さが伝わってくるから、 すごく引き込まれちゃったよ～！
jpnSearchText:
一生懸命さが伝わってくるから、
すごく引き込まれちゃったよ～！

engChrName: Honestly, I dunno if there's much advice we can give you. You're already great as it is.
engSearchText:
Honestly, I dunno if there's much advice we can
give you. You're already great as it is.
jpnChrName: あたし達がアドバイスできる事って あんまりないかも？
jpnSearchText:
あたし達がアドバイスできる事って
あんまりないかも？

engChrName: Heehee, thank you! Hearing you say that is encouraging.
engSearchText:
Heehee, thank you! Hearing you say that
is encouraging.
jpnChrName: えへへ、そこまで言ってもらえるのは 嬉しいですけど。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、そこまで言ってもらえるのは
嬉しいですけど。

engChrName: It's not hard to sing with your heart, really.
engSearchText: It's not hard to sing with your heart, really.
jpnChrName: でも、こうやって一生懸命歌うだけなら 誰でも出来ちゃいますから。
jpnSearchText:
でも、こうやって一生懸命歌うだけなら
誰でも出来ちゃいますから。

engChrName: But I feel like something's still missing...
engSearchText: But I feel like something's still missing...
jpnChrName: それだけじゃ物足りない気がしてしまって……
jpnSearchText: それだけじゃ物足りない気がしてしまって……

engChrName: Maybe the thing you're missin' isn't in the song at all. Why not try dancing?
engSearchText:
Maybe the thing you're missin' isn't in the song at all.
Why not try dancing?
jpnChrName: ……それなら、 踊りも組み合わせてみたらどうだ？
jpnSearchText:
……それなら、
踊りも組み合わせてみたらどうだ？

engChrName: Even a simple choreography might make a bigger impact than if you just sang the Song of Flames.
engSearchText:
Even a simple choreography might make a bigger
impact than if you just sang the Song of Flames.
jpnChrName: 簡単な振り付けでも、動きがあるだけで “焔の唄”の迫力が増しそうなもんだが。
jpnSearchText:
簡単な振り付けでも、動きがあるだけで
“焔の唄”の迫力が増しそうなもんだが。

engChrName: Dancing! I hadn't thought of that, but it's a great idea!
engSearchText:
Dancing! I hadn't thought of that, but it's a
great idea!
jpnChrName: 踊りを取り入れる、ですか……！ とってもいいアイディアだと思いますっ！
jpnSearchText:
踊りを取り入れる、ですか……！
とってもいいアイディアだと思いますっ！

engChrName: I could try some of the dances Shaheena taught me already.
engSearchText:
I could try some of the dances Shaheena taught
me already.
jpnChrName: 以前シャヒーナさんから 教わった踊りも応用できそうですし！
jpnSearchText:
以前シャヒーナさんから
教わった踊りも応用できそうですし！

engChrName: Oooh, I like that idea! I'd love to see you try.
engSearchText: Oooh, I like that idea! I'd love to see you try.
jpnChrName: いいじゃんいいじゃん！ あたしもそれ、見てみたいよ！
jpnSearchText:
いいじゃんいいじゃん！
あたしもそれ、見てみたいよ！

engChrName: If that's decided, then let's try to come up with a quick routine for you.
engSearchText:
If that's decided, then let's try to come up with a
quick routine for you.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、それなら早速 振付を取り入れて試してみましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、それなら早速
振付を取り入れて試してみましょうか。

engChrName: Why don't you join us, Van? Since you're here and everything.
engSearchText:
Why don't you join us, Van? Since you're here
and everything.
jpnChrName: それと……せっかくですから、 ヴァンさんも参加してみてはいかがですか？
jpnSearchText:
それと……せっかくですから、
ヴァンさんも参加してみてはいかがですか？

engChrName: Me? Pass. I was born with two left feet.
engSearchText: Me? Pass. I was born with two left feet.
jpnChrName: 俺がか？ さすがに踊りの素養はゼロなんだが。
jpnSearchText:
俺がか？
さすがに踊りの素養はゼロなんだが。

engChrName: Haha, that's not what I meant! You don't need to dance, just accompany her.
engSearchText:
Haha, that's not what I meant! You don't need to
dance, just accompany her.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そうではなくて、踊りに合わせて 伴奏するのはどうかと思いまして。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、そうではなくて、踊りに合わせて
伴奏するのはどうかと思いまして。

engChrName: We brought a tabla with us, actually, to use in a performance.
engSearchText:
We brought a tabla with us, actually, to use in
a performance.
jpnChrName: ちょうど私たちも興行のために 太鼓（タブラ）を持ってきているんです。
jpnSearchText:
ちょうど私たちも興行のために
太鼓（タブラ）を持ってきているんです。

engChrName: Oh, yeah! That would make it easier to keep the rhythm.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah! That would make it easier to keep
the rhythm.
jpnChrName: うんうん、あたしも賛成っ！ リズムもとりやすくなるだろうし！
jpnSearchText:
うんうん、あたしも賛成っ！
リズムもとりやすくなるだろうし！

engChrName: Van, please! I'll do better if you're here supporting me.
engSearchText:
Van, please! I'll do better if you're here
supporting me.
jpnChrName: えと、良ければお願いします！ ヴァンさんも一緒だと心強いですっ！
jpnSearchText:
えと、良ければお願いします！
ヴァンさんも一緒だと心強いですっ！

engChrName: All right, fine. Can't say no to that.
engSearchText: All right, fine. Can't say no to that.
jpnChrName: はぁ……ったく、 そこまで言われちゃ断わるのもな。
jpnSearchText:
はぁ……ったく、
そこまで言われちゃ断わるのもな。

engChrName: I guess I just beat the drum to match the mood?
engSearchText: I guess I just beat the drum to match the mood?
jpnChrName: 俺の方で雰囲気に任せて 叩く事になるが、それで構わねえんだな？
jpnSearchText:
俺の方で雰囲気に任せて
叩く事になるが、それで構わねえんだな？

engChrName: That'd be perfect! Let's give it our all!
engSearchText: That'd be perfect! Let's give it our all!
jpnChrName: はい、勿論ですっ！ えへへ……一緒に頑張りましょうっ！
jpnSearchText:
はい、勿論ですっ！
えへへ……一緒に頑張りましょうっ！

engChrName: With the combined help of Saara and Shaheena, Feri started practicing her performance.
engSearchText:
With the combined help of Saara and Shaheena, Feri
started practicing her performance.
jpnChrName: こうして、サァラとシャヒーナを交えて フェリの唄と踊りの特訓が始まった。
jpnSearchText:
こうして、サァラとシャヒーナを交えて
フェリの唄と踊りの特訓が始まった。

engChrName: Though it was difficult for her to balance singing and dancing at first...
engSearchText:
Though it was difficult for her to balance
singing and dancing at first...
jpnChrName: 最初は、フェリが歌と踊りのどちらか一方に 集中してしまい苦戦したものの──
jpnSearchText:
最初は、フェリが歌と踊りのどちらか一方に
集中してしまい苦戦したものの──

engChrName: ...her natural talents eventually shone through, helping her sing and dance in harmony.
engSearchText:
...her natural talents eventually shone through,
helping her sing and dance in harmony.
jpnChrName: 持ち前の運動神経によって、 なんとか歌と踊りを両立させていった。
jpnSearchText:
持ち前の運動神経によって、
なんとか歌と踊りを両立させていった。

engChrName: And as Van slowly got the hang of the drums, everything came together for a new Song of Flames.
engSearchText:
And as Van slowly got the hang of the drums,
everything came together for a new Song of Flames.
jpnChrName: コツを掴んだヴァンの太鼓の音も加わって、 新たな“焔の唄”が完成していくのだった。
jpnSearchText:
コツを掴んだヴァンの太鼓の音も加わって、
新たな“焔の唄”が完成していくのだった。

engChrName: *huff* *huff* ...Thank you so much!
engSearchText: *huff* *huff* ...Thank you so much!
jpnChrName: はぁ……はぁ…… ありがとうございましたっ！
jpnSearchText:
はぁ……はぁ……
ありがとうございましたっ！

engChrName: Phew! I think that one went pretty well.
engSearchText: Phew! I think that one went pretty well.
jpnChrName: ふぅ、今のはかなり いい感じだったんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ、今のはかなり
いい感じだったんじゃねえか？

engChrName: That was stellar!
engSearchText: That was stellar!
jpnChrName: うんうんっ、サイコーだったよ！
jpnSearchText: うんうんっ、サイコーだったよ！

engChrName: I'm sure this is just what you needed to impress at your New Year's Festival, Feri!
engSearchText:
I'm sure this is just what you needed to impress at
your New Year's Festival, Feri!
jpnChrName: フェリちゃんだったら、新年祭までに さらに良いものに仕上げられそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
フェリちゃんだったら、新年祭までに
さらに良いものに仕上げられそうですね。

engChrName: Ahaha... If I do, it's thanks to you two and Van.
engSearchText: Ahaha... If I do, it's thanks to you two and Van.
jpnChrName: あはは…… お二人とヴァンさんのおかげですっ。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……
お二人とヴァンさんのおかげですっ。

engChrName: I won't stop practicing until I can sing and dance like a proper priestess!
engSearchText:
I won't stop practicing until I can sing and dance like
a proper priestess!
jpnChrName: この調子で巫女に相応しい 唄と踊りに仕上げてみせますっ！
jpnSearchText:
この調子で巫女に相応しい
唄と踊りに仕上げてみせますっ！

engChrName: And look at the timing here. The perfect audience just showed up.
engSearchText:
And look at the timing here. The perfect audience
just showed up.
jpnChrName: ハッ……丁度、おあつらえ向きの 観客も来てたみてえだな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……丁度、おあつらえ向きの
観客も来てたみてえだな。

engChrName: Huh?
engSearchText: Huh?

engChrName: I'm glad to see you well, Ferida.
engSearchText: I'm glad to see you well, Ferida.
jpnChrName: フフ、息災のようだな、フェリーダ。
jpnSearchText: フフ、息災のようだな、フェリーダ。

engChrName: Abi, Kasim? Fie, too?!
engSearchText: Abi, Kasim? Fie, too?!
jpnChrName: お父さん（アブ）にお兄ちゃん、 それにフィーさんまで……！？
jpnSearchText:
お父さん（アブ）にお兄ちゃん、
それにフィーさんまで……！？

engChrName: Most impressive to see an employer so dedicated he'll even provide assistance to his staff in matters of song and dance.
engSearchText:
Most impressive to see an employer so dedicated he'll
even provide assistance to his staff in matters of song
and dance.
jpnChrName: しかし“唄”の面倒まで見ているとは 随分と手厚い事務所だな。
jpnSearchText:
しかし“唄”の面倒まで見ているとは
随分と手厚い事務所だな。

engChrName: Well, shit happens. Wasn't expecting a bunch of big shots like you to come by, though.
engSearchText:
Well, shit happens. Wasn't expecting a bunch of big
shots like you to come by, though.
jpnChrName: ま、成り行きってだけさ。 しかしまた錚々たるメンツだな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、成り行きってだけさ。
しかしまた錚々たるメンツだな。

engChrName: I happened to bump into Marduk's security chief while I was patrolling Auber.
engSearchText:
I happened to bump into Marduk's security chief
while I was patrolling Auber.
jpnChrName: わたしはオーベル地区の巡回中に 偶然ＭＫの警備主任さんと会ってね。
jpnSearchText:
わたしはオーベル地区の巡回中に
偶然ＭＫの警備主任さんと会ってね。

engChrName: We were just walking around when we spotted you guys.
engSearchText:
We were just walking around when we spotted
you guys.
jpnChrName: 話しながら歩いてたら、偶然裏解決屋（スプリガン）さん達を 見かけたから寄らせてもらった。
jpnSearchText:
話しながら歩いてたら、偶然裏解決屋（スプリガン）さん達を
見かけたから寄らせてもらった。

engChrName: I was just as surprised as you to bump into a Kruga corps commander, though.
engSearchText:
I was just as surprised as you to bump into a Kruga
corps commander, though.
jpnChrName: まさか《クルガ戦士団》の副頭目まで いるとは思わなかったけど。
jpnSearchText:
まさか《クルガ戦士団》の副頭目まで
いるとは思わなかったけど。

engChrName: Hah, well, I visit the capital from time to time to take care of business.
engSearchText:
Hah, well, I visit the capital from time to time to take
care of business.
jpnChrName: はは、《戦士団》の次の仕事に向けて たまたま首都の近くを通る事になってな。
jpnSearchText:
はは、《戦士団》の次の仕事に向けて
たまたま首都の近くを通る事になってな。

engChrName: I thought to stop by and see how Ferida was doing while I was at it.
engSearchText:
I thought to stop by and see how Ferida was doing
while I was at it.
jpnChrName: ならばとフェリーダの顔を 見に来てみた訳だが……
jpnSearchText:
ならばとフェリーダの顔を
見に来てみた訳だが……

engChrName: You're doing even better than I expected. You've grown, Ferida, and it shows in the way you carry yourself.
engSearchText:
You're doing even better than I expected.
You've grown, Ferida, and it shows in the way you
carry yourself.
jpnChrName: 思っていたよりも達者でやっているようで何よりだ。 お前の一挙一動からも十分に成長ぶりが伺える。
jpnSearchText:
思っていたよりも達者でやっているようで何よりだ。
お前の一挙一動からも十分に成長ぶりが伺える。

engChrName: And that idea of yours, of dancing as you sing...
engSearchText: And that idea of yours, of dancing as you sing...
jpnChrName: それに、まさか“唄”に踊りを取り入れるとはな……
jpnSearchText: それに、まさか“唄”に踊りを取り入れるとはな……

engChrName: I like it! Surely you agree as well, Kasim?
engSearchText: I like it! Surely you agree as well, Kasim?
jpnChrName: これは案外悪くないかもしれんな。 お前もそう思うだろう、カシム？
jpnSearchText:
これは案外悪くないかもしれんな。
お前もそう思うだろう、カシム？

engChrName: She's still got some work to do. Still unstable on her feet, so her movements aren't particularly smooth just yet.
engSearchText:
She's still got some work to do. Still unstable on her
feet, so her movements aren't particularly smooth
just yet.
jpnChrName: ……だが、現状は踊りの足運びが不安定で 身体の動きにブレが生じている。
jpnSearchText:
……だが、現状は踊りの足運びが不安定で
身体の動きにブレが生じている。

engChrName: ...If you're going for this, be sure to do your utmost.
engSearchText: ...If you're going for this, be sure to do your utmost.
jpnChrName: 一度自分で決めた事ならば、 完璧にやり遂げてみせる事だな。
jpnSearchText:
一度自分で決めた事ならば、
完璧にやり遂げてみせる事だな。

engChrName: Of course! I just started, so it's not the best right now, but I'll keep practicing! Look forward to me flooring you!
engSearchText:
Of course! I just started, so it's not the best right now,
but I'll keep practicing! Look forward to me
flooring you!
jpnChrName: えへへ、うんっ……！ もっと練習するから楽しみにしててっ。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、うんっ……！
もっと練習するから楽しみにしててっ。

engChrName: (Huh. The security chief's advice was actually reasonable.)
engSearchText:
(Huh. The security chief's advice was
actually reasonable.)
jpnChrName: （警備主任さん、   普通にアドバイスしたね。）
jpnSearchText:
（警備主任さん、
普通にアドバイスしたね。）

engChrName: (Maybe they're not that strained after all.)
engSearchText: (Maybe they're not that strained after all.)
jpnChrName: （ま、別に家族仲が   悪いってわけでもないんだろ。）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、別に家族仲が
悪いってわけでもないんだろ。）

engChrName: Oh, and Arkride? Let me congratulate you for a job well done in Oración.
engSearchText:
Oh, and Arkride? Let me congratulate you for a job
well done in Oración.
jpnChrName: それと、アークライド殿。 オラシオンの顛末についても改めて労いを。
jpnSearchText:
それと、アークライド殿。
オラシオンの顛末についても改めて労いを。

engChrName: Ferida's grown so much since I entrusted her to you. I haven't regretted that choice.
engSearchText:
Ferida's grown so much since I entrusted her to you.
I haven't regretted that choice.
jpnChrName: フェリーダの成長ぶりをみても やはり預けて正解だったようだな。
jpnSearchText:
フェリーダの成長ぶりをみても
やはり預けて正解だったようだな。

engChrName: Glad to hear that. Would've appreciated a heads up before having a whole ass child dumped on me like that, though.
engSearchText:
Glad to hear that. Would've appreciated a heads up
before having a whole ass child dumped on me like
that, though.
jpnChrName: ハッ、そいつはどうも。 押しかけ同然でウチに来た時は驚いたがね。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、そいつはどうも。
押しかけ同然でウチに来た時は驚いたがね。

engChrName: But she's pullin' her weight around the office, so all's good.
engSearchText:
But she's pullin' her weight around the office, so
all's good.
jpnChrName: だがまあウチとしても コイツがいて色々助かってますよ。
jpnSearchText:
だがまあウチとしても
コイツがいて色々助かってますよ。

engChrName: Hmph. Good to know. I'll leave my daughter in your care. She still has much to learn.
engSearchText:
Hmph. Good to know. I'll leave my daughter in
your care. She still has much to learn.
jpnChrName: フッ……それは結構。 引き続き不肖の娘をよろしく頼む。
jpnSearchText:
フッ……それは結構。
引き続き不肖の娘をよろしく頼む。

engChrName: I'll be looking forward to seeing you for the New Year's Festival, Ferida.
engSearchText:
I'll be looking forward to seeing you for the New
Year's Festival, Ferida.
jpnChrName: 次は新年祭で会える事を楽しみにしてるぞ、 フェリーダ。
jpnSearchText:
次は新年祭で会える事を楽しみにしてるぞ、
フェリーダ。

engChrName: Of course! Thank you, Abi!
engSearchText: Of course! Thank you, Abi!
jpnChrName: うんっ……！ ありがとう、お父さん（アブ）！
jpnSearchText:
うんっ……！
ありがとう、お父さん（アブ）！

engChrName: You, too. Kasim, Fie.
engSearchText: You, too. Kasim, Fie.
jpnChrName: お兄ちゃんにフィーさんも……
jpnSearchText: お兄ちゃんにフィーさんも……

engChrName: I'll do my best as priestess, and with the Song of Flames.
engSearchText:
I'll do my best as priestess, and with the Song
of Flames.
jpnChrName: 新年祭での巫女役も “焔の唄”も精一杯頑張って──
jpnSearchText:
新年祭での巫女役も
“焔の唄”も精一杯頑張って──

engChrName: That way I can prove to you how much I've grown!
engSearchText: That way I can prove to you how much I've grown!
jpnChrName: わたしが里を出てから成長した証を、 もっともっと見せるからっ……！
jpnSearchText:
わたしが里を出てから成長した証を、
もっともっと見せるからっ……！

engChrName: ...Hmph.
engSearchText: ...Hmph.
jpnChrName: フッ……
jpnSearchText: フッ……

engChrName: Aida would be happy for her, too.
engSearchText: Aida would be happy for her, too.
jpnChrName: ……アイーダも喜んでるかな。
jpnSearchText: ……アイーダも喜んでるかな。

engChrName: No doubt.
engSearchText: No doubt.
jpnChrName: ああ、間違いねえだろ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、間違いねえだろ。

engChrName: After they left, Saara and Shaheena helped Feri in practicing the Song of Flames for a while longer.
engSearchText:
After they left, Saara and Shaheena helped Feri in
practicing the Song of Flames for a while longer.
jpnChrName: その後、集まった面々が去っていったあとも しばらくフェリの“焔の唄”の特訓に付き合い……
jpnSearchText:
その後、集まった面々が去っていったあとも
しばらくフェリの“焔の唄”の特訓に付き合い……

engChrName: When they finished, Van and Feri said their goodbyes and left.
engSearchText:
When they finished, Van and Feri said their
goodbyes and left.
jpnChrName: サァラとシャヒーナにも礼を言って別れた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>サァラとシャヒーナにも礼を言って別れた。

engChrName: All right, I'm heading back. ...Somethin' up?
engSearchText: All right, I'm heading back. ...Somethin' up?
jpnChrName: さて、俺たちもそろそろ戻るか。 って、どうした？
jpnSearchText:
さて、俺たちもそろそろ戻るか。
って、どうした？

engChrName: No, no, it's just... I've grown so much, and I feel like I can keep growing even more if I stick with you, Van.
engSearchText:
No, no, it's just... I've grown so much, and I feel like I
can keep growing even more if I stick with you, Van.
jpnChrName: ──わたし、ヴァンさんといると もっともっと成長できる気がします。
jpnSearchText:
──わたし、ヴァンさんといると
もっともっと成長できる気がします。

engChrName: Wherever you go, I'll follow.
engSearchText: Wherever you go, I'll follow.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんがどこに行ったとしても、 勝手についていきますからっ。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんがどこに行ったとしても、
勝手についていきますからっ。

engChrName: So, thank you for continuing to take good care of me!
engSearchText: So, thank you for continuing to take good care of me!
jpnChrName: 改めて、今後ともよろしくお願いしますっ。
jpnSearchText: 改めて、今後ともよろしくお願いしますっ。

engChrName: Heh. Pushy for a part-timer, aren't you?
engSearchText: Heh. Pushy for a part-timer, aren't you?
jpnChrName: ……ハッ、厄介な押しかけバイトに 目を付けられちまったもんだ。
jpnSearchText:
……ハッ、厄介な押しかけバイトに
目を付けられちまったもんだ。

engChrName: Guess I'll keep on lookin' after you. Least I can do, as your boss.
engSearchText:
Guess I'll keep on lookin' after you. Least I can do, as
your boss.
jpnChrName: ま、今まで通り面倒は見させてもらうさ。 あくまで所長としての範囲だがな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、今まで通り面倒は見させてもらうさ。
あくまで所長としての範囲だがな。

engChrName: Heehee. Of course.
engSearchText: Heehee. Of course.
jpnChrName: ……えへへ、はいっ。
jpnSearchText: ……えへへ、はいっ。

engChrName: Van's group decided to take a short break.
engSearchText: Van's group decided to take a short break.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、 しばしの休憩をとることになり──
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、
しばしの休憩をとることになり──

engChrName: Everyone split up so they could spend their free time as they pleased.
engSearchText:
Everyone split up so they could spend their free time
as they pleased.
jpnChrName: 一時的に解散して、 それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。
jpnSearchText:
一時的に解散して、
それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。

engChrName: A spriggan request addressed towards both you and I...
engSearchText:
A spriggan request addressed towards both you
and I...
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋さんと私を指名した 差出人不明の依頼、か……
jpnSearchText:
裏解決屋さんと私を指名した
差出人不明の依頼、か……

engChrName: Something stinks real bad about this one, but I don't think it's just a prank either.
engSearchText:
Something stinks real bad about this one, but I don't
think it's just a prank either.
jpnChrName: あまりにも胡散臭いが…… どうにもイタズラに思えなくてな。
jpnSearchText:
あまりにも胡散臭いが……
どうにもイタズラに思えなくてな。

engChrName: Thoughts? I can handle it myself, if you'd like.
engSearchText: Thoughts? I can handle it myself, if you'd like.
jpnChrName: どうする、俺一人でやってもいいが。
jpnSearchText: どうする、俺一人でやってもいいが。

engChrName: That's fine. I'll lend you a hand.
engSearchText: That's fine. I'll lend you a hand.
jpnChrName: いいえ、私もやるわ。
jpnSearchText: いいえ、私もやるわ。

engChrName: We've quite a few shared acquaintances, after all. It's worth looking into.
engSearchText:
We've quite a few shared acquaintances, after all.
It's worth looking into.
jpnChrName: 私たちの共通の知人は限られている。 もしかしたらこれは……
jpnSearchText:
私たちの共通の知人は限られている。
もしかしたらこれは……

engChrName: So? What is the request about?
engSearchText: So? What is the request about?
jpnChrName: それで、依頼の内容は？
jpnSearchText: それで、依頼の内容は？

engChrName: A retrieval. Something's been smuggled into the city via the underground, and we're supposed to go get it.
engSearchText:
A retrieval. Something's been smuggled into the city
via the underground, and we're supposed to go get it.
jpnChrName: 裏ルートで市内に送られた ある“荷物”の回収だそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
裏ルートで市内に送られた
ある“荷物”の回収だそうだ。

engChrName: The route there's pretty convoluted, and it looks like shit's been encrypted over and over a few times.
engSearchText:
The route there's pretty convoluted, and it looks like
shit's been encrypted over and over a few times.
jpnChrName: ルートがかなり複雑な上、 何重にも暗号化されてるようでな。
jpnSearchText:
ルートがかなり複雑な上、
何重にも暗号化されてるようでな。

engChrName: Not gonna lie, this might be a little bit out of my depth.
engSearchText:
Not gonna lie, this might be a little bit out of
my depth.
jpnChrName: 正直俺一人だったら かなり厳しいかもしれねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
正直俺一人だったら
かなり厳しいかもしれねぇ。

engChrName: Lucky for you that I'm here.
engSearchText: Lucky for you that I'm here.
jpnChrName: ふふ、だったら丁度いいわね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、だったら丁度いいわね。

engChrName: We both are perfectly suited for this matter, so let's cooperate and get to the bottom of this.
engSearchText:
We both are perfectly suited for this matter, so let's
cooperate and get to the bottom of this.
jpnChrName: お互いの得意領分が関わっているみたいだし、 力を合わせましょう。
jpnSearchText:
お互いの得意領分が関わっているみたいだし、
力を合わせましょう。

engChrName: After agreeing to work together, Van and Renne decoded the 4SPG. They continued gathering clues afterward from the orbal net and the underworld.
engSearchText:
After agreeing to work together, Van and Renne
decoded the 4SPG. They continued gathering clues
afterward from the orbal net and the underworld.
jpnChrName: その後、二人は４ｓｐｇに書かれた暗号を解読し、 ネットや裏社会から情報を集めて手がかりを追い……
jpnSearchText:
その後、二人は４ｓｐｇに書かれた暗号を解読し、
ネットや裏社会から情報を集めて手がかりを追い……

engChrName: Eventually, the trail led them to an attaché case.
engSearchText: Eventually, the trail led them to an attaché case.
jpnChrName: ついに目的の物と思われる アタッシュケースに辿り着くのだった。
jpnSearchText:
ついに目的の物と思われる
アタッシュケースに辿り着くのだった。

engChrName: I'm sorry to call you all of a sudden, Albert.
engSearchText: I'm sorry to call you all of a sudden, Albert.
jpnChrName: 急に呼び出したりして ごめんなさい、アルベール君……
jpnSearchText:
急に呼び出したりして
ごめんなさい、アルベール君……

engChrName: It's all right. It looks like it's something you need to be discreet about.
engSearchText:
It's all right. It looks like it's something you need to
be discreet about.
jpnChrName: 他の連中に聞かれるとまずい話なのか……？
jpnSearchText: 他の連中に聞かれるとまずい話なのか……？

engChrName: Something like that. We're looking into someone right now. Do you know Curtis?
engSearchText:
Something like that. We're looking into someone
right now. Do you know Curtis?
jpnChrName: そうですね……実は今、 カーチスさんという方を調査していまして……
jpnSearchText:
そうですね……実は今、
カーチスさんという方を調査していまして……

engChrName: Van's team told Albert what they'd heard from Curtis' mom.
engSearchText:
Van's team told Albert what they'd heard from
Curtis' mom.
jpnChrName: ヴァン達はカーチスの母親から 依頼を受けた旨を伝え……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン達はカーチスの母親から
依頼を受けた旨を伝え……

engChrName: They also mentioned how he'd changed recently.
engSearchText: They also mentioned how he'd changed recently.
jpnChrName: カーチスの変化についてかいつまんで説明した。
jpnSearchText: <C1>カーチスの変化についてかいつまんで説明した。

engChrName: Damn it, I knew something was up. He'd been acting strange lately...
engSearchText:
Damn it, I knew something was up. He'd been acting
strange lately...
jpnChrName: やっぱりな……僕もおかしいと思ってたんだ。
jpnSearchText: やっぱりな……僕もおかしいと思ってたんだ。

engChrName: Maybe unstable is the best word for it. It was very different from his usual self.
engSearchText:
Maybe unstable is the best word for it. It was very
different from his usual self.
jpnChrName: 言動が不安定っていうか…… どこか変わってしまった気はしてたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
言動が不安定っていうか……
どこか変わってしまった気はしてたんだ。

engChrName: How long have you known?
engSearchText: How long have you known?
jpnChrName: どれくらい前からそんな調子だったんだ？
jpnSearchText: どれくらい前からそんな調子だったんだ？

engChrName: Ugh... You know, I don't really want to help you.
engSearchText: Ugh... You know, I don't really want to help you.
jpnChrName: む……アンタに協力してやるのは癪なんだが。
jpnSearchText: む……アンタに協力してやるのは癪なんだが。

engChrName: But I guess I noticed it around late October, early November.
engSearchText:
But I guess I noticed it around late October,
early November.
jpnChrName: そうだな……確か１０月の末から １１月の頭くらいからだったか。
jpnSearchText:
そうだな……確か１０月の末から
１１月の頭くらいからだったか。

engChrName: He was pretty down in the dumps before that, saying he'd lost motivation.
engSearchText:
He was pretty down in the dumps before that, saying
he'd lost motivation.
jpnChrName: 少し前までは、やる気が出なくなったと言って 落ち込んでる様子だったんだが……
jpnSearchText:
少し前までは、やる気が出なくなったと言って
落ち込んでる様子だったんだが……

engChrName: But he then started being all excited about his studies all of a sudden.
engSearchText:
But he then started being all excited about his studies
all of a sudden.
jpnChrName: ある日突然、勉強が捗るようになったと 熱が籠った様子で話してくれてな。
jpnSearchText:
ある日突然、勉強が捗るようになったと
熱が籠った様子で話してくれてな。

engChrName: Something was off about it, though. I don't know where all the enthusiasm came from.
engSearchText:
Something was off about it, though. I don't know
where all the enthusiasm came from.
jpnChrName: でもその熱の入り様が 普通じゃない雰囲気でな……
jpnSearchText:
でもその熱の入り様が
普通じゃない雰囲気でな……

engChrName: Thank you for letting us know. Have you heard anything in particular about his friends?
engSearchText:
Thank you for letting us know. Have you heard
anything in particular about his friends?
jpnChrName: そうでしたか……ちなみに、 交友関係について話を聞いた事はありますか？
jpnSearchText:
そうでしたか……ちなみに、
交友関係について話を聞いた事はありますか？

engChrName: As if he was hanging around with a bad crowd? No, not really. Didn't look like it, anyway.
engSearchText:
As if he was hanging around with a bad crowd?
No, not really. Didn't look like it, anyway.
jpnChrName: いや、素行不良の友人が出来たとか、 そういう雰囲気ではなかったな。
jpnSearchText:
いや、素行不良の友人が出来たとか、
そういう雰囲気ではなかったな。

engChrName: Wait, maybe... It's not quite that...
engSearchText: Wait, maybe... It's not quite that...
jpnChrName: あっ、でもそういえば……
jpnSearchText: あっ、でもそういえば……

engChrName: But I remember someone that looked like him hanging around the backstreets in the Tyrell District.
engSearchText:
But I remember someone that looked like him
hanging around the backstreets in the Tyrell District.
jpnChrName: バイト終わりに、タイレル地区の裏道で 彼に似た少年を見かけた事があるんだ。
jpnSearchText:
バイト終わりに、タイレル地区の裏道で
彼に似た少年を見かけた事があるんだ。

engChrName: Since it was at night and the guy he was talking to looked real shady, I kinda just assumed it couldn't be Curtis.
engSearchText:
Since it was at night and the guy he was talking to
looked real shady, I kinda just assumed it couldn't
be Curtis.
jpnChrName: なんだか怪しい雰囲気の男と話していてな。 夜だったし、人違いだと思ってたんだが。
jpnSearchText:
なんだか怪しい雰囲気の男と話していてな。
夜だったし、人違いだと思ってたんだが。

engChrName: Damn it. Maybe that's the guy that...
engSearchText: Damn it. Maybe that's the guy that...
jpnChrName: もしかして…… あの男は例のアレだったって事か……？
jpnSearchText:
もしかして……
あの男は例のアレだったって事か……？

engChrName: Come on. Stop mumbling and out with it already.
engSearchText: Come on. Stop mumbling and out with it already.
jpnChrName: 例のアレ？　勿体つけんじゃねえよ。
jpnSearchText: 例のアレ？　勿体つけんじゃねえよ。

engChrName: We've been warned at school to watch out for a suspicious man that hangs around Tyrell's backstreets.
engSearchText:
We've been warned at school to watch out for a
suspicious man that hangs around Tyrell's backstreets.
jpnChrName: 学校でよく注意喚起されているんです。 タイレル地区の裏通りの“怪しい男”──
jpnSearchText:
学校でよく注意喚起されているんです。
タイレル地区の裏通りの“怪しい男”──

engChrName: He apparently sells tobacco and hard drugs to young people. That's what the rumors say, anyway.
engSearchText:
He apparently sells tobacco and hard drugs to
young people. That's what the rumors say, anyway.
jpnChrName: なんでも、若者をターゲットにして 違法薬物やタバコを売っている売人だという噂です。
jpnSearchText:
なんでも、若者をターゲットにして
違法薬物やタバコを売っている売人だという噂です。

engChrName: ...I should've made the connection earlier. Curtis could've bought the tablets from him!
engSearchText:
...I should've made the connection earlier.
Curtis could've bought the tablets from him!
jpnChrName: どうして気付かなかったんでしょう、 その人から例のタブレットを買ったとしたら……！
jpnSearchText:
どうして気付かなかったんでしょう、
その人から例のタブレットを買ったとしたら……！

engChrName: That makes a lot of sense.
engSearchText: That makes a lot of sense.
jpnChrName: 色々と話が繋がって来そうですね。
jpnSearchText: 色々と話が繋がって来そうですね。

engChrName: Maybe he was going to meet him today when he said he was going to the bookstore!
engSearchText:
Maybe he was going to meet him today when he said
he was going to the bookstore!
jpnChrName: 今日の本屋さんへの買い物というのも 売人に会う事が目的だったんでしょうか……？
jpnSearchText:
今日の本屋さんへの買い物というのも
売人に会う事が目的だったんでしょうか……？

engChrName: Looks like it anyway.
engSearchText: Looks like it anyway.
jpnChrName: ああ、その可能性が高いだろうな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、その可能性が高いだろうな。

engChrName: Next stop: Tyrell's backstreets.
engSearchText: Next stop: Tyrell's backstreets.
jpnChrName: となれば、次はタイレル地区の 裏通りを当たってみるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
となれば、次はタイレル地区の
裏通りを当たってみるぞ。

engChrName: Well, I'm glad I could be of help. Please, do something for Curtis.
engSearchText:
Well, I'm glad I could be of help. Please, do
something for Curtis.
jpnChrName: 力になれたのなら良かった。 出来る事ならカーチスを助けてやってくれ。
jpnSearchText:
力になれたのなら良かった。
出来る事ならカーチスを助けてやってくれ。

engChrName: We will. Thank you for your help, Albert!
engSearchText: We will. Thank you for your help, Albert!
jpnChrName: はい、勿論です。 ありがとうございました、アルベール君……！
jpnSearchText:
はい、勿論です。
ありがとうございました、アルベール君……！

engChrName: (Wait. I should make sure Agnès is here before I hit the store.)
engSearchText:
(Wait. I should make sure Agnès is here before I hit
the store.)
jpnChrName: （おっと、店を当たるなら 　アニエスを連れて来ないとな。）
jpnSearchText:
（おっと、店を当たるなら
　アニエスを連れて来ないとな。）

engChrName: But let's not forget why you're here, yeah?
engSearchText: But let's not forget why you're here, yeah?
jpnChrName: ……と、本題を忘れてはいけないね。
jpnSearchText: ……と、本題を忘れてはいけないね。

engChrName: If you're looking for something perfect for children, might I suggest our macarons?
engSearchText:
If you're looking for something perfect for children,
might I suggest our macarons?
jpnChrName: 子供向けのお菓子とのことなら、 当店からはマカロンをオススメしたいな。
jpnSearchText:
子供向けのお菓子とのことなら、
当店からはマカロンをオススメしたいな。

engChrName: They're one of our seasonal flavors. We make them with the freshest strawberry jam, since those are in season now. Our shop's pride.
engSearchText:
They're one of our seasonal flavors. We make them
with the freshest strawberry jam, since those are in
season now. Our shop's pride.
jpnChrName: 旬入りしたての苺のピューレを使用した 自慢の季節限定フレーバーさ。
jpnSearchText:
旬入りしたての苺のピューレを使用した
自慢の季節限定フレーバーさ。

engChrName: Oh, yeah. That crunchy delight as you bite down on it, your mouth suddenly being flooded by that sweet and tangy cream filling...
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah. That crunchy delight as you bite down on
it, your mouth suddenly being flooded by that sweet
and tangy cream filling...
jpnChrName: サクッとした歯触り…… それに続くなめらかで甘酸っぱい口どけ……
jpnSearchText:
サクッとした歯触り……
それに続くなめらかで甘酸っぱい口どけ……

engChrName: Oooh, I can almost taste it...
engSearchText: Oooh, I can almost taste it...
jpnChrName: 手に取るように想像できるな。
jpnSearchText: 手に取るように想像できるな。

engChrName: Hah! Good to see you haven't changed a bit.
engSearchText: Hah! Good to see you haven't changed a bit.
jpnChrName: はは、甘い物好きは健在なようだ。
jpnSearchText: はは、甘い物好きは健在なようだ。

engChrName: Macarons aren't that expensive, either. I think they're pretty affordable for little kids.
engSearchText:
Macarons aren't that expensive, either. I think they're
pretty affordable for little kids.
jpnChrName: マカロンは手頃なお値段だから 子供たちでも買いやすいだろうしね。
jpnSearchText:
マカロンは手頃なお値段だから
子供たちでも買いやすいだろうしね。

engChrName: I think you sold me on them already. Can we get some macarons, please?
engSearchText:
I think you sold me on them already. Can we get
some macarons, please?
jpnChrName: そうですね。 では、マカロンをお願いします。
jpnSearchText:
そうですね。
では、マカロンをお願いします。

engChrName: We'll get one for everyone to try them.
engSearchText: We'll get one for everyone to try them.
jpnChrName: 試食としてみんなで頂きますね。
jpnSearchText: 試食としてみんなで頂きますね。

engChrName: Okay. We're done visiting all the stores we wanted to.
engSearchText: Okay. We're done visiting all the stores we wanted to.
jpnChrName: これで目当ての店は一通り回ったな。
jpnSearchText: これで目当ての店は一通り回ったな。

engChrName: We've also got plenty of things to try! Shall we head back to Odette?
engSearchText:
We've also got plenty of things to try! Shall we head
back to Odette?
jpnChrName: 試食も揃いましたし充分ですね！ オデットたちのところへ戻りましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
試食も揃いましたし充分ですね！
オデットたちのところへ戻りましょうか。

engChrName: Enter the Student Council Room?
engSearchText: Enter the Student Council Room?
jpnChrName: 生徒会室に入りますか？
jpnSearchText: <C1>生徒会室に入りますか？

engChrName: Leave the Student Council Room?
engSearchText: Leave the Student Council Room?
jpnChrName: 生徒会室から出ますか？
jpnSearchText: <C1>生徒会室から出ますか？
